item.text: rgyud tha pa bzhugs so//
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya bi shA lI pra be sha mahA sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas
@##/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ yangs pa'i grong
khyer gal bar 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das
kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yul br-i dzir rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas/ yangs
ba'i grong khyer gyi a mra srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du song la phyin nas sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog ste/ gsang
sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smros shig /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas
'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams
pa| bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos
bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams
pa| lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams
@##/ /pa| bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka'
stsal pa/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ ma 'dug cig/ yams kyi nad rnam par zhi bar gyur cig /nirga ts+tsha ta/ nirga ts+tsha ta/
nirga ts+tsha ta/ nirga ts+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po/ lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma/ gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /
tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten
skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag
kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon bar dad pa'i 'byung po dbu ma phrag du ma dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs
te| de dag khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po byed par gyur du 'ong gi /nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig /khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang
ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la bsrung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig /lus la yang 'jug
par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su
mu ru| su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu
ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu rU ri ti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ rI rI rI rI rI rI/ ti
mi ri| mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri ti/ ha si mi ri/ mI rI ti/ mI ti/ si sI/ si mI/ kaM ka ra/ ka ka ra ta/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka tsa/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM

ka rA| kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka ro tI ti/ ku ri shaM kaM ka rA/ kaM ka ri she/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/
ti re ti phu swA/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu/ nA thA nA nA thA tha/ ri phu/ ri phu/ nA thA tha/ nirgats+tsha ta/ ri phu/ ri phu/ nirgats+tsha ta/ pa yA tha/
ri pu ri pu/ pa lA ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/
thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyi/ k+Shi phran nir gats+tsha ta swAhA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid
kyis lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /gang la ser
sna rnams chags pa/ /rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzad cing / /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba
rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ /sems
can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag
kun| |bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cig/ gling dang dpung
gnyen gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing bslu ba mi mnga' la/ /gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des//
khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cig /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa des/ /khyed la bde legs
mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos shing / /sems can thams cad rab dga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad
par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gshegs pa na/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos
kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gsung ba/ /thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des/ /khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu
stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs
mdzad/ /brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu
dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni bsam pa yis/ /khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi
khyed cag bde legs shog /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung
la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te
gshegs mdzad kyis/ /sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom
slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed
cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /
'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/ /sa dang bar snang dag na gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /de skad
ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa/ de bzhin bgyi'o zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ sgo'i
them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig
rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams
pa| slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs
pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams
pa| lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/
bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ ma 'dug cig/ yams kyi

nad thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po/ lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma/ gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /
tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha stong phrag du ma
dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can
thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyi/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig /khyed cag las gang dag
sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/ bsrung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/
lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu ru/
su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/
mi ri| mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/
mu rU ri ti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ rI rI rI rI rI rI/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri mi rI ti/ ha si mi mi rI ti/ sI si mi/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka ra ta/ kaM ka ra/
kaM ka tsa/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka ro tI ti

ku ri sho kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rI she /ri ri ri ri/ ri ri rI/ ti re ti phu swa/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ nA tha/ nA nA thA thA/ ri phu ri phu/ nA thA thA/ nirgats+tsha
ta| ri phu ri phu/ nirgats+tsha ta/ pa la yA tA/ ri pU ri pU/ pa lA ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa
dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis/ k+Shi phran nirgats+tsha ta swAhA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye
shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub bo/ /gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/ /rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing / /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad
par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa
rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /
thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun
gyi rten gyur cing / /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing bslu ba mi mnga'
la| |gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don
grub tshogs kyang grub pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos shing / /sems can thams cad rab
dga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde
legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba/ /thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /
yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed
la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /
lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/ /khyed kyis don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs
shog| khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog/ phyir ldog dag kyang bde legs shog /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /
khyed cag rtag tu bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig pa ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad cing / /sdang sems ldan pa
rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams//
grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad rnams
med par shog /kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/ /sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa
rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo rdzogs so//
rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM mu ni mu ni mahA mu na ye swAhA/ lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na bskal pa bye ba brgya
phrag brgyad khri'i bar du sdig pa byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa shAkya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs rdzogs so// //dkon mchog
gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ bi ri bi ri/ hu ru hu ru/ bai ro tsa na rash+mi sany+tso di te A gats+tsha/
AR+ya A kA sha gar+b+ha mahA kA ru Ni ka pU ra ya ha shA na/ d+hA ra ya bud+d+he bi sh+tsa ya na/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsa ri swAhA/ bton pas 'grub ste/ mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu dang / dug
dang | dug sbyar ma dang / byad stems rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /rgyal po dang / chom rkun la sogs pa thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /gang du bris te bzhag pa der
yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa rnam
par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i bla mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs
sngags kyi gzhi 'di gang gis gzung bas chos thams cad gzung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /mi khom pa brgyad las 'das par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs thams cad du yang gnod
sbyin de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed la de la nad thams cad kyis 'jigs pa med do/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ dza yot+ta ra/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ saM bo d+hi/

mahA saM bo d+hi/ a d+hi bad bo d+ha ni/ ha la ha la ha la/ hi li hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ sarba bud+d+ha/ d+harma a ba bo d+hi ni/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta s+phu Ta ni/ sarba pA pa ni/ bud+d+ha/ a d+hiSh+ThA
ne na swAhA/ 'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal
lo| |'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di 'dzin gyi/
rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ ha na ha na sA ne/ na ba sA ne/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ne/ tsa la tsa la ne/ pUrba yo ga ma nu sma ra phaT/ ma hA hastA ya swAhA/ gang
gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgyad stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ldan gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bde ldan gyi snying po rdzogs
so|| ||na maHsarba tA thA ga ta hraM da ya/ a nu ga te/ oM ku ruM gi ni swAhA/ 'di lan gcig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong du bsags pa'i
las kyi sgrib pa yang zad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying po rjes su dran pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya bud+d+hA hri da yaM nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ d+harma paR+yA ya/
bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad
bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul chos kyi dpya dgon pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/ ye shes kyi rnam par spyad
pa| sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su spyod pa/ kun nas 'od zer gyi khang bzang gi dbus na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams
cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas lung bstan pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa/ thams cad kyang de bzhin
gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ thams cad kyang gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas thabs gcig
tu bzhugs te chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'khor rgya chen po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo
mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang / mi'i skye bo phal po che'i chos kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod do/ /rigs kyi bu
'am| rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan
dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ dad dam/ lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
par 'gyur/ chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / bsnyen
bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong du 'khor ba'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho
phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de la 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
dang | nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ /de'i lus la nad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol
gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ chad pa spong ba dang / mtshon cha spong ba dang / dug gzhil bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ de la bdud sdig can gyis glag
rnyed par mi 'gyur/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ gang du yid la byas pa der bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag thams cad skrag cing dngangs la dngang
par 'gyur zhing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig go/ /sangs rgyas kyi tshig chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshig chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi tshig go /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig yin no/ /tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he su bud+d+he/ mahA bud+d+he/ i ha bud+d+he/ ta tra bud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he ma ti bud+d+he/ sarba bud+d+ha/

a nu ma te/ sarba bud+d+he/ a nu dz+nyA na te/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas te/ chos bstan pa yang mtha' yas
mod kyi/ gcig tu yid la bya ba ni mdor na chos sgom pa'o/ /gzungs 'di ni sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa ste/ chos thams

cad kyi phyag rgya yin no/ /tad+ya thA/ shud+d+he/ su shud+d+he/ su shud+d+he/ sho d+ha ni/ saM sho d+ha ni/ ni rma le ma la a pa ga te/ ga te sa mA ti kran+ti/ kra me sa ma sa re/ sa rA sa ra pa ri a sho ke/

bi sho ka/ sho ka sha ma ni/ shAn+te/ u pa shAn+te/ pa shAn+te/ a ba b+hA se/ sarba pu N+ye pa ri miN+Ti te/ sarba d+harma pra ti maN+Di te/ ha ra ha ra/ ma la ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ saM tsa ra/ tsa la tsa

la| saM tsa la/ ta la ta la ma ta la/ sa ma ta la/ ri Ne ri Ne/ su ri Ne/ sa ma ri Ne/ ri Na ma ti lo ka d+ha re/ lo ka d+ha ri Na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ Da ra Da ra/ ro d+ha ro d+ha/ mahA bi dza ya/ bA hi ni/

ha na ha na/ sarba bud+d+he/ hri phre shi tra si/ sarba dz+nyA pa the/ sarba dz+nyA pa ri mi te/ ma hA pra ti b+hA na/ saM pan+ne/ sa man+ta/ A lo ke bud+d+he/ bi Sha ye/ bud+d+ha/ pra ti maN+Di te/ b+ha ga ba te/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa
ra pra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ pra sa ra sarba sho ka a ba ga te swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad ma thag tu ri dang gnas
su bcas pa dang / tshal rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis yang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /rgya mtsho chen po
yang 'khrug/ /rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang ldeg cing 'gul to/ /bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang skrag nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang /
bdud sdig can rnams shin tu sdug bsngal zhing / yid mi bde bar gyur nas nyam thag go /sems can gang dgas chen po g.yos par mthong ba de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
ched du brjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod do/ /lha gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag gis/ lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen pos bcom ldan
'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor nas/ gang dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shAkya
seng+ge yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas skyob pas skad cig yud gang la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni snying po yi/ /gzungs 'di dag ni rab tu bshad pa yi/ /skad cig yud der sa yang
rnam drug g.yos/ /rgya mtsho 'khrugs shing bdud kyi gnas kun kyang / /rab tu g.yos nas bdud kyi ris rnams ni/ /lha dag rab tu dngangs shing 'khrugs par 'gyur/ /bdud yid mi bde
sdug bsngal mya ngan non/ /de tshe lha rnams ngo mtshar rab thos nas/ /'jig rten mgon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ /nam mkhar gnas nas me tog man dA 'thor/ /gang dag sangs rgyas mngon
dad gzhan rnams kyis/ /se mo do dang do shal spos rnams dang / /phye ma dag dang byug pa gos rnams dang / /rgyan dang dpung rgyan dag kyang rab tu 'bul/ /brgyad po 'di dag ni de'i yon
tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'o/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang / thos pa thams cad yongs su 'tshol bas mi ngoms pa'i rgyan dang
chos zab mo rnam par nges pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin par shes pa'i rgyan dang / ji ltar thos pa dang
ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin so sor rtog cing spyod pa'i rgyan dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / rgyan de yang
sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis thabs la mkhas pa'i rgyan dang / gzungs thob pa'i rgyan te/ brgyad po de dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di ni rtag tu rgyun du
yid la bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/ /gzungs kyi gzhi 'di dag rnams yid la byas na/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma rnam par bkod pa
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob bo/ /nad thams cad dang / na ba thams cad la lag pas byab par bya'o/ /bzlas brjod kyang dpag tu med par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //rgya

gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya bud+d+ha hr-i
da yaM nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi skyed mos tshal na sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi shing ljon pa kun nas seng ge'i
khri la bzhugs te/ lha'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po/ dka' thub bzang po la sogs pa
gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shing dang bshad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
phyi ma'i dus na/ 'khor bzhi bsdu ba dang / rjes su gzung ba dang / kun tu rjes su gzung ba dang / khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba dang / don thams cad dang / chos thams cad
dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams rnam pa thams cad du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes
bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs ston to/ /'chad do/ /de khyed kyis zungs la da ltar dang / nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas phyi ma'i dus na theg pa chen po la yang
dag par zhugs pa'i 'khor rnam pa bzhi rnams la ston cig/ shod cig/ yal bar mi dor bar nges par bstan par bya/ bsgrag par bya'o/ /ji tsam du phongs par gyur pa rnams dang / sgrib
pa dang ldan pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bskyang zhing nges par bstan par bya/ bsgrag par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du bgyi ste/ de bzhin gshegs
pas ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin 'di nan tan gyis yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

lha'i bu dag/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ a ma le/ nirma le/ sarba A kA ra ar+tha pa ri prAp+te/ a sa man+ta sarba ku na A kA re t+r+yad+h+we/ a saM ga

a nA pr-i ti/ sa man+ta da sha de sha/ pa ri pUr+Na dz+nyA ni/ sarba a saM ga daR+sha na prAp+te/ sarba d+harma ma bi sha ta pa ri pUr+Ne/ sarba A kA ra/ a saM ga sa ma ni te/ sa man+tA a thA ti ha ta dzet+r+ya d+h+wa da sha su/

dik+Shu pa ri prap+ta ar+the/ shAn+ta/ phra shAn+ta/ u pa shAn+ta/ sa ma shAn+ta/ bi mo k+Sha a nu prAp+te/ su pra ti bud+d+ha d+ha rmA d+hA tu/ a t+yan+ta su ni sri te/ sarba A kA ra ni sa sa rA Na/ a na pa she Sha pA

rang te/ bi pra muk+ta/ a saM yo ga bi pra yo ga s+thi te d+harma te/ ga ga na sa ma/ pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+ha/ nirma le/ a sa man+ta/ t+r+ya d+h+wa a nu ga ta/ su prAp+te pUrbAn+ta/ a pa ran+ta/ ma d+h+ya t+r+ya d+h+wa sa man+ta a
nu prap+te/ a na ba she Sha/ pa ri dz+nyA pra ha na/ b+ha ba na/ sa k+ShAd kri ya par ma pa rang+ga te/ ya thA bA di ta thA kA ri/ sarba A kA ra sam pan+ne/ sarba A kA ra ma hA/ mai tri mahA
ka ru NA/ sarba A kA rA sa mas gra ha a nu prAp+te/ lha'i bu dag /'di ni sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs te/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
'khor bzhi po las rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis lus la thogs sam/ legs par kha ton du byas te 'dzin pa des dman pa'i sems su mi bya ste/ de
bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag gi spyi gtsug gi steng gi mtshams su gnas par 'gyur ro/ /kha cig ni nges par sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /kha cig ni thos
par 'gyur/ kha cig ni chos ston par 'gyur/ kha cig ni gzungs mi brjed par 'gyur/ slob pa lam la gnas pa rnams ni lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad cing chos ston pa rgyun mi chad
par 'gyur/ kun tu 'dzin pa mi brjed par yang 'gyur/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grub par 'gyur/ de dag dang ldan na thos pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gzungs thob par
'gyur/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du rjes su thob par 'gyur ro//
khyed kyis tshe 'di la nga'i bstan pa'i dgongs pa khong du chud par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang nges par bstan par bya zhing bsgrag par bya'o/ /yal bar
mi 'dor/ phyi ba shol mi bya/ brjod par mi bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i
gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di slad ma'i dus na 'khor bzhi rnams la phyi bshol ma mchis pa dang / mi bskyud par bstan par bgyi/ bshad par bgyi'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo de dag la yang nges par bstan par bgyi zhing bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung dang mthun par 'gyur/ bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung par 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang don chen po dang / phan pa'i dngos po chen por 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag/ de'i phyir ji skad smras pa de bzhin gyis shig/ 'di ni khyed la rjes su bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dbang phyug
chen po/ dka' thub bzang po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu

chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phabs/ /rgya gar skad du/ A R+ya sarba bud+d+ha ang+ga ba ti mA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dar ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung chen po'i 'gram na/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po
chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po dag skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la 'jigs pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'byung ngo / /bzhi gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / rgud pa dang / 'chi ba'o/ /de la yang 'jigs pa chen po gcig ste/ 'di ltar 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa chen po ste/ brtsam pa med pa/ gnyen po med pa/
rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po dag de la 'jigs pa chen po gcig po de'i gnyen po ngas 'dir brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis srog rab tu stsal bas skyed bu rjes su gzung ba 'di ni/ deng bdag cag gi rnyed ba legs par rnyed
do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs su thugs mngon du phyogs te bzhugs nas/ se go la gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te/ 'di skad ces/ de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag/ sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig /des na bdag 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas sems can thams cad kyi dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu bzlog par
bgyi'o/ /sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa yang bskor bar bgyi'o zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
bskul te/ 'di skad ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag/ sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i don du bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo / /de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams su yang / 'di skad ces/ gang gi
phyir 'di dag tshe dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang ldan pa yongs su 'grub cing / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar
sangs rgyas thams cad bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsungs so/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar gyur pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i grogs mdzad par zhal gyis bzhes nas de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag thams cad 'di skad ces gsung ngo / /tad+ya thA/ tsa lA tsa la tsa le/ bi na ti/ swa sti ke/ tsakra ang+ga ti/ pra sha man+tu/ sarba ro ga a na tre/ kuN+Te kuN+Te/ mahA kuN+Te/
tsa re tsa re re/ he ma gi ri/ he ma gau ri/ he ma gau ri/ he ma ni shun+ti/ he ma si si/ kau ra be kau ra ba be/ he ku ra re/ ku ra re/ ku ma ti/ bi Sha sa ma Ni/ shi Shu bi/ tsa le tsa le/ bi tsa
le| mA bi la m+ba hu mu hu mu swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po ji snyed pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang nye bar 'dug nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ hUM hUM si si
swA hA| de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma lags par 'gum pa las bzlog par bgyi'o/
tad+ya thA/ shwe te shwe te shwe te/ le li li/ 'phags skyes pos kyang smras pa/ mA ta d+he mA tang+ge/ mA tang+gi ni/ shU mA shU mU/ yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras pa/ tsa re tsa re re swA hA
mig mi bzang gis kyang smras pa/ ba lam bi pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs
pa'i rig sngags 'di nyin re la lan re 'don na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ngan song gsum du
'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'dis sems can thams cad kyi srog la phan btags par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin gcig bzhin du tshig tu 'don
pa dang / gang yang 'di klog pa de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs ba med do/ /de'i lus la nad ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur
ro| |mes ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug gis ma yin/ lce 'bab bas ma yin no/ /gang la la rgyal pa'i bu dag rig sngags 'don pa'i sa phyogs de sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par rig par bya'o/ /yi ger 'dri ba'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la rim gro bya ba thams cad kyis bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhen/ sems can rnams la rim gro byed pa ni sangs rgyas la rim gro byed pa yin no zhes de
bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung ba'i phyir ro/ /su zhig gis 'di bris nas yan lag la btags na de'i yan lag thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
de skad ces bka' stsal nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po ji na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha pa ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// //
rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya dwA da sha bud+d+ha kan nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i
dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i
dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi
tog gi 'od me tog pad+ma baiDUR+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa/ spos mchog dam pas mchod pa/ sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa/ gtsug
tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa/ rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po
zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /su rgyal ba de'i mtshan 'dzin pa de bskal pa chen pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul pra
rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal par 'khor ba las ldog go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri med ces bya ba lung bstan te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog pad+ma bai DUR+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta
bu'i sku dang ldan pa/ spos mchog dam pas mchod pa/ sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa/ gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon
lam gyis brgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub ma thag
tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas| rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul pa'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu lha gzhon nu/ nyi ma'i sgron ma/ zla ba'i me tog/ pad+ma gser sdug nam mkha' lta bu'i sku rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer rab brgyan thogs med 'khor lo'i
dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur 'od zer rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun snang byed tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs de nyid
kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa thams cad dri med 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /tshig 'don to/ /phyag bya'o/ /lho
phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa'i rgyan la dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /yid la bya'o/ /nub phyogs
kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med zla ba'i tog gi rgyal po grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi bkod pa snang bar
mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /lho nub
kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog gi tog grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin
gshegs pa 'jigs med rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs ba
'jigs bral bag tsha mi mnga' spu zing mi byed ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgyings pa'i ming pa zhes bya ba'i
mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gzi brjid 'jigs bral rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /byams
pa| dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi
mtshan brjod la/ nyi ma bcur sdig pa thams cad kyi nyes pa bshags par bya/ dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bya/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba
dang | sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /'on kyang sdig pa
thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mi
'jigs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yang thob bo/ /ting nge
'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yang thob bo/ /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa 'ang myur
du yongs su 'dzin to/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe yang kun
tu mdzes pa dang / de'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum
tshogs pa dang / ris 'dra ba'i skye bo'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa yi/ /tshe rabs tshe rabs thams cad
du| |mthong na dga' zhing dga' byed dang / /'od byed pa dang mthu chen dang / /'byor pa chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams kyang brjod par
ba'o| |tad+ya thA/ a khe ma khe sa man+ta mu khe/ sau ti yuk+te/ ni ruk+te pra b+he/ sa ma yo ge /tsit+ta tsit+ta/ a khe ma khe/ bad ne/ bi brte/ sa man+ta gu Ni sad+yA ra me/ yuk+te pra yuk+te/ hi
li mi li/ ma sa le/ A na le/ tsa me/ a tsi Ti/ a tsi Ti/ tsa tse/ a ra he/ ba hu ts+tshe/ mA yu gra he/ he ma ba ti/ dz+ye ti ba ti/ d+ha rma tsit+te/ ts+yu ta pang ke
a bi k+Sha pe ra d+h+r-ik+Sha me| skan+d+ha baM b+hak+te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gsang sngags kyi
gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /gzungs 'di dag ni bzung byas na/ /phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i/ /bye ba drug cu'i drang srong rnams
de dag de la dgongs par 'gyur/ /skye ba dag ni kun tu yang / /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur/ /cung zad dge ba gang yin pa/ /don rnams thams cad 'byor
par 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i snying por bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon sum mthong / /gzungs 'di dag ni 'dzin byed pa/ /mkhas pa dpal ldan rdzus te skye/ /dran
dang blo gros rtogs pa dang / /mos dang shes rab rab tu 'phel/ /thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur/ /thos pa rnams kyis yongs mi nyams/ /'jig rten mgon
po 'di dag gi /mtshan rnams su zhig rjod byed pa/ /ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas ni/ /bzang 'gror myur bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi
mchog/ de dag de la mngon du 'gyur/ /byang chub rab tu de 'tshang rgya/ /zhing ni bye ba phrag stong dag/ gser gyis bkang ste sbyin byin pas/ /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs rnams
kyi| |mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa yi/ /bsod nams phung po de ches mang / /rtag tu tsha rabs dran par 'gyur/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /mi khom thams cad rnam
spangs te/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes rnyed/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/ /dad pa bla na med pa thob/ /sangs rgyas rnams la rab dad cing / /mchod pa
dam pa byed par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byed de/ /mthong nas ston la rab tu dad/ /'jig rten sgron ma mthong nas ni/ /mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur/ /mtshan
rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /'khor ba rnam par spangs nas su/ /byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgya/ /nyin zhag bdun du tshang bar ni/ /mtshan
rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed na/ /gang gis 'dren rnams mthong 'gyur ba'i/ /rgya chen mig ni sbyangs bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po de dag gi /mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin
byed pa/ /skye ba gang dang gang skye bar/ /de ni phyag bya'i 'og su 'gyur/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /bskal ba bye ba bsam yas su/ /bkur sti ma yin thob mi 'gyur/
'jig rten dag na grags pa 'thob/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /de la bskal pa du mar ni/ /lha rnams bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ /byang chub
myur du 'tshang yang rgya/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /mos med shes rab 'chal mi 'gyur/ /g.yo dang sgyu ni rnam par spangs/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyang
mthong / /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /lha dang dri za klu dbang dang / /mkha' lding lha min gsang ba pa/ /rtag tu de la srung bar byed/ /gzugs dang mtshan ni phun
sum tshogs/ /nor chen khyim du skye bar 'gyur/ /sems can kun la sbyin par byed/ /dpa' zhing gtong phod ser sna med/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya mang por/ /lha yi tsan+dan
dmar po dang / /shin tu dri zhim spos kun gyis/ /spos ngad de yi kha nas 'byung / /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /bskal pa bye bar sgra skad ni/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs
dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rtag tu chos rgyal tshul dang ldan/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /rin chen sna bdun pad+ma'i 'dab/ /bye ba stong phrag mang yod las/ /'byor
chen de skye lha gzugs ldan/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /de ni pha ma spun sdug dang / /skye bo dag gi tshogs rnams dang / /'bral bar 'gyur ba mi mthong ngo / /drang
srang chen po rnams kyi mtshan/ /bud med kyis ni gzung byas na/ /bud med lus la ma chags nas/ /skyes pa blo gros ldan bar 'gyur/ /mi yi lus ni thob gyur nas/ /bla med byang
chub thob 'gyur te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas/ /'dod pa ji bzhin mya ngan 'da'/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /de yi lus la mtshon dang ni/ /dug dang me dang rgyal
po dang / /g.yon can rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /de yi sems la nam kyang ni/ /dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa yi/ /bdud kyis glags rnyed mi
'gyur ro/ /'di dag gi ni mtshan gyi rnams/ /mi gang 'dzin par byed pa de/ /zhing ni bye ba bsam yas par/ /nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa rnams mchod
nas| |'jigs pa med par zhu ba zhu/ /de dag de yis bsam mkhyen nas/ /rgyal ba de dag lung ston 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mgon po de dag las/ /lung bstan pa ni thob gyur nas/ /de
ni shin tu yi rang ste/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la the tshom med/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /'jig rten mgon po rnams las ni/ /zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur te/ /thos nas
thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de nas pha rol phyin pa dang / /mi 'jigs ba dang stobs rnams dang / /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams/ /ma lus bar ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /
sangs rgyas de dag rnams kyi ni/ /gang gi zhing du 'dong 'gyur ba/ /der ni bla med yang dag rdzogs/ /byang chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ /skyes pa
'am ni bud med gang / /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa yi/ /yon tan 'di dag gzhan dag kyang / /sangs rgyas bskal bar rgyun du gsungs/ /bag yod ldan par gyur nas ni//
yon tan phun sum 'di thos nas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/ /de dag mtshan rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'di dag dpal snying po/ /sprin gyi rgyal po
mi yi mchog /'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gis/ /mtshan ni bskal par gang nyan dang / /gang dag 'di rnams mtshan nyan cing / /thos nas gus par byed 'gyur ba/ /de dang
de dag shes rab che/ /rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /drang srong chen po de dag gis/ /'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos gyur nas/ /bag yod ldan zhing mkhas gyur
la| |shes rab ldan pa su mi 'dzin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs
te| bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar
gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //
rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sap+ta bud+d+ha kaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ti se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas na drang srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang
yang mi ring ba zhig na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / kun tu bzang po dang / mtha' yas me tog dang / kun nas me tog
dang | de dag la sogs pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na dge
slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas brdol zhing gcer bu gos med la lag pa sgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nam mkha'i dkyil na kyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa 'di dang / dge slong gcer
bu gos ma mchis la/ lag pa bstod pa cig shos 'di yang su zhig lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i
snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po/ 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no/ /cig shos 'di yang nad kyis btab pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog
pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa mdzad de/ de nas nam
mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo / /bdun pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub ba'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
rnam par gzigs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad
bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha la ha la/ hi li hi lA ya/ na mo dza ga
na mi tsa nA ya/ na mo na maHswAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po/ gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs
chu dang / me'i sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de dug zos kyang zas bzhin
du 'gyur ro/ /zas dang / skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te zos na/ pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/ /ring du
'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod
byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin no/ /mdze dang / skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la/ sna ma'i mar dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / shu ti dang / nye'u shing pa rnams bsres pa'i mar byin na
nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can
thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud+d+ha
ya| na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+ha ya/ oM pa tsa pa tsa pa tsA ya pa tsA ya/ sarba b+hU tA nAM/ ts+tshin+d+ha ya/ kI la ya/ pa ra bid+yA nAM swAhA/ nam mkha'i snying po/ sems can thams cad
la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / bsgom nyes pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i
phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing / ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di zungs shig/ nam mkha'i snying po/ gang la la zhig nga'i
snying po 'di nyin lan gsum yid la byed na de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /
gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni/ nad
thams cad la skud pas bcing bar bya'o/ /'dus pa las gyur pa la ni sna ma'i mar las bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no/ /chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /skud pas bdag srung ngo / /byis
pa rnams kyi gdon dag la skud pa sngon po gdags so/ /mtshon btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/ /gzhan dag la yang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad
bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ oM ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ku lod sA d+hA nAM/
ku ru sarba gra hA NAM swAhA/ nam mkha'i snying po/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba
thams cad kyis gsungs shing / ngas kyang da ltar bshad de/ nam mkha'i snying po/ khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zungs shig/ gang la la
zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ rims nad kyis mi 'debs
shing chu dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge
bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang par langs nas mgo bkrus te de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams
cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sems can sdang ba gang dag rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa
thams cad kyi nang du yid la bya'o/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad du skud pa dkar po gdags so/ /mig nad la shing 'o ma can
las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags so/ /dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang / sbrang rtsi la sngags pa'i 'bras yos la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /
rA dzA naM rA dzA ma tra ba shI ka ra tu k+Sha me na/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /bdag dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa
thams cad dang / sdig pa sbyangs zhing dpal chen po dang / nor gyi phung po chen po bsgrub par 'dod na/ 'o ma can gyi shing sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong
sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags thams cad 'grub par 'dod pa dang / bdag bkru bar 'dod pas shu ti dang / na la dang /
khre dang / shi ri sha dang / rgya spos dang / gur gum dang / gla sgang dang / in+d+ra ba ru dang / byang chub kyi shing dang / a mra'i mgo thogs dang / 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste /sangs
rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bya zhing bum pa gsar pa bzhag ste/ zla ba nya la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags la khrus bya'o/ /dug
mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi thur ma ba'i lci bar smyugs la brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur
ro| |gdon dang / srung ba dang / 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la yang sbyar ba byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa log par dad sel steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsam g+hA ya/ na maHkra kuts+tsha na dA ya/ ta thA ga tA
ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ oM ka Ta ka Ta/ ka Tha ka Tha/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ki Thi ki Thi/ ki TA pa ya na maHswAhA/ nam mkha'i snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel ces bya ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'i snying po 'di khyod kyis zungs shig /
blangs shing bzung ste kun chub par byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus
byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dag gis mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par 'gyur te/ tshe rabs
bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /yang na mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na cho
ga bzhin du bsgrubs na de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ tshe 'di la yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams
cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /zas dang / skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun sngags te zos 'thung na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste skom
zhi bar 'dod na/ bza' ba thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o/ /lhog rgal bcad na zangs khab kyis bya'o/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / bcings pa
thams cad las thar bar bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/ rtag tu nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /
ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na des phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi 'khor sar dkyil 'khor bskus la a ga rus bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
brjod byas la/ de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs su stan te nyal na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yid la ci smos pa de thams cad ston to/ /tshe 'am/
stobs sam/ pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i
don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA

ya| na maHsaM g+ha ya/ na maHka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ si ri si ri/ si rA ya/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/
d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu ma ya/ na mo na ma/ ka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya swAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub
sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyi
'jigs pa mi 'byung / me dang / chu dang / lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par
'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ tshe ring por 'gyur/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad
par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste
pha rol nad las thar bar byed par 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing po ga gam/ a ga rus bdugs la gza' thams cad la khrus bya'o/ /mdze dang / skrangs nad dang / mchin
skran la shu dag 'jam po btags la sbrang rtsi dang bsres te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags la bskus na mdze nad thams cad sos par
'gyur ro/ /zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags te mi'i mgo la bcings na zhag bzhi pa'i rims
sos par 'gyur ro/ /mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na brjed byed las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis
bdug go /de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de/ las thams cad pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te sems can
thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud
d+hA ya| na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ oM ha ra ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ha ha/ na maHkA sh+ya bA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ sid+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pA da swAhA/ de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i
snying po/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po/ khyod kyis kyang snying po 'di zungs
shig| kun chub par gyis shig/ gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ nyin mo'am/ mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas brjod byed na/ mdor
na| rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so/ /las thams cad la
yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /mdze dang / sha gar la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags te bklags shing bkrus na
sos par 'gyur ro/ /klad pa na ba la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o//
thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan
ba'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ g+hu me g+hu me/ mahA g+hu me/ ta le ta le/ ma hA ta le/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA
tsa le| d+hu re d+hu re/ mahA d+hu re/ ti ri ti ri/ mahA ti ri/ ki li li li/ ma hA ki li/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA tsu ru/ mi li mi li/ ma hA mi li/ ti li ti li/ ma hA ti li/ d+hu me d+hu me/ ma hA
d+hu me| tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ khi ri khi ri/ ma hA khi ri/ tsi li tsi li/ ma hA tsi li swAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klad pa'i nad bsal na mtshon dang / lag mthil gyis bya'o/ /sprin bzlog na shing ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas bya'o/ /dug
sbyong na chus bya'o/ /las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o/ /khrus kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o/ /chog thams cad kyis/ dus thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa
sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn a mi tA b+ha d+hA ra NI man+t+ra/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das
snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs sngags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba
mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi te d+b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+ta kA re/ a mi ta ga ga na kIrti ka re sarba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swAhA/ gzungs
'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las gyi sgrib pa yang 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod byas na sgrib pa de rnams zad bar 'gyur ro/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
bzlas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang yongs su byang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas rjes su
dran par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ma hI du hi ke swAhA/ lus la nad byung ba dang / nad khong skams
su gyur kyang rung ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags te/ bsil yab kyis de la g.yabs na nad med par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs sngags de gsungs ma thag tu 'khor
thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba la mngon par bstod do// //bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs rdzogs so//
bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi to d+b+ha be/ a mi ta saM
b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+ta gA mi nI/ gA ga na kIrti ka re/ sarba kle shak+Sha yaM ka ri swAhA/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang lan gsum
bzlas pa byas na de rnams zad par rig par bya'o/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa byas na/ rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang sdig pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge
ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par yang 'gyur ro/ /snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran pa rdzogs so// //zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ tsan+d+re tsan+d+re/ su tsan+d+re/ ma ti tsan+d+ra/ tsan+d+ra ki ra Na/ si ri si ri/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ki li ki li/ d+harmA a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ki li ki li/ saM g+ha a
d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rtag tu nang bar langs te/ zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchan dran par byed pa de ni bskal pa bzhi khri'i
tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ de ni ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zla ba'i 'od gyi mtshan rjes su dran pas yon tan de rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan
rjes su dran pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na shi khi ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te
samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ rat+ne rat+ne rat+ne shi khi ne swAhA/ 'chi ba'i che dran na ngan song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ 'chi 'phos nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gnam
gyi lhar skye'o/ /sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya bi ma la nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/
'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ril bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal
pa| blo gros rnam par dag pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pas de
bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ bzod pa yongs su dag bas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros rnam par dag pa/
phan pa'i dngos po yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byams pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo
gros rnam par dag pa/ snying rje yongs su dag pa dang / dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam
par dag pa/ rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros rnam par dag
pa| stobs yongs su dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag
pa| thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la/
su zhig me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyi bsti stang du byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi
phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs par/ bsod
nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mthar yang zad par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam bar dag ba/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas
kyi chos thams cad kyi tshad med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med do/ /mtha' yas so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mtshungs pa med do/ /
grangs med do/ /dpag gis mi lang ngo / /brjod du med do/ /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la bsti stang du
byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya
ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / yang dag par sems
nye bar bzhag ste/ byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa
dang | rjed par byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / gsol ba dang / bsngags pa dang / skor ba byed ba des phan yon lngar shes par bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan
'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur pa dang / myur du bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mthong
nas kyang dad pa bskyed par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon lnga po dag tu shes par bya'o/ /de nas/ gzhan yang / chos bzhir shes par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
pas bstan pa'i tshig so sor 'dzin pa dang / de dag kyang ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du
sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos
bzhi dang ldan na bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs che ba dang / btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams yid la byed pa dang / phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
kyi byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ bdud dam/ bdud kyi rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams
kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa bskyed de/ pus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas phyag btsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa de ci 'dra bar bdag kyang de 'dra ba'i lus thob par gyur cig ces de ltar mos pa bskyed na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ bsod nams
kyi phung po de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya
byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang zad par byar mi
nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des/ bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ba
yin te/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas pa grong khyer du 'jug gam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong du 'jug kyang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rgyu yang rung / 'chag kyang rung / 'greng yang rung /
'dug kyang rung / chos ston kyang rung / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ lha ma yin
nam| nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa 'am/ shing ngam/ ri 'am/ khung bu'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ thams
cad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / kun tu 'dud ba mi byed pa de gang yang med de/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge
ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho
brang 'khor na rgyu ba la sems can rnams 'dud/ rab tu 'dud/ kun tu 'dud par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /a mi tA a mi

te pra b+ha be mahA pra b+he/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ bcom ldan 'das
mthus bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthus bstan du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/
smr-i ti| smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ mahA smr-i ti/ mahA smr-i ti/ chags pa mi mnga' ba/ gti mug bsal du gsol/ so me/ so me/
so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya
mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu ba na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ shi khi shi khi/ shi khi shi khi/ shi
khi shi khi/ shi khi shi khi/ shi khi shi khi/ zhi bar gyur cig /nad med par gyur cig /bgegs med par gyur cig/ pra b+ha ba ti/ mahA ma d+ye/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/
rash+mi| rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi mtshan yang gzung bar bya zhing phyag bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ bcom ldan
'das rin chen 'byung gnas dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi ma dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen bla ma dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mkhregs dang /
bcom ldan 'das rin chen me tog dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phro dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mi 'khrugs pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / bcom ldan 'das dbyangs dpag med dang / bcom ldan 'das thub dka' dang / bcom ldan 'das grangs pa mtha' yas dang /
bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das bde chen brnyes dang / bcom ldan 'das skar ma'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das bden dbyangs dang /
bcom ldan 'das nad kyi dri ma bral ba dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba dkar dang / bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dkar dang / bcom
ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das 'od dag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mtha' yas dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po dang / bcom
ldan 'das rin chen 'byung dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sde dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sgra dang / bcom ldan 'das
pad+ma'i mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das yan lag mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom
ldan 'das gser lta bur snang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'byung gnas dang / bcom ldan 'das klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom
ldan 'das me tog dang / bcom ldan 'das spos thams cad kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das phreng ba'i rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das dpa' brtan pa'i
sde dang / bcom ldan 'das mtshon cha spong dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po nor bu rin po che dang / bcom ldan 'das dpag med rtogs 'od dang / bcom
ldan 'das seng ge sgra dang / bcom ldan 'das seng ge dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das mthu chen brtson 'grus nges 'byung dang / bcom ldan 'das snying
pos zil gnon dang / bcom ldan 'das rnga sgra'i rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma zil gnon dang / bcom ldan 'das
'jig rten sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das me dang / bcom ldan 'das skrag byed dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mu khyud dang / bcom ldan 'das rtag tu yongs
su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / bcom ldan 'das blo yangs dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen dpag med sprul 'dod dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab ltar rnam
par gnon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rin chen mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'dus pa'i dpal dang / bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo
rin po che'i tshig gi dpal dang / bcom ldan 'das kun nas rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag pa brnyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das
lhun po dang / bcom ldan 'das lhun po chen po dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab dang / bcom ldan 'das shin tu lhun po dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu'o/ /tad+ya thA/
pa ta pa ta/ da ma da ma/ g+ha ma g+ha ma swAhA/ shar phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag bzhugs pa
'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la nad med pa dang / zhi bar mngon du srung du gsol/ lho phyogs logs na sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar mngon du srung du gsol/ nub phyogs logs
na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar mngon du srung du gsol/
byang phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag la
nad med pa dang / zhi bar mngon du srung du gsol/ 'og gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar mngon du srung du gsol/ steng gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de
dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar mngon du srung du gsol/ phyogs mtshams logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar mngon du srung du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ bi ma le/ bi ma lA

te| rig sngags 'di ni rig sngags che/ /lha rnams kyis ni brjod pa yin/ /'di ni dus gsum brjod byas na/ /nad rnams la ni yongs su thar/ /mi ma yin gyis gang byas
dang | |sdig pa gang dag sbyor byas dgrol/ /de dag dran pa brjed mi 'gyur/ /bzung ba rnams kyang chud mi za/ /de dag skye ba rnams su yang / /rtag tu sangs rgyas 'bral mi
'gyur/ /su zhig dri ma med pa'i gzungs/ /'di ni dga' bas 'dzin byed pa/ /zhing rnams kun tu rgyu ba na/ /dpal ldan pad+ma'i snying por 'byung / /mtshan rnams kyis ni
legs par brgyan/ /yan lag 'od zer dra ba 'byung / /tad+ya thA/ ku Ti ku Ti/ kuts+tsha lo/ e la e la/ muk+ta/ kod thA lo/ e ri ri/ ri mr-i ti swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par dag pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi
mkhan po ja ni mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan
la phab pa// //@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya bi she Sha ba ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sbrul gyi lo'i dgun zla ra ba tshes
nyi shu la yul phug ron can na/ grong khyer siny+tso zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe dge slong tshe brjod ces bya ba don zhig gi phyir/ grong khyer gnas
song zhes bya bar song ste/ dge slong de rgya yul gyi grong khyer nas dpag tshad brgya'i lam du phyin pa dang / dge slong des bar der mi lus chen po khrun du mtho sum cu
yod pa/ bzhin mtho bzhi pa zhig rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dge slong tshe brjod des mi de lta bu de la 'di snyam du bsams te/ kye ma/ mi 'di ni lus
che ste/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba yin du nges so snyam nas/ des pus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ mi lus chen po ga la ba de logs su
