pad kan can la phur bu'i bdag /skye 'gyur nyung du za ba dang / /tsha dang skyur ba'i ro bsten cing / /de yi tshe ni ring 'gyur zhing / /dran dang ldan pa skye bar 'gyur/ /spyod pa dang ni
rjes spyod pa/ /rlung nad can gyi bshad par bya/ /mdog mi sdug dang rtsub mdog dang / /bong tshod med cing shin tu rjud/ /blo nyams shes rab med pa
dang / /mi brtan gnas pa med pa dang / /lus ni 'gul dang 'khor ba dang / /skyug cing bshang gci mang du 'byung / /mang du za zhing rtag par za/ /de dag gang phyir nad mang
'gyur/ /'jig rten rigs dang mi mthun zhing / /dgra ni mang po skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni sa steng 'di dag tu/ /tshul 'chal sdug bsngal skye 'gyur te/ /mi snang ba yi sngags
dag ni/ /de la 'grub par bstan pa yin/ /gang zhig rlung nad 'khrug byed pa'i/ /zas la de ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /zlos pa las ni grub 'dod pas/ /de ni yongs su
bsten mi bya/ /sems can rlung nad 'khrug pa la/ /gti mug nye bar zhi ba dang / /rmongs pa'i rigs can la gsungs pa/ /rmongs pa'i sngags ni rab sgrub pa/ /rtag tu
de dag rmongs pa la/ /rmongs pa dag ni 'grub par 'dod/ /rgyu skar khyim ni chu skyes dang / /gza' ni bdag po spen par blta/ /rlung nad skyes pa'i sems can ni/ /
dge ba'i las la mi spyod de/ /'byung po dbang dang 'gugs par byed/ /de bzhin rmongs dang rengs pa'o/ /rlung nad can gyi sems can la/ /gti mug can de sdig
pa byed/ /rmi lam bden par mthong ba ni/ /mtshan nyid 'di dag gsungs pa ni/ /sems can rnams kyi don sgrub pa/ /thub pa rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa'o/ /lug glang dang ni sbyor

ba dang / /sbal pa seng ge nyid dang ni/ /srang dang bu mo sdig pa dang / /de bzhin gzhu dang chu srin dang / /bum pa nya dang glang po dang / /lha dang spre 'u lha ma yin/ /grub dang dri za gnod sbyin
sogs/ /mi rnams gang gis rab bsgrags pa/ /sems can rnams kyi khyim mang po/ /gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /rnam pa mang po sna tshogs don/ /rnam pa sna
tshogs las bstan pa/ /de dag las ni thams cad la/ /yon tan rgya cher smin par 'gyur/ /las las gol ba med par ni/ /lus can yon tan mi
smin te/ /yon tan kho na las ldan pas/ /skye bar yang ni byed pa yin/ /yon tan chos don ldan pa ni/ /sngags la 'grub pa skye bar 'gyur/ /zlos pa sems can yon
tan shes/ /yon tan yon tan min las 'ching / /yon tan med la bya min gang / /de yi las ni bya ba min/ /gang phyir bya ba las byed de/ /bya ba yon tan med pa yin/ /bya
ba las dang yon tan nyid/ /yang dag ldan pa sgrub par 'gyur/ /chog sngon 'gro bya ba'i las/ /stobs bcu ldan pas sngon bstan to/ /rdzas dang sems can spyod
pa gzhan/ /bya ba las dang yon tan yin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rmi lam tshul/ /las las 'byung bar snang ba yin/ /de bas rmi lam mtshan ma
yis/ /rgya che las la rab sbyar bya/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa dang / /yid 'ong blta na sdug pa dang / /bgegs kyi gzugs dang gzugs med pa/ /rmi lam rgyur ni snang ba
yin/ /mthu che sbro ba che ba ni/ /mi ni grub pa 'dod pa yin/ /mchog dang tha ma 'bring dag ni/ /de dag la ni grub par brtag /drag cing las rnams ma rungs ni/ /rmi lam
rtag tu 'phral du min/ /bzang po bstan pa'i las dag ni/ /yun ring dus su grub phyir ro/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das rnams kyi/ /yon tan skye par yang dag 'byung //
rmi lam rnam pa sna tshogs snang / /zlos pas sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi 'grub don du sngags rnams ni/ /gnyid dang snyom pa rab tu brtag /bgegs 'joms
byed pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /de yi dus su rab tu brtag /de tshe sngags ni rigs tshul gyis/ /zlos pas de tshe rab tu sbyar/ /khro bo chen po phyag drug dang / /zhal drug nyid
du brtag par bya/ /sngags chen yi ge bzhi ba ni/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs la gnas pa yin/ /drag po'i gzugs ni gzugs chen bo/ /phag gi rnam par yang dag 'byung / /bgegs
kun rnam par gzhig bya'i phyir/ /dus mtshan de ni lha yi rgyal/ /stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ /sprul gyi gdengs ka rnam par 'phyang / /lag na ral gri sems dpa' che/ /
gzi brjid chen po gshin rje'i gzugs/ /bgegs rnams kun la gtse bar byed/ /log 'dren rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed/ /'byung po kun ni rab nyon cig /mi bzad
sngags ni bshad par bya/ /cho 'phrul chen po bgegs rnams kun/ /ma rungs sems can 'jigs par byed/ /sngags rnams kun ni sgrub byed pa/ /lha yi tshogs rnams nga

la nyon/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ t+d+ya thA/ he he mahA kro d+ha Sha Na mu khaSh+Ta tsa ra Na/ sarba big+h+Na big+h+Na g+hA ta ka hUM hUM/ kiny+tsi ra ya si bi nA yA ka dzI bi tan+ta
ka ra duHswa b+na ma nA sha ya/ la hu la hu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phaT phaT swAhA/ /khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'di gsungs ma thag tu bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad 'jigs
shing nyam thag nas snying gas te yid shin tu skrag nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed cing dam tshig la
gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen
po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye kye lha'i tshogs chen po dag /khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams
cad kyi sngags rnams 'don par byed pa na/ gang zhig ma rungs pa'i sems can gyi gzugs can gyis rnam par 'tshe bar byed pa de la/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis ni rigs rgyud thams
cad 'dul bar byed cing srog kyang 'dzin par mi byed de/ yongs su gdung bar byed cing yongs su skem par byed pa'i rnam par gzhag par bya ba la 'jog par byed cing zlos
pa dag la yang srung ba dang / sba ba dang / sbed pa la gnas par 'jog par byed cing rjes su 'phel bar byad pa dang / gang zhig dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed ba
dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos sgrub pa po bsrung bar byas pa la rnam par tho 'tsham par byed na mgo bo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du rnam pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /thub
pa mchog gis legs gsungs nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la de tshe gsungs/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rnams la/ /ma lus don ni rgya chen ngon/ /sngags rgyud don
dang ldan pa dang / /sgrub pa rnams la khyad par du/ /bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms pa yi/ /rgyud la khro rgyal bstan pa yin/ /'jig rten mgon gyis sngon 'di ni/ /
de bzhin du ni yang dag sbyar/ /ma lus bgegs rnams 'jig bya'i phyir/ /dgra rnams kyi ni khro ba sel/ /zlos pas rtag tu 'di dag ni/ /mtshan mo rtag tu gdon byas la/ /
sems can rnams ni srung don dang / /rmi lam ngan pa sel bar byed/ /sngags rnams ma lus sgrub pa la/ /'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang
rab bshad pa/ /skyes bu'i mtshan nyid bzang po yin/ /gang la sngags rnams 'grub 'gyur ba/ /mchog dang tha ma bar ma 'o/ /gzi brjid ldan dang shes ldan dang / /gser
mdog gsus pa che ba dang / /dkyus ring mig dang snum pa dang / /chags chung khro ba rnam par spangs/ /mig rtsa dmar zhing snyan par smra/ /de la grub pa mchog 'gyur la/ /
lpags pa sra ba cing sngo bsangs mdog/ ha cang ring min yan lag phra/ /spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che/ /chog shes kun nas dge ba byed/ /skye gnas bzang po dag pa
dang / /'dod pa chung zhing cung zad dge/ las rnams kun la snang ba ni/ /de la nges par grub pa mchog/ yan lag thams cad mtshang med/ /dur bsngo bsangs gzi brjid che/ /
nyon mongs med sems shes pa can/ /rtag tu gtsang zhing changs par spyod/ /phra ba'i gsol rtag tu dga'/ /chos kyi ngang tshul 'jig rten shas/ /grogs mang rtag tu
gtong ba dang / /zas tshod rig dag rtag gtsang ldan/ /shes nyen tshul khrims spyod ba dang / /gtsang ba'i spyod la rtag tu dga'/ /bden par smra
zhing snying rje can/ /de la grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /yon tan rgya che yan lag tshang / /rigs ldan rtag tu chos dang ldan/ /pha dang ma la gus pa dang / /bram ze la ni mchod
pa byed/ /shin tu snying rje ldan zhing brtan/ /de la'ang grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /sngo bsangs dkar dang snum pa dang / /rtag tu gtsang zhing nyung du smra/ /bsod pa'i kha zas
la dga' zhing / /gtsang ba'i spyod bas mngon par 'gro/ /mang 'dod sems can 'jig rten shes/ /de la'ang grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /ha cang ring min thung ba'ang min/ /
sku ni mig sman bzhin du gnag/ mig dang mig 'bras rab tu snum/ /gtsang zhing rtag tu khrus la dga'/ /dkon mchog gsum la shin tu dad/ /de yi grub pa
mchog tu 'gyur/ /mchog gi las ni rab ston cing / /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes/ /bzod ldan snyan par smra ba dang / /rgyal pa'i sras la rab tu dga'/ /de
tshe 'jig rten 'das pa grub/ /de 'bras bcas pa grub par 'gyur/ /sems dpa' che zhing brtson 'grus che/ /gzi brjid che zhing brtul zhugs che/ /longs spyod che
zhing sngags rnams shes/ /sngags rnams kun la de nyid rig/ rigs kyi mchog ni rgyal rigs sam/ /bram ze shes dang ldan ba dang / /bud med la brten de la chags/ /de bzhin
gser gyi mdog dang ldan/ /bong tshod che zhing dkar ba dang / /sna ni mtho zhing lag ba che/ /dpa' zhing lag pa ring ba dang / /rgyal po che la mngon par 'dod/ /rgyal pa'i sras la
dad pa dang / /bud med ming ldan lha la mchod/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus pa dang / /byang chub sems kyis brgyan pa yin/ /lhag par snying rje brtan pa dang / /cung zad khro
zhing cung zad rmongs/ /longs spyod che zhing gtong ba che/ /gzi brjid che zhing thul bar dka'/ /bud med rnams ni dga' dang dpa'/ /de yi grub pa'ang mchog yin no/ /shin
tu btung dang dga' dang dpa'/ /rtag tu bud med la chags dang / /gser gyi mdog dang byin pa phra/ /rked pa che zhing gtsang ba dang / /brtse dang snying rje ldan mkhas pa/ /yon
tan mang 'dod 'jig rten shes/ /rtag tu sngags rnams zlos la gus/ /rgyal ba la ni srog kyang gtong / /de bzhin nyan thos sras rnams dang / /bse ru la yang rtag tu gtong / /
stobs ldan 'jig rten gtso bo dang / /rigs ni gnyis pa bzang po yin/ /yan lag thams cad ma tshang med/ /ma rungs rtag tu bab col byed/ /gtong ldan tshul ldan dgra las
rgyal| |chos dang chos min rnam dpyod byed/ /ha cang sbom min rjud pa'ang min/ /ha cang ring min thung ba'ang min/ /bar ma'i mi ni mchog yin te/ /de
yi grub pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /sen mo zangs mdog legs snum dang / /lag mthil dmar dang gtsang ba dang / /rkang ba'i mthil dmar snum pa dang / /'khor lo swa sti kas
brgyan dang / /rgyal mtshan rta babs nya dang ni/ /ba dan pad+ma thob dang / /mi gang rkang ba lag pa la/ /mtshan ni 'di dag yod gyur pa/ /de 'dra'i skyes bu dam pa la/ /grub
pa mchog tu brtag par bya/ /mche ba dkar zhing bzang ba dang / /mtho ba'i ri bo dang 'dra dang / /sna bzang mtho zhing mig dkyus ring / /smin ma stug cing kos ko bzang / /ba yi
rdzi ma 'jig rten mtshan/ /nag pa'i lta ba'i mig 'bras mtshan/ /dpral ba'i dbyes gang rgya che zhing / /mgo bo gdugs 'dra'i rnam pa bzang / /mgo bo gtsug tor 'dra
ba dang / /rna ba bzang ba dam pa yin/ /rtag tu seng ge'i 'gram 'dra dang / /ma mchu bim pa smin 'dra'i mdog/ gang gi lce ni rab snang ba/ /pad+ma 'dab ma dmar 'dra'i mdog
mgrin pa bum pa 'dra ba dang / /thal gong rgyas shing yang dag 'phags/ /mchan khung thong ka bzang ba mchog/ /de bzhin brla ni rgya che dang / /lte ba'i phyogs kyang chung ba
dang / /rked pa rgya che bzang ba dang / /lte ba zab cing g.yas su 'khyil/ /kun nas dkar med ba spu dang / /lag ring lag ni ne ba dang / /rked pa seng ge 'dra ba'i mtshan/ /gang gi brla
ni zlum pa dang / /gru mo nyams med zlum pa dang / /byin pa e na ya lta bur/ /zlum po'i nang na zlum por grub/ /rkang ba sha dang ldan pa dang / /sor mo rnams ni
ring ba yin/ /dmar zhing sen dmar snum pa dang / /sha rgyas pas ni snum pa yin/ /nang stong ma yin mthil mnyam gnas/ /dge zhing mthong na dga' ba dang / /'jam zhing
kha dog dag pa dang / /rab bsngags 'jig rten bkra shis dang / /de dag gi ni steng dag tu/ /rtsa yi dra ba mngon pa med/ /bshang ba 'byung ba'i lam dag tu/ /ri mo zab cing
g.yas su 'khyil/ /mchig pa rab bsngags shin tu chung / /rtag tu zlum zhing dge ba yin/ /ma 'brel dum bum yin dang / /gcig min nyid du bstan pa yin/ /gang tshe
skyes dbang gtsang ba dang / /rtse mo dmar la yang ngag gnas/ /skye bo nyal khar kha zas ni/ /ro ni btsa' bar byed pa za/ /bshang ba kha dog sngo ba'am/ /gal te dmar po rab
snang zhing / /mang po ma yin snum pa dang / /dge pa'i mtshan gyis rab mtshan ba/ /de lta'i sems can gang yin pa/ /grub pa mchog tu 'dod pa yin/ /lan gsum
bshang zhing sngags drug dang / /gtsang sbra'i spyod dka' yongs su gtsang / /gang zhig thun ni tha mar nyal/ /tho rangs ldang ba'i skye bo rnams/ /de yi grub
pa rtag tu mchog/ las kun byed par snang ba yin/ /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /phun tshogs rnam pa mang po la/ /mi rnams rjes su 'dod pa yang / /mtshan nyid
kyis ni mngon mtshan pa'o/ /rgyu skar dag la'ang skyes pa ni/ /rgyal dang nam gru gre dbo dang / /mchu dang lha mtshams dag dang ni/ /nag pa snar ma smin drug dang / /nus
pa'i gza' rnams kyis mtshan pa/ /de dag la ni skyes mthong dang / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char kha ni/ /tho rangs dus su gang skyes dang / /gang tshe de yi dus su skyes/ /de la
grub par rab tu snang / /nyin phyed dang ni tho rangs dang / /nyi ma'i mthar yang gza' bzang po/ /dkar ba zla ba ba sangs/ /ser ba gza' lhag phur bu yin/ /skye bo rnams kyis
mthong na ni/ /'bras bu 'grub phyir nus pa yin/ /mi ni gang zhig dge las kyis/ /'di la skyes par gyur pa yi/ /sngags don ma lus sgrub pa la/ /de dag 'bad med
'grub par 'gyur/ /nyi ma phyed ni 'das pa dang / /rtag tu nyi ma nub pa na/ /lus can rnams kyis rtag de la/ /ma rungs gza' mthong gang yin pa/ /ma rungs nyi ma mig
dmar dang / /mjug ring sgra gcan spen pa dang / /gang yang gza' ni gtso bo dang / /las ni ngan 'joms skar mda' can/ /skar ma shin tu mi bzad nyid/ /de bzhin nag po 'chi
ltas dang / /dus min 'chi ba sa la ni/ /mi bzad de tshe snang ba yin/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su ni/ /gza' lhag gis ni sa rnams mthong / /gnya' shing gang tsam nyi mas phyin/ /
phur bus sa de mthong par 'gyur/ /de nas pha rol gnya' shing tsam/ /pa sangs nor spyan gyis de mthong / /nyi ma phyed ni yongs rdzogs na/ /zla bas lus can ma lus mthong / /
gza' lhag dus su rgyal thabs thob/ /phur bus nor dang longs spyod byed/ /pa sangs nor ni nges sgrub dang / /rgyal srid tshe dang longs spyod ldan/ /zla ba de bzhin tshe ring zhing / /
dbang phyug dang ni 'bras bu bcas/ /de bzhin nyin phyed nyi ma ni/ /nyi ma phyed du mnyam par mthong / /rtag tu nyin phyed rnam 'das na/ /nyi mas phyogs ni mthong bar byed/ /
thung gyur nyi ma gnya' shing tsam/ /byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni/ /sgra gtan spen pa nyid dag yin/ /mun pa dus dang dus mthar byed/ /de nas phar ni thung pa na/ /'chi ltas skar
mda' sa 'gul byed/ /li khri tshogs kyis mdog bsgyur ba'o/ /nyi ma nub gar zangs ma'i mdog/ gza' yi gtso bo gang yin de/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i tshul 'dzin cing / /
lag na mdung thogs ma rungs pa/ /mig dmar nyid kyis mthong ba yin/ /de nas nyi ma gnya' shing 'das/ /dge ba'i gza' ni 'byung ba yin/ /nyi
mas mthong ba las skyes pa/ /ma rungs bab col byed bar 'gyur/ /spen pa mig dmar las skyes pa/ /khro ldan brkam zhing nga rgyal can/ /mjug rings 'chi ltas
dus rnams la/ /skyes ba nad ni yang dag 'byung / /dbul zhing nad btab glen pa dang / /de bzhin du ni rtag tu rmongs/ /dus dang mun pa 'gul byed dang / /skar mda' can
dang gza' ngan dang / /'gul byed sgra drag dmar ba'i mdog/ gnam lcags nyid kyang rab rdung byed/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'chi ltas dang / /gzhan yang khyim sogs rab tu
mthong / /skye bo kun gyi sgra gcan ni/ /mi bzad rab tu mthong gyur na/ /dbul zhing mgon med tshul khrims 'chal/ /mi ni rtag tu sdig pa spyod/ /mi ni sdug bsngal skye
'gyur te/ /nad kyi gzhi ni skye bar 'gyur/ /mdze can nad ni mang ba dang / /long ba 'theng po shu bar bcas/ /za ma ma ning mo sham dang / /bud med mtshan ni ngan pa dang //
skyes pa bud med de bzhin gzhan/ /gza' ni ngan pa mthong ba yin/ /de ltar skyes gyur skyes pa dag /'jig rten mang po skye ba yin/ /dkar dang ser ba'i gza' mchog
ni| |de dag las skyes dge ba yin/ /mdog ni dkar dang ser ba dag/ rgyal bas rab tu bsngags par gsungs/ /gza' ni gtso bo bzhir bshad pa/ /pa sangs zla ba bla ma lhag /
zlos pa las rnams kun la ni/ /de dag mthong na 'grub pa'i don/ /sems can byis ba rnams la yang / /rtag tu de dag skye ba bzang / /lo ni kun la'ang 'dod pa zhes/ /'jig
rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /skad cig tsam yang de bzhin du/ /mig 'byed mig 'dzum se gol gtogs/ /'di ni mdor bsdus skye ba zhes/ /'jig rten mchog
gis gsungs pa yin/ /'di tsam gyi ni tshad dag tu/ /gza' kun 'jig rten dgongs pa yin/ /de dag de bzhin rtag tu 'char/ /'di dag dus kyi de nyid yin/ /'di dag
dge dang sdig pa'i gza'/ /'khor lo bzhin du rtag tu 'khor/ /'jig rten dge dang mi dge byed/ /de nyid 'jig rten gnas pa yin/ /des na de dag gang cung zad/ /sdig
pa'i blo yang skye bar 'gyur/ /sems can dge dang mi dge 'bras/ /mang po yang ni skye bar 'gyur/ /gza' rnams las la spyod pa zhes/ /des na 'di ni mthong zhes
gsungs/ /myur ldan myur bcas 'od 'gyur zhing / /myur bar 'ong bas myur ldan yin/ /mig gis mthong dang ma mthong ba'i/ /se gol gtogs pa'i myur 'gros yin/ /'di
tsam gyi ni tshad dag tu/ /blo mchog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad ba/ /nges par zlos pas rtag tu bya/ /yud tsam dag ni bcu
gnyis dang / /dus dang dus min 'gro ba'i rgyu/ /grub pa'i rgyu 'am ma yin pa/ /'gro ba min pa'ang bshad par bya/ /'jig rten la nye bzang ba dang / /char dang char min yang dang
yang / /yul 'khor 'jig dang mu ge dang / /lo legs nyi ma gsal mthong dge/ dus dang de bzhin dbang po'i gzhu/ /skye bo rnams la rtag zhi byed/ /mjug rings sa
'gul nam gru dang / /skar mda' dang ni lho bur dang / /rgyu skar gza' dang skar rnams kyi/ /spyod pa dge dang mi dge ba/ /'byung po rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ /dge dang mi
dge'i spyod pa yin/ /sha za dang ni ma mo dang / /drag po ma rungs nyer 'joms byed/ /sha za rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ /de bzhin ma rungs sems can brjod/ /gang du lha la
rab dad dang / /rin chen chos dang blo mchog dang / /dge ba'i las dang rtag tu ldan/ /byams sems brtse bar ldan pa dang / /legs par spyod pa'i don ldan blo/ /gzhan
gyi sdug bsngal dag la sems/ /sngags dang rig pa rnams kyis drangs/ /sman gyi don du bzas spyod/ /gang du mtshan nyid la brten pas/ /spyod pa rgya cher bstan ba yin/ /
gzhan gyi lus la gnas nas ni/ /mi lus brten nas gnas pa yin/ /lha ni mchod ba zhes bshad de/ /lha min nga rgyal can gyi rgyus/ /gnas der gnas pa'ang rnam pa gnyis/ /
rim bzhin lha dang lha ma yin/ /de yang der ni rnam gnyis te/ /grags pa dang ni thun mong yin/ /de yang der ni rnam gnyis 'gro/ dge dang mi dge 'gro ba lnga/ /der gnas rnam gsum
'gro ba ste/ /nyi shu sum cu grangs med pa'o/ /lha dbang dang ni 'og min par/ /go rims ji bzhin sa med pa'o/ /'jig rten khams ni mtha' med pa/ /dge dang mi dge'i 'jig
rten yin/ /'khor spyod sems can ji snyed dang / /'phags pa nyan thos ji snyed dang / /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /de yi thugs las skyes sras dang / /byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /sa bcu la ni rab gnas dang / /rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi/ /sems can skye gnas yang dag brten/ /byis pa'i skye bo thams cad kyi/ /
'gro ba'i skye gnas rten pa dang / /rtag tu 'phags rnams thams cad kyi/ /mtshan nyid dang ni spyod pa dang / /tshig dang brda dang de nyid kyang / /rgya cher rab tu bshad par bya/ /sngags
dang rgyud ni rigs bcas pas/ /'byung bo kun ni dgug par bya/ /dbab dang dgug pa'i sngags shes pas/ /gzhan gyi lus la yang dag brten/ /dge dang mi dge'i las
shes shing / /bag yod rigs ni bza' ba dang / /mi blun spyod pa'i sems can dang / /tshar gcad rjes gzung spyod pa dang / /'jig rten sa stang
'gugs byed pa/ /mi ni sngags zlos byed pa dag/ de dag grub pa'i mtshan ma ni/ /de nyid thams cad bshad par bya/ /mi rnams kyi ni mdor bsdu na/ /de dag gi ni lus
bzung nas/ /rtag tu shin tu chos don dang / /thar pa'i don du rnam par brtag/ ma rungs rnams ni tshar gcad dang / /rnam dag rnams ni mchod pa ste/ /tshar gcad rjes
gzung nyid la ni/ /sngags dang rgyud ni rab tu brtag/ rlung dang bad kan mkhris can ni/ /rnam gsum dag la spyod pa'ang gsum/ /de dag zhi bar rab brtags la/ /
rnam gsum nyid du rim par 'dod/ /mi rnams kyi ni gso ba la/ /sngags dang rgyud kyis rtag tu bya/ /'byung ba chen por rnam brtags pa/ /'byung dang 'byung min la
sogs shes/ /'byung ba min dang 'byung ba dang / /lhag par 'byung ba de la brjod/ /skye bo gang tshe lhag 'byung zin/ /de tshe bde ba med par 'gyur/ /'byung dang 'byung
min rnam ba ni/ /rnam pa gnyis su rab tu brtag/ rtag tu sems can 'byung ba che/ /sems can ma yin rab tu brtag /mkhris pa bad kan de bzhin rlung / /gang gzhan
rnam pa sna tshogs byas/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ni/ /lnga pa dag ni nam mkhar brjod/ /chu dang me dang ldan ba dang / /sa dang rlung du yang dag ldan/ /blo dang ldan pas rtag tu yang / /
sems can min pa'i grangs su bstan/ /'jig rten mchog gi bdag po dang / /'od chen ldan pas gsungs ba yin/ /sems can ma yin grangs su bstan/ /sems can grangs
'gro mi ma yin/ /blo mchog smra ba dam pa yis/ /mi rnams sems can nyid du gsungs/ /mi ma yin dang mi dag kyang / /rtag tu sems can grangs nyid do/ /sems can rnams la
dge don du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung yang yin/ /'das dang ma byon sangs rgyas dang / /de bzhin da ltar byung rnams kyis/ /dge ba'i las kyi las 'byung phyir/ /las 'di
dag ni yongs su gsungs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung dag pa/ /las ni don med mi byed de/ /de yi rgyu mtshan rigs dang spyi/ /grub pa nyid du bar snang ste/ /thams cad mkhyen
pa'i ye shes dang / /bde zhing zhi la rtag tu gtsang / /mthar thug dag dang bdag med dang / /don dam thar par 'dod pa ste/ /de nyid chos ni btsal bya'i phyir/ /rgyud 'di yongs
su bshad pa yin/ /rgyud dang sngags dang sman bzang po/ /bka' ni yang dag gsungs pa yin/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar gyi/ /bstan bcos thams cad legs bsngags
dang / /'jig rten mchog dang chos bdag med/ /rtag tu zhi dang shes pa'i gnas/ /'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung / /de yi go 'phang mchog gnas
pa| |thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung / /ma 'dres rab tu brtags pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang / /sngags rnams
kun gyi cho ga la/ /grub pa kun tu bstan pa yin/ /des na 'di nyid thub dbang gis/ /cho ga'i rgyal por gsungs pa yin/ /lus can rnams ni sngags tshul gyi/ /'di nyid
kyi ni lam gyis 'gro/ zhi ba nad med phun sum tshogs/ /mya ngan 'das grong phyin par 'gyur/ /mya ngan med dang rdul med dang / /rtag tu byang chub gzhol zhing shes/ /gang
'di bstan pa dag la ni/ /sngags kun 'don par byed pa na/ /kun mkhyen shes dang shes bya yi/ /las kyi rgyud ni 'brel pa dang / /sngags zlos pa yi ched du ni/ /rgyud
rnams mtha' dag sa steng gsungs/ /sngags rgyud ma lus don dag ni/ /byang chub rnam gsum gzhol ba ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes dag/ cho ga 'dir ni rab
tu bstan/ /sems can rnams la'ang phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten kun la rab tu bskor/ /gzhan la cho ga rab snang ba/ /cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la'ang yod/ /thub mchog
thub pa'i sras dag gis/ /gzhan du cho ga gang bstan pa/ /sngags rnams thams cad 'di la yod/ /des na cho ga rgya chen yin/ /de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis/ /lus can kun
la gsungs pa yin/ /gang du cho ga'i rgyal po 'dis/ /dbang 'gyur min dang bkug min pa/ /sa steng 'jig rten gsum 'di na/ /rig pa'i sngags rgyal de yod min/ /thub pa'i
zla ba rab nub cing / /sa yi dkyil 'khor stongs pa na/ /cho ga 'jig rten 'di gnas pa/ /bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rtag tu dge/ 'byung ba kun
la gzhon nu ni/ /de tshe sangs rgyas mdzad pa ni/ /'jig rten bstan la byed par 'gyur/ /cho ga'i rgyal po mthu la ni/ /yun ring dus su 'dod pa rnams/ /lan cig thos kyang grol
'gyur te/ /rtag tu de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dag ni/ /rtag tu dge ba don yod 'gyur/ /sngags rnams kun la sngags pa ni/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg rtag
'dod pa'o/ /dus gsum dag tu shes bya la/ /mkhyen pa gang du rab 'jug pa/ /de bzhin 'di la 'jug byed pa/ /cho ga'i rgyal po dam pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan
pa ni/ /sngags su rab gnas de 'dir gsungs/ /sngags de rnam par mi rtog par/ /cho ga de 'dir gsungs ba yin/ /don dang don min sems can gyi/ /dge dang mi dge
byed par 'gyur/ /de tshe 'gro ba blo bzhin du/ /'jig rten kun gyi dge mi dge/ de nyid cho ga 'dir spros pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa med/ /'jig
rten 'das pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'jig rten phyir ni 'di gsungs so/ /las rnams kun la shin tu lhag/ 'jig rten las las rab tu 'das/ /chos rnams rnams pa sna tshogs
byed/ /'jig rten kun gyis rab tu bsngags/ /sngags rgyal las la brtson par byed/ /de bzhin sems can tshogs la phan/ /gzhon nu 'jam pa'i dbyangs de ni/ /sangs
rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /de don yon tan nges grub dang / /'jig rten khams kyi dge mi dge/ bag med ma bskul ma yin te/ /bskul nas ngas ni chos bshad
do| |sems can ma lus phan nyid phyir/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni bshad pa yin/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang / /bshad cing ngas kyang bshad pa yin/ /sangs
rgyas gdung ni mi gcod phyir/ /bdag gis kyang ni bshad pa yin/ /sngags pa'i las rnams kun la ni/ /kun mkhyen ye shes 'byung don du'o/ /kun mkhyen ye shes rab
'jug la/ /las rnams gcig tu bsngags pa yin/ /'jig rten sngon las bdag yin te/ /de ni de ltar yongs su spyod/ /de bas las rnams rab tu bya/ /tshe 'dir
dka' ba legs spyad cing / /las ldan tshe ni 'di la yang / /'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grub/ /las ni 'di la'ang snang gyur na/ /skye ba 'di la'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bas
sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /las ni gcig pu rab tu bsngags/ /las de cho gar ldan pa ni/ /de ni 'di la myur du 'grub/ /sems can byis pa cho ga nyams/ /rab tu rmongs pa 'khor
bar 'gyur/ /de bas rnam pa kun gyis ni/ /las ni gcig pu rab bsngags yin/ /cho ga las ni yang dag ldan/ /sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin cho ga nyams pa'i las//
shin tu yun ring dag gis 'grub/ /bsam gtan med par thar pa med/ /thar pa med par bsam gtan med/ /de bas bsam gtan thar pa ni/ /yang dag ldan pa byang chub
brjod// //'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ las thams cad kyi
bya ba'i don gyi le'u rab 'byams bco lnga pha rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ gzhan yang / gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la
gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo dang ldan pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes nga la dris nas/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyi don tham/
cad bya ba'i las kyi le'u rab 'byams 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher sngar bstan pa yin no/ /sngags kun don dang ldan pa yi/ /rmi
lam dge dang mi dge yin/ /des na zhar la 'di kun ni/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa bstan pa yin/ /gnod sbyin bdag po yid dga' nas/ /thal sbyar spyi bor byas nas ni/ /
ston la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ /de tshe tshig ni 'di skad zhus/ /'jig rten rjes su gzung don du/ /blo mchog rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / /bdag la'ang rjes su thugs brtse
dang / /sems can rnams ni bde don du/ /zlos pa'i sngags ni thams cad la/ /rmi lam dge dang mi dge dang / /sems can mchog dang tha ma yi/ /spyod pa'i yon tan rgya cher
bstan/ /bzang po'i 'gro ba'i skye gnas dang / /rgyu dang shes pa'i rnam pa spyod/ /'das dang ma 'ongs shes pa dang / /dge dang mi dge da ltar gyi/ /thams cad kun 'gro'i
shes pa dang / /kun mkhyen ye shes spyod pa dang / /snang med dmigs pa med pa dang / /spros med rab tu spros pa yin/ /rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa dang / /shis pa zhi
ba bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu rnams ni/ /blo mchog gis ni bstan pa yin/ /khyad par du ni zlos pa la/ /sngags rnams don dang ldan par bshad/ /las
dang las 'bras sems can gyi/ /bya ba dus dang de bzhin du/ /de bzhin snod dang gnas dang ni/ /cha byad rmi lam zhar la gsungs/ /gnod sbyin bdag pos thung mchog ni/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa bdun pa la/ /gang zhig skal bzang sangs rgyas pa/ /shAkya'i skye mchog bdun ba ni/ /shAkya'i seng ge dgra las rgyal/ /'di ni bdun par rab tu brtags/ /kun gyi tha
mar rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/ /brtson 'grus che zhing shes rab che/ /thub pa mthu ni chen po thob/ /lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag/ byang chub sems
dpa' phyag byas te/ /rang gi gnas su 'dug gyur nas/ /blo ldan de nas cang mi smra/ /de nas 'jam dpal shes rab che/ /de tshe thub pas dris pa ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskul
ba ni/ /thub mchog dam pa tha mal/ /legs so bcom ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /las dang shes pa rgya cher bcas/ /btsas pa'i gza' ni gtso bo ste/ /dge dang mi dge legs
tshul bshad/ /las dang shes pa rgyur bcas pa'i/ /sems can mang po'i spyod pa gsungs/ /mchog dang tha ma'i spyod pa dang / /dge ba'i don dang ldan pa dang / /zlos pa grub
pa'i mtshan ma dang / /bsgrub bya sgrub min rnam par brtags/ /'byor pa 'dod dang de bzhin du/ /'jig rten dbang phyug longs spyod 'dod/ /rgyal po khyad par can 'dod dang //
rig pa 'dzin grub 'dod pa dang / /thams cad kun 'gro'i ye shes kyis/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad du gsol/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsol btab
nas/ /thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa ni/ /blo ldan ka la ping ka'i skad/ /lha yi rnga sgra'i skad dang ni/ /brtson 'grus chen po tshangs pa'i sgra/ /'brug sgra yi ni sgra skad kyis/ /thub
pa bdun pas tshigs bcad nas/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni dag pas gsungs/ /gzhon nu 'di ni dngos don khyab gyur cing / /ma byung 'jig rten pham pa sgrub byed la/ /'gro ba
kun la phan pa bde phyir ston/ /thar pa shes shing dag pa'i gnas su 'dug/ bden dang brtse dang bzod pa phan sems dang / /gang zhig rtag tu byams dang sbyin la dga'//
de dag rtag tu grub pa thob par byed/ /kye ma gzhan la'ang grub pa yod ma yin/ /rtag tu sngags mchog la ni dga' dad dam/ /bstan dang 'khor lo 'dzin dang 'jam mchog
dang / /de ni bdud 'dul chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /'khor lo 'dzin par 'dir ni rigs pa yin/ /gang gi gsung ni bzang po yid 'ong zhing / /rtag tu byis pa'i skye bo rnam
spangs yin/ /yid 'ong bzang po rnar ni snyan pa dang / /dga' skyed snyan pa dang ni rjes su mthun/ /sems ni tshim byed bde ba rab tu sbyin/ /'jam zhes bya bar sangs rgyas
yang dag gsungs/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyad par gyis/ /gang gi mthu ni mkhyen par mi spyod de/ /de dag gi sras de bzhin sar zhugs pa/ /'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin
bcu yi grangs/ /khyod kyang lha'i dbang phyug 'jig rten khyad par gyis/ /thub bzang shes par nus pa ma yin no/ /gzugs dang gzugs med de bzhin sa gnas dang / /'dod
ldan lha dang mi ni yid las skyes/ /rnal 'byor grub pa thob dang 'jig rten na/ /khyad par can kun de bzhin mi yi gtso/ /de yi che ba gang gis shes gyur pa/ /sems can gang de
yod pa ma yin te/ /khyod kyi che ba 'di ni yongs shes pa/ /'jam zhes bya bar rab shes sangs rgyas yin/ /'jam dpal zhes byar yongs su brtags pa ni/ /khyod kyi ming ni sngon
gyi rgyal bas mdzad/ /khyod kyi ming du 'di ltar brtags byas pa/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar sangs rgyas kyis/ /gzhan du ma yengs rtse gcig yid dag pas/ /khyod kyi ming ni
'khor gyi nang du thos/ /des ni 'di la shis dang zhi ba 'thob/ /srid mthar byang chub mchog ni khyad par thob/ /sngags rnams ma lus grub par 'gyur ba dang / /'gro ba'i skye
gnas mchog ni rab thob cing / /rtag tu chos mchog la ni yang dag gnas/ /bgegs rnams rnam par spangs shing grub pa thob/ /'dod pa'i sngags rnams ma lus 'grub
par byed/ /byang chub shing dbang drung du myur du 'gro/ song nas byang chub mchog ni thob par byed/ /song nas sems can phan phyir der 'dug ste/ /
sangs rgyas byang chub 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i gtso bos yon tan gsungs/ /'jam dpal zhes ni khyod kyi ming dran pa/ /yon tan bsam mi khyab ces rgyal
bas gsungs/ /rgyal ba'i gtso bo sngar gshegs thams cad kyis/ /rtag tu khyod kyi mthu ni bstan pa yin/ /gzhon nu dag pa khyod kyis sngags rtogs pa/ /bskal pa grangs
med rtag tu'ang ston mi nus/ /'jam dpal khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa ni/ /sangs rgyas ma lus dag gis rab tu bshad/ /gzhon nu 'di ni thams cad kun tu 'gro/ nga yi bstan
la khyod ni mi mchog bstan/ /dag pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i skye bo rnams/ /'dir ni ma lus mtha' dag zhi bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi sngags ni nam yang 'da' ma gyur/ /khyod
kyi sngags ni nam yang nyams ma gyur// //'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas
pa'i mdo las/ tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u rab 'byams bcu drug pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer
sngon po dang / ser po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang snang bar byas shing 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
dag kyang snang bar mdzad nas/ gza' dang / rgyu skar thams cad kyang yud tsam gyis zil gyis mnan te bkug par gyur to/ /bkug nas kyang rang rang gi gnas la yang dag par
sbyar nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bkug nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gza' dang / rgyu skar
dang / skar ma thams cad kyi 'od med par byas nas nyam thag pa dang / 'jigs pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la skyabs su 'gro zhing thal mo sbyar nas 'dug par
gyur te/ de ltar rab tu 'dar zhing yang dang / yang sa'i steng du 'gyel bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad
la mkhas pa rnams dang / byis pa'i skye bo'i blo dang ldan pa'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bka' stsal pa ni/ lha'i tshogs mi dang bcas pa'i grogs po dag/ khyed
cag nyon cig/ 'jig rten sna tshogs ni las nyid la sems can rnams rnam par rten par byed de/ gang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i
sku yang mngon par grub la/ gang yang lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang 'khor zhing 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen por rab tu zhugs la/ 'jig rten
rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lus mngon par grub ste/ thams cad kyang las dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang 'brel pa las skyes la/ de la byed pa'i byed pa po'am/ dbang phyug gam/
gtso bo'am/ skyes bu'am/ grangs can gyis rab tu 'byin par byed pa ni gang yang med do/ /las las skyes pa ni ma gtogs te/ de yang las kyi rkyen gyis skyed pa rgyu la
ltos pa yin te/ de yang rgyu dang / rkyen la ltos pa'o/ /de bzhin du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rkyen phan tshun du 'byung ba nye bar 'brel ba yin te/ lhag ma 'byung po
rnams mngon par 'grub pa ni 'byung ba chen po las skyes pa yin te/ 'byung ba chen po de yang ma 'ongs pa'i phung po gzhan dag tu 'gro bar skye bar 'gyur zhing / skyes
nas kyang 'gro ba dang / yul gzhan rgya che ba'i rnam par dbye ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ dus gzhan na lugs las bzlog ste 'gag na ye shes kyi mes bskul te/
las kyis bsags pa'i bag chags mtha' dag mngon par bsregs nas theg pa rnam gsum mnyam zhing spros pa med par dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po ni dus
ring por nye bar chags pa'i las bdag gir byed pa dang / dus bar ma ni rang rgyal bse ru lta bu rang byung gi shes rab rab tu 'byung ba dang / gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa nyan
thos ni dus thung dus mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'o/ /chos gzhan la blo nyid 'jug par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te/ byis pa rnams kyi rnam par rmongs pa nyid dang / ci ste yang 'jig rten
sna tshogs gnas pa 'di ni las las skyes pa yin te/ phyogs dang / cha byad zhig na nad med pa'i go 'phang mya ngan med pa/ rdul med pa/ las kyis 'jig rten grub pa la
ltos pa yin te/ dri ma med pa'i lam rnam par grol ba/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ shin tu bsil ba'i las nyid kyis byed de/ las gzhan la ltos pa ma yin zhing las dang /
las ma yin pa las rnam par grol te/ spros pa med pa la nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /theg pa rnam gsum rab 'jug las/ /zhi ba gzhan yang yod min te/ /sngags kyang rnam
pa gsum du 'gyur/ /rnam gsum las su yang dag bsgrags/ /de las rnam zlos rnam gsum las/ /rnam pa gsum du rab tu snang / /rigs kyang rnam gsum gsungs pa ni/ /sngags
rnams kun gyi gzhi yang yin/ /rigs gsum rnam pa brgyad du yang / /rgyud dag la ni rab tu snang / /rnam pa gcig tu'ang rigs snang ste/ /sngags
rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dag pa'i thugs/ /rigs ni zhi ba mya ngan 'das/ /yan lag so so de nyid las/ /sngags rnams kun tu rab tu bstan//
'jig rten skar mkhan yan lag ni/ /grub pa'i rgyur ni rab tu brtag/ /de nyid yan lag las yin te/ /rkyen gyi yan lag dag la 'jug/ ji ltar sA lu'i 'bru rnams ni/ /
myu gus rnam par shes par byed/ /de bzhin grub pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam par shes/ /ji ltar kha dog dkar po ni/ /tha snyad kyis ni rnam par brtag/
de bzhin skar ma ldan pas ni/ /tha snyad don du rab tu brtag/ thams cad du ni thams cad ldan/ /las ni gcig pu rab tu bsngags/ /las rnams med par mtshon pa
med/ /gang na'ang lus ni yod ma yin/ /rgyu mtshan dang ni spyod pa dang / /skye ba dang ni rigs dang gnas/ /rtag tu la nye sna tshogs pa/ /las de las ni nye bar dmigs/ /las
ni gang du'ang lus can min/ /nang na gnas shing mtshon pa med/ /kun nas skye bo rgas pa na/ /rnam par 'gyur las nye bar dmigs/ /de bzhin lus la brten nas ni/ /
las ni lus can dag la snang / /'bras bu dge dang mi dge'i rtags/ /skye bar yang ni rab brjod dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs la nye bzang / /las rnams sna tshogs dag las byung / /
dus tshod de bzhin 'gro ba dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs srog chags sgra/ /grub dang ma grub mtshan ma ni/ /rkyen gyi don la ltos pa yin/ /rgyu mtshan spyod dang mtshan ma ni/ /rkyen la mngon
par rab tu brtag/ de bas rnam kun 'bad nas ni/ /rkyen la rag las bya ba yin/ /zlos pa'i sngags rnams rtag tu ni/ /grub pa rgyu la ltos pa yin/ /'di dag rkyen gyi yan lag
ni| |las ni bdag gir byed pas mtshon/ /mi mtshon sngags rnams thams cad ni/ /bgegs las shin tu mi bzad 'gyur/ /de bas 'di dag thams cad kyi/ /yan lag
tu ni thub pas gsungs/ /sa dbang rgyal po thams cad mkhyen/ /byang chub snying por ting 'dzin thob/ /sngags ni yongs su gsungs pa na/ /bgegs rnams ma lus rab tu
'jig/ rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /bzod par dka' ba'ang rnam par 'joms/ /kun mkhyen bdag nyid chen po yi/ /de thugs byang chub la zhugs pa/ /ma rungs bdud
kyi sems kyis ni/ /bgegs chen 'jig par ga la 'gyur/ /de nas 'jigs pa chen po ni/ /des ni rgyu mtshan med par snang / /rnam pa sna tshogs 'jigs pa rnams/ /de la
rgyu mtshan med par byung / /de ni bsod nams stobs bskyed pa/ /yun ring dus su yongs su bsngags/ /de yi sngags kyi stobs kyis ni/ /de tshe bdud
ni bcom par 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing brtson 'grus che/ /de yi 'od chen ldan par 'gyur/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /byang chub dam pa thos par 'gyur/ /rmi
lam ngan pa nyer 'jig pa/ /sngags de 'dir ni bshad par bya/ /gang dag sa la spyod pa yi/ /'byung po'i tshogs kun rab nyon cig/ rmi lam ngan pa bzod dka' dang //
ma rungs sems can zlog byed pa/ /rgyal ba sA la dbang po yi/ /sngon ni sngags rgyal yongs gsungs pa/ /lha yi tshogs dang gza' rnams dang / /rgyu skar skar mkhan rnams
nyon cig /gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams/ /ma rungs tshar gcad don dang ni/ /'byung po rnams ni thams cad kyang / /zhi ba'i sems ni rab bskyed phyir/ /gang dag sa la
spyod pa dag /rkang med rkang mang dag dang ni/ /rkang gnyis dang ni rkang bzhi dang / /mdor na sems can thams cad ni/ /'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yi/ /'byung bo'i tshogs

rnams kun nyon cig/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi hUM hUM dz+wA la dz+wA la/ pra dz+wA la pra dz+wA la/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha Sh+Ti phaT phaT swAhA/ /gtsug
tor 'bar ba zhes bsgrags pa'i/ /sngags 'di sngags rnams kun gyi mchog/ gang zhig las rnams stong phrag ni/ /dgu bcu rtsa bzhi dag dang ni/ /bkra shis thams cad 'dod pa
yi| |rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /lan gcig bzlas pas sel bar byed/ /las rnams gzhan yang byed pa ni/ /sngags rnams kun gyi
bdag po yin/ /'byung po kun la dbang byed pa/ /bla ma mnga' bdag sangs rgyas 'di/ /sngags 'di dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /sngags rnams ma lus rab tu sems/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas
pa lha yi lhas/ /thub mchog gis ni de gsungs nas/ /yud tsam mi gsungs bzhugs nas ni/ /cung zad dus ni gzhag par mdzad/ /de tshe gnas gtsang gnas pa yi/ /lha yi
tshogs kyang 'dug par 'gyur/ /lha rnams gtso bo thams cad ni/ /rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma rnams/ /gtsug tor sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis/ /'jigs shing dam tshig la
gnas phyir/ /gtsug tor zhes bya mthu bo che/ /mthu mnyam mthu ni chen po ste/ /brgya phrag lnga'am bzhi'am ni/ /de bzhin bdun nam brgyad dang dgu/ gnyis dang drug dang
lnga dang bdun/ /gtsug tor dbang po rab tu bsgrags/ /da ltar grangs dang grangs med ni/ /gtsug tor rgyal po dge ba yin/ /de dag dang ni sngags 'di mtshungs/ /sngon gyi
rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad// //'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin
tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ las bdag gir byas pa'i rkyen gyi le'u rab 'byams las/ bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rgyu skar
dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / skar mkhan thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa dang / phyogs thams cad du rnam par gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen
po dang ldan pa'i mchog rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag/ khyed cag nyon cig/ gza' dang / rgyu skar thams cad kyi mthu'i tshig khyed cag thams cad dag la
yang ston cig/ khyed kyi sngags bya ba'i don thams cad kyang sgrubs shig/ khyod kyis dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis
bstan pa 'di grub na/ de nas gzhan cho ga'i rgyal po grub pa la yang khyed cag yid dad par gyis shig ces so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gza' rnams
kyi spyod pa sems can thams cad kyi don du gsungs te/ zlos pa thams cad la phan pa'i phyir dang / sngags kyi don yang rab tu bsgrubs pa'i phyir thams cad kyang thams
cad mkhyen pas gsungs so/ /tha skar dang ni bra nye dang / /smin drug dang po'i rgyu skar te/ /rgyu skar gsum po 'di dag la/ /mig dmar gza' ni bdag po yin/ /lug ni khyim du
bstan pa ste/ /'di la grub pa yod ma yin/ /grub mchog bar ma tha ma nyid/ /grub pa yin par 'dod pa yin/ /las rnams kun tu'ang mi 'gro zhing / /ma rungs gza' ni rnam
par zlog /snar ma mgo dang de bzhin du/ /lag tu rgyu skar brjod pa yin/ /rgyu skar nab so rgyal dang ni/ /skag tu'ang rab tu brjod pa yin/ /mchu dang de bzhin gre dang dbo/ /de
bzhin me bzhi nag pa dang / /sa ri sa ga lha mtshams dang / /snron dang de bzhin snrubs dang ni/ /chu ni stod smad dge ba ste/ /zlos pa la phan rab tu bsngags/ /rgyu skar gro bzhin
mon gru ni/ /drag po'i las la rab tu bsngags/ /mon gre khrums ni stod smad gnyis/ /rgyu skar grub pa'i rgyu yin no/ /nam gru la skyes dpal dang ldan/ /'thab la dga'
zhing 'jigs pa med/ /rgyu skar lhag ma gtso bo ni/ /dus kyi tha mar 'byung pa min/ /ji bzhin legs par spyod pa dang / /grub dang bsod nams rab tu bsgrags/ /nye rgyal dang
ni tha chung dang / /'dod pa dag ni nyid yin no/ /yang dag bden dang 'jig rten dang / /snang bar yang ni brjod pa yin/ /longs spyod sbyin dang dge sbyin dang / /ma 'gags
pa dang 'gags pa nyid/ /grags sbyin gzi brjid rgyal po dang / /de bzhin rgyal po 'jig rten dang / /rgyu skar mang po gsungs pa ste/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa
bzhi 'o/ /dus kyi tha ma 'di la ni/ /'di dag gi ni nus pa yod/ /cho ga rgyal 'di bde don du/ /de tsam shes par gsungs pa yin/ /rang nyid 'od ldan sems can ni/ /de yi dus
su rdzogs ldan yin/ /thams cad nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ /de yi dus su rgyu skar med/ /nyi ma zla ba skar ma med/ /lha dang lha min 'jig
rten med/ /dang po'i dus ni dus mchog yin/ /ming med rigs kyang yod ma yin/ /tshes dang skye ba'i skar ma med/ /bsnyung ba med cing sngags kyang med/ /dge dang mi dge'i
las kyang med/ /'di dag rang dgar spyod pa ste/ /bza' dang bza' bar bya ba'ang med/ /'di dag nad med dag pa ste/ /rtag tu sems can rnam mang po/ /de nas dus ni bri ba
na| |'jig rten snod min rab tu 'jug /sngon gyi las kyis drangs nas ni/ /de nas sa yi steng du 'gro/ /sa steng lha gnas gzhal med khang / /lha dang lha min yang dag byung //
bar ma'i dus su phyin gyur nas/ /mi yi lus la yang dag rten/ /bza' dang btung la brkam chags pas/ /'od de dag ni rab tu nyams/ /lus ni sra ba nyid gyur cing / /dge
dang mi dge rnam par spyod/ /de nas nyin zhag zla ba dang / /gza' yi 'od ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas bzung nas gang cung zad/ /skar ma'i dpyad shes pa nyid dang / /sems can rjes su
gzung bar brjod/ /ngas ni de dag bstan pa yin/ /sngon ni drang srong cha byad gyur/ /blo ldan tshangs pa'i cha byad dang / /dbang phyug chen po'i lus bstan cing / /yang na khyab 'jug cha
byad kyis/ /nam mkha' lding gi lus spyad dang / /gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang / /sha za dag gi lus nyid gyur/ /skye dang skye bar bdag nyid skyes/ /byang chub sems dpas mkhas
pa ni/ /de dang der ni skye ba la/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod don phyir/ /rtag tu skye ba'i dbang gis so/ /bdag nyid de tshe dus dag tu/ /sngon gyi byang chub sems dpar gyur/ /
mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa laM/ /bdag ni de tshe byis par gyur/ /'jig rten ji snyed yod pa yi/ /khyab 'jug gis byas gzo spyad dang / /lugs kyi bstan bcos sngon gyi
rabs/ /de bzhin rig byed brda sprod pa/ /sdeb sbyor skar ma'i dpyad nyid dang / /rtsis dang sgyu rtsal 'dod pa dang / /log shes de bzhin shes pa dang / /de bzhin log par spyod
nyid dang / /'jig rten bstan bcos thams cad ni/ /yun ring bdag gis sngon bstan to/ /zhi ba thub bdag ji ltar bar/ /ye shes bdag gis thob ma yin/ /byang chub rgyu
ni grol don dang / /de bzhin du ni thar pa'i phyir/ /'khor ba'i btson rar rab bcings pas/ /las kyang las kyang bdag ma grol/ /zhi ba rnam rgyal sangs
rgyas nyid/ /ma nyams go 'phang mya ngan 'das/ /yun ring don du mngon 'dod cing / /legs par yongs su btsal bas thob/ /de ltar bdag gis rig ldan pas/ /tshegs
chung bya bas thob pa yin/ /rgyal bas sngon ni bstan pas na/ /rang byung ye shes thob pa yin/ /de 'dra'i gnas ni rab mthong ba/ /phyi rol lam gyis thob ma yin/ /byang chub
rgyu ni rnyed dka' bas/ /'khor ba'i dgon par 'khyams pa yin/ /bdag gi rang byung 'di 'dra ba/ /ye shes bdag gis thob pa min/ /rig pa bzang po'i las dga'
bas/ /de ni mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /bdag gis bstan bcos 'di dag ni/ /bsdus pa 'ba' zhig byas pa yin/ /las las grol ba med par ni/ /grub pa'i rgyu ni rnyed
ma yin/ /'khor ba'i yun ring zhags pa 'dis/ /las kyi 'ching bas nges par bcings/ /de yi 'gro 'di bdag nyid che/ /dge dang mi dge'ang smin par 'gyur/ /rgyu skar
gza' dang skar ma'i dpyad/ /mtshon par byed pa kho nar zad/ /chos dang mi ldan mi rnams dang / /gzhan la rtags ni snang mi 'gyur/ /de nyid kyis na gza' gsungs pa/ /
dge dang mi dge'i rjes gzung phyir/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang / /khams ni bzhi po dag dang ni/ /chu dang sa dang rlung dang me/ /nam mkha' yongs su bstan pa yin/ /'byung ba
yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ /'di dag 'byung ba chen po yin/ /sems can yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ /bag med las kyis byas pa yin/ /de dag dus ni nges pa yis/ /sngags rnams
grub par gyur pa yin/ /de yi skye ba 'bad pa yis/ /dge dang mi dge bsrung bar bya/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'jig rten gtso/ /lha yi dbang phyug brgya byin sogs/ /de yang de tshe de
dus su/ /dus kyi mthar ni yongs su brtags/ /dus kyi tha ma dag la ni/ /sngags rnams grub pa nges pa yin/ /de nyid kyis na thub dbang pos/ /gzhon nu yongs su brtags
pa ni/ /shes rab chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs dang ldan/ /'jig rten 'dir ni kun tu rgyu/ /sems can rjes su bzung bar bzod/ /de yi dus su
grub pa ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu mthong / /rgyu skar skar ma'i dpyad shes pa/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu skar dang / /yud tsam dag tu rab tu
bsgrags/ /dus kyi tha ma de la ni/ /bcu gnyis khyim yang yod pa yin/ /rgyu skar tshogs la brten nas ni/ /de dag gza' ni rnam par dbye/ /thams cad so sor gyur pa ni/ /
'jam dpal gyis ni so sor mdzad/ /skye ba dang ni spyod pa nyid/ /khyim rnams kun la rab tu gnas/ /skye bo rmongs pas khyab gyur la/ /dge dang mi dge
'bras bu 'byung / /de nyid las kyi 'ching ba yis/ /de dag khyim ni yang dang yang / /sems can rnams kyis grub pa tsam/ /dge dang mi dge rtog par byed/ /rgyu skar snar mar ldan
par ni/ /skye bar yongs su rab brtags pa/ /dpal ldan bzod pa phun sum tshogs/ /tshe ring bu ni mang ba dang / /rtag tu de tshe nor skal ldan/ /de ni dmag gi bdag po byed/ /
'di ni khyu mchog khyim skyes na/ /khyu mchog nyid la yongs su 'chi/ /mgo nyid la ni 'jig rten shes/ /chas ldan mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ /smin drug char skyes rtag tu ni//
sa bdag rgyal por snang ba ste/ /yang dag skye ba de la rten/ /rtag tu rgya mtsho gsum bdag 'gyur/ /phyogs gcig skyes pa bgrod dka' ba'i/ /phyogs gcig rgyal por
'gyur ba yin/ /gza' ni bla mas mtshan pa yi/ /gal te skye bar 'byung gyur na/ /sa ni khor yug ma lus par/ /rjes su spyod par 'gyur ba yin/ /lo ni bcu dang lnga bo nyid/
de yi rgyal thabs byed par 'gyur/ /tha skar bra nye nyid dang ni/ /smin drug cha la skyes gyur pa/ /khyim 'di dag gi nus pa ni/ /tshong gi don gyis nor sgrub 'gyur/ /gal te
skyes pa des byung na/ /dbang phyug longs spyod phun sum tshogs/ /rgyu skar 'di la skyes pa na/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyi ma nub pa na/ /de ni 'chi bar
'gyur ba yin/ /ma rungs tsham tshom med pa dang / /bden par smra ba ma yin dang / /lus kyi lpags srab dmar ba'i mdog/ sa yi steng na de snang ngo / /'di yi 'gro ba skad
cig ni/ /mig 'byed 'dzums su rab tu bstan/ /'di yi bar du gar skyes pa/ /rgya che yon tan de 'di yin/ /se gol gtogs gnas tsam du ni/ /'di yi 'gro ba rab tu
bstan/ /de na de dag 'gro ba nyams/ /gza' rnams kyis ni mthong ma yin/ /skye ba rnam par 'dres gyur pa'i/ /sems can rnam pa sna tshogs skye/ /'dres pa'i 'gro ba phun
sum tshogs/ /'dres pa'i longs spyod ldan pa yin/ /de nyid kyis na mi skye ste/ /skye ba nyid du brjod pa yin/ /skye ba'i skar ma sum cu ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'byung /
gza' ni mig dmar gyis mtshan pa/ /'di ni ma rungs skye bar 'gyur/ /gsus che lus ni snum pa dang / /mig dkyus ring zhing snyan par smra/ /gza' ni phur bus bltas pa
ni| |rtag tu brtan ldan skye bar 'gyur/ /chu tshod zung tsam nyi ma dang / /zla ba'i lha ni ra ba bshad pa/ /de bzhin rtag tu nyin mtshan la/ /yang dag skye bar 'dod pa yin/ /phyin
ci log pa'i skye ba gzhan/ /phyin ci log tu'ang brtags pa yin/ /gza' ni dge ba mthong ba dang / /mi dge'i skye ba dge mi dge /mi dge'i 'bras bu
grub pa dang / /yang dag skye ba bzang po 'byung / /'gro ba'i skye gnas la brten nas/ /khyim la skye bar rab tu gnas/ /gza' ni ngan spong bus mtshan pa/ /sbyin byed sems
dpa' che ba ste/ /lag dang nab so dag dang ni/ /skag gi cha la rab tu brjod/ /'di dag la skyes gtong ba che/ /g.yo sgyu can ni bab col byed/ /don dang don med 'byor
pa la/ /rtag tu brkam chags bud med chags/ /gzhan gyi bud med mngon 'gro zhing / /de nyid nag po la spyod dang / /dud pa'i mdog 'drar skye 'gyur te/ /drag cing 'khrig
pa la yang dga'/ /sbyor ba'i khyim la rab brten nas/ /de ni spen pa dag la skye/ /nyin dang mtshan du yang dang yang / /der gnas spen pa rgyu bar byed/ /de las skyes pa nyi ma
phyed/ /sems ni stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de yi dus la gang skyes pa/ /de yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya/ /nor ni grub par 'gyur ba dang / /dbang phyug gis ni legs
mtshan pa'o/ /rgyu skar da bzhin rgyal dang ni/ /skag la yang ni gang skyes pa/ /'di ni sbal ba'i khyim yin te/ /dge dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/ /mdog ni ser po dang
ldan zhing / /de ni skye ba mchog tu bstan/ /rtag tu de bzhin mtshan phyed du/ /'di ni skye bar bstan pa yin/ /de yi dus kyi tshad la ni/ /gal te sems can skye bar 'dod/ /cho ga
mthong ba'i rgyu yis na/ /'di ni don rnams thams cad sgrub/ /de ni shin tu gzhon pa nas/ /rgyal thabs byed cing nor rnams thob/ /mdog ni ser dang sngo bsangs ni/ /kha dog
rgyas pa snang bar 'gyur/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod la dga' ba dang / /de ni dpal ldan 'jigs med skye/ /mchu dang de bzhin gre dang ni/ /de bzhin dbo yi cha dag ni/ /snang byed kyi ni
zhing du 'gyur/ /seng ge'i khyim du bya ba yin/ /de la skyes ba dpa' bo che/ /sha yi kha zas de la dga'/ /ri yi rdzong la brten nas ni/ /rgyal thabs dbang phyug byed par 'gyur//
gal te de skyes thob gyur na/ /zhing la gnas shing des sdom rten/ /de bzhin nyi ma 'char ba na/ /skyes pa 'di la brjod pa yin/ /rgyu skar dbo yi cha dag ni/ /de bzhin me bzhi
nag pa nyid/ /rgyu skar de la skye gnas pa/ /mi ni yongs su dpa' bar 'gyur/ /sdom min gzhan gyi bud med 'gro/ de ni dmag dpon byed par 'gyur/ /gal te skye bar
thob 'gyur na/ /nges par rgyal thabs byed par 'gyur/ /gang du skar ma de dag gnas/ /'di ni bu mo'i khyim du 'gyur/ /'di yi bdag po gza' lhag ste/ /kha cig tu ni
gzhan yang yin/ /'di skad skar ma mchog la ni/ /gza' ni mi bzad bsrung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba yang ni bzang ba ste/ /yang na zla ba'i bu bdag yin/ /nyin
phyed rdzogs na skye ba ni/ /'di yi skye ba snang ba yin/ /nag pa'i cha dang sa ri dang / /sa ga'i phyed kyis lhag pa la/ /srang gi khyim ste bzang po'i don/ /zla ba la spyod sems
can gyi/ /'di ni mi bzad zhing yin te/ /skal med ma yin nor gyi gnas/ /'di yi skye ba skye gyur gnas/ /mtshan mo'i thun gyi tha ma 'o/ /mi ni 'di la skyes gyur pa/ /rtag tu
btung ba dag la dad/ /spyi mtshan ma yin ngo tsha med/ /mang pos bkur cing mchod pa dang / /la lar rgyal srid longs spyod dang / /nor chen thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /nges
med skye ba yongs snang zhing / /byis par mas ni spangs pa yin/ /gal te skye ba thob gyur na/ /pu mang bde ba skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyu skar lha mtshams las skyes pa/ /bzo yi las
ni sgrub pa dang / /byams pa'i bdag nyid grogs po mang / /rtag tu dpa' zhing rtul phod che/ /'jig rten snron la skyes pa ni/ /mi ni rab gtum bstan pa yin/ /sdug bsngal
mang po bzod pa dang / /mi ni ma rungs skye bar 'gyur/ /khyim ni sdig par bshad pa ste/ /rtag tu rno zhing bab col byed/ /'di dag nyid la rtag skyes pa/ /skye bar yang dag
brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin nyin phyed nyi ma la/ /gal te mi ni skyes gyur na/ /dag cing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba'i/ /rgyal por de ni nges par 'gyur/ /byis pa gzhon nu gzugs yod pa'i//
de yi skad cig gzas mthong 'gyur/ /sa yi lha mo'i bur gyur ba/ /gang yin de ni mig dmar gsungs/ /de nyid phyir na sa la spyod/ /rang bu nyid kyis gsod par phyed/ /de las gzhan
pa bzlog pas ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i skye ba nyid/ /tshe ring gzi brjid ldan pa dang / /shes ldan nyid du'ang skye bar 'gyur/ /lha mtshams la ni rab skyes pa/ /shes rab che zhing grogs
la byams/ /mig dmar gyi ni zhing 'di yin/ /yang na rtag tu gza' 'dres yin/ /rgyu skar snubs la skyes pa dang / /de bzhin du ni chu stod dang / /chu smad kyi ni cha dag la/ /gzhu
yi khyim du rab tu bstan/ /de yi skye ba'i skye ba ni/ /phur bu'i zhing der bstan pa yin/ /nyi ma phyi dror gyur pa dang / /zla ba nam snad gyur pa la/ /de yi skye ba zhes bstan pa/ /gang zhig
skyes pa skye ba'i rgyu/ /snubs la skyes pa rang rigs 'jig /tha mar bzang por 'gyur ba yin/ /skyes gnas par ma longs spyod ni/ /thob par de ni the tshom med/ /gzhon pa yongs
su 'das pa na/ /snang byed dkyil 'khor ji lta bar/ /rgas pas gyur na rgyal por 'gyur/ /longs spyod che zhing nor cher 'gyur/ /dma' ba'i phyogs su lus 'gyur gyi/ /
gzhan gyi phyogs su ma yin no/ /de las gzhan du bzlog par ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skye bo snang / /chu smad kyi ni cha dag dang / /gro bzhin nyid du bstan pa
dang / /mon gru rgyu skar mchog nyid ni/ /khyim 'di chu srin kho na yin/ /'di ni spen pa'i zhing yin te/ /yang na gza' gzhan gyis mtshan pa'o/ /rtag tu 'di la skyes gnas pa//
de yang sa steng 'di la snang / /dang po'i mtha' dang bar ma'i mtha'/ /mtshan mo'i cha ni 'das pa la/ /de dag las skyes longs spyod che/ /kun nas snang bar 'gyur ba yin//
mtho dang dma' ba'i rigs gnas shing / /de dag sa yi bdag por 'gyur/ /rab gtum kha dog nag po'am/ /sngo bsangs mdog tu de dag 'gyur/ /mig mtha' dmar//
zhing 'jam pa dang / /rtag tu dpa' zhing rtul yang phod/ /de bzhin chu yis khyab pa yi/ /phyogs su rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ /tshe ring bu ni med pa dang / /sdug bsngal
mang po bzod par 'gyur/ /de las gzhan pa bzlog pa la/ /skye bo rnam par bzlog par snang / /mon gru'i phyed dang mon gre dang / /de bzhin khrums stod phyed dag ni/ /de
yi khyim du 'gyur pa ni/ /bum pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /'di la gza' yi gtso bo ni/ /zhing du rtag tu brten pa yin/ /de bzhin 'dres pa'ang zla ba dang / /blo ldan pa
ba sangs nyid yin/ /'di dag skye bar 'gyur ba ni/ /mtshan mo'am nam ni langs par snang / /rtag tu skye 'di bzang po ste/ /'jig rten spyod pa dag pa yin/ /mi ni ma rungs las byed cing //
blo dang ldan par brjod pa yin/ /longs spyod sna tshogs phun sum tshogs/ /sa steng rjes su spyod par 'gyur/ /de las gzhan du bzlog na ni/ /dbul zhing nang rnams snod du 'gyur/ /rgyu
skar khrums smad nyid dang ni/ /nam gru zhes ni brjod pa dang / /khrums stod kyi ni bzhi cha la/ /khyim ni nya ru rab tu brtags/ /skye ba de dag rtag gnas pa/ /kun tu ji ltar snang zhe na/ /
mtshan mo'i thun gyi bar ma dang / /nyin par nyi ma shar ba dang / /nyi ma thun phyed 'das pa dang / /nyin phyed cung zad 'das pa dang / /lhag ma khru gang tsam 'das par/ /'di yi dus su'ang
skyes pa ni/ /dag pa dang ni rab dag nyid/ /pa sangs nyid kyis rab tu mchod/ /pa ba sangs kyi zhing zhes pa/ /lha yi rigs zhes tshangs par spyod/ /ser dang dkar ba'i mdog dag gi /
gza' yis kyang ni rab tu bsten/ /des zhing rtag tu dge ba dang / /chos ldan mchog tu bzang ba yin/ /mi ni de la skyes gyur pa/ /yan lag kun kyang shin tu mdzes/ /brtson 'grus
che zhing rgyal po 'dod/ /gnyen dang bshes ni brtan pa dang / /tshe ring longs spyod che ba dang / /dma' ba'i yul la yang dag bsten/ /shar gyi phyogs la brten nas ni/ /de
dag rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /de dag mya ngan phyogs su ni/ /rtag tu skye bar mi 'gyur te/ /nya ni thang la yongs spyod par/ /nam yang snang ba ma yin no/ /drang
srong rnams kyi chu gnas dang / /chu bo dag tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de la skye ba rab brtan pa/ /khyim nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /mi ni de dag las skyes pa/ /dma' ba'i yul du
rnam par 'phel/ /rtag tu shar gyi phyogs gnas pa'i/ /sa bdag skal ba chen por 'gyur/ /phur bu dang ni spen pa dag/ gza' mchog gi ni mngon par bltas/ /shar gyi
phyogs kyi bdag po byed/ /de dag las skyes the tshom med/ /khyim ni rnam pa mang po dang / /rgyu skar du ma gsungs pa yang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gza' mchog kyang / /sngon gyi
dus yin da ltar min/ /mi rnams de las skyes pa yang / /de bzhin tshes grangs bco lnga dang / /nyin zhag sum cu dag nyid de/ /des na zla bar rab tu bstan/ /zla phyed nyin
mtshan bco lnga ste/ /zla phyed gnyis la zla bar brjod/ /des na zla ba bcu gnyis la/ /lo gcig tu ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'di tsam dus kyi tshod la ni/ /dus kyi tha mar yongs
su brtags/ /rtsod pa'i dus su phyin pa na/ /'di yi grangs su rab tu bstan/ /mi rnams tshe ni de bzhin du/ /lo brgya dag tu bsgrags pa yin/ /de dag lo tshigs phyin
pa na/ /dus ni drug tu rab tu brjod/ /dang po bar dang tha mar ni/ /de dag gsum du rab tu bstan/ /lha mtshams la ni sa 'gul na/ /mi rnams 'dir ni tshe ring 'gyur/ /de dag mi yi
'jig rten 'dir/ /skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mi ma yin pa 'jig rten 'dir/ /phan tshun du ni 'byer bar 'gyur/ /de dag rnam skrag 'jigs pa dang / /phan tshun du ni
rnam par rgyu/ /lha dang lha min gtso bo ni/ /gang tshe 'thab par rab 'jug pa/ /de tshe mi yi 'jig rten 'dir/ /nad ni 'byung bar byed pa yin/ /mjug ring las dang skar mda'
dang / /gnam lcags dang ni rdo rje dang / /dud pa phyogs ni mtha' dag tu/ /du ba mjug ring rab tu snang / /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /mun nag gis ni khebs par gnas/ /
nyi zla rdzu 'phrul chen po dag/ bug pa yod par snang ba dang / /de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /rnam mang yang ni snang 'gyur na/ /mu ge tshe ni nyams pa dang / /de bzhin yul 'khor
'jig pa dang / /mi yi bdag po 'chi ba dang / /sdom brtson 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / /'jig rten dag ni thams cad la/ /der ni 'jigs su rung ba 'byung / /mchu dang
tha skar dag dang ni/ /nab so la ni sa 'gul na/ /de tshe dbus kyi yul dag tu/ /rkun ma bab col byed la gnod/ /lho mi phyogs la gnas pa yi/ /rgyal po chen po rnam par
'jig/ bra nye smin drug nyid dang ni/ /gang tshe snar ma dang ni mgo /'gul na 'jig rten 'jigs pa che/ /de la dogs pa rab tu 'byung / /nub phyogs
na ni gnas pa yi/ /de tshe rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang yang mtha' 'khob gnas pa yi/ /kla klo rku bas 'tsho byed dang / /de bzhin 'bigs byed steng gnas dang / /nang
du mi yi dbang phyug gnas/ /de yang de yi dus dag tu/ /nad kyis brgyal zhing gnod par 'gyur/ /de dag la ni dgra rnams 'byung / /gcig la gcig ni yul 'phrog
'gyur/ /rgyu skar lag dang rgyal dang ni/ /skag dang de bzhin gre dang dbo/ /'di dag la ni sa 'gul na/ /mi bdag kun ni mi mthun nas/ /phan tshun gnod pa byed 'gyur ba//
gsod dang 'ching dang gnod pa dang / /mu ge dag kyang rab tu 'byung / /me bzhi nag pas ri dang / /de bzhin lha mtshams snron nyid la/ /snod kyi 'jig rten sar gyur pa/ /
'di la gang tshe 'gul 'gyur na/ /kha ba can gnas kla klo dang / /rkun ma kun nas gnas pa dang / /bal yul gyi ni bdag po dang / /kha sha'i lung par gnas pa yi/ /der
ni mi bdag ma lus pa/ /phan tshun du ni mi mthun nas/ /thams cad g.yul la spyod 'gyur bar/ /'dir ni the tshom med pa yin/ /rgyu skar gang yin snrubs dang ni/ /chu
ni stod smad gnyi ga la/ /sa yi steng du 'gul bar ni/ /'di dag la ni rab mthong na/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi mi rnams dang / /ban dra o dra kA ma ru/ /b+hang+ga la bdag rgyal po ni/ /'chi ba
'di la the tshom med/ /gau DA'i bdag po dpal dang ldan/ /yul 'khor gzhan gyis yongs bskor ba'am/ /'phral la na bar gyur pa dang / /la lar yang na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /
'jig rten rgya mtsho'i ngogs gnas dang / /gang gA'i 'gram du yang dag gnas/ /chu yis thams cad khyer ba'am/ /nad rnams mang po kun non byed/ /gro bzhin dang ni mon gru
dang / /mon gre dang ni chu stod dang / /de bzhin du ni chu smad dang / /gal te nam gru las skyes pa/ /rab tu 'gul ba nyin byed la/ /snod kyi 'jig rten yang dag 'gul/ /sa rnams
thams cad rab 'gul ba/ /ri bo dang ni gnas su bcas/ /rtag tu nam mkha' la snang ba/ /'phar zhing 'og tu 'byung byed na/ /byang phyogs kyi ni yul dag dang / /nub phyogs la ni
yang dag gnas/ /lho yi phyogs ni thams cad dang / /phyogs rnams kun la gnas byed pa'i/ /mi mchog sa ni mang spyod pa/ /phan tshun du ni gnod pa byed/ /sems can rnams ni
gnod chen ldan/ /mu ges yul 'khor 'byer bar 'gyur/ /tho rangs sa ni 'gul gyur na/ /lus can shis dang zhi bar 'gyur/ /de las cung zad phyi dus na/ /drag po'i 'gu
ba rab tu skye/ /de nas cung zad phyis 'gul na/ /yul ni ma ga d+har gnod dang / /ang+ga'i yul du gnod 'gyur te/ /ma ga d+ha rgyal de bzhin no/ /de nas
cung zad nyin phyed dam/ /phyi dro'i dus su gyur pa na/ /gal te sa ni 'gul bar gyur/ /sa steng ma lus nyid dag gi /rab tu byung ba thams cad la/ /rtag tu nad ni 'byung ba thob//
rims dang yi ga 'chus dang gzer/ /de bzhin nad ni 'brum bu yis/ /zhag bdun btab par gyur nas ni/ /de nas de dag sos par 'gyur/ /de nas nyi ma yang 'das
nas/ /sa ni gal te 'gul gyur na/ /rigs bzhi dag gi mchog gyur pa/ /bram ze rtswa ni so ma 'thung / /nyon mongs rgyal po'i blon po ni/ /'chi bar 'gyur bar the tshom
med/ /mdun na 'don ni chos dang ldan/ /blon po'am zham 'bring byed pa na/ /gzhan yang sdom can gtso bo ni/ /sngags rgyud don la mkhas pa dang / /bram ze dang ni rgyal
rigs dang / /de bzhin dmangs rigs rje'u'i rigs/ /brtan pa mkhas pa dag dang ni/ /bstan bcos de nyid don lugs ldan/ /gsod dang rab tu nyams pa'am/ /
dran ldan thos dang de nyid shes/ /sngon byung ba ni sems pa dag/ myur du nad kyis 'jigs 'gyur te/ /gnam lcags rdo rjes shing la bzhin/ /de nas nyi ma nub pa na//
de nas yang ni song ba na/ /phyi dro dus kyi mtha' la ni/ /gal te sa ni rab tu 'gul/ /de bzhin sems can 'dres pa dang / /dud 'gro dag gi 'gro ba dang / /mi yi 'jig rten
gtso bo dag/ de tshe 'gum dang rnam par 'jig/ mtshan mo'i thun ni dang po la/ /gal te sa ni 'gul 'gyur na/ /sems can 'dres pa sna tshogs dang / /dud 'gro'i skye
gnas rnams su ni/ /mi ni 'jig rten gtso rnams su/ /char chen rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /cung zad thun de bri gyur la/ /sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa yi/ /de tshe rtags de
snang gyur na/ /rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs chen 'byung / /de nas thun de zad pa'i mthar/ /'gul snang las ni mi bzad pa/ /nub phyogs mi yi bdag po yi/ /pha rol dmag
tshogs 'byung bar shes/ /thun ni gnyis pa dang po la/ /gal te sa ni 'gul 'byung gyur/ /gzhan gyi dmag tshogs nad dang 'chi/ /khong pa'i nad ni mi bzad 'byung //
mkhris pa bad kan las gyur nad/ /skye bo rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'byung po rnams ni skyo 'gyur zhing / /de tshe phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro/ de nas gnyis pa'i thun
dkyil du/ /sa ni rab tu 'gul byung na/ /rlung chen 'byung ba shes bya ste/ /shing dang lha khang 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /yang thog ra ba ni rnams kyi/ /rtse mo 'jigs par the
tshom med/ /gnas dang 'dug gnas bzang po dang / /khang pa dang ni rta babs dang / /dud 'gro rnams kyi 'dug gnas kyang / /sa la myur du ltung bar
'gyur/ /de nas mtshan phyed dus dag tu/ /gal te sa ni 'gul ba byung / /de tshe shar phyogs yul gyi bdag /mi mchog gtso bo 'chi ba'am/ /de bu 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am//
mu ge 'byung bar rab tu ston/ /bar ma'i thun ni bri gyur nas/ /tha mar nye la 'gul ba byung / /sa rnams dag ni ma lus la/ /zhi zhing nad med nges par ston/ /de nas mtshan
phyed mthar gyur la/ /gal te sa ni 'gul bar snang / /gsher chen yul gyi dbus dag tu/ /mi yi bdag po nad kyis gnod/ /phan tshun mi mthun gyur nas ni/ /sdug
bsngal mi bzad 'chi bar 'gyur/ /thun ni gsum par phyin nas 'gul/ /byis pa rnams la bde ba 'byung / /sbrang bu sha sprang phye leb dang / /rkun po rnams ni 'jig par
'gyur/ /tho rangs 'gul bar gyur na ni/ /tshe ring nad med lo legs byed/ /grong khyer gyi ni khor yug dag /me yis tshig par shes par bya/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i dus dag
tu| |sa ni rab tu 'gul pa byung / /dbus kyi yul ni thams cad du/ /rkun mas rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur/ /de tshe zhag ni bdun dag las/ /rgyal po 'chi bar snang ba yin//
gang du stobs ni rab che ba/ /sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa yin/ /de tshe gnas ni de dag tu/ /dge dang mi dge'i sbyor ba snang / /skar mda' gnam grum sa 'gul ni/ /skar mda' dkar
po 'bar 'gyur na/ /des ni sngar bstan sel bar byed/ /de bzhin dkar mdog rtag tu ni/ /dge zhing rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /mi bzad chen po kha dog dmar/ /me yis
tshig par nye bar ston/ /dud ka'i mdog nag nag po ni/ /rgyal po 'chi bar ston pa yin/ /ser ba'am yang na ser skya 'am/ /'dres pa'i mchog ni snang gyur na/ /de che
'bres pa'i las 'gyur ba/ /skar mda' ltung bas rnam par ston/ /gnam grum nyid du bstan pa ni/ /gar 'byung de ni ston pa ste/ /gal te dbus na de tshe dbus/ /yul
nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /sgra brnyan snyan pa byung na ni/ /bde zhing nad med ston par byed/ /ma rungs mi bzad 'jig rten du/ /rnga sgra yis ni dge ba sbyin/ /'jigs dang shin
tu 'jigs rung sgra/ /der ni mu ge stan pa yin/ /de la sogs par sbyor ba ni/ /rtag tu gza' rnams 'dod pa yin/ /rgyu skar 'di dag mthong ba la/ /grub pa'i las ni de tshe
bya| |tha skar snar ma nyid dang ni/ /rgyal dang khrums ni stod smad gnyis/ /nam gru dang ni lha mtshams dag /bzlas pa'i dus su rab tu bsngags/ /'di dag la ni sngags
rnams 'grub/ /grub pa'i don yang ster bar byed/ /skar ma dag ni 'di dag la/ /dkyil 'khor nyid kyang bri bar bya/ /gza' yi res kyi gtso bo ni/ /ser dang dkar
bar snang ba yin/ /tshes ni 'di dag la dge ste/ /rtag tu zla ba nya ba yin/ /yul gzhan dag tu 'gro byed dang / /dkyil 'khor dag kyang bri bar bya/ /dang po gsum pa lnga pa
dang / /bcu pa dang ni bdun pa dang / /bcu gsum pa la ci bde bar/ /mi yi bdag bo 'gro bar brtag/ skye bo kun la dge ba sbyin/ /chags shing 'gro bar rab tu bsngags//
dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngags rgyud dag/ sngags rnams thams cad mi bri 'o/ /'di dag la ni sngags mi 'grub/ /bgegs kyi rgyur ni bstan pa yin/ /'gro dang sbyin sreg
grub pa la/ /tshes grangs gza' ni dam par ldan/ /phur bu pa sangs zla ba dang / /gza' lhag mchog ni las kun la/ /gza' mchog 'di dag rtag tu ni/ /bzhi po tshes
dang ldan pa ni/ /sa steng 'jig rten kun tu ni/ /'gro ba'i las ni grub par byed/ /ma rungs 'chi ltas bral ba yi/ /nyi ma la ni brtag par bya/ /yud tsam bcu gnyis kho
na ni/ /de yi dus su rab tu sbyar/ /dkar dang byams ldan nyid dang ni/ /mig dmar du yang rab tu bstan/ /drag bo dbang chen dag pa dang / /byi bzhin nyid dang legs
mdzes dang / /'khor dang 'khor bar byed pa nyid/ /dge ba sbyin zhes bstan pa yin/ /zla ba mchog ni sbyin pa nyid/ /'di dag bcu gnyis mtshan nyid yin/ /yud tsam dag tu
bstan pa ni/ /nyin zhag sum cu nyid la 'o/ /bcu pa char ni 'bab 'gyur te/ /bcu bzhi pa ni yul 'khor 'jig/ brgyad pa bcu gnyis pa nyid dang / /bzhi pa nyid ni spang bar
bya| |myur la sogs pa'i grangs dang ldan/ /mar ngo la ni mtshan mo yin/ /lhag ma bgegs ni byed pa yang / /log 'dren yin te bzhi pa'o/ /'di dag grangs ni ldan pa
la/ /dus 'di dag tu rab tu bstan/ /mig ni 'byed dang 'dzums pa dang / /se gol myur ba'i 'gros 'di ni/ /'di dag dus kyi tshad dag ni/ /rgya cher yang ni bstan par bya//
se gol brgya yi tshogs dag la/ /rtsa rgyun gcig tu bstan pa yin/ /rtsa rgyun bzhi la chu tshod bstan/ /chu tshod bzhi la thun zhes bya/ /thun bzhi la ni nyin par te/ /mtshan mo
dag kyang de bzhin bstan/ /de ltar brgyad dang ldan pa la/ /nyin mtshan du ni rab tu brtags/ /mig gi 'byed 'dzums bcu la ni/ /skad cig tsam du rab tu brtags/ skad
cig bcu zhes bshad pa ni/ /yud tsam du ni yongs su brtags/ /yud tsam bzhi la thun gcig ces/ /sngags rig pas ni yongs su brtags/ /'di tsam dus kyi tshad la ni/ /
gsum gyi grangs su yongs su brtags/ /sbyin sreg dus dang bzlas pa yi/ /grub pa'i dus dang sbyar bar bya/ /nyal ba'i dus dang mi nyal dang / /rtag tu nyin
zhag phrugs btungs la/ /nyin dang mtshan ni nyi ma zhes/ /de ltar ming ni 'jug pa yin/ /nyi ma bco lnga nyid la ni/ /zla ba phyed du rab tu bstan/ /zla phyed gnyis la zla ba zhes/ /
rtsis shes 'jigs pa med pas bstan/ /de bzhin zla ba zla drug gis/ /sgra gcan gyis kyang 'dzin pa yin/ /de nas zla ba bcu gnyis la/ /lo yi sgrar ni rab tu bsgrags/ /
de nas lo ni bcu gnyis la/ /lo chen zhes ni de la bya/ /gza' dang rgyu skar phyin ci log/ lha min dbang po thams cad kyang / /de nas lo ni bcu gnyis la/ /'dir ni
dge dang mi dge byed/ /gang tshe yang ngor lha min dbang / /sgra gcan rab tu snang 'gyur zhing / /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /ma lus rab tu zin gyur na/ /mtshon gyi tshogs
ni chen po yang / /sa yi steng du snang bar 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa chen po ni/ /dus dang dus su rab sbyor 'gyur/ /rnam pa du ma mang po yi/ /bgegs ni mi bzad snang
bar 'gyur/ /dus kyi tha mar phyin pa na/ /'jig rten snod ni chos min la/ /rgyu skar snubs la gnas pa la/ /zla ba ma lus 'dzin 'gyur zhing / /mtshan mo ma lus 'dzin
pa nyid/ /zla ba 'dzin pa nub bzhin dang / /gal te nyi ma nyin par ni/ /nub bzhin du ni 'dzin gyur dang / /nyi ma dang ni zla ba nyid/ /mtshan phyed dag tu gzung gyur nas/ /lha min
dbang po'i grib ma yis/ /gal te 'jigs shing nub gyur na/ /shar phyogs gnas pa'i rgyal po ni/ /sdang bas gsod par the tshom med/ /rang nyid 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas sam/ /
gzhan gyis de ni gsod par 'gyur/ /kla klo yi ni bdag po nyid/ /shar phyogs su ni gsod par byed/ /o Da'i yul gyi mi rnams dang / /de tshe rdo rje zhes bdag kyang / /gal te tha skar
snar ma dang / /de bzhin du ni bra nye dang / /smin drug dag la nyi zla ni/ /gang tshe 'dzin par snang gyur na/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bad kan dang / /mkhris pa dang ni rlung gyur dang / /de
bzhin 'dres par gyur pa na/ /gzhan yang lus can kun la 'byung / /byis pa dag ni thams cad la/ /rnam pa du ma'i nad rnams 'byung / /gal te rgyu skar mchu dang ni/ /gre
dang de bzhin dbo nyid dang / /me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / /sa ga dag gi rgyu skar ni/ /de la nyi zla shar ba na/ /'dzin par the tshom med 'gyur zhing / /nyi zla gnyis ni shar phyogs
su| |sgra gcan gyis ni zin gyur na/ /shar phyogs mi yi bdag po dang / /lA Da yul gyi bdag po dang / /ang+ga ma ga d+ha rgyal po/ /mig gi nad kyis 'debs pa'am/ /bu rnams 'chi
bar 'gyur ba'am/ /de rnams 'chi bas nyer 'jigs 'gyur/ /dgra rnams snang ba'i sems ldan rnams/ /tshogs kyang de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
mgo dang lag dang nab so dang / /de bzhin rgyal dang skag nyid dang / /nyi ma zla ba 'di dag la/ /sgra gcan gyis zin snang gyur na/ /ma ga d+hA rgyal gnod 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin
yul mi dag la'ang gnod/ /blon po nad 'jigs shes par bya/ /'ching dang nyon mongs grong khyer 'gyur/ /lha mtshams dang ni snron dag la/ /sgra gcan gyis zin kun
la snang / /de tshe nad rnams kun tu 'gro/ yul mi kun la'ang nad rnams 'byung / /gsod dang 'ching dang nyon mongs dang / /gnod pa rnam pa du ma byung / /'ching dang
gzhan gyi dmag tshogs ni/ /skye bo'i gtso la de dag skye/ /chu stod dang ni gro bzhin dang / /de bzhin chu smad kho na la/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas dang / /zla ba
la ni dmar bar snang / /gza' ni 'dzin par snang gyur pa/ /rtag tu mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gro bzhin mon gre'i rgyu skar dang / /de bzhin du ni khrums stod dang / /gang tshe
mo na gru dag la ni/ /gal te nyi zla gzas zin te/ /gza' ni byung bar shes gyur na/ /kha dog nag pa la brten nas/ /mya ngan chen po nyon mongs dang / /mu ge kun
tu 'byung bar ni/ /yul mi kun la 'byung ba dang / /rgyal po rkun ma'i 'jigs chen 'byung / /nam gru rgyu skar nyid dang ni/ /gang tshe khrums smad dag la ni/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /
shar nas sgra gcan 'dzin pa na/ /nub phyogs nas ni nyi ma 'dzin/ /ma ga d+hAr ni mi yi bdag/ /sems can rgyal po'i thabs nyams par/ /zla phyed gcig gis snang bar 'gyur/ /rtag
tu sgra gcan 'gro ba yi/ /mtshan ma 'di dag bstan pa yin/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /phyogs ni gang nas zin gyur pa/ /de dang de yi phyogs dag tu/ /dge dang mi dge 'byung
bar 'gyur/ /gang nyid sa steng 'gul ba ni/ /'jig rten mtshan mas bstan pa dag/ dge dang mi dge de dang der/ /de bzhin gzas zin shes par bya/ /khug rna ser ba mjug rings
ni| |nyi ma lnga yi bar du yod/ /de 'og 'jig rten sems las 'byung / /ngogs la spyod cing gnas pa yin/ /yul mi thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing / /nad kyi gzhi ni 'byung ba
yin| |byang phyogs gang gA'i 'gram gyi ni/ /rgyal po dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ /de bzhin kha ba can gyi dbus/ /bgrod dka' khrad khrod la gnas dang / /sa yi bdag po la
gnas dang / /khor yug na rtse rje dang / /byang phyogs gang gA'i 'gram dag na/ /de tshe 'gram spyod bdag po dag/ mya ngan gdung ba du ma yis/ /skye bo'i bdag po de 'ching 'gyur/
rgyu skar gang la sa 'gul ba/ /de la khug rna yang dag bstan/ /phyogs rnams ma lus khug rna ni/ /mi bzad 'od ni spangs pa dang / /nyin zhag lnga yi
bar du yang / /rtag tu nyin zhag mang por ni/ /phan tshun chos ni mi mthong dang / /mi yi spyod yul mthong ba min/ /mi rnams dag ni phan tshun du/ /der ni mthong bar 'gyur
ma yin/ /der ni 'jig chen 'byung bar shes/ /rgyal po yul 'khor bcas te 'jig /skar mda' khor yug dag tu ni/ /gang dag las kyis byung gyur pa/ /phyogs
kyi mthar ni rab snang ba/ /gnyis dang gsum ni mi bzad yin/ /mtshan mo dbang po'i gzhu nyid dang / /bya rog gal te 'dab ma dkar/ /dkar ba'am yang na kha dog
nag /yang na dkar dang nag par mthong / /phyin log 'dab chags kha dog dang / /phyin ci log gi dus sgra dang / /phyin ci log gi bya rnams yod/ /gang du der ni
'jigs chen 'byung / /rkang gnyis rkang ba bzhi nyid dang / /rkang med dang ni rkang mang dang / /'dab chags dud 'gro srog chags rnams/ /phyin ci log 'gyur
'jigs chen 'byung / /khyi ni gyen du gdong bltas te/ /yang dang yang du zugs 'gyur ba/ /nyin par ram ni mtshan mo ru/ /gang du der ni 'jigs chen 'byung / /de
ltar rnam pa du ma dang / /rnam mang gang du rab brtags pa/ /der ni char mi 'bab par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i tshogs kyang rnam par 'jig /ji ltar skye ba'i skar ma ni/ /dge dang mi
dge'i srog chags yin/ /de bzhin mtshan ma gang skyes pa/ /dge dang mi dge'i byed pa yin/ /sngon gyi rgyu ni ma yin pa/ /rgyu mtshan cung zad mi mthong ste/ /rgyu med rab tu
'jug byed pa'i/ /bgegs 'byung ba ni yod ma yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu
rgyas pa'i mdo las/ skar ma'i dpyad kyi rgyu mtshan shes pa'i le'u rab 'byams las bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
pas| |gzhan yang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma dang / skar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye kye gza' dang / rgyu skar gyi tshogs khyed cag thams
cad nyon cig /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig /sngags dang / rgyud dang / dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga rnams
dang / bzlas pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang / rig pa sgrub pa la 'jug ba dang / rig pa 'dzin ba rnams kyi cho ga dang / rgyu skar gyi spyod pa dang / rtsis mngon par shes pa
rnams kyi cho ga'i rgyal po de la khyed cag rnams kyis der bgegs ma byed cig/ bstan pa la rab tu zhugs pa rnams la lha'i tshogs thams
cad kyis kyang de la srung ba gyis shig/ sems can ma rungs pa thams cad kyang dgag par gyis shig/ bstan par gyis shig/ thams cad kyi thams cad du gsod par ma
byed cig/ stobs bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi bstan pa la rnam par gzhag par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rungs
pa thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom
ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan
'das shAkya thub pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na bzhugs pa la rnam par blta ba'i phyir nye bar lhags par gyur to/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas
nye bar lhags par rang gi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bos te/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che/ /'jig rten rnams
la'ang phan pa'i phyir/ /sngags rgyud cho ga di lta bar/ /sngags rnams kun la rab 'jug phyir/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi/ /gtso mchog
yi ge gcig pa ni/ /dus nyams rtsod pa'i dus dag tu/ /sngags rnams kun gyi rab mchog ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin/ /gtsug tor rgyal po stobs po che/ /'byung
po kun ni zlog par byed/ /gza' dang rgyu skar ma mo rnams/ /ma rungs sems ldan 'gog par byed/ /'jig rten bgegs rnams ji snyed dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang gdug
sems ldan/ /sems can rnams ni rdzas gzung dang / /zlos pa rnams ni bde bya'i phyir/ /bstan pa 'di la cho ga mchog/ stobs chen 'khor los bsgyur ba yin/ /gtsug tor
rgyal po mthu bo che/ /kun la dbang phyug dam pa ni/ /gang gi dus ni 'di yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis gsungs/ /de skad gsungs nas sangs rgyas rnams/ /mi
gsung bar ni bzhugs par gyur/ /de nas sangs rgyas 'dus pa de rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad
snod kyi 'jig rten rnams gcig tu 'bar bar gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can gcig la yang gnod par ma gyur te/ snang ba chen po yang dag
par snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / de na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das dang / 'khor
chen po 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgongs su
gsol/ /yi ge gcig pa 'di ni rig pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gong nas gong du gnas pa/ bstan pa thogs pa med
pa| dpag tu med pa'i stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa/ bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cho ga yang ngas bshad par bya'o/ /bstan pa nub
ba'i dus su rtsod pa'i dus 'di la bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba de bstan pa 'di la srung ba gcig pur 'gyur zhing dus thams cad du grub par
'gro ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod la 'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin te bstan pa'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ /yi ge gcig pu
'di la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dus par 'gyur ro/ /kye lha'i tshogs dang / sems can thams cad nyon cig/ b+h+rUM/ bcom ldan 'di ni
thams cad mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas sngags gzugs rnam par gnas/ /ston pa thugs rje che dang ldan/ /sems can kun la rnam par spyod/ /sngags rnams bdag po dpal dang ldan/ /
gtsug tor las byung bstan pa yin/ /snying rje'i dbang la brten nas ni/ /'di ni yi ge gcig tu gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni/ /'di ni sna tshogs gzugs la gnas//
ji ltar sangs rgyas sku rnams ni/ /skye bo rnams la sku gdung gyur/ /'jig rten gyis mchod zang zing bcas/ /zang zing med pa'ang khyad par du/ /dam chos sku gdung dag tu bstan//
'jig rten zang zing med pa'i rgyu/ /sku ni zang zing bcas par gsungs/ /thub pa'i zla ba zag pa med/ /zang zing bcas dang zang zing med/ /'jig rten rgyur ni gsungs pa yin/ /
chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni/ /thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can la/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/ /sngags kyi tshul gyis bzhugs pa yin/ /sna tshogs gzugs
can thams cad mkhyen/ /sa steng 'di la snang ba yin/ /sems can rnams kyis sngags grub pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yin/ /sngags 'di yongs su mdor
bsdu na/ /rang gi cho gas 'dir bzlas na/ /sngags rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /rtag tu 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur/ /'di yi cho ga mdor
bsdus nas/ /dus su yang ni bshad par bya/ /dus mthar thub mchog 'jig rten du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nub pa na/ /de yi dus su cho ga 'grub/ /sngags 'grub pas
ni gsungs pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi las kyis sbyor ba rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ ma
rgyal ba las rgyal ba/ sngags thams cad kyi bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis don du gnyer ba/ gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cho ga yi ge
gcig pa sngar rgya cher bstan nas/ yang mdor na re zhig dang po bzlas pas gang du gnas pa las dpag tshad lnga'i nad nas ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad 'byer
bar 'gyur ro/ /grub pa thams cad kyang nus pa med par 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyi nus pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa po'i 'dod pa ma gtogs par lha thams
