sha kha ras sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad nyi ma bdun la dus gsum du byas na gang gi ming gis sbyin sreg byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nim pa'i lo ma la yungs mar gyis
btags pa'i sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad zhag bdun la dus gsum du byas na gang gis ming gis byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyis sbyin sreg
byas na thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /sman bri ha ta'i me tog gis sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gser rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /shing ka lany+dza ri ka'i me tog la sbyin sreg
stong rtsa brgyad byas na grong chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /pa ta la'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na 'bru mi zad pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /bil pa'i me tog gis sbyin sreg
byas na gsar rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /shu dag la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags te sbyin sreg byas na rgol ba thams cad la lan 'debs nus par 'gyur
ro| |sman bram ha'i khu bcud mar dang ldan pa zangs ma'i snod du bzhag la/ bzlas pa khri rdzogs pa'i bar du bzlas nas de nas 'thungs na rgol ba thams cad
las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /shin tu zhe sdang ba la ni stong rtsa brgyad bong ba la mngon par sngags te khros pa'i mdun du bor na khro ba med par 'gyur ro/ /
ras ris kyi cho ga bzhi pa rdzogs so// //ras ma nyams pa sgra med pa la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas pa/ tshon ma 'dres pa
dag gi 'phags pa 'jam dpal pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su 'phags pa 'og dpag chen mo/
g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzugs can ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og
tu pad+ma'i mtsho me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab pa na klu'i rgyal po gnyis ro stod chu'i nang nas byung ba/ pad+ma'i sdong bu la lag pas 'dzin pa'o/ /'phags pa
gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyogs gcig tu bri bar bya ste/ log 'dren gyi bgegs 'jigs par byed pa/ me 'bar ba mngon par 'byin pa/ spyan khro gnyer can
du byas pa/ phyogs gzhan du ri khrod ma lo ma gyon ma/ zhags pa dang / dgra sta lag na thogs pa/ kha dog nag pa/ mig dmar ba/ rma bya'i rgyab tu zhon pa/
sgrub pa po la srung bar byed pa bri bar bya'o/ /sgrub pa po yang pad+ma'i phreng ba lag na thogs shing bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi zhal la rnam par blta bar bya'o/ /
steng du ni rnga yab dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu rnams bri bar bya'o/ /ras ris de nub tu bstan te bzhag la sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod
rten gyi mdun du bzlas pa bye ba bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i tha mar me'i mchod pa chen po bya zhing bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklags pa bzlas pa stong
phrag bcu 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i zhal la lta zhing bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas ras ris 'gul bar gyur na rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i mig thob cing rig
pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /'khor los bsgyur ba chen por yang 'gyur ro/ /bzlas shing bzlas na byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i chos
ston pa yang thos par yang 'gyur ro/ /ras ris de nyid kyi mdun du ba ser mo be'u yod pa'i mar khu blangs la zangs ma'i snod du bzhag nas ji srid du dro bar 'gyur
ba dang / du ba 'thul bar 'gyur ba dang / rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na dro bar gyur pa na 'thungs na ni mchog tu yid gzhungs pa dang /
thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /du ba 'thul ba na 'thungs na ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rab tu 'bar ba na 'thungs na ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /kham
phor so ma btang ba kha sbyar la shu dag sna ma'i me tog gis dkris pa bzhag la ji srid myu gu byung ba de'i bar du bzlas brjod bya ste/
de zos na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod gzhan bye ba byas na 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong zhing chos ston pa yang thos la de la dad par
yang 'gyur ro/ /gser gyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyar byas te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ ji srid 'bar gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na de blangs pa
tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /ldong ros sam/ ba bla'am/ lig bu mig gam/ bil
ba'i lo ma chu la bcug ste/ ji srid khu la khu la zhes bya ba'i sgra byed pa de srid du bzlas na de blangs pa tsam gyis sa la spyod pa'i srin po dang / sha za rnams
kyi bdag po dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rma med cing ma 'dres pa'i ral gri blangs la ji srid sbrul gyi gdengs ka bzhin du byas te/
'dug pa de srid du bzlas pa byas la/ de nas de blangs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal par tshe gnas pa dang / gzhan gyis
mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /ldong ros lcags gsum gyis dkri bar byas te khar bcug la ji srid tsu lu tsu lu'i sgra 'byung ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na thub pa med par 'gyur
ro| |dgra thams cad 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs thams cad dbang du byed de/ 'dod pa dbang du byed pa ni ma gtogs so/ /shing sha mi las skyes
pa'i shing a shwat+ta'i snying po blangs la/ lcags gsum gyis dkri bar byas nas khar rab tu bcug na/ ji srid tsu lu tsu lu'i sgra 'byung ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na
mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /dngul gyi 'khor lo byas te lha ma yin gyi khung bu'i sgor bzhag la ji srid du 'khor los lha ma yin gyi 'khrul
'khor bcad nas rab tu 'jug pa de'i bar du bzlas pa byas na de'i mod la lha ma yin gyi na chung rnams byung nas de dang lhan cig rab tu zhugs nas bskal par
gnas par 'gyur ro/ /lcags las byas pa'i mdung rtse gsum byas te/ khung bu de dag gi sgor bzlas pa byed na der 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'jig par 'gyur
zhing | ji srid sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dang lhan cig 'dod pa de snyed dang lhan cig rab tu 'jug cing bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byams pa yang bzhugs
shing mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/ /ras ris kyi cho ga lnga pa'o// //shing arga dkar po las mthe bong tsam gyi bcom
ldan 'das 'jam dpal byas la shing arga'i me tog 'bum phul na blon po chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /shing ka ra bI ra dkar po'i rtsa ba las mthe bong tsam
byas te/ 'di nyid kyi me tog bye ba gcig phul na bka' la gtogs par 'gyur ro/ /shing ka ra hA Ta las mtho gang gi tshad tsam du byas la de'i me tog
'bum phul na dmag dpon thob par 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan dkar po las mtho phyed tsam gyi bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal byas la/ sna ma'i me tog 'bum
phul na mdun na 'don thob par 'gyur ro/ /shing a shwat+ta las sor gcig tsam gyi tshad du byas la rnyog pa med pa'i chus bum pa bkang pa phul na skye bo mang
pos bkur bar 'gyur ro/ /dri thams cad las byas la me tog thams cad phul na gang 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu yul ma ga d+hA'i yam shing
ma nyams pas sbyin sreg byas na blon po skye bo mang pos bkur bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas pa byas na mtshams med pa lnga yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /
shi ba'i dus su yang 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'di la chos ston par yang mdzad do/ /langs shing langs shing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na
sems can thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /mig la yongs su bzlas na bdag po mthong zhing bka' drin stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis ched du
las byas pa nyin zhag bdun gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /grong gzhan du gnas pa la ni zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis so /yul gzhan la gnas pa la ni zla ba
gnyis so/ /gzhon nu'i bdag po'i cho gas yin gyi/ sngags gzhan gyi cho gas ma yin na/ las ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa dang / mngon spyod
dbang du byed pa ni ma gtogs so/ /cho ga drug pa 'di bstan pa/ /dus kyi mtha' la sems can rnams/ /bsod nams chung la phan don du/ /thub pas sngon ni
bstan pa yin/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yin/ /bstan pa nub par gyur pa na/ /dus ni mi bzad 'jigs pa na/ /de tshe grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /cho ga'i rgyal po bde
byed pa/ /bdun pa 'dir ni bshad par bya/ /de tshe dus ni mi bzad la/ /cho ga 'di ni nga yis bshad/ /sems can bsod nams chung ba la/ /lam ni 'di dag
rab tu bstan/ /byang chub tshogs kyi rgyu don du/ /theg gsum lam la rab tu gzhol/ /de yi dus su sems can la/ /thabs la mkhas
pa bstan pa yin/ /sred pas rmongs pa'i sems can dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis dkrugs/ /srid pa mthar ni gtug bya'i phyir/ /de dag la bstan
lam 'di yin/ /srid pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa la/ /dge ba'am dge ba'i las kyi rgyur/ /grub dang sgrub dang de bzhin rdzas/ /sngags dang rgyud ni nga yis
bstan/ /sgrub pa zlos pa rnams la 'dir/ /cho ga'i rgyal po bdag nyid che/ /sems can rnams ni gdul don du/ /'jig rten 'dren pa rnams kyi gsungs/ /
shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog /thub pa mchog gis de gsungs nas/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /grub pa don yod bstan pa dang / /sngags dang rgyud kyi stobs dang ni/ /
brtson 'grus rgya che ldan bstan nas/ /de tshe gnas gtsang lha tshogs la/ /rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs pa ni/ /cho ga'i rgyal po rgya che ba/ /'jig rten kun la phan
pa'i phyir/ /'jam dpal dbyangs kyi bstan pa la/ /grogs po de ni nga yis bstan/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pa
po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ cho ga'i bya ba 'jam dpal gyi cho ga rab 'byams las le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom
ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ gzhan yang / gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/
khyod kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u las/ ras ris kyi cho ga bdun pa yod de/ gang gis dus kyi mtha' ma de la bsgrub par 'gyur na/ de la don yod par 'grub par
'gyur te/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa/ bde ba 'byung ba/ bde ba rnam par smin pa/ mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba/ ngan song thams cad las zlog par
byed pa/ nges par byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa'i grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po
gsungs pa ni/ yi ge drug pa 'gro ba drug las grol bar byed pa'i bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mi mnyam pa/ zla med pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ srid pa'i rgya
mtsho thams cad dang / sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal las grol bar byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bzod par dka' ba/ 'jig rten
thams cad kyis ma gos pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis mi thub pa/ srid pa'i lam thams cad rnam par
sbyong bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par byed pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bar
mdzad pa/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed pa/ 'jam dpal gyi bstan pa la sngags thams cad kyi mchog de gang zhe na/ oM bA kye daM na maH/ 'di'i cho gar
'gyur ba ni/ tshod rngad dam/ nas chan khyor gang ngam/ slongs mo'i zas kyis 'tsho la/ dus gsum du khrus byed cing gos lan gsum brje bas yi ge 'bum
byas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /kha tshar gyi rtse mo ma bcad pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas pas/ tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis 'phags pa
'jam dpal pad+ma'i gdan la chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs su 'dug pa/ bla gos phrag bar gzar ba
'drir gzhug par bya'o/ /g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/ g.yas su ni 'phags pa kun tu bzang po/ steng du ni
rig pa 'dzin pa gnyis phreng ba thogs shing sprin gyi nang nas byung bar bri bar bya'o/ /'og tu ni sgrub pa po lag na spos snod thogs pa'o/ /khor yug tu ni ri'i rtse mo'i
'og tu ni pad+ma'i mtsho 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ /sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang / ras ris nub tu bstan te rab tu gzhag la/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas
nas mar me yang rab tu spar zhing sna ma'i me tog la re re la yang mngon par bzlas nas me tog stong rtsa brgyad 'jam dpal gyi zhal la gtor ro/ /de nas zab pa chen
po'i yi ge hUM gi sgra thos pa'am/ ras ris rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur ro/ /yi ge hUM gi sgras ni sa kun la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /ras ris 'gul bas ni rgol
ba thams cad la lan 'debs nus pa dang / 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi bstan bcos shes par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste ma grub kyang las thams cad la nus pa dang
ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni cho ga dang po'o/ /a ga ru'i yam shing sor phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad la du ruSh+ka'i thang chus sil ha ras btags pas seng ldeng gi mdag
ma du ba med pa la mtshan thog thag tu sbyin sreg byas na skya reng 'char ba tsam na 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong bar 'gyur zhing / des ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol
bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa dbang du bya ba ni ma gtogs so/ /de nyid kyi ras ris kyi mdun du tsan+dan gyi spos kyi rgyun chad pa med par mtshan
thog thag tu bdugs te bzlas pa byas na/ de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du gshegs te zab mo'i chos ston pa de la mos par 'gyur ro/ /
mos nas kyang nad thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ dbang thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan
dmar po las byas pa'i pad+ma rtsa lag dang bcas pa sor drug tsam tsan+dan dmar po'i 'de gus bskus nas lan stong sngags shing dgang gzar gyi lan stong blug
pa byas la/ zla ba nya la ras ris kyi mdun du pad+ma'i snod bzhag la lag pas bzung nas ji srid rab tu 'bar ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na de bzung bas lo bcu
drug gi na tshod dang / mdog gser btso ma 'dra ba dang / nyi ma bas lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / lha gzhon nu lta bur 'gyur ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa
thams cad kyis phyag byas pa dang / bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /lus zhig nas mngon par dga' bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gzas zin pa
la shu dag dkar po blangs la ba'i rnam lngas bkrus te shing a shwat+tha'i lo mas bkab pa byas la/ ji srid drod dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar ba de srid kyi bar
du bzlas pa byas na dro ba 'byung bas ni skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba dang / rgol ba thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang
ba dang / stong phrag sum cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'bar bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /ba ser skya'i be'u
dang bcas pa'i mar khu blangs la/ zangs ma'i snod du shing ashwat+tha'i lo ma bdun gyis bkab ste bzhag la/ ji srid grub pa rnam gsum thob pa de srid du
bzlas pa byas la de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sman puskar mU la'i sa bon zla ba
gzas zin pa la khar bcug nas ji srid du tsu lu tsu lu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ba de srid du bzlas pa byas la/ sman de phyung nas lcags gsum gyis yongs su
dkri ba byas la/ yang khar rab tu bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sman de skyug na ni snang bar 'gyur ro/ /li shi dri zhim po khar bcug la bzlas pa 'bum byas
na gang dang smra ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'o ma dang / nas chan khyor gang za zhing bzlas pa 'bum phrag bcu gnyis byas na rig pa 'dzin
par 'gyur ro/ /slong mo'i zas kyis 'tshol shing bzhin du mi smra ba'i dka' thub byed cing bzlas pa 'bum byed na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bzlas pa bye ba
byas na ji ltar srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal chos ston pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas pa byas na don
thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi gzugs brnyan dri thams cad pas byas la bcad cing sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur
ro| |gu gul gyi ril bu rgya shug gi tshig gu'i tshad tsam mar gyis btags pas brgya phrag stong gi sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/ /til la zho
dang | mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg 'bum phrag stong byas na thams cad kyi dam pa'i khyim gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur ro/ /ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung
bas dkyil 'khor byas la de la me tog gis bcal du bkra ma ste bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ de nas dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par
byas na zla ba gcig gis mchog tu yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/ /gi wang la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te dpral bar thig le byas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar
'gyur ro/ /gtsug phud la lan bdun bzlas pa byas na sems can thams cad kyis gnod pa med par 'gyur ro/ /me tog gi ri ma las sbyin sreg 'bum byas na
nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin re zhing bzlas pa bdun byas na nges par myong bar 'gyur bas las rnams zad par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas pa brgya
rtsa brgyad byas na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /le'u bdun pa'i ras ris kyi cho ga'o/ /'phags pa
'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'jam dpal gyi ras ris kyi cho ga'i le'u
rab 'byams la sa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ gzhan yang / gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang
la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyi sngags dang / rgyud dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang / 'khor lo
bsgyur ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor la sogs pa dang / sngags thams cad kyi grub
pa'i gnas yod de/ de yang mdor na byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur te/ rgya dang rgya ni che nyid
la| |'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab 'grub 'gyur/ /gang yang de yi sngags rnams ni/ /der ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /gtsug tor rgyal po thams cad dang //
de dag tu ni grub par snang / /kA bi she dang bag kha la/ /o Di ya ni khor yug yul/ /kha che dang ni sin+d+hu'i yul/ /kha ba can gyi mtshams kun dang / /byang
phyogs su ni gnas brten la/ /dge ba'i sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang yang sangs rgyas sngon gsungs dang / /da ltar yang ni gsungs pa dang / /ma
'ongs sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / /zhi ba'i rgyur ni gsungs pa ste/ /kha ba can ri'i nang byung ba/ /der ni thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /skye bo skal ldan
bzang po ni/ /zhi ba'i las ni rtsom par byed/ /de bzhin sngags ni yul dbus su/ /pad+ma'i rigs ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /mdzod dang nor bu'i rigs
dag kyang / /der ni 'grub par rab tu snang / /gnod sbyin lngas rtsen dag dang ni/ /'phrog ma gnod sbyin skye gnas dang / /gang dag dri za'i sngags rnams ni/ /de dag tu
ni grub par gsungs/ /de nas rtag tu ku sha'i grong / /ma ga d+hA ni khor yug dang / /ngogs dga' chu bo snar ma dang / /bang ga'i yul ni thams cad du/ /de bzhin nor
bu'i rigs gsungs pa'i/ /dzam+b+ha la ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho dang ni gling ngogs dang / /chu yi gzi ni thams cad dang / /dga' ba'i grong khyer siM ha lar/ /
sngags kyi lha ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /sgrol ma khro gnyer can dag dang / /dpal chen ma dang grags chen ma/ /gdugs dkar rnams kyi sngags rnams dang / /zla ba'i
grong khyer rgya mtsho dang / /shar gyi yul ni kho ra yug /der gnas pa la 'grub par 'gyur/ /'bigs byed ri nang gnas pa dang / /yul ni mchog dbang khor
yug tu/ /smin drug bu bzhin 'jam dpal ni/ /khor yug tu grub pa yin/ /ri rtse tshang tshing nang dang ni/ /ri sul dang ni nags bcas la/ /log 'dren bgegs
ni byed pa yi/ /bzlas pa dag ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /glang po'i cha byad yang dag ldan/ /mche ba gtsigs pa gzi brjid che/ /de bzhin rta gzugs du ma dang / /
du ma'i rnam par grags pa yin/ /lha ni dbang dang ldan pa'i bu/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bgegs byed pa/ /des bstan sngags dang
ldan pa yi/ /grub pa'i zhing du rab tu snang / /ma mo mi bzad rnam sna tshogs/ /gza' nyid shin tu mi bzad dang / /yi dwags skyes gnas bstan pa yin/ /mi yi
zas byed bden bral dang / /yi dwags rgyal por bstan pa dang / /de dag zhing du grub par gsungs/ /de la sogs pa'i 'byung po kun/ /grub pa'i zhing du
gsungs pa yin/ /rdo rje khro bo brtson 'grus che/ /de dag phyogs su grub pa yin/ /lha min sngags kyi gtso bo dang / /gang gzhan de bzhin 'jig rten pa'i//
sngags rgyud lho phyogs dag tu ni/ /brten pa dag la grub par 'gyur/ /rtag tu yi dwags rgyal po dang / /gshin rjes kyang ni bstan pa dang / /zhi ba khyab 'jug
gis bstan pa'i/ /sngags gzhan dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur/ /gdug cing gdug pa'i las dag ni/ /lha yi gnas su bstan pa yin/ /sngags rnams
gdug pa'i las rnams ni/ /lag na rdo rjes bstan pa dag /lho yi phyogs la bsten na ni/ /sdig pa'i las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de dag gi ni phyogs dag
tu| |myur du yang dag 'grub pa snang / /nyi mas bshad pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /nyi ma'i sngags zhes rab tu bsgrags/ /nub phyogs na ni gang yod pa/ /sngags dang
rgyud ni rab tu 'grub/ /gnod sbyin dbang po rdzu 'phrul che/ /der ni rang sngags 'grub par 'gyur/ /byis pa rnams ni rmongs pa yi/ /'byung po kun la nor sbyin
zhing | |cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni/ /skye bo rnams la nor sbyin byed/ /longs spyod ldan zhing mdzod 'phel ba/ /nub kyi phyogs su 'grub par 'gyur/ /nor sbyin
zhes bya'i ming gis ni/ /sa yi steng du rnam par grags/ /gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje rang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /sngags pa mchog ni dam pa ste/ /
rang nyid sa bcu'i bdag po yin/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag gi /de dag sngags ni grub pa yin/ /de bzhin rigs brgyad sngags dag ni/ /phyogs brgyad dag tu gnas
pa yin/ /rgyal ba'i rigs kyi sngags dag ni/ /byang gi phyogs su 'grub pa yin/ /pad+ma'i rigs las byung ba'i sngags/ /de bzhin shar gyi phyogs su 'grub/ /lho
yi phyogs su gnas pa la/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /nub phyogs su ni mdzod 'grub gsungs/ /phyogs mtshams dag tu rin chen rigs/ /de bzhin
nub byang mtshams su ni/ /de dag 'grub par rab tu brtags/ /lho nub kyi ni mtshams dag tu/ /de bzhin gnod sbyin rigs kyang 'grub//
shar lho dag gi cha dag tu/ /nyan thos rnams ni gzi brjid che/ /de dag rigs su snang ba ni/ /der gnas pa la 'grub par 'gyur/ /byang shar dag gi cha dag tu/ /rang
rgyal rnams su yang dag 'byung / /rigs ni 'jig rten kun gyis mchod/ /de dag der ni 'grub pa yin/ /'og gi phyogs kyi cha dag tu/ /'jig rten pa yi sngags
rnams 'grub/ /sa 'og 'jug par gyur pa'i sngags/ /rigs brgyad kun la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa'i sngags/ /gtsug tor la sogs
rab bsgrags pa/ /steng du 'gro ba'i grub par ni/ /rgyal ba 'khor lo sgyur bas gsungs/ /thad kar kun nas khor yug tu/ /rdo rje can gyi grub pa yin/ /de bzhin
gzhan yang sngags rgyal kun/ /pad+ma'i rigs las byung ba ni/ /thams cad du ni thams cad 'grub/ /sngags rnams kun kyang longs spyod ster/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs
dag kyang / /dus rnams kun tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di dag zhing du bstan pa ste/ /de yi dus ni yongs su bstan/ /rgyal ba'i rigs kyi sngags grub pa/ /sangs
rgyas rnams la sngon 'byung ba'o/ /pad+ma rdo rje'i rigs dag ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar ma'i dus/ /gzhan gyi dus su sngags dag ni/ /de las gzhan pa'i rigs
'grub yin/ /de dag grub pa'i dus su gsungs/ /dus gzhan rab tu bstan ma yin/ /dka' thub kyis ni grub pa mchog /skye ba gsum gyis thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu
sngags rnams zlos pa dang / /der dad yid ni der sems dang / /rgyal sras rnams la rab dang ba/ /skye ba 'di la'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus
pa dang / /byang chub sems kyis brgyan pa dang / /shes rab che zhing sdom la gnas/ /sngags dang rgyud la 'jigs pa med/ /byang chub sdom la gnas pa dag /'bad
pa med par sngags rnams 'grub/ /sems can rnams kyis las grub dang / /bdag kyang grub par nyer bstan pa/ /rtag tu sngags nyid grub pa yin/ /rmongs pa'i
sems can 'grub pa med/ /de nyid phyir na rgyal dbang gis/ /cho ga'i rgyal po gsungs pa ni/ /sangs rgyas gtso bo bdun pa yis/ /sngags rnams rgya che'i las dag
bstan/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi thu bo ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni gzi chen la/ /thub pa'i zla ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /des ni gsung mchog rab tu bstan/ /sngags rnams kyi
ni mthar thug mthu/ /gzhon nu rab tu nyon cig dang / /gang tshe sangs rgyas rtag tu ni/ /'jig rten 'dren pa bzhugs gyur pa/ /de tshe de
bzhin grub pa ni/ /gtsug tor la sogs rab grags pa/ /de bzhin 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / /gzi brjid phung por rab bstan dang / /rgyal ba gtsug tor
gdugs dkar po/ /rgyal bas mang por gsungs pa ni/ /de la sogs pa'i gtsug tor ni/ /de yi tshe ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba ni/
dzam+bu'i gling du 'byung 'gyur zhing / /chos kyi rgyal po rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rkang gnyis dam pa bzhugs pa na/ /sngags rnams ma lus bshad pa dag /de yi tshe
na 'grub par 'gyur/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/
zhing dang / dus kyi cho ga nges pa'i le'u rab 'byams las nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ gzhan
yang | gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ras
ris ni sngar bstan te/ sems can la yod pa'i spyod pa dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i mtshan ma rnams ni bshad par bya yi nyon cig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos btud nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can
rnams ni gzhan gyi lus la 'jug pa'i sems can rnams te/ 'phags pa dang / lha'i skye gnas dang / grub pa dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
sha za dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa las sna tshogs kyis byas pa'i lus rnam pa sna tshogs la brten cing gnas pa/ cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rtags sna
tshogs dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bstan pa'i dus lags/ bde bar gshegs pa/
bstan pa'i dus ni lags te/ de'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas legs par bshad du gsol/ /de skad ces rgyal ba'i mchog 'jig rten gyi 'dren pa go'u ta ma bdun
pa la gsol ba btab nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa cang mi smra bar gyur te rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
pas sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / mtshan ma shes pa dang / rtags dang / dus gsungs pa/ gzhan gyi lus zhugs
sems can ni/ /sngags kyi sbyor bas drang bar bya/ /kha cig zas la chags pa yi/ /sa steng mi ni 'dzin par byed/ /gzhan dag khros ldan sems kyis ni/ /sa
steng dag tu mi bzad pas/ /rtag tu chags dang bral ba dag /snying rje'i dam tshig dag gis ni/ /mi yi 'jig rten dag 'jug pa/ /dge ba'i mi la 'dzin par
byed| |rab bsngags dge dang g.yo ba med/ /mi rnams kyi ni mdog kyang sgrub/ /nyi ma dag ni 'char ba la/ /de dag 'jug par brjod pa yin/ /mi rnams nyi ma
nub pa yi/ /de yi dus su 'jug par 'gyur/ /mtshan mo'i thun gyi dang po la/ /yar ngo la ni snang bar 'gyur/ /rab bsngags dge ba'i las dag dang / /rtag
tu gang zhig chos ldan mi/ /gang zhig shes nyen ldan pa ni/ /de dag la ni 'jug par snang / /'dod chags bral ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /des na mi la 'jug pa
yin| |phyogs gtsang skye bo gtsang ba dang / /rgyu skar skar ma bzang ba dang / /nyin zhag sngags dang zla res bzang / /yar ngo dge ba'i nyin zhag dang / /gza'
bzang yang dag ldan pa dang / /tshes grangs rdzogs dang yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin zla ba nya ba la/ /de dag la ni 'jug par snang / /chags bral rdzu 'phrul chen po ni/ /
'jug par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yang / /nam mkha' la ni ta la tsam/ /sa las 'phags te 'dug pa yin/ /de ni skyil krung 'dug nas kyang / /nam mkha' la ni
gnas par snang / /tshig kyang bzang po mtshungs med dang / /tshangs dbyangs de bzhin rnar snyan dang / /gang du 'dod chags bral de gnas/ /sems dpa' chen po de
dag smra/ /gtsug tor phyag rgyas drangs pa yis/ /sa yi steng du 'dug par 'gyur/ /sa steng de la 'jug pa na/ /de yi mod la mchod yon sbyin/ /sna ma'i me tog
dag la ni/ /tsan+dan bzang po gur gum bsres/ /bsres pa'i chu dang chu gtsang ni/ /de yi mod la dbul bar bya/ /sngags pa sa la rab btud nas/ /pha na pa'i blo yis
gsol ba gdab/ /dpa' bo'i rang bzhin sems kyis ni/ /sems can des ni gsol ba gdab/ /tshig ni bzang po 'don byed cing / /rnar snyan de bzhin rmongs
ba med/ /sngags shes cho ga 'jigs med pas/ /de ni ji ltar 'dod pa 'dri/ /'jam dbyangs yang dag dran nas ni/ /de yi dus su 'jigs med bya/ /gtsug
phud lnga pa'i phyag rgya 'am/ /gtsug tor las byung gzhan pa'ang bcing / /de nas phyogs ni bcing bya ste/ /steng dang 'og tu'ang de bzhin
no| |de nas de yi 'byung ba kun/ /bar dang tha mar rab tu brjod/ /de bzhin dang po bar ma'i dus/ /byung dang ma 'ongs dus dag dang / /de bzhin da ltar
byung gyur pa/ /'od ldan des ni ston par 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'dzum med mig gis ni/ /chags bral des zin rab tu lta/ /gang yin des bstan tshig gis
ni| |bde bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /de bzhin grub dang bsgrub bya'i rdzas/ /gang zhig tshogs kyi rnam pa dang / /rang rgyal byang chub dgra bcom dang / /
nges par byang chub chen po'ang de/ /nges par sangs rgyas nyid rigs nyid/ /de bzhin byang chub sems rigs dang / /rigs med nyid dang dus dang ni/ /
sems can skal ldan brjod pa'ang yin/ /dam tshig gis ni mngon mtshon pas/ /bden pa kun ni des ston 'gyur/ /skad cig tsam ston rnal 'byor la/ /
dus ring dus su sdod ma yin/ /skad cig de la gang cung zad/ /yid la bsams shing don du gnyer/ /myur du sngags grub kho na la/ /de dag thams cad ston
par byed/ /ci 'dod mngon par re ba dag /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob/ /sngags pas slar ni gshegs gsol ba/ /myur du mchod yon phul nas 'gyel//
cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /snod ni yang dag bsrung ba bya/ /sems can lus ni 'gyel ba yang / /sa yi steng du nyal ba nyid/ /gtsug tor sngags dang ldan pa
yi| |sngags ni cho gar gsungs pa dag /de nyid kyis ni bsrung ba dang / /phyag rgya gtsug phud lnga yis so/ /de tshe lus ni bde legs 'gyur/ /sa yi steng las ldang bar
'gyur/ /sems can kun la'ang 'jug pa yi/ /srung ba 'di ni rab tu brtag /snod la brten te 'tshe byed par/ /gdug pa'i sems can gyis mi nus/ /skye bo snod
du gyur pa la/ /'di ni srung ba chen po yin/ /de yi tshig ni bar mar gnas/ /dbus kyi yul gyir rab tu bsgrags/ /lha yi skye gnas la brten pa'i/ /'og min gzugs
dang ldan pa dang / /de dang de yi rtags rnams dang / /gzugs ni rab tu snang ba yin/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug dang / /'dod dang ldan pa'i lha dag dang / /
de las dman pa'i 'gro ba'i rtags/ /tshig nyid kyang ni shin tu snyan/ /de nas sa la gnas pa dang / /gzhal med khang gnas lha rnams kyi/ /tshig ni ku sha'i grong
khyer mtshungs/ /ma ga d+hA yi gnod sbyin tshig /de bzhin ang+ga'i yul gyi tshig /lto 'phye chen po rab tu bstan/ /gzi brjid chen po nam mkha'
lding | |de dag shar phyogs tshig tu 'gyur/ /bang ga'i yul du yang dag skyes/ /gang dag tshig ni bstan pa ni/ /de bzhin mi 'am ci yi tshig /de yi tshig tu rab
brtag bya/ /rtag tu piN+Da'i tshig gyur pa/ /grub dang ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin/ /de tshig rig pa 'dzin pa dang / /drang srong 'dod pa'i gzugs can yin/ /de tshig mngon
shes lnga dang ni/ /drang srong rnams kyis yongs su brtags/ /gang yang yul tshig ma ga d+hA/ /gang yang ha ri ki la'i tshig /mi gsal mi dong nyid dang ni/ /yi ge ta
la shin tu rten/ /la yi yi ge mang ba'i tshig /sha za'i tshig tu brjod pa yin/ /las tshon zhes bya'i gling dang ni/ /na li ke ra 'byung ba'i gnas/ /gling ni rtsub
par byed nyid dang / /gcer bu stobs ldan bu gnas kyang / /sems can dag byed gnas pa dag /de bzhin 'di dag gling las byung / /yi ge la mang tshig dag
dang | |tshig ni gsal ba'i rnam pa med/ /mi gsal bsri ba med nyid dang / /khro bcas yi dwags skye gnas tshig /lho phyogs pa yi tshig dag dang / /an+d+ra kar
Na dra bi DA/ /sems can ko sal 'brog gnas dang / /sing ga la yi gling dag na/ /yi ge ga dang rar bcas pa/ /de ni srin po'i tshig tu shes/ /de dag gling la gnas pa
de'i| |ming ni gang zhig brjod pa yang / /ma mo rnams ni gzi brjid che/ /de yi tshig 'dir gsungs pa yin/ /tshig ni nub phyogs phyogs mtshams dang / /ma la ba yi tshig
dag dang / /be'u nya dang rgya mtsho'i tshig /sha ra se yi rnam brtags dang / /rgya mtsho bcu 'dus chu bo 'dus/ /dpal mgrin dang ni ko dz+wa ri/ /'di dag tshig ldan 'jug
pa ni| |nyi ma la sogs gza' mchog gdon/ /de lan gzhan don gtso bo ni/ /yul ni ba ri ya tra'i tshig /yul ni ar bu ta sa h+ya/ /ri ni mA la yar gnas dang / /
lang ba'i yul du yang dag skyes/ /tshig ni ci 'dra yod pa yi/ /de 'dra'i tshig tu smra ba ni/ /grul bum skye gnas 'dzin pa yin/ /yi ge sha Sha sa dang ni/ /ra lA ba las
yang dag 'byung / /yi ge g+ha dang ldan pa'i tshig /lha ma yin du nges par bstan/ /kha che'i yul las 'byung ba dang / /skye ba'i gnas na ka bi sha /gnod sbyin rgyal
po'i rigs las byung / /phyag na rdo rje'i rigs su bstan/ /de dag lnga yi gtso bo ni/ /kun gyi tshig tu 'dod pa yin/ /de bzhin dbus kyi phyogs gnas dag /pad+ma'i
rigs kyi skye gnas rten/ /tshig dang 'gros dang mtshan ma yi/ /pad+ma'i rigs su snang ba yin/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis rnam brtags pa/ /snga
ma nyid du bstan pa yin/ /'dod chags bral ba'i mtshan ma gang / /rgyal ba'i mtshan mar rab tu 'byung / /yul phyogs gang gi tshig smra ba/ /der gnas 'gros dang
spyod pa yin/ /der bstan sems can nyid dang ni/ /'gros dang mtshan ma'ang kun tu bstan/ /kha ba can gyi nang gnas pa/ /dri za drang srong skye bo'i tshig /gang+gA'i ngogs
kyi byang phyogs pa/ /gnod sbyin tshig tu rab tu snang / /ri ni 'bigs byed la gnas pa/ /gang+gA'i 'gram gyi lho phyogs dang / /dpal gyi ri bor skyes gyur dang / /gang yang
skye bo rnams dag ni/ /srin po skar ma yi dwags dang / /ma mo cha lugs ngan pa dang / /mi bzad gzugs can bgegs chen po/ /gdon ni shin tu ma rungs pa/ /brkam
zhing gzhan gyi srog 'phrog byed/ /de yi tshig ni yang dag 'byung / /gang dag yul ni de dag brtag /de dag yul gyi 'gros dang spyod/ /de dag tshig tu smra ba ni/ /ma
rungs gdon 'jug rnam spyod yin/ /'di dag gzhan yang mang po ni/ /gang gi spyod 'gros spyod pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs tshul dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan
nyid dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sems can gtso/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skye gnas 'dod/ /de ltar gdon 'jug mtshan ma ni/ /mtshan nyid 'gros dang spyod pa yin/ /mi rnams
kyi ni bde skyed pa/ /sems can du yang bya ba ste/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag 'byung / /bsrung ba'i don du rab sbyar bya/ /yi ge drug pas bya ba ni/ /phyag rgya chen po dang
ldan pa'i/ /sngags nyid kho na bzlas byas na/ /bsrung ba chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po
che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ gdon 'jug pa'i spyod pa'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams las nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom
ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ gzhan yang / gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
dpal/ khyod kyi sngags rnams rgyud thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa/ rig pa thams cad la 'os pa/ dus dpag tu med pa'i yon tan ma lus pa'i 'bras
bu byung ba yang rjes su 'brel ba'i mtshan ma'i tshad yod de/ de 'grub par bya ba'i rgyud bshad pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba gzhan gyis 'grub pa nyid/ /dus kyi rgyus ni
'grub pa med/ /de yi ched dang sbyor ba ni/ /sngon byung rgyu las byung ba yin/ /rtse gcig bdag gir byed pas 'grub/ /grub pa rig pa rnam
dpyod pa'o/ /rigs pa gzhon nu khyod bstan na/ /lus can kun la rab tu snang / /mthar gyis byas pa'i las rnams ni/ /rigs pa zhes ni bya ba yin/ /dpa' bo'i
rigs ldan de sbyor bas/ /grub pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /grub med bsgrub bya'i las rnams med/ /las rnams med par 'grub pa'ang med/ /las dang
byed par yang dag ldan/ /yang dag ldan pas grub pa 'thob/ /cho ga ldan pa'i rgyu yis ni/ /gnas pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /sngags pa sngags ni mi sgrogs
na| |sngags min pa yang sngags par 'gyur/ /thub pa'i las ni yang dag spyod/ /grub pa rgyas pa thob par 'gyur/ /rigs kyi sa bon la brten na/ /blo
yi mchog la gnas par 'gyur/ /gnas mchog dam par des sdom na/ /dang po bgrod pa thob par 'gyur/ /blo dang bsam pa legs gnas la/ /nad med
go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis dus dang mtshan ma las/ /dus min grub par 'dod pa ni/ /mdor na brgya byin yin na yang / /de yi sngags rnams
mi 'grub bo/ /'byung po skye bo mi phan dang / /dus min par yang rtsom pa yang / /bdag nyid chen po tshangs pa yang / /de la grub pa mi snang ngo / /snyom dang sred dang
yang dag ldan/ /dregs dang nga rgyal ldan pa dang / /lhod dang yun ring 'thab la dga'/ /grong gi skye bo la rtag dga'/ /le lo phan tshun sbyor ba la/ /'di la grub
pa ga la yod/ /gang yang lha yi bla ma dang / /gang yang rtag tu lha min bla/ /sngags rnams de dag gis bsgrub kyang / /cho ga spangs na nus med yin/ /de bzhin cho ga'i
las nyams na/ /sems ni rnam par rmongs par byed/ /de bas sngags ni bzla mi bya/ /cho ga med par rigs pa min/ /byis pa rnams kyi mthong ba rmongs/ /de lta
bus ni skyed par 'gyur/ /de bas byis pa rmongs pa yang / /shin tu dka' ba'i 'gro bar lhung / /de nas de dag sngags spyod pa/ /de las de dag drang ba yang / /
mthar gyis de dag grub pa ni/ /dge ba 'gro ba rab tu thob/ /de las zlos pa'i sngags pas ni/ /mi g.yo zhi ba'i gnas su 'jog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags
bzlas pa/ /de ltar sngags rnams don yod de/ /sems can mig zur gyis bltas pa'ang / /rjes su gzung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen
te| |'di dag sems can mnyes gshin pa'o/ /'di dag grub par bstan pa ste/ /theg gsum mnyam pa nyid zhi ba/ /de bas rnam
kun rab 'bad nas/ /mnyam par gzhag cing sngags zlos bya/ /sngags zlos rab tu sbyor byed pa/ /sngags ni cho ga med par sbyor/ /yun ring dus su
'khor ba na/ /nam zhig cig na grub par 'dod/ /shin tu yun ring dus song nas/ /sngags rnams grub par snang ba 'o/ /cho ga ldan pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /
myur du grub pa rab tu 'thob/ /'bras bu grub par mthong ba ste/ /'bras med sngags ni gsung ba min/ /gsang sngags 'bras bu ldan pa ni/ /tshe 'di nyid
la grub par gsungs/ /grub med 'bras bu las ma yin/ /las med par yang 'bras mi 'dod/ /'bras bu las dang yang dag ldan/ /'bras bcas
las su bstan pa yin/ /de bas skye dang rga spangs pa/ /de ltar yang dag byung 'gyur pa/ /'jig rten zhi bar gsungs pa ste/ /zhi ba srid las rnam grol
yin| |bdag nyid chen po der 'gror rtogs/ /sangs rgyas chos ni rjes su bstan/ /'jig rten phyin ci log dus su/ /de la'ang grub par rab tu snang / /tshe
'di nyid la'ang grub 'gyur te/ /tshe rabs gzhan du'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i lam ni 'dus ma byas/ /mthar thug zhi ba'i bar du 'gyur/ /gang du 'jig
rten rnam bstan pa/ /zhi ba'i gnas ni dri med bzang / /sangs rgyas nyid ni legs bstan pa/ /rgyal bas kun tu bstan pa yin/ /de la mthar ni de dag phyin/ /
sngags grub par ni gsungs pa yin/ /rang rig so so'i rgyal ba yis/ /sngags 'di bstan pa ma yin te/ /thub pa rdzu 'phrul chen po yis/ /'jig rten dag
la sngags bstan to/ /tshe 'dir lus can rnams la ni/ /mngon sum du ni grub pa bstan/ /de nyid stong pa rig pa yis/ /sngags ni sangs rgyas nyid du ston/ /
rtsod dus tha ma'i dus dag tu/ /zhi ba'i de nyid khyad par du/ /sngags 'grub par ni mi 'gro zhing / /myur ba'i las la'ang 'grub pa med/ /de yi dus su sbyor pa
ni| |cho ga mthong ba'i las dag gis/ /sngags rgyud shes pa sgrub bo zhes/ /bstan pa 'di la thub pas gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na/ /
grub mchog myur du grub par 'dod/ /de bzhin bar ma'i dus dag tu/ /bar ma'i grub pa nye bar bstan/ /tha ma'i dus la brten nas ni/ /tha ma'i grub par
gsungs pa yin/ /bzang po yi ni dus dag la/ /de bzhin nam mkhar 'gro ba dang / /sngags rnams kun ni rab grub par/ /'jig
rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin/ /de dus rgyal ba'i dbang po ni/ /rigs kyi mchog de rab tu 'grub/ /pad+ma'i rigs ni bar mar 'grub/ /dus kyi mtha' la rdo
rje'i rigs/ /kha cig smon lam dbang gis ni/ /thams cad du ni sngags rnams 'grub/ /spyan ras gzigs dang 'jam dpal dang / /sgrol ma khro gnyer
gnod sbyin rgyal/ /rin chen rigs spyod gnod sbyin ni/ /dus rnams kun tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /lha rnams kun gyi sngags gzhan ni/ /gang yang chags
can gyis rab sbyar/ /rtsod pa'i dus su 'grub 'gyur zhing / /'jig rten pa yi bstan pa'ang 'grub/ /lha dang mi dang lha min gyi/ /dbang po gnod sbyin srin
po dang / /drang srong nam mkha' lding dang ni/ /sha za 'byung po gza' tshogs dang / /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / /'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa yi/ /bsod
nams ldan pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /ma rungs las ni mi zad ldan/ /brgya byin changs pa drag po dang / /dbang ldan de bzhin gzhan dag kyang / /khyab 'jug 'byung
po thams cad dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen pos sngags bstan pa/ /de dag dus kyi tha ma la/ /bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /de dus 'jigs pa chen po la//
sdang ba'i las ni de bzhin 'grub/ /'byung po dbang dang dgugs bya ba/ /sa steng sha za'i las dag 'grub/ /don med grub par snang ba ste/ /'jig rten pha rol
dag tu smod/ /des na rgyal ba'i dbang po yis/ /de dus 'jigs pa chen po la/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag bstan/ /kun la rjes gzung gtsor byas
nas| |zlos pa la ni sngags gzugs kyis/ /zlos pa bstan pa la dad cing / /dkon mchog gsum la mchod byed la/ /de tshe sems can sngags gzugs kyis//
gdul bar byed par 'gyur ba yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i
mdo las/ /cho ga nges par sdom pa'i dus kyi le'u rab 'byams las nyi shu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas//
gzhan yang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/
'jam dpal/ khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings kyi mdzod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun
pa'i rjes su spyod pa/ mdo chen po'i mchog /rin po che'i le'u/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i rjes su gnang ba/ sngags kyi mchog sgrub pa la rgyu
mtshan shes pa dang / rtags dang / dus gzhan shes pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnams nges par bstan cing yang dag par bstan no/ /'byung po thams cad kyi
sgra sgrogs pa dang / sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa'i ming gi sgrar 'gyur ba ni sgra las byung ba'i ming du shes pa dang / sgra las byung ba ma yin
par bstan pa dang / de bzhin du 'dren ma dang ldan pa'i sngags rnams ni rnam pa gsum du bya ba yin te/ sgra bzang yang dag ldan pa dang / /rtag tu don dang
rab tu 'brel/ /zur chag tshig dang rtag tu bral/ /legs par sbyar don gyis brgyan pa/ /phyi rol grub mtha' yod ma yin/ /'phags pa'i sngags su rab
tu bsgrags/ /rtag tu tshig don ldan pa ste/ /rnam pa gsum gyi dbye bar 'gyur/ /ring dang thung dang de bzhin du/ /bar ma'i yi ges brgyan pa'ang yin/ /
sngags kyi lha mor gyur pa ni/ /dbyangs yig sdeb sbyor gyis brgyan pa/ /dag ni legs sbyar legs sbyar min/ /ci ste don dang don med min/ /don ldan tshig dang don
med tshig /sngags don rnam par gsungs pa yin/ /rnam rtog mang po'i tshig dag ni/ /'jig rten pa rnams kun gyi sngags/ /gcig dang gnyis kyi yi ge dag/
sdeb sbyor dbyangs yig bzang po bzhi/ /gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug /de bzhin bdun pa brgyad pa yin/ /dgu pa bcu pa de bzhin du/ /yi ge dag ni grub
par 'dod/ /yi ge bcu dang yang dag ldan/ /yi ge rnams kyi gnas pa mnyan/ /ji srid 'di dag bcu 'gyur ni/ /sa steng 'di la yi ge mthong / /yi ge drug dang nyi
shu dang / /yi ge gcig gi bar du 'gyur/ /'di tsam tshad kyi yi ge ni/ /sngags kyi tshig ni rtag tu sbyar/ /rkang pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sngags ni don kun sgrub
pa'o| |mchog ni rab mchog don ldan pa/ /sngags ni gang zhig rgyal bas gsungs/ /de sras rgyal ba'i sras dag gis/ /gsungs pa dag ni bar ma yin/ /'jig
rten kun gyi bstan pa yi/ /sngags ni tha mar 'gyur pa yin/ /bden bral gyis bstan ngan pa'ang yin/ /bco brgyad bdun nam nyi shu 'am/ /brgya dang lnga bcu dag
gi bar/ /'di tsam tshad kyi sngags rnams ni/ /rgyal ba 'phags bas gsungs pa yin/ /gcig dang gnyis kyi yi ge dang / /lnga brgya'i
yi ge'i bar 'gyur ba/ /de tsam tshad kyi sngags rnams ni/ /byang chub sems dpas rab tu gsungs/ /de nang tshig ni dgod pa dang / /sngags dang ldan par brjod
pa yin/ /sdeb sbyor ldan zhing dbyangs yig ldan/ /skad byings don gyi rnam par brgyan/ /tshig dang legs par rab ldan dang / /rgyud dang rigs par ldan pa
dang | |sgra dang dbyangs yig rnam bral ba/ /nam zhig na ni grub par 'gyur/ /legs par rab ldan sgra rnams kyang / /spyi bo drod gnas rkan dang ni/ /so mchu
lkog ma'i sgra dag ni/ /sbyar ba bzhin du rim gyis 'byung / /mi gsal brjod pas ldog gyur pa/ /legs par rab ldan brjod pa yin/ /yongs rdzogs tshig
dang sgra dag dang / /yang dag ldan pas bsgrub par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa nyams dang bya ba nyams/ /sgra dang don dang rnam bral na/ /myur du sngags rnams mi 'grub
ste| |yun ring dus su 'gro ba yin/ /de la grub pa yong med min/ /log par yang ni de mi byed/ /skye ba gzhan du'ang snang ba ste/ /sngags grub mchog
kyang ster bar 'gyur/ /yun ring dus su bzlas pa yi/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /sngags rig skye bo'i sngags de ni/ /don med las ni byed ma yin/ /sngags
rnams kun gyi tha ma ni/ /mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten pa/ /'byung po kun ni ser snar bcas/ /gang yin des ni sngags bstan pa'o/ /yi ge gang dag nges bstan
pa| |gcig dang gnyis kyi grangs dag dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs kla klo'i skad/ /yul gyi skad du bstan pa ste/ /phreng du bsdebs dang ldan pa dang / /sgra ni 'dres par
gyur pa yin/ /de dag yi ge gcig pa nas/ /rtsa brgyad stong gi bar du'o/ /tshig rkang bzhi dang rkang med dang / /rkyang pa tshigs su sbyar nges bstan/ /tshigs bcad
rgyun chags cha dag dang / /tshigs bcad tshigs su brjod pa yin/ /yang dang yang ni brjod don ldan/ /gsal ba'i don gyis brgyan pa yin/ /zur chag legs
sbyar sgra nyams kyang / /don ni rab tu brtag pa yin/ /mi gsal gsal ba med pa dang / /yi ge nyams kyang 'dod pa yin/ /'gro ba yul dang rnam bral ba/
de la'ang sngags ni 'grub par brjod/ /de ltar sngags rnams kun la ni/ /rtag tu phan pas rigs par gsungs/ /zag med zas bcas thams cad kyi/ /sngags
rnams 'di yi mtshan nyid yin/ /gang la yi ges mang zhing / /oM ni ta yis brgyan pa ni/ /de las de yi mod la ni/ /de dag la ni nges
grub 'gyur/ /dang por sngags ni yi ge oM/ /mtha' na yi ge ma yod la/ /yi ge sa ni rkang par ldan/ /de bzhin ta yis bar mdzes shing / /ta yi rnam pa zur
bzhir ldan/ /mtha' gnas yi ge rnam par spangs/ /ra gnyis ldan pa yi ge ta/ /sngags rnams kyi ni grub pa byed/ /dang por ra gnyis mang ba dang / /yi
ge hUM gi yon tan yang / /yi ge tsa ni gru bzhir snang / /de dag yi ge sgrub par brjod/ /yi ge b+ha ni rar ldan zhing / /yig mthar ma dang yi ge gnas/ /dang
por ma dang mang yi ge /de ni sngags kyi mchog tu bstan/ /gang yang yi ge na mang zhing / /rgyud rnams kun la snang ba yin/ /sngags de dag ni zhi bar gsungs//
gshin rje hUM gi sa brgyan pa yis/ /yi ge b+ha ni mang ba de/ /dbang po'i rlung gi phyogs su gsungs/ /yi ge ba ni chu lhar gsungs/ /'jig rten phan zhing rgyas
byed yin/ /sngags gang yi ge e mang ba/ /dbang chen de ni rab tu snang / /dang po dkon mchog gsum skyabs 'gro/ /gang yin sngags ni de bzhin du/ /
phyag 'tshal ba la rab 'jug dang / /zhi ba'i rgyu dang bde ba byed/ /de las gzhan pa'i lha rnams la'ang / /phyag 'tshal don du rab tu sbyar/ /sngags dang rgyud la rang gi
sngags/ /rang sngags las ni thams cad pa/ /gang la yi ge ra mang zhing / /mtha' na yi ge phaT hUM bcas/ /'di dag sngags ni gdug pa che/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing gzi
mdangs che/ /mi zhi srog gcod byed pa ste/ /gdug pa'i sems can dag la sbyar/ /khyad par du na sdig yod pas/ /de bas las de mi bya'o/ /rtag tu thub pas spangs
bas na/ /'bad de zlos pos spang bar bya/ /sngags ni zhi dang rgyas pa dag /gnyis kyi don ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /las la ji srid gsungs pa dag /skad cig gis ni
thams cad 'grub/ /'di dag sngags ni legs bzlas na/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /zhi ba'i las ni bya ba
yin| |rin chen rigs kyis bya ba ni/ /rgyas pa'i las ni thams cad do/ /gang dag sdig pa'i las rnams kun/ /mngon spyod la ni rab tu sbyar/ /mngon par spyod
ba'i las rnams ni/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyis bya ba yin/ /'jig rten mgon gyis bkag na yang / /gnod sbyin dbang la rab tu bstan/ /sems can rnams ni gdul
ba'i phyir/ /sngags kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs/ /rigs gsum nyid kyis thams cad du/ /rnam pa gsum du bstan pa yin/ /thub pa
nyid kyis rigs dag ni/ /gang yang brgyad du yang dag bstan/ /grub pa de dag rnams gsum 'gyur/ /rnam pa gsum du yang dag bstan/ /mchog dang bar ma tha ma
ni| |de dag rnam pa gsum 'byed pa/ /zhi dang rgyas pa dag dang ni/ /mngon spyod par ni 'dod pa yin/ /sngags dang ldan pa nyid dag dang / /rgyud dang ldan pa kho
nar bstan/ /sngags kyi 'gro ba'i bdag nyid che/ /mngon par spyod la sbyar ba yin/ /'di dag las ni mi 'dod de/ /thub pa mchog gis smad pa yin/ /shin tu
nyam ngar gyur kyang ni/ /srog la gnod las mi bya'o/ /mdor bsdu na ni ma 'dres pa dang / /las kyi bdag nyid chen por bstan/ /der ni rigs dang cho ga sngags/ /
las ni rgya che rgya che ba/ /cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la gsungs/ /rgyud gzhan dag la'ang snang ba yin/ /las nyams rnams ni mi bstan cing / /sngags rnams kun
la rig par ldan/ /'jig rten sngags rnams ji snyed pa/ /de bzhin cha bcas cha med pa'o/ /'jig rten 'das pa thams cad kyang / /'di 'dra'i yon tan
shes par bya/ /sngags grub grangs ni med gyur kyang / /de grangs yongs su brjod par bya/ /dang po grangs cig 'byung ba ste/ /de bzhin nyi shu'ang ldan par
'byung / /de nas mdor na sum cu ste/ /de las gzhan yang bzhi bcu yin/ /de phyed bsnan na drug cu ste/ /de bzhin bcus bsnan bdun cu yin/ /de steng bcu ni
bsnan pa la/ /brgyad cu'i grangs su gsungs pa yin/ /de la bcus bsnan dgu bcur gsungs/ /bcu gzhan gyis bsnan brgya yin te/ /brgya yi grangs kyis
bgrang ba yin/ /de dag bcu la stong phrag gcig /stong phrag bcu la khri yin te/ /khri bcu la ni 'bum phrag gcig /'bum phrag bcu la sa ste/ /sa ya bcu
la bye ba yin/ /bye ba bcu la dung phyur te/ /dung phyur bcu la ther 'bum yin/ /de bcu ther 'bum chen por bstan/ /de bcu la ni shug rngog ste/ /shu rngog bcu
la mchog nyal yin/ /mchog nyal bcu la rkyang phye ste/ /rkyang phye chen po de bcu yin/ /de bcu la ni khyad phyin yin/ /khyad phyin chen po de bcu yin/ /de dag bcu la
sgyu mar brjod/ /sgyu ma chen po de bcu yin/ /de bcu la ni mtsho las zhes/ /'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa yin/ /mtsho yas chen po de dag bcu/ /mtsho yi
chen po de bcu la/ /dug chen pa yi rgya mtsho yin/ /de dag nyi shu'i phyed la ni/ /dug chen rgya mtsho chen po yin/ /dug chen rgya mtsho bcu la
ni| |mchog yas zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /mchog yas bcu zhes bstan pa ni/ /ban bun dag tu rab tu bstan/ /ban bun de dag bcu la ni/ /de ni ma lus pa zhes
brjod/ /de dag nyi shu'i phyed la ni/ /ma lus chen po zhes su brjod/ /de tshe grangs kyi tshad du ni/ /'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa yin/ /bcu yi grangs kyis
bcur byas na/ /grangs ni grangs med ces su brjod/ /grangs med bcur ni bsgyur byas na/ /de las gzhan du dpag med yin/ /dpag med stong du bsgyur byas
na| |'jig rten zhes ni yongs su bstan/ /'jig rten de bcu 'jig rten che/ /'jig rten chen po bsgres byas na/ /de 'og mun pa zhes su brjod/ /mun pa
las ni snang bar brjod/ /snang ba chen po de dag bcu/ /de bcu la ni phung por brjod/ /phung po de bcu bsgres na ni/ /phung po chen por de brjod do/ /phung po
chen po de bcu la/ /'di ni zab pa zhes brjod do/ /zab pa las ni brtan par brjod/ /brtan pa las ni rab brtan 'gro/ /de nas gong du mang ldan yin/ /
mang por 'dod pa gnas su brjod/ /rtsis shes dam pas gnas su brjod/ /de nas gnas ni chen por 'gro/ /chen po'i gags zhes 'dod pa bzhin/ /dpag dang
dpag med mnyam byas nas/ /de don chen por yongs su bsgrags/ /don chen rab 'byor gnas dang ni/ /de las rgya mtsho chen por 'gro/ /dang po rgya mtsho chen
por bstan/ /dang po'i dang por phan pa dang / /dang po mchog ces bya bar bstan/ /mchog las gtso bor brjod pa ste/ /gtso las khyim gyi ming yin no/ /de ni bsam mi khyab par brjod//
bsam mi khyab las mi bzad gzugs/ /mi bzad gzugs las rgyas thabs 'dod/ /rgyal thabs las gzhan gter yin te/ /de yi 'og ma dge ba yin/ /dge
ba'i pha rol sems las byung / /de las gzhan pa'i sems byung che/ /sems las sems ni rnam par g.yeng / /brjod pa zhes ni de la bya/ /brjod pa las ni brjod
med nas/ /bsnyad yas su yang brjod pa yin/ /bsnyad yas las gzhan bsnyad yas che/ /de tshe phyar phyur zhes kyang brjod/ /phyar phyur las ni phyar phyur che/ /
shu rdog de bzhin shu rdog che/ /rtsis kyi pha rol phyin pa'i gnas/ /dge zhing zhi ba zhes su bstan/ /de nas bgegs chen mthong ba ste/ /chu 'byung zhes ni de
las brjod/ /chu 'byung de las sems 'phrul gnas/ /de las gzhan pa dam pa yin/ /de las pha rol sangs rgyas yul/ /de las
gzhan ni 'phel byed sa/ /'jig rten mi yi rtsis dag ni/ /bgrang bar yang ni mi nus so/ /de las gzhan du sangs rgyas kyi/ /go 'phang dang ni spyod yul yin//
sangs rgyas zhing ni gang+gA'i klung / /bye ma snyed du brjod pa ni/ /bsdus nas rdul gyi tshogs dag ni/ /'dren pas bstan pa mdzad pa yin/ /'di dag dper ni byas
pa ste| |tshad ma shes pa'i spyod yul min/ /rgyu yis dngos po bsgrub bya ste/ /rtsis kyi pha rol phyin mi nus/ /'di tsam rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /sngon ni
nga yis bsnyen bkur byas/ /dpag med bskal pa dag tu ni/ /de dag la ni mnyes byas nas/ /de tsam dus kyi mthar thug par/ /nga ni byang chub sems
dpar gyur/ /sems can don ni bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas nyid du'ang yang dag bstan/ /de dang der ni bdag gi sngags/ /cho ga rgya chen bstan pa
yin| |cho ga yi ni rab mchog 'di/ /sangs rgyas 'di dag kun gyis gsungs/ /'di tsam tshad kyi sangs rgyas kyis/ /sngon chad 'di ni gsungs pa yin//
dus kyi tha ma'i skye bo la/ /gzhon nu nga yang nga yis bstan/ /ji snyed 'jig rten sngags rnams dang / /cho ga'i rgyal po'i snod dang ni/ /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa
dang | |mi dang lha dang lha min dang / /thams cad kun gyi sngags rnams ni/ /rgyud dang rigs par rab tu bstan/ /cho ga'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /gang du kun gyis
yongs su bkur/ /de dag cho ga zhib mo yis/ /'jam pa'i ngag ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jam dpal dbyangs kyi cho ga ni/ /'di nyid kyi ni zhib mo zhes/ /de dag
'grub par gsungs pa ste/ /thams cad kun pas mthu ldan 'gyur/ /gang yang mi yi 'jig rten dang / /gang gzhan sngags kyi lha mo dang / /'jig rten 'das pa'i
sngags kun dang / /'jig rten rdzu 'phrul che dang bcas/ /'di nyid tshul gyi cho ga yis/ /cho ga'i rgyal pos 'grub pa nyid/ /sngags rnams kun dang cho ga kun/ /
'di yi dbang du 'gyur bar bstan/ /cho ga'i rgyal po bla med 'di/ /gang du 'jam dpal gyis rab bzhed/ /gang yang bzo ni rnam par shes/ /'jig rten pa yi
'jig rten 'dod/ /rgyu mtshan shes dang la nye bzang / /skar ma'i dpyad kyi rtags dang ni/ /rgyu mtshan shes dang spyod pa dang / /sgra skad dge dang mi dge dang / /'byung
po kun gyi skad shes dang / /spyod dang sems kyi spyod pa dang / /zur gyis shes pa dag kyang bshad/ /de bzhin gter lta nor sgyur
byed| |rtsi dang brda' sprod bstan bcos dang / /gos kyi rim pa'i cho ga dang / /nad rig gso ba rig pa dang / /de nyid thams cad phan dang bde/ /gtan tshigs
lugs kyi bstan bcos dang / /gzhan yang sgra yi bstan bcos bstan/ /sdeb sbyor rig byed dri za'i glu/ /spos sbyor dag kyang bstan pa yin/ /bdag gis
byang chub sems kyis ni/ /sems can don phyir bshad pa yin/ /bdag ni byang chub sems sngon gyur/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor sngar gnas tshe/ /sems can
rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis su ni bshad pa yin/ /'khor ba'i dgon pa tshang tshing du/ /bdag ni yun ring dus su gnas/ /ji ltar gdul bya'i
sems can la/ /de ltar bdag gis de bzhin byas/ /ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams/ /phan pa'i las ni len pa dag /phan don las kyi dge ba'i gzhi/ /
de lta de ltar 'di dag byas/ /sna tshogs las kyis bsgyur ba yi/ /sems can 'gro ba'i skye gnas dag /'di dag bya ba sna tshogs byas/ /sna tshogs skye gnas
rab tu bstan/ /las rnams sna tshogs ldan pa yis/ /sna tshogs don gyi bstan bcos bstan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs ldan pas/ /'di la de bzhin byas pa
bzhin/ /sna tshogs 'gro ba'i skye gnas su/ /bdag gis de bzhin cha byad byas/ /phan pa'i bsam pas sems can la/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni bdag gis sprul//
dbang phyug brgya byin tshangs pa sogs/ /khyab 'jug nor sbyin bden bral dang / /sna tshogs gza' yi gzugs sogs kyang / /de tshe sngon ni nga yis sprul/ /thugs rje
chen po'i dbang gyur thugs/ /sems can bsam pa'i spyod yul can/ /de dag la ni rim gyis su/ /zhi ba'i gnas la bzhag pa yin/ /'khor bar phan tshun
'gro ba na/ /yun ring dus su thogs pa ni/ /sems can rnams kyi don bsgrub phyir/ /sngags kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin/ /yun ring 'khor ba'i skye bar nges/ /
sangs rgyas rigs la brten nas ni/ /ye shes sngags dang cho ga ni/ /mthar gyis bstan par byas pa yin/ /byed pa dang ni bdag po'ang rung / /nga la gang yang
yod min te/ /nges pa'i rigs la brten nas ni/ /nga yi sangs rgyas byang chub mchog /bde ba nad med yang dag zhi/ /dri med mya ngan med zhi ba/ /ngas thob mya
ngan 'das zhib/ /skye ba'i 'ching las nga rab grol/ /yang na 'khor lo rab bskor zhing / /yang dag mtha' la brten nas ni/ /sngags kyi tshig
ni rgya chen dang / /cho ga 'di ni nga yis bstan/ /las dang cho ga rgya che ba/ /zlos pas don med mi bya'o/ /'jig rten ji snyed sngags rnams dang / /cho ga dag kyang rab
bstan pa/ /de kun mchod cing ri mor bya/ /de dag la ni brnyas pa spang / /cho ga rgya chen de dag kyang / /des na sngags pas brnyas mi bya/ /rgyu mtshan shes dang rig
pa dang / /skar ma'i dpyad shes skad shes pa/ /'di dag don med mi bya ste/ /bkra shis don du bstan pa yin/ /mthong ba'i chos kyi don du yang / /grub pa'i rdzas
sogs sman dang ni/ /zang zing bcas par mig sman 'grub/ /de las bkra shis 'grub pa yin/ /rab bsngags rgyal ba'i tshigs bcad dang / /bde legs
tshigs bcad kyis brgyan pa/ /rab bsngags zhag ni bzang po dag /yar ngo dag gis legs mtshan pa/ /gza' mchog dkar ba dag ldan la/ /sngags sgrub
pa ni brtsam par bya/ /de la sogs pa'i dge dang ldan/ /mi dge dag kyang spang bya ba/ /nga nyid kyis ni sngon bstan te/ /de bas zlos pas gzung bar bya/ /'jig
rten ji snyed gang su dag /skar ma'i dpyad la mkhas pa dang / /gzhan gyi rgyud la mkhas pa dang / /lugs kyi bstan chos gtan tshigs bcas/ /rig pa'i bstan
bcos legs 'brel ba/ /sems can rnams la phan byed gang / /de kun nga yis sngon gsungs te/ /sngags zlos pas ni gzung bar bya/ /lam 'di grub pa'i rgyu yin
bar| |de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa yin/ /grub pa'i mtha' ni mtha' dag kun/ /gang yin thar pa'i rgyur gsungs pa/ /sngags kyi lam gyis grub pa'i rgyur/ /nga nyid
kyis ni byas pa yin/ /sngags kyi rig pa mtha' dag ni/ /zlos pas don med mi bya'o/ /'jig rten pa yi sngags kun dang / /ngam par yang ni rab bstan dang / /de
bzhin 'jig rten 'das bzang po/ /thams cad kun la rab sbyar bya/ /sems ni log par mi bya ste/ /yid kyis nam yang sun mi dbyung / /sngags rnams kun la
mchod byed pa/ /dam tshig shes par rab tu bstan/ /sangs rgyas dgongs shing phan pa yin/ /de bzhin ston pa'i bstan pa la/ /rab zhugs rgyal ba'i sras rnams
kyang | |zhugs par rab tu shes pa yi/ /thub zla'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni/ /'di ni dam tshig bshes par gsungs/ /rtag tu sngags rnams don yod de/ /yang dag
bsam pa thob pa yin/ /gzhan dbang ngas ni ma byas te/ /brnyas pa dag kyang spyad ma yin/ /sngags rnams 'phags pa ma yin pa'ang //
de dag don med byas min brjod/ /'jig rten ji srid sngags rnams sam/ /yang na gzugs su byung ba'ang rung / /kun nas nyon mongs mthong lam mtha'/ /de
dag 'bras bu yod par bstan/ /khros dang zhe sdang ldan pa yis/ /don med par ni mi bya'o/ /mi 'dod gus pa med pa yis/ /las ni mi bya 'bras bu med/ /de dang
'brel ba'i sems la ni/ /nam yang de la sbyin mi bya/ /rtag tu mnyam par gzhag nas su/ /sngags tshig ldan par bzlas byas shing / /cho ga ji bzhin gzung
byas na/ /'bras bu mtha' dag thob par 'gyur/ /yid ni g.yo med byas nas kyang / /sngags gcig de ni bzlas par bya/ /sngags ni don kun sgrub pa ste/ /rtse gcig
sems kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /rmongs pa'i bdag nyid g.yeng ba'i sems/ /de la grub pa 'grub mi 'gyur/ /gang la yid ni dag pa dang / /bstan pa la ni
rab dad pa/ /'bras bu mtha' dag 'grub pa ste/ /'gro ba dam pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ni/ /'dod pa'i grub pa nye bar bstan//
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ las dang / bya ba dang / cho ga dang / rgyu
mtshan shes pa'i le'u rab 'byams las nyi shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ gzhan yang / gnas gtsang
ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyi phyag rgya dang / sngags rab 'byams mchog
tu shin tu gsang ba nyon cig /ma dad pa'i sems can dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mngon par dad pa med pa dang / dam tshig med pa dang / gnang
ba med pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun gcod par byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / bsod nams mi 'dod pa
dang | skye bo sdang ba dang 'grogs shing 'dres pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang / sangs rgyas dang chos las thag ring du gyur pa dang / cho ga 'di las
'bras bu med par gyur ba dang / slob dpon gyis man ngag med ba dang / gzhon nu/ /khyod kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbang ma bskur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i rigs la dam tshig ma mthong ba dang / skye bo mngon par mi 'dod pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la bstan par mi
bya'o| |sangs rgyas chos la ma dad dang / /byang chub lam ni ring gyur la/ /de la phyag rgya mi sbyin zhing / /rgyud nyid kyang ni bstan mi bya/ /bag med rmongs par gyur
pa'am/ /yang na gal te chags pas byin/ /zlos pa phyin ci log byed la/ /de la sngags ni mi 'grub bo/ /phyag rgya nye bar mi 'gyur zhing / /sngags nyid kyang ni
gzhan du 'gyur/ /myur du grub pa mi 'thob cing / /de yi lus kyang nyams par 'gyur/ /zhi zhing dad pa'i sems ldan dang / /der ni dam tshig mthong ba dang / /
rgyud dang sngags la rab zhugs la/ /phyag rgya rgyud ni bstan par bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod byed dang / /rgyal ba'i bstan la rab dad dang / /cho ga'i
sbyor ba mthong ba dag /de dag la ni phyag rgya bstan/ /byang chub sems kyi cho ga shes/ /byang chub sems kyis rnam par brgyan/ /rtag tu byang chub lam la gnas/ /
de dag la ni phyag rgya bstan/ /sngags dang rgyud la rab brtson zhing / /phan tshun brgyud pas dam tshig mthong / /byang chub chen por dam bcas pa/ /de la phyag rgya
rab tu bstan/ /rgyal ba'i sras po dag dang ni/ /de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang / /mthong ba'i chos kyi 'bras thob kyang / /de la phyag rgya rab tu bstan/ /chos rnams la
ni rnam rtog med/ /dad cing ser sna bral ba dang / /ston pa'i bka' la rigs par shes/ /de la phyag rgya rab tu bstan/ /rtsa brgyad brgya yi tshad du ni/ /'di dag phyag rgya
phyag rgyas btab/ /lhag dang nyung ba ma yin par/ /mngon sum sangs rgyas kyis rab bshad/ /'jam dpal gang gi cho ga la/ /sngags kyang de dang mnyam pa yi/ /
brgyad bcas brgya zhes gsungs pa dang / /sngags rnams de dang mnyam par bstan/ /phyag rgya'ang brgya ni rtsa brgyad du/ /thub pa mchog gis sngon gsungs so/ /'di tsam
ched du cho ga la/ /phyag rgya sngags ni yang dag 'byung / /sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod 'di ni/ /sngags kyi mdzod du nye bar bstan/ /phyag rgya sngags ni mnyam ldan na/ /
yang dag ldan pas las myur byed/ /'khor lo med pa'i shing rta ni/ /rigs par 'gro bar mi 'byung ste/ /de bzhin sngags rnams ma lus pa/ /phyag rgya med par
las mi byed/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mnyam ldan zhing / /yang dag ldan pas myur las byed/ /lha dang lha min bcas pa yis/ /'jig rten gsum kun 'gugs byed
na/ /las gzhan dag gis legs sbyar ba'i/ /mi yi 'jig rten sems ci dgos/ /mthong chos 'bras bu 'di dag gi /rgyag rgya sngags la
snang ba yis/ /gnyi ga ldan zhing dag pa dang / /cho ga ldan pa'i don bstan na/ /rgyal ba mchog dang sras rnams dang / /'byung po rnams ni 'gugs par byed/ /sngags
dang phyag rgya dka' thub nyid/ /rnam gsum las ni legs gnas dang / /ci 'dod phun sum tshogs pa kun/ /de bzhin zos pas thob par 'gyur/ /sngags rnams
phyag rgya phyag rgya btab/ /sngags kyis kyang ni de rgyab btab/ /sngags ni phyag rgya med pas min/ /sngags dang phyag rgya spangs pas min/ /phyag rgya sngags ni mnyam
ldan na/ /yang dag ldan pas las kun byed/ /'di dag phan tshun 'bras bu ste/ /phan tshun 'bras bu 'byung ba yin/ /sgrub pas rigs ldan sbyar byas na/ /bsgrub bya
min pa'i las rnams med/ /phyag rgya ldan pa'i zlos pa pos/ /sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga mthong bas rab brtson zhing / /sngags dang phyag
rgya kun byas na/ /gang du 'gugs 'gyur mi 'grub pa/ /de gnas de ni yod ma yin/ /srid rtse mnar med par dang ni/ /'jig rten khams kyi 'gro ba gzhan/ /
gang du mi 'babs mi 'gugs dang / /bsgrub bya ma yin gang yang med/ /sems can skye gnas las skyes dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mi snang ba'ang / /cho gas bskul
nas mi 'gugs pa/ /de ni gang yang yod ma yin/ /srung ba'i cho ga'i rgyud dag gam/ /las 'grub bzlog par bya ba la/ /sa bcu la ni gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems
dpas kyang mi nus/ /sngags dang phyag rgya la gnas la/ /'byung po kun gyis mi tshugs so/ /dka' thub pa bzlas pa cho ga'i lam/ /sbyin sreg las la rab sbyar na/ /'di
las skye zhing de las grub/ /phyag rgya sngags la snang ba yin/ /zlos pa rtag tu 'bad brtson zhing / /rtag tu de dag la gnas na/ /sngags rnams grub par 'gyur ba ste/ /don
yod 'gyur bar thub pa'i bka'/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dag ni/ /de dag gis ni gzhan du byas/ /sngags dang rgyud ni rigs pa la/ /gang zhig rtag tu mi 'jug pa'o//
sngags dang phyag rgya mtha' dag gi/ /gang zhig cho ga ldan byed pa'o/ /'jam dpal la gzhon nu 'di dag ni/ /yang dang yang du bstan pa yin/ /sngags kyi rigs pa mtha'
dag ni/ /phyag rgyas sngags ni phan pa 'byung / /de srid las la cho ga'i rgyal/ /'dis ni 'bras bu rgya chen 'byung / /'jig rten gsang mchog phan pa dang / /sngags dang
phyag rgyas dam bcas pa/ /de nas rigs ldan 'jam dpal de/ /khyab par byed pa byis pa'i gzugs/ /cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin
gyur gnas/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag 'byung / /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus che/ /sa bcu la ni gnas pa yis/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen gyur
pa| |thub pa mchog la rab tu zhus/ /bcom ldan sngags kyi rgyud dag ni/ /gang yin 'di ni 'jig rten bstan/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis kyang / /de yang
bdag la gsungs pa yin/ /de ltar shAkya seng ge yis/ /ci yi phyir na rab tu gsungs/ /bdag ni de ltar the tshom 'tshal/ /thub pa mchog gis bdag
la gsungs/ /blo ldan ka la ping+ka'i skad/ /tshangs pa yi ni gsung dbyangs kyi/ /sa bcu la ni rab gnas pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs pa/ /sngon
ni bskal pa mang po ru/ /da ni 'khor bar 'khor ba na/ /thub dbang me tog kun skyes las/ /cho ga'i rgyal po'ang nga yis thob/ /de dang der ni sems can
la| |phan pa mang po byas pa yin/ /thugs rje'i dbang du song nas ni/ /da tshe bdag gi smon lam byas/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu de tshe bdag /dus kyi mthar
ni yang dag byung / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas ni/ /bstan pa'i don ni byas pa yin/ /phyi ma yi ni dus dag tu/ /de tshe nga ni mya ngan 'da'/ /des na cho ga'i rgyal
dbang po/ /khyod kyi drung du nga yis bstan/ /nga yang 'jig rten mya ngan 'das/ /dzam bu'i gling ni rab stongs shing / /de bzhin ston pa'i chos kyi mdzod/ /rtsod dus
thag ring gyur pa ni/ /sems can rnams la bstan pa'i don/ /cho ga'i rgyal po gcig byed 'gyur/ /cho ga'i rgyal po rgya chen la/ /de bzhin 'di ni yang dag
'jug /sems can rnams ni don la brtson/ /nga yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dus 'jigs su rung ba yi/ /de tshe sems can chos ldan min/ /rtag tu lus
la mi gnas shing / /rgyal po rnams ni ma rungs yid/ /mi dang mi ma yin rnams ni/ /kun kyang bstan la rnam par sdang / /ngas bshad chos kyi mdzod rnams
ni| |de yis thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/ /de dag gdul ba'i don gyi phyir/ /sngags kyi mdzod ni nye bar bstan/ /bskal pa bsam gyi khyab par sngon/ /
gzhon nu khyod kyi smon lam 'di/ /sangs rgyas ji snyed gang du dag /'jig rten gnyen gyur mya ngan 'das/ /de dag bstan pa'i don du ni/ /dus dang dus su bya
'o zhes/ /bdag ni byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs/ /dus kun du ni rnam par spyod/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis sems can la/ /de
dang der ni rnam par 'dul/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi smon lam 'di/ /sngon chad du ni byas pa yin/ /des na byis pa'i gzugs thob gyur/ /des na khyod la
bshad par bya/ /skye bo skyabs ni med pa dang / /sangs rgyas zhing ni stongs pa na/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyi sems can la/ /byis pa'i tshul gyis yang
dag shod/ /sems can mang po 'dul byed cing / /phun sum tshogs pa sbyin byed pa/ /dus kyi tha ma de la ni/ /sems can kun la mchog sbyin byed/
'jig rten nga ni mya ngan 'das/ /sa yi steng ni stongs gyur na/ /khyod nyid byis pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /de tshe
dgon chen rab dga' ba/ /kha ba can nang yod pa yis/ /chu bo gser dang ldan 'gram du/ /nga ni mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi
rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phyag rgya bskul ba'i cho ga 'jam dpal gyis yongs su zhus
shing bstan pa'i le'u rab 'byams las nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ /gzhan yang / gnas gtsang
ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i mdzod yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spu nas 'od zer du ma bye ba khri phrag brgya stong grangs med pa'i 'khor dang bcas
pa byung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba du ma des sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma gsal bar byas nas sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskul nas phyir yang bcom
ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spur zhugs par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bskul ma thag tu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil du zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sangs rgyas
thams cad la mchod nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ phyag rgya'i le'u cho ga'i mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
byin gyis brlabs pa bshad kyi nyon cig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zhabs la btud/
de phyag bcal nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod kyi phyag rgya mchog tu shin tu
gsang ba gang yin pa de dus la bab par mkhyen na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni legs te bshad du gsol/ /skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la
bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir dang / lha dang / mi rnams dang / sems can
thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bde ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab nas/ phyag rgya thams cad la gzigs shing sangs rgyas thams cad la mkhyen par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pa/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa/ 'phags pa'i sngags
rnams la yid brtson par byed pa la gzengs bstod pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa/ 'khor
bar gnas pa dag pa la bde ba dang / shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jog par byed pa/ sems can sdug bsngal ba thams cad la bde ba'i don gyi
phyir phyag rgya'i le'u'i cho ga ngas bshad kyi/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu nyon cig /dang po gtsug phud lnga pa ni/ /de ni phyag rgya chen por 'dod/ /gnyis pa gtsug
phud gsum pa yin/ /ral pa gcig pa gsum pa ste/ /bzhi pa ut+pa lar gsungs pa/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /lnga pa bkra shis ldan du
brjod/ /drug pa rgyal mtshan zhes su brjod/ /bdun pa gang ba zhes bstan te/ /sngags shes dag la legs mdzes shing / /brgyad pa srog shing zhes brjod
pa| |sngags shes dag la legs mdzes yin/ /dgu pa gdugs shes bstan pa ste/ /bcu pa mdung du brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin bcu gcig sangs rgyas kyis/ /
kha sbyar zhes ni yang dag bstan/ /bcu gnyis pa ni phub ces gsungs/ /bcu gsum pa ni da pus yin/ /bcu bzhi pa ni ral grir bshad/ /de bzhin dril bu
bco lnga pa/ /bcu drug pa ni zhags par bstan/ /bcu bdun pa ni lcags kyur shes/ /bco brgyad pa ni bzang po'i gdan/ /bcu dgu pa ni
gdan du brjod/ /nyi shur bstan pa rma bya'i gdan/ /nyi shu gcig pa paT+Ti sa/ /rtags gcig nyi shu gnyis pa ste/ /rtags gnyis nyi shu gsum pa yin/ /de
bzhin phreng ba nyi shu bzhi/ /nyi shu lnga pa gzhu yin te/ /nyi shu drug par gsungs pa ni/ /lcags mda' dag tu rnam par brtags/ /nyi shu bdun par gsungs
pa ni| |rtags kun dag tu rab tu bstan/ /nyi shu brgyad pa gsal shing ste/ /nyi shu dgu pa tho ba yin/ /sum cu pa ni mda' bo che/ /sum cu gcig pa mche bar bstan/
sum cu gnyis pa de bzhin kha/ /sum cu gsum pa ras kyi gos/ /sum cu bzhi pa bum pa ste/ /sum cu lnga pa la 'khar gsil yin/ /sum cu drug pa byam bum/ /sum cu bdun
pa gtun shing ste/ /sum cu brgyad pa skyil krung yin/ /sum cu dgu pa pa Ta ha/ /bzhi bcu par ni rang bstan pa/ /chos kyi drung zhes nye bar bstan/ /bzhi bcu
dag ni gcig pa yang / /lcags thag ces ni yongs su bsgrags /gnyis pa 'dod pa mang por gsungs/ /gsum pa yid la re ba rdzogs/ /bzhi pa skyed
byed snang ba ste/ /shes rab pha rol phyin par 'dod/ /lnga pa ma mo zhes bshad pa/ /rkang gnyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /drug ba rta babs zhes byar gsungs/ /bdun pa
rta babs bzang po yin/ /brgyad pa sgra skad dag tu bstan/ /dgu pa rgyal ba'i sga yang yin/ /lnga bcu pa ni rnga bo che/ /lnga bcu gcig pa chos kyi rnga/ /lnga bcu gnyis pa la yang
bshad/ /gsum pa lag pa mchog yin te/ /lnga bcu bzhi par shes bya ba/ /phyag rgya de nyid 'khrul med yin/ /lnga bcu lnga pa mjug ring yin/ /lnga bcu drug pa mda'
yin te/ /bdun pa dag ni dgra star bstan/ /brgyad pa 'jig rten gyis mchod yin/ /lnga bcu rtsa dgur shes bya ba/ /mdor na mtshon ni rtse gcig yin/ /drug cu par ni
'gyur ba yang / /mdor na gshol du shes par bya/ /drug cu gcig pa pad+ma ste/ /drug cu gnyis pa rdo rjer bshad/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa/ /'jig rten drug cu gsum
par gsungs/ /drug cu bzhi par shes bya ba/ /mdor na pad+ma dkar po yin/ /drug cu lnga par shes bya ba/ /phyag rgya mchog sbyin dam pa yin/ /de nas drug cu drug pa ni/ /
thag pa'i phyag rgyar sangs rgyas gsungs/ /drug cu bdun par 'jig rten du/ /mkhas pas mdung du bstan pa yin/ /drug cu brgyad par bya ba yin/ /rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar
gsungs/ /drug cu rtsa dgur 'gyur ba ni/ /dgra 'joms byed par rab tu bstan/ /bdun cu par ni shes bya ba/ /mdor na klu yi phyag rgya yin//
bdun cu gcig par gsungs pa ni/ /gzhal med phyag rgya mchog bzang yin/ /bdun cu gnyis ba mdor bsdu na/ /shing rta zhes ni de la brjod/ /mdor na bdun cu
gsum pa ni/ /'jig rten mgon gyi gdan du gsungs/ /de bzhin bdun cu bzhi dang ni/ /bdun cu lnga ru bstan pa dag /tshes brgyad zla ba pi wang dag /phyag rgya
gnyis su bstan pa yin/ /bdun cu rtsa drug 'jig rten du/ /phyag rgya pad+ma 'dra ba yin/ /bdun cu bdun pa'i phyag rgya mchog /ut+pal ni 'byung ba'i gnas/ /bdun
cu brgyad pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /phyag 'tshal ba zhes bstan pa yin/ /bdun cu rtsa dgu mchod yon rgya/ /dgra bcom phyag rgya brgyad cu pa/ /mar me brgyad cu gcig par
shes| |thal sbyar brgyad cu gnyis par 'dod/ /gsum pa phreng ba zhes bya 'o/ /bzhi pa gdan zhes gsungs pa yin/ /lnga pa gnas kyi phyag rgyar bstan/ /drug pa
rab gnas gsungs pa ste/ /bdun pa dbang gi phyag rgyar brjod/ /brgyad cu brgyad pa mchog tu 'dod/ /dgu dang dgu bcu'i grangs dag ni/ /phyag rgya gnyis ni dge
pa mchog /kha sbyar zung gi phyag rgya ste/ /grangs ni dgu bcu 'byung ba ste/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig ces gsungs pa/ /me tog gi ni phyag rgyar bstan/ /gnyis pa gtor ma'i phyag rgya
ste| |gsum pa rtag tu spos kyi yin/ /bzhi pa dri yi phyag rgya ste/ /lnga pa mar mer shes par bya/ /drug pa sbyor bar shes par bya/ /bdun pa skyil krung phyed kyi gnas/ /brgyad
pa dag ni bod pa ste/ /dgu pa dag ni gshegs su gsol/ /de bzhin brgya rdzogs phyag rgya ni/ /thams cad pa yi las shes bya/ /brgya las rtsa gcig gsungs pa ni/ /phyag
rgya chen po zhes bya ste/ /gtsug tor 'jig rten mgon po ni/ /rtag tu bla ma 'khor los bsgyur/ /phyag rgya de ni dang por gsungs/ /gnyis pa gdugs dkar las byung yin//
gsum pa rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs su snang ba yin/ /bzhi pa chos kyi mdzod kyi gnas/ /chos kyi phyag rgyar shes par bya/ /lnga pa dge 'dun zhes bya ste/ /
de ni phyag rgya chen po'ang yin/ /drug pa 'byung po zhi byed pa/ /rang rgyal lag pa'i phyag rgya nyid/ /bdun pa byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /sa bcu dag la zhugs pa yi//
phyag rgya pad+ma'i phreng ba ste/ /phyag rgya chen por de shes bya/ /'jig rten pa ni thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya sngags rnams mchog sbyin byed/ /mthu chen gtso bo chen po ste/ /gtso
bo 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod/ /brgyad pa yang dag rab sbyar ba/ /phyag rgya srid gsum skye gnas yin/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi grangs bstan pa//
rgyud 'di las ni rab 'byung ba/ /brgya gcig de bzhin rtsa brgyad du/ /phyag rgya'i grangs su brtags pa yin/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis 'di tshad du/ /sa steng sngon ni bstan
pa yin/ /ston dang bstan pa 'jig pa na/ /lus can rnams ni rab spyod 'gyur/ /dang po re zhig lag pa gnyis/ /thal mos byar te rtse mo sprad/ /sor mo phan tshun
nang du gshib/ /sor mo phan tshun sbyar nas ni/ /de nas yang dag sbyar nas kyang / /lag gnyis yang dag ldan pa la/ /gtsug phud lngas ni legs mtshan bya/ /
sor mo rnams kyi rtse mo dag /de nas de dag rnam bzlog pa/ /phyag rgya gtsug phud lngar shes bya/ /gtsug phud lnga pa nyid dag ni/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes su bsgrags/ /
byang chub sems dpa'i dbu la yod/ /'di ni phyag rgya mthu bo che/ /rab sbyar las kun byed pa yin/ /'jam dpal gyi ni sngags dag gam/ /snying po nyid ni rab tu
sbyar| |skra can ma yi sngags dag gam/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rtag tu bya/ /cho ga mthong bas sbyar ba'am/ /sngags rnams kun gyis byas na ni/ /las rnams kun ni
don yod par/ /thub pa'i bkas ni bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin lag pa rnam bkod nas/ /de yi lag pa kha sbyar bya/ /de bzhin rtse mo gsum bya ste/ /sor mo rnams ni rab
sbyar na/ /lag gnyis mthe bong spyod pa dang / /rab tu phyung ste drang por bya/ /gung mo dang ni srin lag dag /phyin ci log tu 'brel ba bya/ /'di ni gtsug phud gsum zhes bya/ /
ral pa gsum pa zhes bya'ang yin/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /gang dag chog mthong ba yi/ /las rnams kun ni byed pa yin/ /'jam
dpal gsang sngags gang yin pa/ /de dag kun la sbyar bar bya/ /zlos pa yid la gang 'dod la/ /don de myur du grub par byed/ /lag pa de bzhin rnams bkod nas/ /de
bzhin gtsug phud gcig par bya/ /sor mo gung mo yang dag sbyar/ /nges par gtsug phud gcig par 'gyur/ /rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
kyis gsungs/ /gzhon nu'i sngags ni rab bkod dang / /gang yang 'jig rten kun gyi yang / /de dag sbyar na 'grub 'gyur te/ /myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin
'di yis bsgrub bya ni/ /sngags mchog rgyal bas bshad pa yin/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /'di don myur du bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin lag pa yang dag sbyar//
sor mo'i rtse mo dgug cig dgod/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sprad dgug /sor mo gzhan ni rang bzhag la/ /mthe bong gnyis ni rab gshib nas//
gung mo gnyis ni rab brkyang bya/ /srin lag gnyis ni rtse sprad bkug /ut+pa la ru bstan pa yin/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni brjod cing
bya| |gtsug phud lnga par bstan pa yin/ /las rnams gang yin de dag nyid/ /de kun ut+pa la yis ni/ /myur du sgrub par byed pa yin/ /'di ni mchog sbyin phyag
/de bzhin lag gnyis sbyar sngags dang ldan byas na/ /myur du nor ni byed par 'gyur/ /lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar byas nas/ /lag pa
gnyis po rab bkan la/ /khor yug tu sor mo yis/ /de nyid kha ni yang dag sbyar/ /bkra shis ldan pa'i rnam par 'byung / /mdzes pa'i rnam par dgod par bya//
gung mo'i sor mo'i dbus su ni/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni yang dag sbyar/ /mthe bong gnyis ka rnam sbyar ba/ /phyag rgya bkra shis ldan du brjod/ /don kun byed
pa'i phyag rgya 'di/ /zhi ba'i las la rab tu sbyar/ /snying po'am yi ge drug ldan pas/ /las rnams kun ni byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin lag gnyis sbyar
nas ni/ /sor mo phan tshun rab sbyar ba/ /'gro ba'i khyad par mkhyen pa yin/ /gang ba bzang zhes gsungs pa yin/ /rtse mo'i phyogs kyi sor mo rnams/ /kun nas yongs
su 'gyed byas pa/ /gang ba bzang zhes sangs rgyas kyis/ /zlos pa rnams la gsungs pa yin/ /de 'di sdug bsngal dag dang ni/ /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rab zhi
byed| |rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskul byas na/ /myur du nor gyis phyug par byed/ /'jig rten mkhyen cing legs spyod pas/ /phyag rgya gzhan yang gsungs pa ni/ /
lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /g.yon pa phab cing de la brten/ /lag pa g.yas pas bya ba ni/ /de yi sor mo dgug cing gzhag /mdzub mo gung mo nyid
dag ni/ /bsgreng ba rgyal mtshan zhes brjod de/ /rgyal mtshan phyag rgya zhes grags pa/ /bsgreng bas dgra ni zlog par byed/ /phyag rgya 'di yi bya ba ni/ /rim gyis
gtor ma sbyin sreg sogs/ /phyag rgya 'di yis bya ba yin/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rab bskul na/ /'di ni las kun byed pa yin/ /lag pa de bzhin rnam sbyar
ba| |thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /bgegs rnams ma lus rnam 'jig cing / /sngags shes mnyam par brjod pa ni/ /rim gyis las rnams byed par 'byung /
cho ga mthong ba'i ldan pas ni/ /myur du don ni sgrub bar byed/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi snying po ni/ /snying gi gnod pa sa yang dag phyung / /
'jig rten ma lus bsam pa yi/ /las rnams yang dag ldan pas byed/ /lag pa de bzhin sbyar byas nas/ /g.yon pa'i steng du g.yas pa gzhag /g.yas kyi mdzub
mo blangs nas ni/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng byas pa/ /'di ni srog shing phyag rgya yin/ /dgra rnams kun ni zlog byed cing / /mi bzad shin tu 'jigs rung
ba'i| |bgegs rnams thams cad zhi bar byed/ /sngags zlos pa yis bstan pa ni/ /ma rungs thams cad gsad don phyir/ /rtsa ba'i sngags dang yang dag
ldan| |myur du las ni byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin lag pa sbyar byas la/ /srog shing 'dra bar btsugs byas nas/ /de steng lag g.yas brkyang byas pa/ /phyag
rgya gdugs zhes bya bar brjod/ /phyag rgya 'di yis bya ba ni/ /bdag gi spyi bor bsrung bar bya/ /sngags rnams kun gyis byed pa ste/ /las ni srung bar byed pa
yin| |dgra rnams kyi ni gdong 'gebs shing / /mi 'dod pa dag rengs par byed/ /mi ma yin dang ma rungs pa/ /ji ltar 'dod par byed pa yin/ /gdugs
kyi phyag rgya de mthong bas/ /bgegs rnams kun ni rnam par 'jig /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /lag pa dag ni mdzes sbyar nas/ /mthe bo mdzub mo rtse sprad ldan//
gung mo gnyis ni rab rkyang zhing / /srin lag gnyis ni rtse sprad bkug /gung mo'i tshigs gnyis sbyar bar bya/ /de nyid mdung gi phyag rgyar bstan/ /ma rungs thams cad
zlog par byed/ /srin po gdon rnams 'jigs byed ces/ /'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yin/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed/ /khros pas rab tu bstan
pa yin/ /mi bzad sdig pa'i las byed pa'i/ /'jig rten la ni rab myur byed/ /srog la gnod par byed pa'i las/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis spangs pa yi/ /las
'di dag ni mi bya ste/ /'jig rten dam pas bkag pa yin/ /yang na kun 'gro'i sngags sbyar ba'i/ /mdung gi phyag rgya dam pa yin/ /gang dag 'jig rten sngags
rnams dang / /de bzhin rgyal bas rab bshad pa/ /de dag gi ni sngags rnams sbyar/ /mdung gi phyag rgya legs mnyam gzhag /sngags kyi mchog ni mi bzad mthong /
