ni sa steng mya ngan 'da'/ /kha ba can gyi nang dag tu/ /sA la'i nags ni yang dag 'byung / /gser dang ldan pa'i chu bo dang / /gyad rnams kyi ni nyen kor du/ /sA la zung gi nags
nang du/ /nga ni mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /grong khyer ming ni sdig pa can/ /cod pan bcings pa'i mchod rten dang / /chu bo'i 'gram ni rtag nyams dga'/ /der ni sa steng mya ngan
'da'/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / /rdzu 'phrul che ldan nyan thos dang / /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /brgya byin tshangs bcas
'dab bzang dang / /gzhan yang 'og min la sogs lha/ /der ni thams cad 'dus par ni/ /rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /der ni gyad kyi nye 'khor dang / /gang+ga'i byang phyog
'gram dag ni/ /chu bo chen po de las gzhan/ /kha ba can ri'i lho phyogs char/ /sA la'i nags zhes bya ba 'byung / /de tshe nub phyogs bltas
ba'i mal/ /de yi gnas su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de tshe chu bo rab dga' ba/ /bzang po gser ldan 'gram dag tu/ /lha rnams kun gyi tshogs la sogs/ /'dus pa dag ni
'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi dang rgyal po'i mchog rnams dang / /mi dang mi ma yin par 'byung / /de tshe mi dang 'byung po kun/ /de tshe byis pa 'phags pa dang / /dga' ston chen
po dga' chen ltar/ /gnas de la ni yang dag 'dus/ /rang lus zang zing bcas par ni/ /bzang po chen po'i bkod pa'ang byas/ /chos kyi mtha' ni yongs spangs nas/ /
yang dag mthar ni yang dag zhugs/ /de tshe sngon gyi skye ba ni/ /ser skya'i grong khyer gzhi dag tu/ /shAkya rigs kyi gtso bo ni/ /nga ni 'khor ba'i btson rar skyes/ /bdag gi sdug
bsngal bdag nyid kyis/ /khyim las nges 'byung yongs su spangs/ /de tshe mu stegs mang po bsten/ /bdud rtsi dag kyang thob ma gyur/ /dka' ba dag kyang bdag gis
spyad/ /lus kyi gdung pa'ang yun ring ba/ /lo drug tu ni bsten pa yis/ /lus kyang zhig cing rnam par skams/ /shes dang shes bya gsal ba ni/ /ngas ni cung zad
thob pa med/ /de nas nga ni langs nas kyang / /'bras tshan dkar ba'i zas kyang zos/ /lha rnams kyis mchod lam dag ni/ /der ni sa steng nga yis bgrod/ /chu bo nai rany+dza na'i 'gram/ /
shing gi rgyal po legs mdzes pa/ /me tog rnam pa du mas khyab/ /de 'gram sa ni nyams dga' ba/ /nags chen 'bras bu ldan pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs shing dag 'byung / /
chu bo chen pos yongs bskor ba'i/ /shing gi rtsar ni nga yis phyin/ /sa yi cha ni mthong tsam gyis/ /bdag gis sems ni brtan pa thob/ /de lta'i shing ni bdag gis mthong / /
yal ga lo ma nyer mdzes pa'i/ /shing chen grib ma chen po ni/ /rtsa ba mi mngon nyer spyad 'os/ /shing rtsa a shwad thar 'dug nas/ /sems ni shin tu dang bar gyur/ /bsam gtan
dang ni ting 'dzin dang / /der ni brtan ba'ang mngon par thob/ /mtshan mo'i mthar ni skye mthar byed/ /der ni snang ba med ba'ang thob/ /bdud kyi bgegs ni rnam mang po/ /rnam pa du ma
rab tu sbyar/ /sde rnams bcom nas slar ldog cing / /rang gi gnas su'ang de dag song / /sngags dang rgyud ni 'di don du/ /rnam pa mang po'ang gsungs pa yin/ /rnam pa du ma'i
sbyor ba dang / /bsam gtan shes pa'ang bstan pa yin/ /der ni theg pa gsum yang spyad/ /gzhan dag sems can rten la 'dzud/ /nyes pa rnam pa gsum nyid kyi/ /gnyen
po dag kyang rab tu bstan/ /de nas langs nas yang song nas/ /grong khyer lteng rgyas chu bzang gis/ /khrus byas der gnas drang srong rnams/ /slob mar
bcas pa'ang rab tu byung / /sems can rnam mang don byas nas/ /de nas nga ni yang dag 'das/ /ka shi'i grong ni nyams dga' bar/ /mthar gyis su ni yang dag zhugs/ /rdzu
'phrul chen po sngar sangs rgyas/ /de yi gnas su'ang zhugs pa yin/ /ka shi skye bo'i yul dag tu/ /der ni rang bdag nyid gnas gyur/ /zhi ba mya ngan 'das byed pa'i/ /
dam chos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /'jig rten lha dang lha min bcas/ /'gro ba lnga la yang dag brten/ /'byung po kun la bde ba'i phyir/ /der ni chos kyang rab tu bstan/ /
der ni snga ma'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/ /de ni nga yis rab tu bstan/ /srid las grol zhing bde don dang / /
sems can nyes pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /bde zhing zhi bar gzhol ba 'o/ /tshangs ba'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /srid pa'i lam ni gzhig don du/ /bde ba'i ting
'dzin las byung ba'i/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ /tshangs ba'i gnas bzhis rnam par brgyan/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung dang bcas/ /rnam pa bcu
gnyis byas pa yin/ /ma rig 'gag par yang dag ldan/ /rig pa bskyed pa'i rim las byung / /yang dag mtha' yi legs mthar skyes/ /de nyid mthar ni bstan pa yin/ /lugs
su 'byung dang bzlog ba dag /tha mar bdag nyid rtogs chen skyes/ /sems can mang po thar don du/ /zhi ba'i 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ /nyams dga' ka shi'i grong spangs nas/ /
de tshe bdag ni mnyan yod song / /de tshe mu stegs gdul bya'i phyir/ /cho 'phrul chen po'ang byas pa yin/ /mi yul dag tu rdzu 'phrul ni/ /de tshe yang dag bstan pa byas/ /mu
stegs mang po'i gnas dag tu'ang / /de tshe'ang rab tu dga' bar byas/ /yul ming me thab ces bya bar/ /lha las babs ba bzang bo byas/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dag tu yang / /
chos nyid la ni brgya byin sbyar/ /de nas 'og min lha sogs dang / /tshangs sogs brgya byin bcas pa dang / /rnam thos gnod sbyin dbang dang bcas/ /rgyal chen bzhi yi
ris dag dang / /rtag tu myos dang gzhong thogs dang / /pi wang gsum pa phreng thogs dang / /lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams kun/ /sa bla lha dang bar snang gnas/ /
'phags pa gnod sbyin tshogs bdag dang / /lha dang lha min thams cad dang / /chos kyi 'bras bu ldan bar byas/ /mya ngan 'das gsum rjes 'gro byas/ /sems can
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang / /de tshe legs pa nyid la btsud/ /de dag rtsis kyis grangs med pa/ /'khor ba'i mtha' bzhin de mtha' med/ /stong
chen po yi 'jig rten gyi/ /khams dang 'dra bar bsam mi khyab/ /rtag tu sems can mang po ni/ /bden pa'i don la yang dag sbyar/ /de tshe der ni nga 'ongs nas/ /gnas
gtsang steng du gnas nas kyang / /theg pa gsum la rjes 'jug pa'i/ /dam chos sngags ni rab tu bskor/ /sems can gdul bya la brten nas/ /nga yis cho ga'i rgyal po
'di| |'jig rten mang la rab bstan nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la'ang gtad pa yin/ /nga ni 'jig rten mya ngan 'das/ /sa steng stobs par gyur pa na/ /de nas 'jam
dpal sems can la/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /thub dbang yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /dam pa'i chos ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /de tshe rtag tu srung bar ni/ /
'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'gyur ba yin/ /sngags ni rab tu dbye don du/ /cho ga rgya chen bstan pa yin/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /ma rungs mi bzad chen po yi/ /mi bdag gdugs
pa chen po ni/ /phan tshun gsod pa dag la dga'/ /sdig pa'i las can spyod pa ngan/ /de tshe longs spyod chung ba dang / /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar the
tshom med/ /sA la zhes bya'i nags su ni/ /de dag mchod don rtsom par byed/ /chu bo gser ldan 'gram dang ni/ /cod pan 'ching ba'i mchod rten du/ /zhi ba'i dbyings la brten
ba'i phyir/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das mal 'cha'/ /lus ni sreg pa'i shing la bzhag /rdzogs longs spyod pa longs spyod spangs/ /de'i sngon mdzad pa nyid dang ni/ /nga yi rmad byung spyod
mthong nas/ /nga yi gdul bya'i spyod yul dang / /sangs rgyas gdul bya'i mdzad pa dang / /spyod pa dge ba sna tshogs te/ /mi yi bdag por kun dran nas/ /thams cad mchod par
byed par 'gyur/ /lha dang lha min mir bcas pa/ /de nas sa bdag kun 'dus nas/ /de tshe nga yi drung du ni/ /dga' ston chen po mchod pa kun/ /byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /

sku ni shing la rab bteg nas/ /zang zing yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/ /dge ba dang ni mi dge dang / /bsod nams bsod nams ma yin spangs/ /yang dag mtha' don stong nyid mtha'/ /phung po lnga ni 'byung ba che//
sems can mang pos de rjes mthong / /bsod nams che ba'i don du sbyar/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /nyan thos chen po bdag nyid che/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad kyang / /sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas/ /yang dag mtha' ni rtogs nas kyang / /chos kyi mtha' la yang dag gnas/ /sems can kun la snying brtse bar/ /kun gyis yongs
su bskor nas gnas/ /lha yi tshogs ni thams cad dang / /'phags dang so so'i skye bo dang / /'di kun bsod nams chen po'i gnas/ /mchod rten la ni
'dus par 'gyur/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal don gnas nas/ /dang ba'i sems ni rab tu thob/ /mchod rten mtha' yi nyen kor du/ /'byung po'i tshogs kyang 'dug pa yin/ /mchod
pa chen po byas nas ni/ /smre sngags 'don cing du bar byed/ /dbugs 'byin snying rjes brlan nas ni/ /mchi ma'i thigs pa'ang rab tu 'dzag /smre sngags 'di ltar kun 'don pa/ /mi
rtag sdug bsngal stong pa yi/ /sangs rgyas chos ni sngar ston mdzad/ /de ltar sa steng 'di la ni/ /de 'dir thub mchog dam pa ni/ /drang srong mchog gyur bdun pa dang / /sems can
kun mchog shAkya'i rgyal/ /de mthong ba yi tha ma yin/ /sdug bsngal mi rtag ston pa yi/ /bcom ldan de 'di gzims pa yi/ /mthong ba yi ni tha ma 'am/ /stong nyid don dam
ston byed dang / /thog ma nas zhi don ston pa/ /lha yi tshogs dag ci yi phyir/ /kye ma mnga' bdag sad mi byed/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po lha yi bu/ /thams cad 'dir ni lhags
par gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po chos don gnyer/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po nyan thos dang / /sems can kun ni sdug bsngal ba'i/ /mi dang lha dang lha ma yin/ /chos kyi 'khor lo
rjes bskor ba'i/ /de yi dus ni 'di dag yin/ /bcom ldan khyod ni myur du bzhengs/ /sangs rgyas dus kyi rjes 'gro ba/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i dus bzhin du/ /thub pas de 'drar mi
'da' mdzod/ /yun ring dus nas brten mdzad pa'i/ /sems can mang po'i don mdzad stsol/ /zhi ba mya ngan 'das lam mam/ /bsam gtan rnam thar bstan du gsol/ /de
ltar rnam pa du ma yi/ /smra ba mang po'i tshig brjod nas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha yi tshogs/ /de nas thams cad cang mi smra/ /mtshungs med smre sngags byas nas ni/ /bdud dang
bcas pas rab tu 'dug /yun ring du zhing smre byas nas/ /'gul nas 'chi bcas sgra 'dzer bcas/ /mya ngan yid mi bde dang bcas/ /tshangs tshogs lha dang lha min bcas/ /mi
dang mi yi bdag po kun/ /sa steng de la gnas par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang shAkya'i rigs skyes pa/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas ni/ /lha
yi lha yi gnyen gyur pa/ /dge slong ma 'gags pa zhes bya/ /de gcung mi yi nang na dge /shin tu phra la mkhas shing gsal/ /chags bral lugs la mkhas pa dang / /dgra
bcom gtso bo rgyal po ni/ /du ma'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor/ /mya ngan gyis bskyed dbugs phyung nas/ /shin tu yun ring tshig kyang smras/ /snying rje yid mi bdes drangs
pas| |rgyal po dang bcas gyad rnams la/ /grogs po re zhig shing la ni/ /me ni 'jug par ma byed cig /ji srid bcom ldan sras bo ni/ /mchog
gyur chos nyid las byung ba/ /de ni nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che/ /'od srung chen po zhes bya ba/ /thub pa chen po blo yi mchog /bram ze'i rigs skyes zang zing med/ /ma ga d+ha yi mi
nang skyes/ /ri bo der ni mnyam par bzhag /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab mchog tu/ /bi pa li yi khyim du gnas/ /der ni myur du 'dir 'ong bar/ /byed kyi gzhan du ma yin
no| |lha ni gang zhig der dad pa/ /sku la me 'bar des bzlog pas/ /de bar sku la ma gtong ba/ /dal ba don med ma byed cig /ji srid rdzu 'phrul che ba'i mchog /
nyan thos thub pa thugs dgyes des/ /'jig rten gsum mchod sangs rgyas dang / /ston pa 'jig rten gyis mchod la/ /zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas/ /bla ma
g.yas su bskor byas pa/ /de tshe sku 'di sbar don du/ /der ni kun gyis rab byos shig /gang tshe sngar ni sbar 'gyur na/ /kun tu 'bar ba'ang don med gyur/ /thams
cad don med ma byed cig /'dir ni ngal ba kho na 'byung / /blo dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/ /kun la de skad smras nas ni/ /mi dang mi yi bdag po dang / /gyad
rnams kun kyang 'dug bar 'byung / /mi yi rigs su nga skyes shing / /mi rnams kyis kyang rab tu skyes/ /longs spyod rnams mang gzhan dang ni/ /bzo dang sgyu rtsal dge ba'ang bskyed/ /
sa steng shing gi rtsa dag tu/ /mi yi gzugs kyis byang chub thob/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad pa ni/ /mi rnams la ni chos kyang bstan/ /de nyid phyir na mi rnams kyis/ /sku sbyong don
phyir me yang spar/ /nga ming 'byung po kun gyi ni/ /mchog nyid du ni gyur pa yin/ /mi yi 'jig rten zhi ba dang / /nga ni mya ngan 'das par brtags/ /gang dag sangs rgyas thams
cad ni/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /thams cad mi yi 'jig rten du/ /mi yi lus su yang dag 'byung / /skye dang byang chub de bzhin du/ /dam chos 'khor lo dge ba spyod//
zhi ba yang dag kun gshegs par/ /de bzhin rang rgyal dgra bcom pa/ /mi yi lus la brten nas ni/ /bla med zhi bar gshegs pa yin/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab
bar| |de dag la ni ngas phan byas/ /nga ni phyi mar zhi ba dang / /bsil bar gyur cing 'gog par gyur/ /sa steng stong bar gyur pa na/ /de na sku gdung rab bzhag pa/ /mi rnams
la ni phan don du/ /mchod pa rjes su gzung 'dod bas/ /'jig rten lta dang lha min bcas/ /mi dang gnod sbyi mkha' lding bdag /srin po yi dwags grul bum
bdag /rdzu 'phrul chen po sha za rnams/ /'byung po dag ni thams cad dang / /gzar bcas ma mo rnams dang ni/ /de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad
ni| |grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab khams/ /srog chags thams cad nyid dag ni/ /mchod pa'i don phyir sku gdung dag /sa steng stong par gyur pa na/ /de yi tshe na yang
dag bzhag /kha cig sa steng mi dag dang / /lha yi rgyal po de bzhin gzhan/ /lha min dbang po rdzu 'phrul che/ /sa 'og gnas pa gzhan dag dang / /de bzhin klu rgyal
lha min dag /sku gdung so so so sor ni/ /yon tan ldan pa rdzu 'phrul ches/ /phyogs gnas thams cad bdag gir byas/ /rang gi gnas su khyer nas ni/ /de tshe mchod
pa byed 'gyur zhing / /rdzu 'phrul chen po sangs rgyas su/ /thams cad the tshom med par 'gyur/ /mchog dang tha ma bar gnas pa'i/ /sems ni dad pa rnam gsum gyis//
'jig rten rnam gsum 'gyur ba ni/ /sangs rgyas bse ru dgra bcom thob/ /theg pa rnam gsum 'jig rten gsum/ /rnam gsum yang dag bstan pa yin/ /theg chen
la 'jug lam gyis ni/ /de la brten nas nges par 'byung / /rang rgyal byang chub la brten pa/ /de bzhin 'jig rten 'gyur ba yin/ /de las gzhan pa nyan thos kyang //
rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /de bzhin 'jig rten 'gyur ba yin/ /rnam gsum rigs kyis rnam par brgyan/ /sa bdag longs spyod chen po dang / /bde chen don du 'khor
los bsgyur/ /lha dang mi yi phun sum tshogs/ /yun ring de tshe rjes myong nas/ /mthar ni 'chi ba la brten nas/ /de dag zhi ba rnam gsum 'gro /dang por sngar ni sangs rgyas dang / /
da ltar ma 'ongs pa dag kyang / /thams cad la ni 'di nyid de/ /'di ni yang dag ji bzhin bstan/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i sa de la/ /lha rnams thams cad 'dug nas ni/ /yid 'byung
sems ni skyo nas kyang / /skad 'dzer bcas pas smra ba ni/ /de tshe thams cad 'di skad smra/ /kye ma'o kyi hud mi rtag pa/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che/ /de 'dir yongs su
mya ngan 'das/ /lha yi rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /de dag kun gyis de smras nas/ /snying ni mya ngan bcas gyur nas/ /de nas cang mi smra bar gnas/ /ma ga d+hA yi skye bo mchog /ku
sha'i mchog gi grong gnas pa/ /de dang nye ba'i ri bo ni/ /phag rgod ces bya'i ming du grags/ /dge slong bsam gtan der byed pa/ /pi pa li yi phug zhugs pa/ /'di ni nyan
thos nga yi bu/ /thugs skyes chos las byung ba gang / /de ni 'od srung chen po yin/ /de tshe phug mchog la 'dug nas/ /de nas bsod snyoms la spyad de/ /'dug nas rang nyid
sems par byed/ /dus ring bdag gi sangs rgyas la/ /bdag gis kyang ni de phyag byas/ /rang byung gyur pa mi yi mchog /bdag gis da ltar de blta
bya| |shAkya'i rigs skyes thub pa mchog /bcom ldan de ni ga la bzhugs/ /bram ze'i rgyal po 'od srung che/ /der ni yang dag dgongs par gyur/ /thub pa'i thub pa kho na ni/ /
sems kyis de ltar bsams par gyur/ /lha yi mig gis 'jig rten la/ /'jig rten ma lus lta bar byed/ /'og min de bzhin 'jig rten mtha'/ /srid rtse'i 'jig rten
khams kyi bar/ /'jig rten ma lus thams cad dang / /stong chen srid pa las byung ba/ /nyan thos spyod yul ji tsam par/ /lha yi mig gis blta byas nas/ /mya ngan 'das
gzims zhi ba dang / /bsil bar gyur zhing nad med pa/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po lha tshogs kyis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor ba dang / /mi dang mi yi bdag po dang / /lha min
gnod sbyin srin po dang / /'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /grags chen nyan thos chen po yang / /shes rab gtsor ni gyur
pa dang / /'dod chags bcas dang 'dod chags bral/ /lha dang bcas pa mi rnams kyis/ /dpa' bo shing la bteg pa ni/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rigs las byung / /de
bzhin lha yi lhar gyur gtso/ /thub pa dam pa'i mnga' bdag ni/ /sa bdag gling la gnas rnams kyis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor gyur nas/ /mi yi dbang mchog gyad dag gis/ /
lag na rtswa sgron yang dag thogs/ /de dag me sbar mi nus par/ /lha rnams kyis ni bzlog 'gyur zhes/ /dge slong ma 'gags pa yang ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyis de skad smras/ /
mchi mas brnangs shing smre sngags 'don/ /sa rnams sgra ni chen pos gang / /ha ha zhes bya'i sgra nyid dang / /rnga bo che yi sgra yang thos/ /lha dang drang srong tshogs kyis khyab/ /lha yi bu
mo'i tshogs kyis bstod/ /grub pa rig 'dzin klu dang ni/ /mi 'am ci klu rgya che ba/ /snyan pa'i sgra ni sgrogs par byed/ /bya yi skad ni dge ba dang / /yid 'ong sna tshogs rol mo dang / /lha dang
mi yis rjed pa dang / /lha yi bu mo'i tshogs kyis gang / /grub pa rig 'dzin dag dang ldan/ /de tshe sA la'i nags dag tu/ /rnal 'byor dag gis kun tu khyab/ /thub mchog gzims
mal dam pa ni/ /kun nas yongs su bskor bar mthong / /rdzu 'phrul chen po mya ngan bral/ /de nas dbugs 'byin mya ngan bcas/ /de tshe bram ze 'od srung ni/ /mchi ma'i thigs
pa'ang rab tu 'don/ /nga yi nyan thos mchog gyur pa/ /de tshe sa yi steng du 'gyel/ /tshig kyang myur du brjod pa ni/ /kye ma'o dga' ba rab tu byung / /gang du sangs rgyas zhes bya ba/ /
zag med mya ngan 'das gyur tam/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa zhes/ /de nyid kyis ni 'dir gsungs pa/ /skye ba gzhan gyi rjes 'gro ba/ /bdag
gis ston pa'i sku mi mthong / /de nas langs nas myur du ni/ /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal por song / /sdug bsngal nyams thag ma skyes dgra/ /pha yi mya ngan gyis non pa'i/ /de tshe de yi
phug 'ongs nas/ /mi yi bdag po de la smras/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rgyal po chen po mya ngan 'das/ /bzhon pa myur du sbyor mdzod dang / /nga ni ston pa'i
drung 'gro ba/ /sA lar gzims mal bzhugs pa ni/ /nad med sems dang rnam par bral/ /bstan pa thams cad las 'das shing / /sku yi dam pa longs spyod rdzogs//
ma rungs de tshig thos nas ni/ /rgyal po de yang sdug bsngal zhing / /nyam thag smre bar gyur ba yi/ /de tshe tshig ni rgyal po 'don/ /ston pa dang ni pha dag dang / /gnyi ga
las kyang bdag nyams gyur/ /gnyen rnams kun gyis spangs pa ste/ /de tshe skye bo yid ches med/ /dmyal ba mi bzad ltung 'gyur na/ /bdag ni su yi skyabs la
brtan/ /nyan thos ston pa'i mchog gyur pa/ /dpa' bo chen po skyabs mdzod cig /nyan thos chen po gzi brjid che/ /bdag gi 'tsho ba 'di na med/ /ma ga d+hA yi mi
yi bdag /de nas de skad smras pa dang / /nyan thos mchog gi rkang gnyis la/ /de yi mod la spyi bos gtugs/ /der ni sems med brgyal gyur ba/ /de yi tshe na gzhon nu ni/ /rdzu
'phrul chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /dbugs 'byin pa ni byed par 'gyur/ /sems can rjes su gzung 'dod pas/ /'jig rten kun tu rgyu bar gyis/ /gang tshe sA la'i nags su
ni| |nga lus shing gi steng bzhag pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bskor nas/ /de tshe khyod ni 'dug par 'gyur/ /gang phyir nga lus mchod pa'i phyir/ /sa steng 'dir ni
khyod kyis byas/ /'jig rten kun tu bltas nas ni/ /su zhig sdug bsngal gang las drang / /gzhon nu zab pa'i blo ldan pa/ /de ltar sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /'jam dpal
gyis ni de yi tshe/ /sa bdag de ni sdug bsngal ba/ /der gnas pa la khyod kyis ni/ /khyod nyid kyis ni de 'dul gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas rtogs 'gyur gyi/ /lha dang drang
srong rnams dang ni/ /nyan thos rang rgyal gzhan dag dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen pos mi nus so/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis mi bdag ni/ /rmi lam gnas pa bzhin du mthong / /
khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul byin rlabs kyis/ /rgyal po mya ngan gyis brgyal des/ /de tshe de ni rmi lam du/ /mngon sum byis pa lta bur mthong / /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jam pa'i
dbyangs/ /gzhon nu bdag nyid sna tshogs pa/ /de bzhin chos ni rnam par 'phrul/ /byang chub sems dpa' byis pa'i gzugs/ /sna tshogs
rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /'jam dpal gyis bstan sems dad byas/ /rgyal po mnar med 'gro ba las/ /myur du de las ldang bar 'gyur/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las dang
ni/ /ngan song mtho ris bzang po dang / /'gro ba bdag nyid che yon tan/ /nyan thos thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /de nas rgya cher byas pa ni/ /mdo sde 'gyod pa sel ba ste/ /
rgyal po ma skyes dgra yi ni/ /shin tu rgya cher bsal ba 'o/ /rgya che don gyis brgyan pa yi/ /mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsungs so/ /dang po bar ma tha ma yi/ /sangs rgyas
kun gyi gsung dag ni/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /cho ga rgya cher gsungs pa yin/ /de nas 'jam dpal dus kun tu/ /gzhon nu khyod ni de yi tshe/ /
sdig pa'i las la rjes 'jug pa'i/ /sa bdag rnams ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ /khyod ni rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /gdul bya dag kyang bsam mi khyab/ /'byung po'i
tshogs rnams ma lus pa/ /khyed ni 'dul byed nyid du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bos de gsungs nas/ /'od chen ldan pas 'jam dbyangs la/ /gnas gtsang
steng bzhugs de tshe gzigs/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /smra ba'i mchog gis de la gsungs/ /bskal ba mang po 'das pa na/ /khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas par 'gyur//
grangs kyis mnyam med bsam mi khyab/ /mi yi grangs dang mnyam med par/ /'jam pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu yang ni mthar
gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas mdzad pa de tshe byed/ /sems can mang po rnam bkrol nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs can rdzu 'phrul che/ /gzhon nu la ni de
gsungs nas/ /brtse bas brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /yun ring dbugs phyung rnam par skyo/ /yun ring rdzogs sangs rgyas bltas nas/ /mchi ma'i thigs pa'ang rnam 'dzag cing / /
thal mo sbyar dang bcas nas ni/ /de nas kyang ni 'dug par 'gyur/ /de nas de ni sa gnas pa/ /mi yi dam pa ma skyes dgras/ /rmad byung 'od srung chen po ni/ /bram ze la ni mgos
btud nas/ /dran pa rnyed cing sems sad nas/ /rkang gnyis skyil krung bcas nas 'dug /de ni yun ring dbugs phyung la/ /don ni rgya cher nges bstan byas/ /dbang phyug chen
po ma skyes dgra/ /rgyal po'i bu ni 'dug bar 'gyur/ /de nas 'od srung ches smras pa/ /nga ni spur sbyong gnas su 'gro /mi rnams la ni phan phyir dang / /mchod rten gzugs
gnas mchod don du'o/ /nyan thos mchog ni gnas de ru/ /rdzu 'phrul nyid kyis nye bar lhags/ /de dang 'brel bar sems skye ba/ /bdag gi rdzu
'phrul rigs pa min/ /mchod rten chen po mthong bar ni/ /rkang gnyis bdag ni 'gro bar 'tshal/ /de nas lam gyi bar 'dug nas/ /'khor ba'i stegs ni rab tu
bstan/ /ji tsam der ni 'ongs gyur pa/ /dge 'dun kun dga' rar gnas pa'i/ /dge slong rgan zhugs gsar bu ni/ /sdig pa nyid kyis rnam rmongs pas/ /mthong
nas rgan zhugs rnam 'khrugs te/ /gang phyir de dang nye bar 'ongs/ /grags pa che zhing skal ba che/ /sems can dag pa rims nad med/ /bram ze de yi drung lhags
nas| |de tshe rkang gnyis phyag byas nas/ /de la smras pa skal ba che/ /legs 'ongs khyod ni ci phyir byon/ /myur du khyod ni gang du 'gro/ /yid byung ci phyir rab tu 'dug /de
smras khro ldan byis pa la/ /tshe ldan khyod kyis ma thos sam/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'jig rten kun gyi ston pa ni/ /sangs rgyas bdag gi pha zhes
smras| |mar me 'bar bzhin mya ngan 'das/ /dpa' bo chen po nub par 'gyur/ /sa yi steng ni stongs par gyur/ /de bzhin 'jig rten ma lus stongs/ /bdag gi phyogs
rnams kun stongs gyur/ /byis de phyin ci log sems kyis/ /der ni rgan zhugs rab dga' nas/ /rab dgod tshig tu smras pa ni/ /rab tu ring de 'das gyur tam/ /phyag ring
lus che che ba dang / /mgo ni gdugs kyi rnam pa 'dra/ /bdag cag rnams kyi gtso bo mchog /bslab dang bslab min rjes su ston/ /da ltar de ni mya ngan 'das/ /ci 'dod bzhin du
bdag cag spyod/ /rgan zhugs kyis ni de smras nas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po rab tu 'khrugs/ /gdong la khro gnyer byas nas ni/ /yi ge hUM ni rab tu sbyar/ /sdom brtson bag
chags bslang nas ni/ /bram ze de mod rab 'khrugs nas/ /rkang ba'i mthe bos de ma thag /sa yi steng du rab bsnun pas/ /sa rnams dang ni ri rab kyang / /rab tu 'gul bar gyur pa
dang | |rgya mtsho rnams dang shing rnams dang / /ri rab rnams kyang 'khrugs par gyur/ /klu rgyal dang ni lha rnams dang / /ri sul phug kyang rnam par 'gyel/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma
dang / /sa steng de tshe snang ba nyams/ /rlung yang rgyu ba med par gnas/ /skar mda' dag kyang sa la lhung / /de nas de ni sngags zhes brjod/ /nyan thos rnams kyi rigs las
byung / /yi ge hUM de yi ge gcig /las rnams ma lus byed cing dge /sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas tsam gyis/ /'di ni bzlas pa tsam gyis byed/ /'gro dang gnas pa'i dug
dang ni/ /de bzhin dgra kun rengs par byed/ /sems can gdug pa thams cad la/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis rengs par byed/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las
byed cing / /khyad par du yang gzhan nyid byed/ /rgan zhugs tshig kyal rab smras pa/ /der ni mi smra thur bltas 'dug /de yi rdzu 'phrul la dad nas/ /de yi mod la rnam par
btul/ /de tshe nyan thos mchog gi ni/ /gdung sbyor shing gi drung du khyer/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /dge slong de ni rkang gis song / /der song des ni thub
pa'i sku/ /shing la yod par rab tu mthong / /lha yi tshogs ni du mas kyang / /mchod pa chen po byed pa dang / /gau ta ma ni thub pa yi/ /sku ni shing gi steng bzhag mthong //
'od srung chen po rmad byung ba/ /skal pa chen po de mthong nas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i dge slong rnams/ /thams cad smre sngags 'don par byed/ /lha dang bcas pa'i tshogs kun
ni| |ha ha'i rnam pa rab 'don cing / /de ltar mya ngan las skyes pa'i/ /nyam thag sgra ni shin tu che/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po lha dang klu/ /de nas kun gyi rab bsu nas/ /rkang
gnyis mchog la phyag byos zhes/ /skal pa che la'ang rab tu smras/ /lha tshogs mi dang bcas pa dang / /'byung po kun gyi tshogs dag dang / /mi bdag drang srong gnod
sbyin dag /khyod la sdod cing gzhol ba yin/ /shing la me gtong 'bad gyur kyang / /sku sbyong shing ni spar mi nus/ /de nas de ni skyon bral ba/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po skal ba ches/ /
gdung sbyong shing gi smad cha la/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po des phyag byas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran nas/ /bskor ba dag kyang mang du byas/ /de tshe lcags kyi sgrom phral nas//
zhabs gnyis dag kyang rnam brkyang la/ /yang dang yang du zhabs byugs nas/ /zhabs gnyis spyi bos phyag byas nas/ /thub pa mchog gi zhabs gnyis la/ /lan mang dag
tu rnam par bltas/ /der ni zhabs gnyis yang zhugs te/ /lcags kyi sgrom la yang dag gnas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /de ni de nas langs 'dug pa/ /rdzu 'phrul
chen po 'dod chags bral/ /dgra bcom rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /ma ga d+ha gtso rgyal po yang / /sku sbyong shing gi thad 'ongs pa/ /glang po shing rta bzhon rta dang / /mthar gyis de
nas theg pa yis/ /de nas dpung chen sa yi bdag /kun kyang stobs dang bzhon par bcas/ /de tshe thub pa shAka thub la/ /der ni phyag 'tshal don du lhags/ /sa steng zhi ba'i
gzims mal du/ /bas mtha' dgon par mya ngan 'das/ /chu bo gser ldan 'gram dang ni/ /cod pan bcings pa'i mchod rten du/ /zhi ba'i dbyings la yang dag zhugs/ /
yang dag mtha' la yongs su brten/ /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal po der/ /dpung chen ldan pas yang dag lhags/ /rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pa yis/ /de yang nga la
stod par byed/ /phan yon che zhing stobs dang ldan/ /ngo mtshar sa yi rgyan gyur pa/ /thub pa'i sku sbyangs las byung ba'i/ /der ni sku gdung mchod rten byas/ /dge slong kun dga' bo
zhes bya| |slob pa nga yi bsnyen bkur ba/ /mi yi dam pa mnyes gshin pa/ /nga la rtag tu yongs su dad/ /yid ni zhum zhing mya ngan gdungs/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de
nas 'od srung thad song nas/ /rkang pa gnyis la rab btud nas/ /sdug bsngal nyam thag 'dar ba yis/ /'di skad sgra ni 'dzer bas smras/ /deng 'dir nga yi ston pa 'das/ /de
lta bdag ni mgon med gyur/ /nga yi rten dang gnas dang skyabs/ /khyod nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /thub pa'i zla ba de nyid kyis/ /nye gnas khyod kyir lung yang bstan/ /nyon mongs
kun ni rnam spangs pa/ /khyod kyi nye gnas dgra bcom pa/ /thun gyi phyi ma mtshan mtha' la/ /rgyal ba des ni bstan pa yin/ /nga nyid mya ngan 'das pa na/ /rtag tu khyod ni
yod par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i don du ni/ /phan par 'dod par khyod byed 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal can bdag spangs nas kyang / /thub pa chen po zhi bar gshegs
blo ldan ma 'gags pa zhes pas/ /sdom chen de ni dbugs 'byin byed/ /khyod ni mya ngan du ma byed/ /mya ngan dag kyang ma byed cig /gnas ni gang du'ang 'gro mi byed/ /'di nyid du
ni gnas par gyis/ /'jig rten mig ni 'das gyur nas/ /'di nyid ston par 'gyur ba yin/ /'dir ni ston pas lung bstan nas/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /nga yang bcom
ldan lhan cig tu/ /'od srung rjes su 'gro bar bya/ /ston pa gnyis po dag gi yang / /sa yi steng na gzugs brnyan yin/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i nyan thos ni/ /'od srung chen po gtso
bo ni| |'tsho zhing yongs su gzhes pas na/ /khyod ni mya ngan ma byed cig /rdzu 'phrul chen po snying rjes non/ /rnal 'byor chen po 'dod chags bral/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po thub
pa'i sras/ /thams cad de bzhin smra bar byed/ /gyad dang rgyal po dag gis ni/ /spur sbyong shing la me btang bas/ /khor yug kun nas me 'bar nas/ /spur sbyong shing de thal bar
gyur| |de mthong lha yi tshogs dag dang / /gdengs can brang 'gro rnams kyis ni/ /spur sbyor shing gnas zhi ba'i phyir/ /tsan+dan chu yi rgyun dag gis/ /char chen rab tu gtong zhing
gnas/ /de nas de yi mod la yang / /sa steng du yang de bzhin du/ /me tog tshogs kyi char yang btang / /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod pa'i phyir/ /de yi mod la kun der
lhags/ /thams cad phan tshun 'thab pa'i phyir/ /de yi mod la bya ba rtsom/ /tshangs sogs brgya byin 'thab bral dang / /lha tshogs kun kyang de
bzhin no/ /nyan thos chen po 'dod chags bral/ /rdzu 'phrul chen pos bzlog par byas/ /sku gdung rgyal ba'i ring bsrel ni/ /'od srung chen pos rnam bgos pa/ /mchod
pa'i don du thams cad la/ /cung zad cung zad nges par byin/ /theg pa gsum las mi ldog dang / /zhi ba'i mthar phyin bya phyir ro/ /rnal 'byor de tshe 'od srung che/ /rdzu 'phrul
chen po 'dod chags bral/ /rgan zhugs kyis ni smras pa'i tshig /de ni yongs su sems par byed/ /'dir ni gsungs rab ma lus pa/ /yan lag bcu gnyis bde
'byung gnas/ /mdo dang 'dul ba mngon pa'i chos/ /nam mkha'i dud bzhin ma gyur tam/ /dpa' bo chen po nub gyur nas/ /bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur bas ni/ /sangs
rgyas gsungs pa'i bka' 'di ni/ /ma lus bdag gis bsdu bar bya/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /ma lus lhan cig bgro bar bya/ /ma ga d+hA yi grong
mchog tu/ /grong khyer bzang po rgyal po'i khab/ /ku sha'i grong khyer nyams dga' dang / /ri bo rdo 'jog mtho ba dang / /yul bzang yangs pa can dang ni/ /mchod
rten gnas ni legs mdzes pa/ /de bzhin rnam pa du ma'i gnas/ /bstan pa bsdu ba'i ched dag tu/ /'dus nas smra ba kun smra ba/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po byed par 'gyur/ /nga yang 'dir
ni nub pa dang / /de tshe dus kyi mtha' ma la/ /phan tshun gsod par dga' ba yi/ /sa bdag rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /las kyi mtha' mang dge slong rnams/ /sems can
rnams ni chags pas rmongs/ /de bzhin dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma/ /dus kyi mtha' la ma zhir 'gyur/ /phan tshun skyon ni tshol byed cing / /phan tshun gsod la mngon par zhen//
rma ldan skyon ni ma rungs ltar/ /skyon la rtag tu rtog par byed/ /thub pa de dus nub pa ni/ /dge slong rnams ni ma bsdams 'gyur/ /de tshes steng bstan pa ni/ /bsrung ba'i don du
bzhag gyur pa/ /chags bral zag med 'jig rten du/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam pa brgyad/ /de tshe dgra bcom thu bo yang / /sgra gcan 'dzin sogs rab tu bsgrags/ /de tshe dus kyi
tha ma la/ /de dag kyang ni snang ba med/ /sngags pa grub pa'i dus su ni/ /de dag mthong ba don yod 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bzhag pa
yin| |grags pa chen po chad pa'i las/ /de dag la ni ngas bstan pa/ /de dag bka' las 'das pa 'am/ /cud zad bslab las 'das na'o/ /ji srid dam chos yang dag
mtha'/ /zang zing med par gnas par gyis/ /nga yi gsung gi bsod nams 'di/ /ji srid bstan pa stobs dang ldan/ /des na bdag nyid zhir 'gyur
zhing | |zag med mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /de tshe thub pa'i bstan pa ni/ /yongs su nub par 'gyur ba na/ /dge slong rnams dang dge tshul rnams/ /dge slong ma rnams ser
snar bcas/ /rtag tu ngan spyod g.yo sgyu can/ /de tshe yongs su ma dag pa'o/ /nga yi bstan la mi gnas shing / /khyim dang chung ma tshol bar byed/ /de yi tshe na dge bsnyen rnams/ /
gzhan gyi bud med la rtag dang / /lhag ma rnam pa bzhi po nyid/ /de tshe rtags dang ming tsam yod/ /'khon 'dzin thams cad goms byed cing / gcig la gcig ni rnam
'tshe byed/ /phal cher mu stegs kyis non cing / /lha rnams kun kyang gnod par 'gyur/ /de tshe bram ze'i rigs la ni/ /skye bo rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin log
spyod rmongs pa dang / /mi rnams srog chags 'tshe bar dga'/ /nga ni yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /rtsod dus 'di la lung bstan yin/ /mi ni rnam mang gzhan dag kyang / /
rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med dga'/ /mi dge kun la dga' ba dang / /dge ba'i don ni rnam spangs pa/ /nga ni sa steng zhir gshegs nas/ /sems can mang po 'byung bar
'gyur/ /nga yi sku ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /gzi brjid chen po lha tshogs dang / /bdag nyid chen po mi rnams dang / /de bzhin gnod sbyin 'byung po'i tshogs/ /lha min dang ni dri za
dang | |rdzu 'phrul chen po mi 'am ci/ /de nas mkha' lding klu dang ni/ /de bzhin srin po drang srong rnams/ /rnal 'byor ba dang grub pa dang / /gzi brjid chen po gza' rnams dang //
rnam pa sna tshogs skye gnas dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sems can rnams/ /srid pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa dang / /blo ldan 'ching ba bcad pa dang / /sku gdung nad bral 'di
la ni| |de tshe mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /chu bo gser ldan 'gram dang ni/ /sA la'i zung gi tshal dang ni/ /cod pan bcings pa'i mchod rten dang / /gyad rnams kyi ni nye 'khor
du| |nga ni der yang mya ngan 'da'/ /'jig med zhi bar yongs su 'gro/ /nga yi sku gdung de blangs nas/ /de bzhin gzhan gyis 'phrog par byed/ /lha dang lha ma yin rnams dang //
de tshe 'byung po'i tshogs kun gyis/ /so sor cha ni rnam phye nas/ /rnam par gzhag pa byas par 'gyur/ /mi yi rgyal po dpung chen ldan/ /ma ga d+hA yi ma skyes dgra /rdzu 'phrul che
ldan nyan thos ni/ /kun la'ang gsol bar rab 'debs pa/ /bsod nams bdag gis ma byas pas/ /bdag gi pha yang shi bar gyur/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal ltung
gyur pas/ /bdag nyid chen pos drang du gsol/ /de nas blo ldan nyan thos mchog /sangs rgyas thugs las skyes pa'i sras/ /'od srung chen po zhes
grags pa/ /skye dgu rnams la phan byed pas/ /ma skyes dgra ni ngo tsha ldan/ /sems zhum gyur te mthong nas ni/ /rdzu 'phrul nyid la rab gnas nas/ /de yi dus su yang dag
dgongs/ /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel sku gdung ni/ /cha gcig khyod kyis blang bar gyis/ /rgyal po gzhan ni stobs ldan gyis/ /gzhan dag rab tu khyer bar gyur/ /phan
tshun ba bcol 'khrugs nas ni/ /gcig la gcig ni 'khon byas nas/ /de tshe nam mkha' sku gdung khyer/ /rang gi gnas su'ang bzhag par 'gyur/ /de tshe thub pa'i
nyan thos mchog /dge slong 'od srung chen po de/ /kye ma'o kyi hud sems pa ni/ /sa steng 'dir ni rab stongs pa/ /sangs rgyas dang ni rang rgyal dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i
nyan thos kyis/ /sems can 'jigs par snang ba ste/ /srid pa'i btson rar spyod pa yin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sdug bsngal drag /yun ring rjes su myong bar 'gyur/ /
'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yi/ /ring srel yang dag mchod byas nas/ /de dag lha yi 'jig rten du/ /yun mi thung bar bde ba myong / /rgyal srid de nas longs
spyod dang / /rnyed par dka' ba'i sngags rnams ni/ /'gro ba sna tshogs spyod pa yis/ /rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur/ /phun tshogs 'dod pa 'jig rten mchog /rnam thar
gsum gyis rnam par brgyan/ /sku gdung rnams ni mchod byas na/ /grub pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten rnam grangs bram ze zhes/ /thub pa mchog ni nyan thos gtso//
'od srung zhes ni bya ba yis/ /'di ltar de ni bsams nas ni/ /de tshe sa las ma phye bar/ /de yi sku gdung blangs nas ni/ /ma ga d+hA bdag ma skyes dgras/ /'bad nas cung zad
yongs su sbyin/ /de bzhin rgyal po kun la yang / /'od chen po ni ma mthong yang / /nyan thos bdag nyid chen po des/ /kun la'ang thams cad rab tu byin/ /kun la'ang mi
rtag 'du shes kyis/ /de ni yang ni gnas par gyur/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sems can rnams la mya ngan byed/ /shAkya'i skyes mchog bstan pa ni/ /'jig
rten dam chos nub pa na/ /bskal pa rnam pa mang por ni/ /yun ring sems can dub par 'gyur/ /'di dag dud bzhin mi 'gyur bar/ /'di dag gsung ni bsdu bar bya/ /
dpa' bo de las langs nas ni/ /sems kyi stobs ni nyams pa med/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgrar gyur pa'i/ /mi yi dbang pos mgron du bos/ /bston pa'i bstan pa bya ba'i phyir//
rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir/ /'bad pas sku gdung myur du ni/ /gser gyi snod kyi nang du bcug /de dag sngon du yang dag btang / /de tshe rgyal po'i
khab myur 'gro/ 'od ma'i tshal du phyin nas ni/ /sku gdung dag ni yang dag bzhag /'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yi/ /mchod rten rmad byung chen po byas/ /mchod rten de ni

mchod byed pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ni/ /phreng ba gos dang gdugs dang ni/ /dar la rol mo byug pa dang / /dar la rol mo byug pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang / mar me me tog phreng ba
yis| |phyag 'tshal rjes song sems kyis ni/ /rgyal po rab tu mchod pa byed/ /mchod rten de la mgos btud nas/ /de yi tshe na smon lam btab/ /'jig rten mchog la
mchod pa yis/ /bdag gi dge ba mang po gang / /de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa 'dis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mchog thob shog /de nas rgyal po langs nas ni/ /'od srung
che la rab tu smras/ /mig ni mchi mas kun khyab nas/ /mig gi mchi ma phyis nas ni/ /snying ni brtse bas rab brlan nas/ /de tshe pha ni yang dag dran/ /shes rab chen po 'phags
pa khyod/ /khyod ni bdag gi dbang gyur mdzod/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang byas pa/ /nges par mnar med rab tu gzhol/ /ston pa bka' yi lam gnas pa/ /de 'dra'i
chos kyi rgyal po yi/ /pha yi srog la gnod bcas pa'i/ /mya ngan bsal bar mi nus pas/ /'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis/ /bdag la chos don bstan par rigs/ /
de skad smras nas bdag nyid che/ /rgyal ba'i nyan thos mchog gyur pa/ /blo ldan 'od srung zhes bya bas/ /'di dag tshig ni rab tu smras/ /rgyal po chen po ma 'jigs shig /khyod kyis
dge ba mang du byas/ /skye ba brgya phrag du mar yang / /khyod la goms pa rab tu yod/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa na/ /rang rgyal gcig ni yang dag byung / /grong khyer bA ra na sI ru/ /de
tshe tshong dpon bu zhig byung / /mi shes byis pa g.yo ba yis/ /de tshe shing rta zhon nas byung / /bcom ldan de nyid de ru ni/ /rang rgyal yongs su byung ba ni/ /'jig rten rjes su gzung 'dod
pas| |de ni slongs mo'i don du rgyu/ /byis pa des ni de mthong nas/ /sems ni yang dag dad gyur nas/ /rkang gnyis la gtugs dris pa ni/ /dge slong khyod ni ci zhig byed/ /bse ru
lta bur skye ba med/ /bcom ldan de ni mi smrar 'dug /de tshe byis pa de yi ni/ /gos la bzung nas yang dag gnas/ /'deng ngo 'deng ngo khyim bzang 'dir/ /rgyal mtshan gyis ni
rab mtshan pa/ /'di ni bdag gi khyim yin te/ /zhabs bkrus nas ni bshos gsol te/ /ji ltar dus bzhin myur gsol nas/ /ci 'dod par ni rtse bar bgyi'o/ /de nas nyes
dang bral ba de/ /nyes gsum mthar byed 'joms pa po/ /gzhan dag rjes gzung de dag gtsor/ /mthar gyis kyang ni rab 'gro zhing / /song nas sgo yi
rtsa ba la/ /'od chen der ni 'dug par gyur/ /de nas byis pa nang zhugs nas/ /ma la yang ni 'di skad smras/ /ma ni bdag la 'bras chan stsol/ /bza' ba rnam mang dag kyang
stsol/ /yun ring sa rdul la rtse ba'i/ /bdag gi grogs po 'dir 'ongs gyur/ /yun ring bdag ni dgar 'gyur ba/ /sgor ni 'ongs nas 'dug pa yin/ /de tshe de ni rab rings
par| |de yi mod la sgor yang byung / /rdzu 'phrul chen po zhi ba'i gzugs/ /bdag nyid chen po de yang mthong / /de tshe de ni myur 'ongs nas/ /snod ni bzang po blangs nas kyang / /
lag pa legs par rab bkrus nas/ /me tog spos sogs sngon 'gro bas/ /'bras chan gtsang ma blangs nas ni/ /du ma'i ro yis rnam brgyan pa'i/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza'
ba dang / /dngul gyi snod du rab tu bcug /de tshe myur du phyir byung ste/ /de yi lhung bzed la blugs nas/ /khyor bcas chos la dad pa yis/ /de yi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs/ /de
yis bsod snyoms blangs nas ni/ /nam mkha' la ni mngon par song / /de nas de ni rab 'bar zhing / /mar me'i phreng ba bzhin du snang / /bse ru ltar spyod gang yin pa/ /de
dag ngag gis chos ston min/ /rdzu 'phrul 'od kyis sems can la/ /bdag nyid chen po ston par byed/ /de yang lhag par snying rje can/ /sems can 'gro ba ser snar ldan/ /pha
rol don du sems can la/ /de ni rdzu 'phrul ston par byed/ /de yi rnam smin las kyis ni/ /ma dang lhan cig byas pa yang / /stong phrag lnga yi skye bar ni/ /lha nyid kyang ni byas par 'gyur/ /
lha rnams kyi ni lha rgyal der/ /ma de nyid ni yang dag gyur/ /'khor los bsgyur nyid mi rnams kyi/ /mi yi bdag por de tshe gyur/ /yun ring bde ba rjes myong nas/ /gzugs can
snying po'i bur 'di gyur/ /gang gis bcom ldan de smras dang / /gos kyi tha ma la bzung dang / /tshig ngan smra bas smras pa ni/ /dge slong smra bas smras pa dang / /sa rdul bdag dang
rtse ba zhes/ /de tshe sngon ni khyod ces smras/ /tshig gi las ni de yis ni/ /ma 'dod pa yi tsha ba yi/ /drag cing rab tsha'i sdug bsngal ba/ /yun ring mang po rjes myong ba/ /mi 'dod
sdug bsngal bzod dka' ba/ /mi zad dmyal bar lhung bar gyur/ /las kyi zhags pas rab bcings nas/ /sems can ngan 'gror 'gro bar gyur/ /rgod pas las ni byed pa
yis| |ngu bas rjes su myong bar gyur/ /de bzhin byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /nyan thos rgyal ba skyob pa la/ /tshig ni ma rungs rgya che ba/ /de yi las ni 'di 'dra'o/ /dmyal
ba las ni thar nas kyang / /mi nyid du ni 'dir yang 'ongs/ /rnam smin skyes pa mi yi bdag /dmyal ba yang ni dran par gyur/ /de yi khro ba bdo ba yis/ /
khyod kyis pha yi srog kyang bcad/ /rang rgyal dag gi spyod pa yang / /sngon gyi bag chags kyis dran pas/ /sangs rgyas mngon sum mthong nas ni/ /skye dgu dag kyang de bzhin
byas/ /de nyid rgyu ni dran byas pas/ /'dir ni rgyal thabs nyid kyang byas/ /de ltar 'od ma'i tshal du ni/ /phan tshun de dag sa steng smra/ /nga yi slob ma mchog 'di dang / /
gnyis pa mi yi bdag po yis/ /mchod rten lan brgyar phyag btsal nas/ /de tshe rang gi khyim du song / /de nas slob ma'i mchog gyur pa/ /pi pal phug na gnas pa
de| |rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /thub pa ma lus 'dus nas ni/ /gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis dang / /'dul ba ma lus sdung par byed/ /gang zhig chos
ni ngas bstan dang / /de bzhin sngon gyi rgyal ba mchog /de ni slob ma'i mchog des kyang / /rnam pa gsum du yang dag bstan/ /'dul ba dang ni mngon pa dang / /mdo
sde'i dbye bas gzhung du byas/ /sems can 'ching ba gsum las bgrol/ /nyes pa gsum yang skem par byed/ /dpa' bo sdug bsngal gsum las 'grol/ /rtag
tu theg pa gsum la dgod/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i don/ /blo yi mchog ni byed par 'gyur/ /rgyal chen ma skyes dgra zhes pa'i/ /ma ga d+hA pa mi yi bdag /ang+ga ma
ga d+hA dang ni/ /bA ra Na sI de las gzhan/ /byang du yangs pa can dang ni/ /rgyal chen stobs po che bar ni/ /the tshom med par 'gyur ba yin/ /bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur/ /
gzhon nu khyod ni 'dul byed cing / /zhi ba dam pa ston par 'gyur/ /de yi bu yang rgyal po ni/ /yi ge u zhes bya bar bsgrags/ /de ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/ /myur du bstan pa
pa'i don la brtson/ /des ni ston pa'i gsung rab 'dir/ /rgya cher 'dri bar byed 'jug 'gyur/ /mchod pa chen po'ang byas nas ni/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par byed/ /phyir
yang ngan song 'di mi 'gro/ /ltar skye bar ni de 'gyur ro/ /lo ni nyi shu sum cur ni/ /pha dang lhan cig 'grogs par 'gyur/ /grong khyer stobs ldan mtshan phyed du/ /rigs
las skyes pa'i nad kyis ni/ /mngon par zil gyis non bar 'gyur/ /nyin zhag sum cu rtsa drug tu/ /nad chen dag gis nyam thag 'gyur/ /nad rnams kun gyis btab nas
de| |rnam pa sna tshogs brgyal nas ni/ /rgyal po de myur shi 'phos nas/ /lha rnams su ni skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni mthar gyis 'bad nas ni/ /nges par byang chub thob par
'gyur/ /'di dag gzhan yang mang po ni/ /'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs par/ /rang rgyal skyob pa dag la ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa yis/ /de bzhin
lha dang mi rnams kyis/ /'dod dang khyad par phun tshogs 'thob/ /de dag mthar gyis 'gro 'gyur ba/ /zhi ba nad med go 'phang 'thob/ /rgyal po mchog dang dman pa dang //
mi yi bdag po bar ma rnams/ /rgyal po na hu sha la sogs/ /dang po'i dus su bstan pa dag /des kyang de bzhin gshegs mchog dang / /rjes yi rang bas mtho ris
song / /nges par de dag sangs rgyas gyur/ /kha cig nyan thos theg pa la/ /nges par kha cig nyan thos nyid/ /de kun thar la mngon par gzhol/ /dus kyi rnam gzhag rjes
mthun par/ /tshe yang rnam par brtag pa yin/ /dam pa tshe yang ring ba ste/ /de bzhin bar ma bar ma yin/ /shin tu dka' ba'i dus mtha' la/ /dus kyi tha ma rtsod dus
la| |rgyal po rtsod pa la dga' bas/ /gzhan ni tha mar bstan pa yin/ /phan tshun 'khon du 'dzin chags pas/ /gcig la gcig ni rnam 'tshe byed/ /dman pa'i skye ba
thob pa dang / /mtshon gyi reg pas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mtshon gyis 'tsho bas yang dag dga'/ /de bzhin gzhan gyi bud med chags/ /rgyal po 'jig rten smod par
ni| |the tshom med par 'gyur ba yin/ /g.yon can las ngan can dang ni/ /de bzhin 'phags min ser sna can/ /de yi tshen 'byung bar 'gyur/ /cha gnyis ldan dang rtsod
dus bar/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /gzhon nu de ni rtogs par gyis/ /dus gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba na/ /sa steng rgyal po 'byung ba yi/ /de dag gzugs dang mtshan
ma dang / /kha dog kyang ni rtogs par gyis/ /ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / /gzugs can snying po de bzhin gzhan/ /rgyal rigs gtso bo 'char ba dang / /dmag brgya
pa ni yang dag 'byung / /lag bzang gzhu bzang zhes bya dang / /de bzhin dbang chen tsam sha /de bzhin lits+tsha bir skyes pa'i/ /shAkya'i rigs skyes seng+ge dang / /cher ldan
gsal dang rab gsal dang / /sde chen du yang bstan pa'o/ /de bzhin 'phags rgyal gtum po dang / /ser skya'i grong gi rgyal po ni/ /zas gtsang zhes ni bya ba dang / /dpa'
po zhes bya stobs chen dag /'di dag rgyal po'i rigs su gsungs/ /sa srung ston pa mchod byed pa'o/ /shAkya seng+ge mi yi mchog /sangs rgyas mngon du lta bar 'gyur/ /
de yang de nas chos thos nas/ /yun ring phun sum tshogs pa 'thob/ /nges par byang chub 'dod nas kyang / /shi nas zhi ba thob par 'gyur/ /sa bdag sa yi dkyil 'khor
du| |'di dag 'jig rten rnam par grags/ /rigs ni rgyal rigs dag tu bstan/ /'du shes ming gis mtshon pa yin/ /sa steng nga yis bstan
pa'i tshig /de dag mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu byis pa'i gzugs can gyis/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten lung bstan pa/ /ma skyes zhes bya'i rgyal po de/ /nges par
byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /nga ni sa steng mya ngan 'das/ /lo brgya dag ni 'das pa na/ /snang ba med cing nyes par bcas/ /mi shes mun pas rab tu bsgribs/ /de tshe
sa ni stongs pa zhes/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis spangs pa yin/ /de tshe mi bzad chen po yi/ /grong khyer me tog can du ni/ /mya ngan med cing bya ba yi/ /rgyal po sa ni skyong
byed pa/ /khro bcas las ni drag po byed/ /de tshe de ni snying rje med/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /nad med ser sna bral ba dang / /dge slong tshul khrims
ldan pa yi/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thang du lhags/ /sngon gyi bag chags rgyu dang ni/ /sa rdul byin pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /rigs ni nges par 'gyur ba dang / /rgyal
bo nor chen ldan par 'gyur/ /chos dang chos min rnam spyod cing / /brtse dang snying rje ldan pa dang / /chags bral rdzu 'phrul chen po des/ /rgyu ni phye zhing bstan par
byas| |sngon ni khyod kyang rgyal po ste/ /mi shes byis pa g.yo ba yi/ /rgyal pa shAkya seng+ge la/ /sa yi rdul ni snyim gang phul/ /zhing de la ni rab phul bas/ /lha yul phun sum
tshogs pa thob/ /lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /sa yi 'jig rten 'dir 'ongs gyur/ /'dzam gling nags tshal phun sum tshogs/ /rgyal po'i rgyal thabs spyod par byed//
bdag nyid chen po dzam+b+ha la/ /gnod sbyin gyi ni sngags kyang bsgrubs/ /bdag nyid chen po sa yi bdag /de nas gnod sbyin shing rta grub/ /de la gnod sbyin 'dug pa ni/ /bka'
dang mthun par yid kyang 'jug /klu rnams kyang ni 'dug pa ste/ /bran dang bka' bzhin byed pa'i rgyu/ /de ltar rdzu 'phrul che bdag nyid/ /de tshe stobs kyis 'khor sgyur 'byung / /
ci 'dod de ni 'gro ba na/ /gang du'ang 'gog pa med par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchog sa la/ /gang yang sngon ni rab bzhag pa/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi/ /de tshe
'ong ma'i tshal du'o/ /sku gdung mchog ni blangs nas kyang / /dge ba la dmigs yid can gyis/ /ji ltar sngon ni byas pa bzhin/ /mchod rten de la mchod pa byas/ /sku gdung
bum pa de blangs nas/ /de ni de bzhin rnam bgos nas/ /blo ldan des ni skad cig gis/ /de nas gnod sbyin la yang smras/ /dzam bu'i gling 'di ma lus pa'i/ /mchod rten rgya
gyis brgyan pa dang / /sa rnams sku gdung snying por ni/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rab tu bya/ /'bad pa yis ni mtshan phyed du/ /gnod sbyin gyis ni bka' yang
blangs/ /mi ma yin pa'i bya bas byas/ /sa steng rdo yi srog shing bsgreng / /ka ba stong phrag du ma ni/ /de tshe yongs su btsugs par gyur/ /mchod rten rnams la mchod don du/ /
lus can rnams la mtshon par gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yis/ /mchod rten sna tshogs byas nas ni/ /skad cig gcig gis gnod sbyin rnams/ /rgyal po yi ni
drung du lhags/ /de nas gnod sbyin rab btud nas/ /dben par tshig ni rab tu smras/ /ji skad bka' stsal ma lus byas/ /sa bdag ci ste gzigs mi mdzad/ /de nas myur
dus bdag de/ /de tshe shing rta de la zhon/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod don du/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdzes pa'i phyir/ /gser dang de bzhin dngul dag dang / /rnam pa sna
chogs mchod rten brgyan/ /de nas gnod sbyin shing rta dang / /myur du rgyal po rab tu song / /gang ni rgyal ba'i mchod rten yod/ /skad cig gis ni de yul du'o/ /rnam
pa sna tshogs mchod pa yis/ /rgyal po des ni de la mchod/ /de tshe rgyal ba'i mchod rten gyis/ /sa rnams ma lus mdzes par byas/ /bdag nyid chos rgyal mya ngan
med| |smon lam dag ni 'debs par brtson/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di don gyis/ /bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas shog /de bzhin des kyang rigs nas ni/ /rgyal po chos ni ston par byed/ /
de ni shi nas lha ru 'gro/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /lo ni brgyad cu rtsa bdun du/ /sa steng mchod rten mchod par 'gyur/ /lo ni brgya dang lnga bcur 'tsho/ /gnod pa med
pa'i rgyal thabs byed/ /de rang las las byung ba yi/ /lus la nad ni yongs su 'byung / /nad des gnod cing sdug bsngal nas/ /shi nas mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /lha yi
phun sum tshogs pa che/ /thob nas rjes su myong bar byed/ /de ni yid gzhungs rim gyis su/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i byang chub thob/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag ni/ /sngags kyang
de tshe 'grub par 'gyur/ /dzam+b+ha la sogs gnod sbyin yang / /'di yi bstan pa'i rjes su 'jug /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'phrog ma sogs/ /gnod sbyin mo yang yang dag 'grub/ /
'khor los bsgyur bas bskyed pa yi/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i sngags kyang 'grub/ /gang dag rgyal bas bstan pa'i sngags/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /gtsug tor
la sogs thams cad dang / /gang gzhan rgyal bas gsung pa'ang yin/ /de yi dus ni rab bzang la/ /sgrub pa dam pa dag kyang bya/ /dam pas tha ma bsgrub mi bya/ /dam pa
thob par bya phyir ro/ /di lI pa dang na hu sha /nga las nu dang dug chen mtsho/ /rgyal bas bshad pa'i 'khor los bsgyur/ /sngags ni de dag sgrub par
byed| |bdag nyid chen po na hu sha /de tshe gzi brjid phung po 'grub/ /rgyal po chen po dug chen pa/ /gdugs dkar po yang 'grub pa yin/ /de bzhin rgyal po di lI pa/ /yi ge
gcig pa'i sngags kyang 'grub/ /nga las nu ni 'jig rten dang / /de bzhin gtsug tor dam pa 'grub/ /rgyal mchog d+hu mar ni/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'grub//
de bzhin 'dam gyi rgyal po ni/ /rnam rgyal gtsug tor 'grub pa 'o/ /de bu skye dgu'i bdag po ste/ /de yang sa steng spyan sngags grub/ /skye dgu'i bdag po skye ba ste/ /de
yang mdzod spu'i sngags kyang 'grub/ /lte ba'i bu ni khyu mchog ste/ /de ni las grub brtul zhugs brtan/ /kha ba can gyi ri dag tu/ /de yang nor sbyod gnod sbyin 'grub/ /
khyu mchog bu ni rgyas pa ste/ /de yang de tshe sngags bzlas byed/ /de tshe sa steng der mthar gyis/ /dpa' bo chen po'ang rab tu 'grub/ /'di dag gzhan yang mang ba yis/ /
rgyal po 'jig rten rnam grags pas/ /sngags rnams rab tu bsgrubs nas ni/ /rgyal srid byas nas lha yul 'gro/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /rgyal ba'i dbang
pos gang gsungs pa/ /de kun dus ni bzang po ste/ /lo ni stong phrag brgyad cu ba/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi don mkhas pas/ /grub pa dag ni sgrub par 'gyur/ /'di dag gzhan
yang rab mang ba'i/ /sa bdag 'jig rten rnams grags pa/ /de nas stong phrag brgyad cu'i sngags/ /de bzhin yang dag bsgrubs nas ni/ /rgyal srid byas nas mtho ris
'gro/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de tshe bar ma'i dus dag tu/ /lha mo rdzu 'phrul chen mo dang / /lha rnams kyi ni sngags dang ni/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi sngags dang
ni| |blon po mi yi gtso bo dang / /sa bdag sa kun bdag po 'o/ /bA ra Na sI'i grong khyer du/ /rgyal po tshangs pas byin pa yang / /'jig rten 'jig rten dbang phyug grags//
phyag na pad+ma rab tu 'grub/ /bdag nyid chen po brtson 'grus che/ /lhag par snying rje chen po de/ /sems can rnams la sngags tshul gyis/ /chos rnams ston pa byin pa
yin| |rgyal po yang ni tshangs byin gyis/ /mi yi bde ba rjes myong nas/ /de nas de ni sngags grub ste/ /lus dang bcas pas mtho ris song / /de yi bu yang blo ldan ni/ /bsod
nams las ni brtul zhugs brtan/ /brtson 'grus chen po rta mgrin zhes/ /rnam par grags pa de yang 'grub/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /de tshe brgya byin las rgyal
'gyur/ /de bu dkar po zhes bya ba'i/ /rgyal po thams cad gtong pa 'byung / /de yang nor ni sbyin pa'i sngags/ /dkar mo che zhes bya ba yi/ /sngags ni
rab tu bsgrubs pas ni/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /bde ba can du yang dag 'gro/ /nges par byang chub 'dis nges 'thob/ /de bzhin
gzhan yang ngas lung bstan/ /de tshe bar ma'i dus dag tu/ /bar ma'i sngags ni rab tu 'grub/ /dka' ba tha ma'i dus dag tu/ /nga ni sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i
rigs dag gi /sngags kyang rab tu 'grub par gyur/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags dag ni/ /gang zhig sa steng sngon bstan pa/ /sngags ni longs spyod rgyu nyid du/ /de yang
rab tu grub par 'gro/ /'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /phal pa dag gi sngags dag ni/ /mi sdug gzugs can rnyog par ldan/ /bar snang dang ni nam mkhar sbyod//
sa blar gnas pa'i gnod sbyin mo/ /de bzhin sna tshogs sha za mo/ /mi 'am ci dang mkha' lding dang / /yi dwags srin pos bshad pa rnams/ /sha za lto 'phye gnod sbyin
dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po klu rnams kyis/ /dus ngan de tshe tha ma la/ /sngags ni rab tu grub par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs kyi sngags dang ni/ /gzhon nu ma yi gzugs
kun yang / /dus ni 'jigs rung de yi tshe/ /de yang grub pa rab tu 'gro/ /de bzhin sngags ni rnams gsum/ /sgrub ba'ang rnam pa gsum yin no/ /rnam gsum nyid kyis dus su
ni| |rnam gsum sgrub par 'dod pa yin/ /rgya che'i gtam dang ldan pa dag /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /gtso bo mya ngan med ba yi/ /de 'og rgyal po byung ba ni/ /mya ngan
bral zhes rnam par grags/ /'jig rten chos kyis spyod par ldan/ /lha mo gos dkar mo yi ni/ /de yi sngags 'di yongs su 'grub/ /mya ngan rnam bral gyis bsgrubs nas/ /lha
yi gnas su rab tu song / /yun ring bde ba mtho ris su/ /rgyal po chen po rjes su myong / /phyir yang mi yul phyin nas ni/ /blo ldan chos kyi ngang tshul ldan/ /rgyal thabs rnam pa sna
tshogs ldan/ /'od chen pos ni rjes su myong / /lo ni bdun cu rtsa drug tu/ /dpal ldan mchod rten mchod pa byed/ /de nas de ni nad btab nas/ /lus zhig nas ni lha ru 'gro/ /
de yi 'og tu rgyal po ni/ /dpa' bo'i sde zhes rab tu brjod/ /chos la spyod cing rnam par grags/ /bstan pa 'di la mnyam par gzhag /lha mo mchod rten dpal chen ma/ /
de yi sngags kyang rab tu bsgrubs/ /des kyang ston pa'i khang chen ni/ /de yi tshe na byas par 'gyur/ /sa rnams rgya mtsho'i mthar thug par/ /ma lus mchod rten rnams kyis
brgyan/ /de la rnam smin las kyis ni/ /lus las skyes pa'i nad kyang 'byung / /zla phyed gcig tu sdug bsngal nas/ /de ni shi 'phos lus zhig 'gyur/ /lo
ni bdun cu dag tu yang / /mi yi nang du rgyal thabs byas/ /shi 'phos de ni mtho ris 'gro/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de yi 'og tu rgyal po ni/ /dga' bo zhes bya
'byung par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan grong khyer me tog ces/ /sde chen stobs ni che bar gnas/ /sha za pi lu zhes bya ba'i/ /sngags kyang des ni bsgrubs pa yin/ /de yi sngags
kyi mthu yis ni/ /longs spyod chen po yod par 'gyur/ /rgya yi gtso bo zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nor thob pas blon por 'gyur/ /'jig rten
rgyal po nyid du'ang 'gyur/ /de yi dus su 'byung ba ni/ /bram ze tshad ma shes pa 'o/ /log pa'i nga rgyal dag la zhen/ /ma ga d+hA yi grong khyer gnas/ /log pa'i nga rgyal gyis
dregs rnams/ /'byung ba nyid du the tshom med/ /de dag gis ni rgyal po bskor/ /de dag la ni des nor byin/ /nor ni mang po de dag gis/ /dge ba'i bshes la rab mchod
nas/ /de yi nor ni zad par byed/ /ma 'dres de la goms pa dang / /sbyin la zhum med rgyu yis ni/ /blo ldan de yis lha khang ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi byed du bcug /grong khyer me
tog ces bya bar/ /bdag nyid chen po blon po'i mchog /bram ze bzang po snying rjer ldan/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po dang ni rab mdza' ba'i/ /chos kyi bdag nyid 'byung
bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin ma ni dpa' mo ldan/ /sa steng de yi sngags kyang 'grub/ /des kyang sa steng dag tu ni/ /mchod rten bzang po byed du bcug /gnod sbyin ma yi mthu yis ni/ /
shes rab rab tu che bar 'gyur/ /de yi bag chags las kyis ni/ /sngon gyi bag chags yongs bskul nas/ /blo dang ldan pas mthar gyis ni/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i byang chub
'thob/ /mchog sred ces ni rnam grags pa'i/ /de tshe 'dod chags shas che 'byung / /bud med byas pa'i skyon gyis ni/ /bram ze'i khye'us 'chi ba 'thob/ /dpal ldan rgyal po dga'
bo yang / /snga ma'i las kyi nyes pa yis/ /me tog ces bya'i grong khyer gyi/ /mi rnams chad pas gnod par byed/ /blon po'i tshogs kyang ma dad 'gyur/ /stobs chen bden par
smra ba yang / /sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yis/ /nang chen dag gis thebs 'gyur te/ /rims nad chen pos sdug bsngal gdungs/ /nam phyed tsam na shi bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po
de yi tshe tshad ni/ /de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa drug go /de ni nyan thos byang chub tu/ /rgyal po nges par 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi grogs po gzhan gyur pa/ /bram ze'i khye'u pA Ni ni/ /
nges par nyan thos byang chub tu/ /nga yis lung bstan byas pa yin/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bdag nyid che/ /de yang de yi sngags grub pa'o/ /bram ze
shes rab 'dod pas kyang / /khro bo ha la ha la bsgrubs/ /rgyal po de las gzhan pa yang / /zla ba spas zhes bya bar 'byung / /gnod sbyin chu dbang grub pa ste/ /rgyal srid gnod
pa med par byed/ /longs spyod che zhing bden par smra/ /chos kyi bdag nyid sa yi bdag /mi dge'i bshes gnyen rab brten nas/ /srog chags mang po gsod par byed/ /las
kyi rnam smin de yis ni/ /'brum bu'i nad byung rab tu brgyal/ /de yi mtshan phyed sad nas ni/ /rgyal srid la ni bu bzhag pa/ /snying po thig le zhes bya ba/ /blon po la sdang byis pa
de| |de nas zla ba spas pa de/ /shi 'phros sa steng dus las 'das/ /mi yi 'gro ba spangs pa yi/ /de tshe yi dwags 'jig rten song / /'gro ba las grol sngags goms pas//
de nas lha yi gnas su song / /dge ba'i sems kyis dmigs nas ni/ /sngags kyi rgyus ni yang dag bskyed/ /rgyal po des ni mthar gyis kyang / /nyan thos kyi ni byang chub
'gro/ /snying po thig le rgyal po yis/ /byis pa mi gsal blo yis ni/ /bye ma las byas srid gzhan du/ /sngon ni mchod rten dag kyang byas/ /de yi rnam smin mthu yis ni//
ma smad lha yi gnas su song / /skye ba stong phrag lnga brgyar ni/ /lha yi nang du bde ba myong / /mtho ris 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /mi yi nang du rab skyes pa/ /blo ldan zla ba sbas pa yi/ /
rgyal po dga' ba'i rigs su skyes/ /byis pa nyid nas rgyal por 'gyur/ /yun mi thung ba bde ba myong / /'jigs med brtan dang yang dag rig /spyi brtson pa dang snyan par smra/ /de
nyid rang dbang rgyal srid ni/ /lo ni bdun cur yongs su byas/ /skra can zhes bya'i sngags dag kyang / /rgyal po de la rab tu grub/ /khyod nyid kyi ni sngags nyid kyang / /de tshe grub par
byed par 'gyur/ /khyod nyid kyis bshad sngags dag kyang / /de yi tshe na 'grub par 'gyur/ /byis pa'i tshul can sna tshogs gzugs/ /byis pa rnams la mthu dang ldan/ /sngags kyi
gzugs kyis lus can la/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /gang zhig khyod kyis bstan pa'i sngags/ /de tshe de yi dus dag tu/ /
brjod pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /blo ldan snying po thig le yi/ /rgyal po de yi blon po ni/ /tsa nag kya zhes rnam grags pa/ /bram ze'i khye'us khro bo 'grub/ /gshin rje gshed
ces bya ba ni/ /blo ngan des ni de yang 'grub/ /des ni khro bas zil non nas/ /srog chags dag gi 'tsho ba bcad/ /de tshe rgyal po gsum gyi bar/ /shin tu mi bzad sdig
pa byas/ /der ni dus ring 'tsho ba yi/ /bram ze ngan pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /lus des lha min brten par byed/ /lha min lus
la zhugs nas ni/ /de nas dus ring 'tsho bar byed/ /de nas lus de zhig nas kyang / /mnar med dmyal bar yang dag 'gro/ /de nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de/ /blo
ngan des ni rjes su myong / /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa/ /mi 'dod de tshe las las byung / /las gcig sdug bsngal de zad nas/ /khro bo'i sngags
kyis rab bskul te/ /dmyal ba las ni de 'chi 'phos/ /dud 'gro dag tu nye bar skyes/ /klu yi skye gnas brten nas ni/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can dag tu 'gyur//
khro ldan chen po klu yi rgyal/ /gdengs can dug gis dregs byed dang / /mi bzad las ni rab byed pas/ /ma rungs las las de 'chi 'phros/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po
yi dwags kyi/ /gshin rje'i rgyal por rab tu 'gyur/ /de ltar sdug bsngal stong phrag ni/ /yang dang yang du rjes su myong / /blo ngan de ni mthar gyis su/ /bram ze'i
khye'ur sa steng 'ongs/ /mi yi skye bar 'ongs nas ni/ /'jigs pa yi ni gzugs can 'gyur/ /khro ba dang ni dbul ba nyid/ /grags pa chung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /gang
yang 'jig rten rang sangs rgyas/ /'dod med bse ru lta bur spyod/ /dman pa la ni rjes brtse ba/ /sa yi steng na rnam par rgyu/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ /bsod
snyoms spyod la rab tu zhugs/ /de tshe gzhan sems rig pa des/ /blo ngan de ni rab tu mthong / /snying rjes yin gyi gzhan min des/ /de yi thad du byon par 'gyur/ /
de ni zan don gsol ched du/ /bse ru lta bu la ni khyer/ /des ni sngags la rab brnyas nas/ /de tshe rgyu ni yang dag bstan/ /de las gcig gi bdag nyid la/ /bsod
snyoms de ni yang dag bstabs/ /kye 'di rab byung ma lus pa/ /ji ltar bde ba bzhin du gsol/ /de la snying brtse rang sangs rgyas/ /de tshe rdzu 'phrul bstan par 'gyur//
de yi mthu yis yid bskyod nas/ /de nas ngo mtshar rab skyes te/ /sangs rgyas bse ru lta bu la/ /sbyi bos kun la rab tu btud/ /ji ltar 'dod par nyes bral rnams/ /
dge ba'i rtsa ba de yi mthus/ /rang rgyal byang chub smon lam btab/ /bdag nyid chen po ci 'dra ba/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po zhi ba'i gzugs/ /sdug bsngal blo ngan mi 'gyur
bar| |de 'dra bdag ni 'jig rten shog /las kyi lhag ma zad pa dang / /'chi 'phos de tshe mtho ris song / /chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/ /nyan thos de ni byang
chub thob/ /de bas sngags kyis sgrub pa ni/ /mngon spyod dag ni yong mi bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /mngon spyod rab tu
bkag pa yin/ /snying rje mchog ldan sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ches/ /sngags rnams mthu bstan don du ni/ /las rnams thams cad bstan
pa yin/ /de bzhin nor bu lta bu'i sngags/ /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /khro dang chags pas zil mnan pa'i/ /byis pa rmongs pa'i sems
dag gis/ /de dag sngags ni mngon spyod la/ /phan tshun rab tu sbyor bar byed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /blo dang ldan pas de bzhin bkag /rnam
pa thams cad sngags rnams ni/ /sems can longs spyod 'phel ba dang / /de nas rgyal po dam pa dang / /srung ba tshe dang dbang phyir dang / /skye gnas sna tshogs
la gnas pa'i/ /sems can rnams ni dgug don du/ /sngags kyang bsgrub par bya ba ste/ /'tsho ba dgag phyir ma yin no/ /dge slong mang du thos pa ni/ /de
yi tshe na 'byung 'gyur ba/ /ma khol zhes kyang bya ba ste/ /nga nyid kyi ni bstod byed pa/ /ji bzhin yon tan bzang po ni/ /ji ltar bzhin du brjod par 'gyur/ /kun
nas sems ni rab dang zhing / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /sgrub dka'i sngags ni rab bsgrub cing / /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin no/ /yon tan
ldan zhing tshul khrims ldan/ /mang du thos shing chos kyang smra/ /dud 'gror sngon ni gyur pa na/ /nga yi bstod pa yongs mra/ /nyams dag 'grong khyer rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshul
'od ma'i tshal gyi sa steng du/ /slob ma'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu/ /ji ltar bde bar bzhugs pa na/ /der ni bya rog gcig yod pas/ /nga la sems ni rab dad byas/ /
sems ni nga la dad byas pas/ /lus zhig nas ni mtho ris song / /lha rnams las ni shi 'phos nas/ /mi rnams nang du nye bar skyes/ /mi yi nang du skyes nas kyang / /nga
yi bstan la rab tu 'byung / /rab byung bdag nyid chen po de/ /ji bzhin de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ma khol zhes bya'i brtul zhugs can/ /de ni de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur//
ji bzhin don ni bstod pas mchod/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dpe dag gis/ /'byung po kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /legs par spyod pa rab byed pa'o/ /sems can rjes
su gzung ba'i phyir/ /bstod pa brjod pa de gtsor byed/ /dus mtha' 'jig rten smad pa la/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rnam par smin pa de yis ni/ /lus
zhig nas ni bde 'gror 'gro/ /blo ldan de ni mthar gyis kyang / /rnam pa sna tshogs de myong nas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mchog gsungs
pa'i| |thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub 'thob/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nga 'das nas/ /lo ni bzhi brgya lon pa na/ /dge slong klu zhes de 'bod 'byung / /bstan
pa la ni dad cing phan/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob pa/ /lo ni drug brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /rig pa rma bya chen mo ni/ /bdag nyid chen po des kyang grub/ /bstan
bcos sna tshogs don dang ni/ /dngos po med ba'i don de rig /gang tshe lus de bor ba na/ /bde ba can du'ang skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni mthar gyis sangs rgyas
nyid| |nges pa kho nar yang dag 'thob/ /thogs med ces bya'i dge slong ni/ /bstan bcos de nyid don la mkhas/ /mdo sde nges don drang ba'i don/ /rnam
pa mang po'ang rab tu 'byed/ /'jig rten rig pa ston bdag nyid/ /gzhung byed ngang tshul can du 'gyur/ /de yi rig pa grub pa 'di/ /sA la'i pho nya mo zhes
brjod/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /blo ni bzang po skye bar 'gyur/ /bstan pa yun ring gnas bya'i phyir/ /mdo yi de nyid don sdud byed/ /lo ni brgya
dang lnga bcur 'tsho/ /de lus zhig nas lha yul 'gro/ /'khor ba rnams su 'khor ba na/ /yun ring bde ba rjes myong nas/ /bdag nyid chen po mthar gyis de/ /
byang chub thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /de ltar rnam pa mang po yi/ /nga yi bstan la dge slong rnams/ /shes rab ldan nyid chos kyang sbyod/ /dus kyi mtha' la de tshe 'byung / /
phyi ma de tshe dus dag tu/ /dge slong dgra bcom zhes bya ba/ /de ni sngags don bdag nyid ldan/ /rgyud shes de bzhin mang du thos/ /gnod sbyin sngags ni rab brjod pas//
de la bum pa bzang po grub/ /sngon ni ngas ni gang bshad pa'i/ /theg pa chen po'i mdo sde yang / /de yi tshe na bum pa las/ /dka' thub chen po 'dren par byed/ /
glegs bam de la nges bltas nas/ /de la sngags ni zlos pa na/ /gnod sbyin bsgrub pa'i bum pa la/ /der ni bsrung ba ma byas pa'i/ /bag med dran pa nyams pa
yis| |gtsug spyod kyis ni bum pa 'phrogs/ /de nas de yi sngags grub pa'i/ /dge slong sngags ni zlos byed pas/ /bum pa dag ni bltas pa na/ /der ni mngon par
mthong ma gyur/ /de nas khro bo mig dmar zhing / /rnam g.yo tshig tu smra ba ni/ /tshangs pa dka' ba'i mthar gyur par/ /brgya byin sogs bcas dbang phyugs che/ /sngags kyis ma bkug ma 'ongs
na/ /sngags pa bdag min sngags rgyal min/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas sras sngags dang / /rgyal ba mchog gis sngags dag ni/ /tshar gcod
don du gang gsungs pa'am/ /gdul dka' 'dul bar byed ba'ang / /gal te kun rnams ma bkug na/ /sa steng ma lus de dag med/ /de nas sngags pa chen po
langs/ /brtul zhugs brtan cing las rnams grub/ /ji ltar sngags ni byas pa yi/ /sbyor ba mthong bas rgyud dag kyang / /rkun ma dgug pa de don gtsor/ /sbyor
ba rab tu byas par 'gyur/ /skad cig dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /sdom brtson de ni las myur byed/ /yi ge hUM gi sngags gcig gis/ /tshangs sogs sa steng 'dren
par byed/ /lha rnams ma lus rab bkug pa/ /tshangs sogs brgya byin dang yang bcas/ /ha ha zhes bya'i sgra 'don cing / /nyam thag 'jigs pa'i sgra yang
sgrogs/ /ci bgyi zhes bya'i blo byed cing / /bdag cag 'dir ni nyes med smra/ /myur zhing rab tu rings par yang / /blo ldan dge slong 'jigs med pas/ /lha rnams
la ni rab smras pa/ /'dir ni bum pa slar byin zhes/ /lha rnams phan tshun thams cad la/ /dge slong des ni rab tu smras/ /gang gis bum pa bzang po khyer//
khyod kyis myur du rab tu smros/ /lha rnams kun gyis bltas pa na/ /kun tu yang ni ma mthong gyur/ /bum pa 'di ni su yis khyer/ /lha yi dbang po yang dag dgengs//
byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po/ /dpal ldan lag na rdo rje can/ /de yi bu ni mi bzad yod/ /khro ba che zhing shin tu gdug /bgegs kyi gzugs kyis sngags pa
la| |'gro ba kun la rnam par rgyu/ /bum pa de ni des khyer mthong / /lha yi bdag pos de yang smras/ /rdo rje rigs kyi bgegs yod pa/ /sa steng rtse zhing rol par
byed/ /'dis ni bdag la ma mchod pas/ /des ni bum pa de 'dir khyer/ /lha yi bdag pos de smras nas/ /phyir yang lha yi gnas su song / /de tshe rang nyid
sngags kyis ni/ /lha rnams ma lus slar gshegs gsol/ /skad cig yud tsam nyid kyis ni/ /shin tu legs par yang dag bkug /de tshe dbang med bum
par bcas/ /bgegs de nyid dang bcas par 'ongs/ /de nas de ni bgegs de yis/ /yi dwags rnams la bum pa byin/ /de nas de yi bgegs des ni/ /tshig
'di dag ni rab tu smras/ /yi dwags 'jig rten bum pa khyer/ /nga ni de la dga' ba med/ /sngags ba des ni dka' ba dang / /dka' bas btud de bgegs la smras/ /song
zhig song zhig bgegs chen po/ /phyin chad 'di ltar ma byed cig /de nas des ni yi dwags dag /de yi mod la bkug par 'gyur/ /ltogs
shing ngal ba'i sems dang ni/ /dman zhing de dag khab tsam kha/ /shin tu mi bzad chen po de/ /nyam thag skad kyang rab tu 'don/ /snying rje'i tshig tu smra ba ni/ /bdag
nyid chen po yongs su skyobs/ /khyod kyi bum pa 'dir 'ongs kyi/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin bdag la byos/ /sngags pa snying rje cher ldan pas/ /yang dag 'dar ba
rab tu skyes/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /tshig ni 'di dag rab tu smras/ /khyod kyi 'jig rten sdug bsngal ci/ /yun mi ring bar rab tu smon/ /dman pa'i
yid kyis de smras pa/ /bkres pas yang dag gdungs par 'gyur/ /yi dwags 'jig rten skom pa yis/ /bdag nyid chen po yin yang rung / /dge slong snying
rje chen pos ni/ /de dag la ni bum pa byin/ /de nas de dag yid dga' nas/ /myur bar rang gi gnas su song / /de dag bsams pa tsam gyis ni/ /bum pa
las ni bza' btung byung / /dge slong dga' bo'i 'og tu ni/ /tsan+dan skyong ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de tshe dus kyis tha ma la/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /bdag
nyid chen pos byang chub ni/ /bgegs med myur du rnyed dka' thob/ /rgyal po btsun pa zhes bya ba/ /nga yi bstan pa nub byed pa/ /dus kyi tha ma de yi che/ /the tshom med
par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shar phyogs nas ni brtsams nas su/ /kha che'i yul gyi bar dag tu/ /rmongs pas lha khang mchod rten rnams/ /de tshe de bzhin 'jig par
'gyur/ /dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa rnams/ /blo ngan des ni gsod par byed/ /byang gi phyogs su brten nas ni/ /de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mi ma yin pa nyid
'khrugs nas/ /yul 'khor phyugs dang gnyen rnams dang / /ri yi dum bus bcom par 'gyur/ /blo ngan de ni sa 'og 'gro /de ni 'og nas 'og tu 'gro /dmyal
nas dmyal bar ba drag par/ /sdug bsngal sdug bsngal drag por ni/ /mi bzad par ni yang dag ltung / /mnar med zhes ni bya ba yi/ /sdig pa'i las kyis dmyal
ba ni/ /de ni bskal ba cher 'tshed pa/ /bdag nyid ngan pa go mi shes/ /mi dge'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ /sdig pa shin tu mi bad byas/ /de ni nga yi bstan
pa la/ /rnam pa kun gyis 'bad nas ni/ /sems ni ma lus rab btang nas/ /phun sum tshogs dang de nas spyod/ /nges par sangs rgyas nyid lam ni/ /yan las
brgyad kyi theg pas ni/ /de tshe de ni rab 'gro zhing / /mya ngan nad med dam ba thob/ /de yi 'og tu sa srung ba/ /sangs rgyas phyogs zhes rnam par grags//
phyogs che gtong ba che ba dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /thams cad mngon dga' rgyal po
ste| |ston pa'i bstan pa de gtsor byed/ /kun dga' ra ba mchod rten gnas/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan bla na med/ /mtshe 'u rdzing dang khron pa dang / /mtsho rnams
dag ni du ma dag /rgyal po chen pos byas nas ni/ /tshe zad lha yi gnas su song / /des kyang sa steng grub pa ni/ /pad+ma 'chang ba brtson 'grus che/ /bdag nyid chen
po sems dpa' la/ /sa yi bdag por don du gnyer/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /de yi las kyi lhag ma yis/ /myur du byang
chub thob par 'gyur/ /de yi bu ni rgyal po yang / /sde chen stobs ni che ba yi/ /zab mo'i phyogs zhes rnam par grags/ /grong khyer sa ni lnga len byung / /rig pa'i bdag
nyid rgyal po de'ang / /de yi tshen 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang dang / /mchod rten rdzing dang khron pa ni/ /'od chen sa yi bdag po de/ /du ma
byed par the tshom med/ /blo dang ldan pa 'jam dbyangs kyi/ /sngags kyang des ni rab bsgrubs pa/ /de dag yi ge drug ces bya/ /don chen longs spyod 'phel byed pa'o/ /de yi
sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /de ni longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ /blo dang ldan pa mthar gyis ni/ /myur du byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan 'di la/ /rnam
pa sna tshogs bya ba byed/ /byang gi phyogs la brten nas ni/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lha ldan yul zhes bya ba yi/ /gangs can ri yi nang gnas pa'i/ /rgyal po mi
yi lha zhes pa/ /li tsA bI rnams rigs su byung / /de yang sngags kyi don bsgrubs te/ /longs spyod che dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rig pa longs spyod ldan zhes bya/ /mi yi bdag
pos de yang grub/ /lo ni brgyad cur rgyal srid byas/ /des ni rkun ma rnam par spangs/ /rgyal po des ni srog spangs nas/ /der yang sngags ni myur 'grub ste/ /zhi dang rgyas pa
bsil byed pa'o/ /'jig rten sgrol ma zhes grags dang / /lha mo gos dkar ma dang ni/ /dkar mo chen mo gzhan phan brtson/ /rtag tu yid ni mi skyo ba'o/ /de la sogs pa
gsungs pa yi/ /de bzhin rgyal po mang po ni/ /rnam pa du ma mang po dag /kha dog sna tshogs sna tshogs gzugs/ /kha ba can gnas kla klo'i rgyal/ /de yang ston pa mchod
byed pa'o/ /khyu mchog khyu mchog bzang po dang / /sa 'od de bzhin sa 'od bzang / /de bzhin pha rol gnon nyid dang / /rkang pa'i 'gros zhes bstan
pa yin/ /sa srung dang ni be 'u dang / /'od ldan nyid ni phyi ma yin/ /tha mar char rgyal ngang tshul te/ /kla klo rnam pa sna tshogs yin/ /de 'og lugs ni rnam zhig cing / /phyi rol
skye dgus nye bar spyod/ /de tshe bal yul bdag po ni/ /mtshon gyis 'thab pas rnam par 'jig /kla klo'i rkun po bsten pa yi/ /der ni rgyal po rnam par 'jig /sa
bdag du ma gsungs pa rnams/ /sna tshogs lha dang bram ze dag /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgya yul kun la brten pa yi/ /rgyal po dbyig gi snying zhes bya/ /sde chen
stobs kyang che ba dang / /blon po rgya che nyid dang ni/ /skye bo rtsa lag rab tu mang / /kla klo btud dang rnam par rgyal/ /ston pa'i bstan pa de gtso byed/ /gzhon nu bdag nyid
chen po nyid/ /de yi sngags ni rab bsgrubs pas/ /mthu ni chen po dang ldan pa'i/ /rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge brgyad/ /dpa' bo che zhes rnam par grags/ /phun sum
tshogs pa'i gnas chen yin/ /de yi byis pa'i blo yis ni/ /rgyal srid phyir ni rab smon byas/ /gang gis dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid du nges 'gyur ba/ /
mi bdag rgyal thabs nyid kyi phyir/ /de ni skal ba mi nyung 'gyur/ /mchog gi sbyin pa bla na med/ /bsams pa tsam gyis thob pa nyid/ /tshangs sogs lha rnams thams
cad la/ /ma lus lung ni stsol byed na/ /lha ngan phal pa dag dang ni/ /mi yi 'jig rten smos ci dgos/ /lo ni brgya dang lnga bcur 'tsho/ /grags chen lha yi gnas su
'gro/ /chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/ /byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /gzhon nus yongs su bshad pa yi/ /rig pa 'di ni li yul du/ /de ni myur du 'grub 'gyur
gyi| |rig pa gzhan ni nam yang min/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo che/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'od chen po/ /mngon sum de yi yul dag na/ /byis pa'i gzugs
kyis bzhugs pa yin/ /grub pa'i zhing mchog dam pa la/ /mi ni yongs su sgrub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po tu ruSh+ka zhes bya/ /byang phyogs la ni yang dag brten/ /sde chen brtson
'grus che ba te/ /de yi gnas su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shing shun gyon yul ma gtogs pa/ /kha che'i mthar thug ka shir bcas/ /de ni dpag tshad bdun brgya dang / /'bum
phrag gnyis kyis bdag tu/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /de tshe the tshom med par 'gyur/ /de yang sngags ni grub pas na/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /blo ldan mi yi spyan
gyur pas/ /skra can ma yi rig pa bsgrubs/ /bdag nyid dge bar bya ba'i phyir/ /lha khang dag ni mang po byas/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig gi
mchod rten mchog ni de bzhin byas/ /theg pa chen po mchog chos dang / /de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ /'jig rten shes rab pha rol phyin/ /de yi yul
du rab gnas byas/ /rgyal po de ni lus zhig nas/ /mtho ris 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sa bdag de ni mthar gyis su/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med 'thob/ /
de 'og sa bdag rgyal po ni/ /chen po tu ruSh+ka zhes bya/ /blo ldan mang pos bkur zhes bya/ /rtag tu dge zhing mchod la dga' / /lha mo sgrol ma rdzu 'phrul che/ /de yi
sngags kyang rab tu bsgrubs/ /des kyang sngags ni rab bsgrubs pa/ /sa steng rgyal po'i ched du'o/ /phyogs che dpung ni chen po dang / /rgyal po grags pa chen po
ste| |gnyen dang rigs dang rgyal pos kyang / /de ni bkur ba nyid du 'gyur/ /rtsa brgyad stong gi gtsug lag khang / /de yi dus su yod par 'gyur/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu
yis ni/ /lo ni nyis brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /gang tshe de lus zhig pa na/ /dga' ldan du ni skye bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /lha yi bus kyang bkur bar
'gyur/ /chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/ /byang chub yan lag mngon rdzogs nas/ /'bad pas de ni mthar gyis kyang / /mnyam med byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /dus
kun de yi yul du ni/ /gsung rab mang po gnas 'gyur ba/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba dag gis gsungs/ /da ltar ngas kyang gsungs pa yin/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po klu dang ni/ /'dod
chags bral bas rnam par gnas/ /de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang / /gnod sbyin bstan pa srung byed dang / /sa steng dam chos srung byed pa/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur//
de ltar rnam pa mang po bstan/ /sa bdag 'jig rten rnam grags pa/ /bstan dang ston par 'gyur ba yin/ /nub phyogs sa yul ni mtha' yas pa/ /'phags rgyal zhes bya'i
pha rol tu/ /la da'i yul gyi skye bo ni/ /ngang tshul zhes bya'i rgyal po yod/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /grong khyer phyin nas yang dag zhugs/ /chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur
ba ste/ /'jig rten sna tshogs gtsug lag khang / /de bzhin srog chags dge bar ni/ /sa bdag chos la mnyes gshin pas/ /rig pa'i bdag nyid byed par 'gyur/ /rgyal
pa'i gzugs brnyan yid 'ong la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod pa byed/ /'jig rten mgon po grags chen gyi/ /mchod rten mchog la'ang mchod pa byed/ /des na de ni
sngags kyang grub/ /rgyal po las skyes kho na ni/ /de yul du yang yang dag grags/ /dge slong bsod snyoms byed pa ni/ /tshul khrims ldan
zhing blo dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /bdag nyid chen po dus su rgyu/ /de ni bsod snyoms rab zhugs rgyu/ /rgyal po'i khab bzang rab mthong ba/ /rgya
che skye bos gang ba la/ /bslang pa'i don du der yang zhugs/ /bkres pa dang yang yang dag ldan/ /ngal zhing ltogs pa'i yid gyur kyang / /de tshe bsod snyoms rnyed ma
gyur/ /rgyal po'i skyes bus de myur bzung / /khyim de las ni phyung par 'gyur/ /de nas de ni yid byung nas/ /rgyal po'i mi la rab khros te/ /grong khyer de las nges
byung nas/ /mod la de yi rang gnas phyin/ /ltogs shing skom pa nyid gyur pas/ /sdug bsngal yid mi bde bar 'gyur/ /de nas de ni zas chad nas/ /mtshan phyed
du ni langs gyur nas/ /sdom brtson de ni sems chung bas/ /de tshe srog ni btang bar rtsom/ /de tshe smon lam byed pa ni/ /la da'i yul gyi bdag por shog /de nas
dge slong dus las 'das/ /spu gri zhes bya'i rgyal rigs su/ /bdag nyid chen po de skyes gyur/ /ston pa'i bstan pa mchod par byed/ /lo ni sum cu dag tu
yang / /rgyal srid gnod pa med par byas/ /brkam chags rang mi'i sbyor ba yis/ /ma zhu'i nad kyis btab par 'gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po lus zhig nas/ /dus byas
lha yi gnas song ba/ /byams pa gang du bzhugs pa yi/ /dga' ldan lha yi gnas mchog tu/ /bdag nyid chen pos chos 'chad par/ /de nyid du ni skye bar 'gyur
'od chen byams pa chen po la/ /bsnyen bkur byed cing chos kyang nyan/ /bdag nyid chen po de mthar gyis/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i byang chub 'thob/ /tshul khrims
zhes bya'i rgyal po'i 'og /g.yo ba zhes bya 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lo ni lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang / /de bzhin zla ba lnga ru 'tsho/ /de srid rgyal srid des byas nas/ /mtshon chas
'tsho bas rab bsad pa/ /bud med byas pa'i skyon nyid kyis/ /de ni mtshon chas bsad par gyur/ /de yi nu bo brtan zhes bya/ /brtan pa ches ni brtan par 'gyur/ /sngon
ni bkren pa zham 'bring 'gyur/ /yul ni la da'i bdag por gyur/ /lhag ma rgyal po thams cad dang / /skye dgu kun kyang zham 'bring ba'o/ /tshul khrims zhes bya rab 'das
nas/ /de ni de dag kun gyi sngar/ /sa bdag thams cad 'byung 'gyur ba/ /dpa' bo rgya mtsho'i pha rol 'gro/ /rgyal po dbang bo zla mdzes dang / /de bzhin du ni gzhu dang tog /
me tog gzhu dang rgyal po'i bu/ /res ldan grong las byung ba yin/ /dang po'i dang po snga ma dag /ba la'i grong du 'byung ba yin/ /'od ces bya ba
stod rnams dang / /de bzhin khyab 'jug ces bya ba/ /rgyal po mtha' yas gsungs pa ni/ /yang ba yi rigs su 'byung / /de dag phyi ma'i rgyal po ni/ /khyab 'jug
ces ni bya ba byung / /grong dang skye bo gnyen dang bcas/ /drang srong dmod bas gnod gyur pas/ /blo ldan rgyal po med par 'gyur/ /grong khyer chu yis rab tu gang / /
de tshe de yi res ldan grong / /rgya mtsho chen pos rab tu gang / /byang gi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /rtsom pa sna tshogs ri zhol brtan/ /sna tshogs rigs la gnas pa
yi| |rgyal po rnams ni mtha' yas gsungs/ /nyi shu gcig dang sum cu yi/ /mi yi rgyal por shes par bya/ /bco brgyad sa yi bdag po zhes/ /par ma'i sa
