kun bdag po yin/ /mtha' yas klu yi sde la sogs/ /de las tham rnam par zhig /de nas khyab 'jug 'phrog byed dang / /mdung zhes bya ba 'phrog byed gzhan/ /dbang
ldan dang ni phreng kun dang / /bza' dang brtul zhugs bzang po gzhan/ /dus kun chos lugs rnam par nyams/ /rgyal po de dag dus las 'das/ /des ni bram
ze rigs byung pa/ /de tshe longs spyod tshe nor dang / /bar mthar yi ge dang po b+ha/ /de tshe blon po gnyi ga gtso/ /gnyi ga nor ldan dpal ldan grags/ /bstan pa la ni phan par
dga'/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rgyal po/ /blon pos de tshe sngags kyang bzlas/ /de nas bzung nas sa yi bdag gnyi ga mi yi dbang phyug gyur/ /bdun dang brgyad
dang de bzhin gsum/ /de tshe dpal mgrin gnas na 'dug /ston pa nyi ma zhes bya ba'i/ /gnas na dbang phyug rab tu gnas/ /thams cad gnas su sa yi bdag /
'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /yi ge ha zhes rab gsungs pa/ /sa rnams kun la mi yi bdag /de yi yul du sngags 'di dag /de tshe grub par 'gro ba yin/ /
zhi dang rgyas pa'i rig pa rnams/ /gang zhig chos rgyal gyis gsungs pa/ /longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs tshogs/ /de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs ldan/ /sna tshogs
gzugs kyi gzungs dang ni/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po gnod sbyin mo/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /der ni grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /lho yi phyogs la yang dag brten/ /rgya
mtsho'i 'gram gyis dag la/ /rgyal po dkar dang zla mdzes dang / /sa la yi ni bzhon pa dang / /dbang chen dang ni bde byed dang / /sa bdag de bzhin yid du 'ong / /longs spyod
skra bzang skra zhes su/ /lho yi phyogs su rnam par grags/ /bkra shis dang ni rnyed sla dang / /ba lang rnyed dang khyu nyid dang / /gru bzang de bzhin gru nyid
dang / /dbang chen dang ni zla ba nyid/ /ba lang srung dbang zla ba'i sde/ /'dod lha de bzhin ma ga d+ha/ /grangs byed bde byed nyid dang ni/ /stag dang seng+ge gza' lhag dang / /sangs
rgyas dag pa bum pa dag /bum pa ma lus nyid du brjod/ /mnyam dang legs par 'jam pa dang / /skra bzang skra ni ldan pa dang / /lho yi phyogs su sa yi bdag/ mtha'
yas mang por bstan pa yin/ /'das dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang / /da ltar dag tu rtogs par gyis/ /rnam pa sna tshogs nang btab nas/ /'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs
'chi/ /mtshon gyis 'debs dang mu ge yis/ /'chi zhing kha cig phyogs gzhan 'gro/ /de ltar 'di dag rgyal po rnams/ /ka na tsi pu rar gnas par bstan/ /de bzhin
stong phrag rnam grags pa/ /de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de dus de tshe phyogs dag tu/ /sngags rnams grub par 'dod na ni/ /khro bo rdo rje'i rigs bstan pa'i/ /
sngags 'di dag ni bsgrub par bya/ /mngon par spyod pa'i las dag dang / /de bzhin dbang gi don yang 'grub/ /gzhon nu byis pa'i gzugs can ni/ /'jam pa'i
dbyangs ni bdag nyid che/ /de tshe dus mthar phyin pa na/ /de tshe yul der 'grub par 'gyur/ /ri bo 'bigs byed la brten nas/ /rgya mtsho ba tsha can 'gram du/ /gdong drug
ces ni yang dag bsgrags/ /sems can rnams la mchog sbyin byed/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo dang ldan/ /byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ /sems can
rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ /lho yi phyogs su gnas par gyis/ /gdong drug gang gi sngags dag ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rab bstan pa/ /de tshe de phyogs de dus
su| |'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /de tshe dpal gyi ri bo'i phyogs/ /'bigs byed nang dang ri zhol dang / /gling nyid rnam pa thams cad dang / /ka ling ka zhes rab
bsgrags dang / /yon tan gsum dang kla klo dang / /kho ra khor yug ko sa la/ /rgya mtsho'i nang dang 'gram dag tu/ /rgyal po dag ni mtha' yas yod/ /cha shas kA ma ru zhes pa//
kha ba can gyi nang na gnas/ /o Da yul gyi mtshams kun na/ /rgyal po rnams ni mang po gsungs/ /sna tshogs kla klo'i rgyal po ni/ /ston pa mchod byed de gtso byed/ /
dbang po zla ba dga' ba yi/ /rgyal po kla klo'i gnas na gnas/ /de las rgyal po gnyis dag ni/ /bstan pa la ni lo brgyad dang / /ston pa'i sku gzugs mchod byed pa'o//
de las skyes pa thams cad ni/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la rab dad par/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shar gyi phyogs la brten pa yi/ /
rgyal po'i mchog ni mang po gsungs/ /gang zhig 'das dang ma 'ongs dang / /da ltar byung ba thams cad du'o/ /dang po'i rgyal po mchog bshad bya/ /gau DA'i rgyud du sa
steng skyes/ /grong khyer 'phel byed nyams dga' bar/ /grags ldan de ni rab tu skyes/ /de ming 'jig rten zhes bya ba/ /rgyal po go DA 'phel byed 'byung / /nga ni 'jig
rten skyes med 'dir/ /de ni chos la sems pa byung / /sa bdag mang po rnams mnan nas/ /zho shas 'tsho ba dag tu byas/ /bar ma'i dus su 'di dag mnyam/ /bar
ma bar ma'i chos dang ldan/ /rtsod pa'i dus kyi tha ma la/ /mi yi dbang po de nyid nyon/ /rgyal po rgya mtsho zhes bya dang / /rnam par gnon pa nyid dang ni/ /rgyal mchog
gtso bo dbang chen dang / /de 'og yi ge sa zhes bya/ /lha yi rgyal po zhes bya de/ /tha ma'i dus la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i gtso bo sna tshogs zhes/ /blo ldan chos ni
'phel byed pa'o/ /de yi nu bo byis zhes bya/ /bstan par di la phan zhing dga'/ /shar phyogs rgya mtsho'i mthar thug par/ /mchod rten gyis brgyan mdzes pa ni/ /de
tshes rnams ma lus par/ /byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /lha khang kun dga' ra ba rdzing / /skyed mos tshal dang bkad sa ni/ /de tshe dpal ldan byed 'gyur zhing / /
gzings dang zam pa byed pa po/ /de tshe ston pa'i gzugs brnyan mchod/ /de la zhugs pa'ang mchod par byed/ /rgyal srid sa yi bdag po byed/ /gnod pa med cing
'gran zla med/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu'ang 'tsho/ /zhag ni sum cu rab byung nas/ /pha rol rgol bas pham byas te/ /de nas rgyal pos rang srog bcad/ /de 'og de ni
lus zhig nas/ /dmyal ba dag tu rab skyes te/ /zhag gsum dang ni gcig dag tu/ /dmyal ba dag gi 'gro bar gnas/ /de nas dmyal ba'i lus bor nas/ /rtag tu
rgyal po lha gnas 'gro/ /lha rnams legs spyad 'jig rten du/ /gtsang ma'i gnas zhes rab tu dran/ /der ni lha rgyal zhes byar 'gyur/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid byang chub
gzhol/ /brgya phrag dang ni stong phrag tu/ /lha yi bde ba rjes su myong / /phyir yang mi lus thob nas ni/ /srid pa gzhan la sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /skye ba gzhan du sems can
la| |de nyid kyis ni las kyang byas/ /grong khyer 'phags rgyal zhes bya ba/ /de tshe ma la bar skye 'o/ /der ni tshong dbon mchog gyur pa/ /ma la bar skyes nor chen ldan/ /
'jig rten skyong zhing gnas med pa/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba med dus su/ /rang sangs rgyas ni 'jig rten du/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par rgyu/ /
sems can rnams la phan don du/ /sa yi steng du rnam spyod de/ /grong khyer 'phags rgyal phyin nas ni/ /bsod snyoms spyod la rab tu zhugs/ /bdag nyid chen po
tshogs spyod pas/ /de che lam chen grong bar du/ /de che tshong pa de nyid kyis/ /thub pa mngon du mthong bar gyur/ /'bras chan la ni mgron bos nas/ /de tshe rang
gi khyim du khyer/ /de nas thub mchog myur khyer nas/ /stan dag la ni bzhugs su gsol/ /zas kyi dus ni nyer gnas pas/ /bcom ldan de ni dgongs su
gsol/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag kyang / /de tshe cang mi smra bar gyur/ /de tshe tshong pa de la ni/ /lhung bzed dag ni zed par gyur/ /tshong pa zur gyis go ba dang / /de
tshe blo dang ldan gyur pas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba yis/ /lhung bzed rnams ni yongs su bkang / /de nas des ni rang lag gis/ /de dag la ni 'bad pas
byin/ /thogs nas de dag thams cad ni/ /mar me'i phreng ba bzhin du mthong / /nam mkha' la ni lus brten nas/ /de dag de yi mod la song / /de nas ba spu langs
nas ni/ /de tshe skyo ba mang por gyur/ /yid ni rdzu 'phrul la dad nas/ /sa de la ni rab tu 'gyel/ /smon lam de tshe byed pa yang / /ji ltar tshig tu smra ba ni/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di
yis ni/ /de ring bdag gis gang thob pa/ /des ni thub pa rab mchog ni/ /'jig rten blo yi mchog 'gyur shog /de tshe sa steng 'khor los bsgyur/ /skye ba stong phrag bcu
ru 'gyur/ /de nas de yi lus spangs nas/ /bye ba drug cur lha gnas 'gro/ /der ni yul ring bde myong nas/ /lha gnas skye ba yongs bor te/ /de tshe mi yi skye ba ni//
gzhan gyis dbang gis 'dir yang byin/ /de ni rgyal po'i rigs skyes pa/ /thams cad du ni 'dir yang 'gyur/ /rgyal po byis pa zhes bya de/ /shar gyi phyogs su
'byung bar 'gyur/ /skye ba stong phrag brgyad du ni/ /bde ba sgrib med thob 'gyur ba/ /dpal ldan rgyal pos thob pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid mthar thob 'gyur//
de ltar rnam mang sems can dang / /de bzhin phun tshogs rgya che ba/ /de tshe mchod dang skul byed pa/ /ston pa la ni sun mi 'byin/ /rig pa dge ba byed pa yi/ /
byang chub lam la nges par sbyor/ /de las gzhan ba'i rgyal po ni/ /go DA nus pa'i ngang tshul can/ /gzhon nu zhes bya'i rgyal por gsungs/ /de yang shin tu chos
dang ldan/ /de nas gzhan pa dpal ldan bcas/ /yi ge u zhes rnam par grags/ /de las gzhan ni rnam 'byed cing / /de bzhin phan tshun
'jigs par byed/ /de dag go DA drag sems kyis/ /'di dag 'byed pa chen por byed/ /de nas lha zhes bya ba yi/ /rgyal po lam ni byed par shes/ /dgra rnams
kun gyis yongs khyab nas/ /de ni dgra yis bsnun nas shi/ /de 'og zla ba zhes ni bya/ /des ni rgyal po nyid kyang byas/ /sngon gyi las kyis bskul nas ni/ /de nas
mtshon gyis rmas nas shi/ /de yi bu ni bcu gnyis grangs/ /lo brgyad bcas pa dag tu 'tsho/ /de yang mtshon gyis rab btab nas/ /de tshe byis pa nyid du shi/ /de dag
gcig la gcig sems shing / /drag po phan pa med la dga'/ /rgyal mchog yi ge ta zhes bya/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /go DA'i 'jig rten rnams kyi
gtso/ /chen po'i nad kyis yang dag btab/ /nad de nyid kyis nyams thag gnas/ /dus byas nas ni 'og tu song / /de 'og yi ge da zhes bya/ /nyin zhag cung zad rgyal
po byed/ /go DA'i yul du byung gyur pa/ /gang+gA'i 'gram du yang dag gnas/ /de 'og yi ge b+ha zhes bya/ /zhag gsum du ni rgyal po byas/ /de nas sa srung rgyal po ni/ /
thams cad du ni de tshe 'byung / /rgyal po de ni snyan par smra/ /byas pa gzo zhing stobs kyang che/ /bud med dbang 'gyur bkren zhing glen/ /dgra las rgyal zhing mi phyed 'gyur/ /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brnyen nas/ /de tshe gtong ba chen por gyur/ /mchod rten nyams dga' gtsug lag khang / /kun dga' rab rnam mang po/ /rdzing yang chu
ni phun sum tshogs/ /bsod nams gang ni legs mdzes pa/ /de dag mang po ston byed cing / /grags dang snyan pa'i don la brtson/ /lha yi stegs ni nyams
dga' dang / /phug dang gnas khang dag kyang byas/ /ya mtshan can gyis yang dag gnon/ /sna tshogs mu stegs gnas kyis ni/ /rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi mthar thug par//
phyogs de thams cad rnam par gnon/ /brtse ldan longs spyod ldan dpag med/ /rgyal po de ni chos la dga'/ /shar gyi phyogs su rgyas par ni/ /the tshom med par
'byung bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu cho gar yang dag ldan/ /ka ba nye bar gnas gyur tshe/ /gang+gA'i 'gram la yang dag brten/ /de tshe rgyal thams byas pa ni/ /lo ni sum cu dag
dang bdun/ /lo ni brgyad cu dag na 'che/ /de nas de yi lus zhig nas/ /lha rnams dag tu nye bar skye/ /de nas dpal ldan klu yi rgyal/ /chos kyi bdag nyid chos la
la dga'/ /mchod rten gang zhig 'di byas dang / /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid du 'ong / /de tshe sa steng dge 'dun ched/ /logs su gtsug
lag khang dag byas/ /rnam par smin pa de yis ni/ /srid pa tha ma la brten nas/ /nges par sangs rgyas nyid lam dang / /mi g.yo go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /de
yi 'og tu go DA ra ni/ /de dag gtsor ni mu stegs gnon/ /shar gyi phyogs su 'byung ba ni/ /grong khyer du ni mu stegs gnas/ /rgyal po'i ming ni bcom ldan zhes//
go DA'i nang na mthu dang ldan/ /brtul zhugs can ni mthur ldan pa/ /sbyin gnas zhes pas dbang yang bskur/ /der ni rgyal srid byas nas su/ /nub kyi phyogs su
yang dag song / /ci 'dod sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i/ /grong khyer nyams dgar rab tu zhugs/ /ma zhu bas ni rab btab nas/ /phyir yang rab tu log par 'gyur/ /shar
phyogs rgya mtsho mthar thug par/ /rkun ma rnams kyis yang dag khyab/ /mtshon gyi gnod pas rab bshig nas/ /shi nas yi dwags 'gro bar song / /sa bdag
rgyal po mi mang ba/ /de sa ni lo gsum bar du byas/ /de nas de ni rkun pos bsad/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba'i yi dwags song / /de nyid du ni lo gsum bar/ /yi dwags
rgyal thabs yongs su byas/ /yi dwags 'jig rten mi bzad pa/ /de nas de ni lus kyang btab/ /skye ba de las rnam grol nas/ /rtag tu mtho ris 'jig rten song / /de yi
'og tu rgyal po ni/ /rgya mtsho zhes ni bya bar grags/ /blo ngan lo ni gsum gyi bar/ /blo gros ngan pas rgyal srid thob/ /de yi nu bor rnam grags pa/ /thal ba zhes bya'i
rgyal po 'byung / /srog gcod pa dang yang dag ldan/ /bab col chen po rab tu byed/ /'bad pas rang gi lus la yang / /brtse med bag ni med pa 'o/ /byis par gyur pas
'di nyid sems//pha rol don ni de mi sems//mi dge'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ /sdig pa'i las ni mang po byas/ /g.yo ldan de bzhin bkren pa yi/ /bram zes rgyal srid dag kyang
gnon/ /mi dang mi ma yin dag gi /longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs phun sum tshogs/ /rgyal po des kyang rab tu 'thob/ /de ni mthar gyis
song ba dang / /rgyal po nub kyi phyogs dag tu/ /kha che'i sgo ye mthar thug par/ /byang gi phyogs la brten nas ni/ /der yang g.yul las rnam rgyal nas/ /rgyal thabs
de tshe byas pa ni/ /bcu gnyis lo dang zla ba lngar/ /sa la rgyal srid de tshe byas/ /de nas de ni nad kyis btab/ /yang dang yang du brgyal bar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal chen pos/
zil mnan nas/ /lus ni zhig nas shi 'phos 'gyur/ /rgyal srid phyir ni rab chags nas/ /de dag phan tshun zhe sdang zhing / /mtshon chen
tshogs kyis 'phen pa ni/ /de dag phan tshun byas par 'gyur/ /yi ge sa ming byis pa khye'u/ /de tshe rgyal srid dbang yang bskur/ /mtshan ma tsam zhig de byas nas/ /
phyir yang de ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bram ze'i gtso bo gnyis kyi ni/ /de dag phan tshun phye nas ni/ /ma ga d+hA yi yul phyin zhing / /u dum bA ra'i grong zhes par/ /bram
ze'i gtso bo byis pa gnyis/ /sa steng rang gis dbang yang bskur/ /de nas mthar gyis de song nas/ /shar phyogs su ni yang dag brten/ /go DA'i yul gyi mir
yang phyin/ /de tshe 'gran zla med par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid ngan pa'i rtsod rgyal gyis/ /byis pa'i gtso bo de gnyis pos/ /mi dge bshes gnyen la brten nas/ /
srog chags mang po rab tu bsad/ /gang zhig sngon gyi rgyal pos bkur/ /dpa' bas nga rgyal byed pa gang / /go DAr skye bo gnas pa dag /thams cad dag ni
gsod par rtsom/ /de nas rgyal po zla ba zhes/ /dpa' bo gcig pu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i 'gram gyi mthar thug dang / /bA ra NA sI de las gzhan/ /ston
pa'i gzugs brnyan nyams dga' ba/ /blo ngan gyis ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /chos kyi stegs ni mi nyung ba/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis sngon bstan pa/ /blo ngan dag gis bsreg
'gyur zhing / /mu stegs rnams ni gsod par dga'/ /de nas de ni khro dang chags/ /mi sdom log pa'i nga rgyal can/ /mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas/ /sa steng gcer
bu'i gnas dag kyang / /de nas thams cad 'jig byed cing / /'tsho ba 'gog pa'ang byed par 'dod/ /yul gyi dbus su rgyal po gzhan/ /de yi dus su 'byung 'gyur ba/ /
yi ge ra ming rigs bdag nyid/ /rje rigs kyis 'tsho de las gzhan/ /ston pa'i bstan pa 'di la dad/ /zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal mchog des/ /gcer bu'i rigs gyur rgyal
po ni/ /de yang rab tu bsad par gyur/ /yi ge ha ming de'i nu bo/ /dpa' bo gcig pu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dpung ni chen por yang dag ldan/ /dpa' zhing zil gnon
yang dag gnon/ /rgyal po yi ge ha bya bas/ /zla bar rnam grags gnas las bton/ /de nas rgyal po rje'u rigs spyod/ /sde che stobs ni che ba dang / /de tshe shar gyi
phyogs dag ni/ /bsod nams che ba'i grong mchog song / /rgyal rigs chos la gnas nas ni/ /chos kyi don shes brtser ldan pas/ /de ni nga rgyal khro tshul gyis/ /
srog chags mang po gsod byed cing / /sems can gnod pa byed pa dang / /chad pa byed la rab dga' zhing / /las ngan rjes su spyod byed
pa'i/ /zla ba zhes bya de phyung nas/ /rang gi gnas na rab tu 'dug /yi ge ha ming slar log nas/ /kla klo'i rgyal pos rab tu mchod/ /yi ge ha bya dge dang ldan/ /
dge ba'i don gyi las kyis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'gros dag gis/ /rang gi yul ni nyid du phyin/ /de nyid kyis ni las byas pas/ /rgyal srid dga' dang ldan pa
thob/ /yang na rgyal srid sbyong gnas pas/ /longs spyod rab tu thob ldan pa/ /snga mar rang sangs rgyas la ni/ /bza' dang gos ni byin pa dang / /de tshe lham ni byin
pa dang / /gos kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs kyang byin/ /de yi las kyi mthu yis ni/ /lha mi'i rgyal srid chen po thob/ /lha dang mi yi phun sum tshogs/ /longs spyod phun
sum tshogs ldan spyod/ /zla ba zhes bya'i bram ze'i rigs/ /longs spyod cher ldan gang phyir de/ /bram ze dag la longs spyod byin/ /de tshe rgyal thabs byed pa ni/ /
lo ni bcu dang bdun dag dang / /de bzhin gzhan ni zla ba gcig /nyin zhag bdun dang brgyad dag tu/ /kha yi nad kyis yang dag btab/ /srin bu rnams
kyis zos nas ni/ /dus byas nas ni 'og tu 'gro/ /mi ma yin pas zil mnan nas/ /de tshe grong de bshig par 'gyur/ /mi ma yin pa'i nyes pa yis/ /rims kyis
nyam thag nad kyis brgyal/ /sngags kyi sbyor bas 'chi ba ste/ /de tshe rgyal po dus las 'das/ /mnar med pa zhes bya ba yi/ /dmyal bar sdig pa'i las byed rnams/ /
sdig pa'i las rnams rjes spyod pa/ /de ni de ru skye bar 'gyur/ /dmyal bar de tshe bskal chen du/ /ma rungs sems ldan 'tshed par 'gyur/ /de nas so tham kyi hud
zer/ /yang sos dang ni thig nag dang / /mi bzad ral gri'i nags tshal yang / /yang dang yang du myong bar 'gyur/ /yi dwags 'jig rten dud 'gro nyid/ /de bzhin
gshin rje'i 'jig rten du'ang / /de ltar skye ba stong rnams su/ /'khor bar yang ni 'khor 'gyur yang / /des ni bde ba mi thob cing / /rtag tu sdug bsngal bsten
par gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sems ni kun gyis dad byas te/ /nad med phun sum tshogs par song / /
sangs rgyas phan 'dogs byed pa yi/ /'bras bu mtha' yas 'byung 'gyur bas/ /sangs rgyas la ni dad par bya/ /chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin no/ /rgyal pos
dkon mchog gsum mchod na/ /'jig rten gyi ni mchog tu 'gyur/ /rgyal thabs chen po'i grags pa thob/ /nor gyi dbang phyug longs spyod
che| |rgyal pos phun tshogs rgya che ba'i/ /bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs thob/ /'jig rten mchog ni mchod byas na/ /'jig rten dbang phyug nyid du 'gro/ /de nas brgya
byin 'thab bral nyid/ /tshangs pa nyid du yang dang yang / /nyan thos rang rgyal nyid dang ni/ /sa steng sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ /theg pa gsum gyi mchog thob cing //
theg pa la ni chags med 'gyur/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab/ /de ltar 'bras bu bsam mi khyab/ /rnam par
smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ /de nas gzhan yang rgyal po ni/ /zla ba sa steng med pa na/ /phan tshun 'khrug pa'i ngang tshul du/ /go DA'i rgyud du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
phan tshun ltos pa med par ni/ /de tshe mtshon ni 'debs par 'gyur/ /zhag ni bdun po gcig dang ni/ /de bzhin gzhan ni zla ba gcig /de tshe chogs kyi rgyal
srid rgyud/ /de tshes steng byed par 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i 'gram gyi grong der ni/ /gtsug lag khang gi gnas kyang byas/ /de nas zla ba zhes bya ba'i/ /bram ze'i khye'u de yi
bu| |zla ba brgyad dang zhag lnga dang / /phyed dang gnyis zhag 'das nas 'chi/ /de'i mthar rgyal po 'dug pa ni/ /klu yi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ /go DA'i yul gyi rgyal po 'byung / /
dang po dza ma'i rigs bram ze/ /kun nas rje'u rigs kyis bskor ba'i/ /klu zhes bya ba de yang 'byung / /de yang mu ges gnod pa dang / /de bzhin pha rol dmag tshogs
gnod/ /de dag rgyal srid thob pa na/ /chom rkun chen pos kun tu khyab/ /des kyang de yi lugs nyams te/ /der ni lo ni lnga dang gcig /rgyal srid kun nas 'khrugs
bzhin spyod/ /srog gcod mang po byas nas ni/ /de tshe srog la gnod par byed/ /snga ma'i las kyi nyes pa yis/ /rje'u rigs spyod pa de dag byed/ /phan tshun 'khrugs
pa'i ngang tshul du/ /de tshe de ni 'byung bar gyur/ /de dag de tshe nus ldan tshul/ /rgyal rigs spyod la gnas pa yi/ /go DA'i rgyud kyi mi yi bdag /'byung bar 'gyur
bar the tshom med/ /kha cig de tshe mtshon gyis 'chi/ /nad rnams kyis kyang yang dag 'debs/ /de nas dus byas rgyal po rnams/ /dmyal ba rnams su 'gro bar
'gyur/ /bud med gtso bo'i byis pa ni/ /de yang phyis ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /de dag de bzhin zla phyed nas/ /mtshon gyis bsnun nas de nyid bsad/ /mu ge chen po yang
dag 'byung / /pha rol dmag tshogs dag gis dkrugs/ /yid ni skrag par gyur pa yis/ /shar phyogs yul mi nyams par gyur/ /de
yi yul du mi bdag ni/ /the tshom med par 'byung 'gyur ba/ /bcom brlag skyes pa'i rgyal po mchog /yangs pa can gyi tshong pa sngon/ /de yang lus la mchod
pa yin/ /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal por 'gyur/ /de yi yang nu bo yi ge b+ha/ /shar gyi phyogs la yang dag gnas/ /de'i bu yi ge pra zhes bya/ /shar phyogs nyid du yang
dag skyes/ /rgyal rigs mchog tu skyes par bstan/ /legs par spyod pas byis pa bcings/ /lo ni bcu dang bdun dag tu/ /'ching ba dag la yang dag
bzhag /glang rdzi zhes bya'i rgyal pos bcings/ /bcom ldan zhes byas de ni dkrol/ /yi ge ha zhes rgyal chen ni/ /nub kyi phyogs nas yang dag 'ongs/ /shar
gyi phyogs ni mtha' med par/ /gang+gA'i 'gram na gnas par gyur/ /dmangs rigs gzi brjid che ba dang / /sde chen stobs ni che ba dang / /de ni de yul 'gram
gnas nas/ /kun tu yang ni rab tu gnas/ /go DA'i skye bo zhes grags grong / /mu stegs zhes kyang rnam par grags/ /rgyal pos de ni rnam mnan nas/ /
stobs chen de ni 'dug par gyur/ /der ni rgyal rigs byis pa de/ /tshong pa dang ni lhan cig 'ongs/ /der ni nam phyed zhugs nas ni/ /nam gyi mthar ni de yang mchod/ /
dmangs rigs rgyal po zhes bya bas/ /slar nyid du ni ldog par byed/ /gang+gA'i 'gram gyi mthar thug par/ /grong khyer dga' ba zhes bya bar/ /de tshe rgyal srid ma ga d+har
byis pa der ni bzhag par gyur/ /wa ra NA si'i pha rol tu/ /ka shi yul gyi mir yang phyin/ /stobs chen sa yi bdag po ni/ /dmangs rigs der ni zhugs par gyur//
sdug bsngal nyam thag nad chen pos/ /de tshe bu ni dbang yang bskur/ /byis pa khye'u phug ces pa/ /de tshe rgyal thabs dbang yang bskur/ /chen po'i nad kyis zil
mnan nas/ /de tshes yang 'khor bar mthong / /de nas 'bar bas shugs nar phyung / /lus zhig nas ni dur 'gror song / /de tshe zla ba bdun dang brgyad/ /dud 'gro dag
tu gnas par gyur/ /de yi skye ba las grol nas/ /lha rnams kyi ni nang du skyes/ /de tshe skye ba nyi shur ni/ /lha yi phun sum tshogs pa thob/ /chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar
gyis/ /rang rgyal byang chub thob par byed/ /sngon gyi skye ba'i dus dag tu/ /'di nyid las ni nye bar bsags/ /bdag nyid chen por rang rgyal la/ /gos kyis kun nas bkab
pa dang / /glang po rta dang shing rta'i rgyur/ /lham ni rab tu phul bar gyur/ /de la blo ldan sems dang bas/ /de tshe de la bza' ba byin/ /rnam
par smin pa de yis ni/ /lha yi rgyal po brgya byin du/ /skye ba bye ba phrag dgur ni/ /lha yi 'jig rten dag tu gyur/ /sa steng 'ongs nas rgyal po ni/ /de ni skye ba 'di
la gyur/ /gzhan gyis rjes bsgrubs rgyal thabs ni/ /rjes su spyod par 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi bu yang rgyal po ni/ /wa rA Na sir rab tu gnas/ /chags 'og
rgyal phran gyis bcom pa'i/ /rgyal thabs rnam 'jigs 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi rgyal srid dgra dang ni/ /bram zes phal cher gnod par 'gyur/ /bag med
'dod pa spyod pa dang / /rgyal po de ni gdon gyis 'dzin/ /phyi ma'i yi ni dus dag tu/ /de nas mtshon gyis brgyab nas 'chi/ /ma ga d+hA rgyal de dag ni/ /phan tshun
du ni gnod byed pas/ /zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal po 'das/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi kun nas kyang / /gang+gA'i 'gram gyi mthar thug par/ /wa rA Na si de las gzhan/ /
yi ge pra zhes rgyal rigs ni/ /de yi tshe na rgyal po 'byung / /gang zhig dmangs rigs gyur pa ni/ /yi ge ha yis yongs su mchod/ /grong khyer dga' ba zhes bya
bar/ /gang+gA'i 'gram la yang dag rten/ /sngon gyi las kyis yongs bskul nas/ /rgyal rigs rgyal por 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nyid las byas byed du bcug /
rjes su yang ni yi rang byas/ /de tshe dus ni 'das pa na/ /gser thub ces bya'i ston pa byung / /wa rA Na si'i grong khyer du/ /nor chen ldan pa'i tshong dpon yod/ /tshong
dpon bu ni byis pa de/ /byis pa dag gis yang dag bskor/ /sa rdul dag la rtse ba'i phyir/ /lam chen dag tu zhugs par 'gyur/ /rang khyim mchod rten mchog
mthong la/ /pha dang ma ni mchod byed pa/ /de nyid yid la bzung byas nas/ /sa rdul gyi ni mchod rten byas/ /de tshe me tog dman mas ni/ /mchod pa yang ni byed par
'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dad pa'i dran pa yis/ /sangs rgyas de la'ang bstod pa byas/ /byis pa rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/ /der ni byis pa rtse bar gyur/ /ston pa
gser thub rgyal ba yis/ /nyan thos mchog de gcig pu zhig /skyon bral bdag nyid grol ba dang / /khams gsum las ni rnam grol blo/ /de tshe dang po skyon bral ba/ /bsod
nams la ni rgyu bar gyur/ /wA rA Na si legs mdzes pa'i/ /de tshe grong khyer rab tu zhugs/ /gang du sa steng byis pa yod/ /de tshe chags bral phyogs der phyin/ /der ni byis pa
de kun gyis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor bar gyur/ /'dir gshegs dge slong 'dir spyon cing / /ston pa'i mchod rten phyag phyogs mdzod/ /bdag
cag gis ni 'bad byas na/ /bzang po 'di la mi gzigs sam/ /de nas tshong dpon bu khye'u/ /rtsa yi thag pa blangs nas ni/ /rdu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral
brtse ba'i tshul gyis de bcings khrid/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po chags bral bas/ /der gnas rnams la yang dag dgongs/ /sa steng dag tu gzigs pa na/ /de dag
gis ni mchod rten byas/ /byis pa'i spyi bor lag byugs nas/ /blo ldan de la 'di skad smras/ /gang du khyod kyis mchod rten byas/ /thongs shig khye'u bdag cag 'deng /
gang du sa steng mchod rten ni/ /de yang thams cad 'od gyur nas/ /de tshe byis pa dang lhan cig /bdag nyid chen po des phyag byas/ /bsod nams don du ci 'dod
par/ /dpa' bo des ni phyir yang chas/ /de nas tshong dpon byis pa yis/ /chos gos mtha' nas bzung nas ni/ /dge slong de ni bzung khyer ba/ /bshos gsol bya ba'i
ched du'o/ /de nas tshong dpon gtso bo des/ /byis pa khye'u de mthong nas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po chags bral ba'i/ /chos gos mtha' la 'dzin byed la/ /'jigs shing
ba spu ldang ba dang / /nga yi khyim du mchog kyang gshegs/ /myur du rkang gnyis la btud de/ /byis pa yis ni 'dzin pa btang / /bu de yis kyang bzung byas la/ /'bad pa
yis ni bzod gsol byas/ /skye bo'i mchog gyur phan 'dod pa/ /de yi lhung bzed blangs nas ni/ /sA lu'i tshod ma bza' ba yis/ /lhung bzed dag ni bkang byas nas//
bu la bos nas smras pa ni/ /yang dag long la 'di la byin/ /de nas byis pa shes ldan pas/ /'bad pas lag gnyis bkrus nas ni/ /lhung bzed gang ba blangs nas
su/ /'dod chags bral bal ni phul/ /phul nas myur ba nyid du ni/ /rkang pa gnyis la phyag kyang byas/ /'dod chags bral bas blangs nas ni/ /gtsug lag khang song
zas la spyad/ /bde bar reg pa'i sems kyis ni/ /de tshe 'dod chags bral bar gyur/ /de las byis pa gzhan zhig ni/ /phrag dog sems su gyur nas ni/ /mu stegs
rnams la rab dad nas/ /bstan pa la ni de mi mchod/ /khro ba'i sems ni kho na yis/ /'dod chags bral la nyin zhag gzhan/ /bza' ba bca' ba rnams mang po/ /khyer
nas de la rab tu byin/ /khyod la byin pa'i bsod snyoms kyi/ /dge ba cung zad gang yod pa/ /tshong dpon bu ni de bas kyang / /sa steng bdag ni dam par shog /de nas mu stegs
de kun dang / /de tshe bram ze'i chung ma rnams/ /de nas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ /tha dad par ni 'thab mo'ang byas/ /byis pa khyed cag yong mi
shes/ /ci phyir mo reg gam du 'gro/ /'di dag bdag la'ang gnas med na/ /gzhan dag gang du mya ngan zlo/ /byis pa de yi sems can la/ /de lta bu yi zhe sdang skyes/ /
ston pas nye bar bsngags pa yi/ /chos kyi zam pa grags pa dang / /sa steng lha khang mchod rten mchog /mu stegs rnams kyi sa de dag bshig /tshong dpon mchog
gi bu de la/ /kun nas 'khrug pa'i sems kyang byas/ /mgo reg 'di la byin pa yi/ /sbyin pa'i 'gro ba gang du 'gro/ /ngan 'gro'i 'gro bas zin sems la/ /rnam
par gnod pa bdag gis bya/ /gnyis pa byis pa gang yin te/ /zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal po yin/ /rnam smin de yis mi 'dod pa/ /yun ring sdug bsngal rjes su myong / /
tshong dpon mchog gi bu de ni/ /lus zhig nas ni bde 'gror song / /de dag der ni lha gnas su/ /yun ring bde ba rjes su myong / /de tshe de tshe de dang der/ /shi 'phos
lha yi 'jig rten gnas/ /de tshe tha ma'i skye ba la/ /thams cad du ni 'ching ba gcod/ /tha ma'i skye ba thob pa na/ /mir gyur pa yi bdag por 'gyur/ /las kyis de
tshe 'phos na yang / /de tshe de tshe de dang der/ /'jig rten dag tu skyes gyur pa/ /sa steng mi yi bdag por byed/ /gang zhig me tog sman ma ni/ /byis pa g.yo ba des phul ba/ /des
na longs spyod nyon mongs can/ /de 'di'i 'bras bu nyon mongs ldan/ /sdug bsngal longs spyod thob pa yang / /rgyal po de yi bstan pa nyams/ /mi brtan byis pa'i rang
bzhin dang / /ji lta de ltar g.yo sems kyis/ /sa steng ston pa'i mchod rten la/ /mchod pa chen po yongs su byas/ /rnam par smin pa'i las de yis/ /byis pa rgyal po'i
dbang phyug byed/ /med par rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ /yod pa rab tu 'jig par 'gro/ /byang dang nub kyi bar dag tu/ /de ni rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ /blo gros gang de bcings
pa dang / /byis pas yang ni rab dang ba/ /byis pas bcings dang grol ba yi/ /rnam smin las ni de yi su/ /skye ba dag ni lnga brgyar yang / /byis pa bcings dang grol bar
'gyur/ /tha ma'i skye ba de yi tshe/ /thams cad du ni 'ching ba bcad/ /lo ni lnga bcu lnga dag gam/ /bdun cu rtsa bdun dag du 'gyur/ /shar phyogs rgya mtsho'i mthar thug
par/ /sa steng de ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /'bigs byed ri yi nang gnas pa/ /mtha' khob kla klo'i rkun ma rnams/ /de dag kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/ /yi ger ming rgyal
por 'gyur/ /gangs can ri yi nang gnas pa/ /byang gi phyogs la brten pa yi/ /de tshe rgyal rigs rgyal pa de/ /yul mi kun la spyod
par 'gyur/ /mi shes byis par gyur pa yis/ /mchod rten sa rdul gyis byas pas/ /'gran zla med cing gnod med par/ /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal por gyur/ /shar
phyogs rgya mtshor brten nas ni/ /de 'di 'brog gi mthar thug par/ /blo ldan lo hi ta las gzhan/ /byang du de bzhin kha ba can/ /nub tu kA shi nyams dga'i grong
rtse mo zhes bya'i grong de bzhin/ /'di yi nang du rgyal po ni/ /ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa/ /de ni seng+ge lnga zhes bya/ /pham nas rgyal pos gzhan yang pham/ /
seng+ge las skyes thams cad de'ang / /de tshe rtsa nas rnam par bshig /gangs can nang dang shar phyogs dang / /rgya mtsho bcu yi 'gram gnas nas/ /de tshe rgyal rigs
rgyal po de/ /yul mi dag ni kun la spyod/ /lha chogs seng+ge rgyal po ni/ /g.yon can gzhan la bsten pa dang / /'bigs byed nang na gnas pa la/ /des kyang
rang gi rgyal po byas/ /bgrod dka' zhes bya'i yul dbus su/ /dug chen rgyal bas rnam rgyal byas/ /byang shar kun la gnas pa yi/ /seng+ge zhes bya de bzhin
gzhan/ /zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal po 'das/ /de tshe go DA'i skye bo'ang 'jig /de tshe rgyal rigs sa yi bdag /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /rgyal po mngon 'phel skye
zhes bya/ /de yi longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de tshe rgan por gyur pa na/ /de yang g.yo ba med par song / /lo ni brgyad cur 'tsho ba ste/ /de bzhin gzhan ni bdun dang
bdun/ /de nas 'khogs pas zil mnan nas/ /dus byas lha yi gnas su song / /yun ring lha yi bde ba ni/ /de tshe rgyal pos rjes su myong / /sngon ni kun nas nyon mongs
pas/ /las kyis yang ni shi 'phos te/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po klu yi rgyal/ /blo ldan dud 'gro'i nang du gnas/ /tshong pa sngags ni grub pa ste/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i blo byed cing / /de
tshe rig pa'i rgyal po dang / /de tshe bde 'gro dag tu 'gyur/ /de yi tshen 'khor los bsgyur/ /sna tshogs tog ces rgyal por 'gyur/ /de bzhin du ni blo ldan de/ /de tshe rig 'dzin
chos kyang 'chad/ /lo ni bye ba brgyad cu dang / /de tshe dgu dang bdun du 'gyur/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba yis/ /'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi 'khor du bu mo ni/ /
bye ba drug cu skye bar 'gyur/ /de nas de ni lus zhig nas/ /lha mo sgrol ma mnyes byas te/ /lha rnams bdag por song nas ni/ /der ni chos kyang ston par byed/ /rgyal po de ni
mthar gyis su/ /myur du byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de yang lo ni gsum dag tu/ /rgyal po'i dbang phyug byas nas ni/ /yi ge pa yi rgyal po 'dam
de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /phan tshun rgyud ni byas nas su/ /rtsod pa chen po la yang gnas/ /de yi nu bo yig pa zhes/ /brtul zhugs can du rnam par gnas/ /lo ni gsum
dang gcig dag tu/ /rgyal srid yongs su 'phel bar byas/ /de ma thag tu 'khru bas btab/ /'di dag gnyi ga 'chi bar gyur/ /'jig rten dus 'das shi nas ni/ /gnod
sbyin dag gi nang du skyes/ /de gnyis mthar gyis chos ldan pas/ /rang rgyal byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de'i yang nu bo yig pa zhes/ /rgyal rigs kyi ni chos la dga'/ /
de yang rgyal po lo gsum du/ /mi yi bdag po byed par 'gyur/ /de'i yang nu bo rgyal po ni/ /yi ge dza zhes rnam par bsgrags/ /de yang yul ni 'di dag tu/ /sa kun
gyi ni bdag por 'gyur/ /rta dang shing rta glang po dmag /kun nas gru dang theg pa yis/ /g.yul du nye bar gnas nas ni/ /dgra yi tshogs ni kun las rgyal/ /des ni
yul 'di ma lus dang / /sa rnams thams cad nyid la ni/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan lha khang dang / /de bzhin rgyal ba'i mchod rten dang / /sa rnams dag ni thams
cad la/ /thams cad mdzes par byas par 'gyur/ /de tshe sngon gyi rgyal po de'i/ /bran ze de bzhin shAka rigs skyes/ /nga rgyal shes rab ldan zhing rno/ /byang chub mthar byed nga rgyal
blo/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /'di nyid 'di yi grogs nyid 'gyur/ /rgyal po chos la dga' ba yi/ /rgyal rigs kyi ni mchog tu gsungs/ /lo ni nyi shu bdun dang brgyad/ /de
ni de tshe 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /bud med byas pa'i skyon nyid kyis/ /dus byas nas ni lha gnas 'gro/ /blo ldan de ni mthar gyis kyang / /bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de
nas grags pa dpal zhes bya/ /de bzhin sa yi bdag po ni/ /u DI yan rgyal po che/ /chos la dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /u D-I yan gyi grong mchog la/ /grong khyer yi
ge pa zhes bya/ /der ni rgyal po byed pa ste/ /kun nas dgra las rgyal ba 'gyur/ /der ni de tshe brgyad dag gi /gtsug lag khang yang byed par 'gyur/ /bram ze'i gtso bo de bzhin
ldan/ /shAkya'i skyes zhes yang dag brten/ /de yi grogs la brten nas ni/ /khor yug tu ni rgyal srid byas/ /lo ni brgyad cu gcig bcas par/ /mi yi bdag po der
'tshor gyur/ /las byed skyon gyis chos bdag nyid/ /dus byas nas ni lha gnas 'gro/ /lha rnams kyi ni rgyal thabs kyang / /de bzhin mthar gyis byed par 'gyur/ /de
nas lus de zhig nas kyang / /mtho ris las kyang mtho ris 'gro/ /de yi byang chub rgyu dag ni/ /dge ba'i chos ni yongs rdzogs byas/ /de yi
bran nyid rgyal po ste/ /rgyal srid gnod med byed par 'gyur/ /yi ge'i dang po ya zhes bya/ /sa yi bdag po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lo ni bdun dang gcig dag tu/ /de yi dus
su rgyal srid byed/ /de gcig bud med rnams kyis ni/ /brdegs nas kyang ni shi bar 'gyur/ /yi ge pa rgyud yang byung ba/ /rgyal rigs rgyal por 'gyur ba yin/ /des
ni bran tshogs rnams bsad nas/ /rang dbang du ni yongs su gyur/ /mi dge'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ /rnam mang srog ni gcod pa yin/ /dpa' zhing 'byor la
rmongs par ni/ /'jig rten kun la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /g.yo zhing myur du byed pan/ /chang dang g.yo sgyu can la dga'/ /chang gis bag med rnam rmongs nas/ /des na
de ni sa la nyal/ /dgra rnams kyis ni brtson byas nas/ /mtshon chas bsnun nas de gsod 'gyur/ /des nas de ni lus zhig nas/ /dus byas nas ni 'og tu 'gro/
de yi spun zla gnyis pa ni/ /ming ni yi ger zhes shes/ /nyin zhag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad du/ /de tshes la rgyal srid byas/ /bram ze rnams la nor byin nas/ /the tshom
med par dus byas kyang / /de nas gzhan yang sa bdag ni/ /de che rgyal po bzang po byung / /de yang dmangs rigs skyes nas ni/ /yan lag mtshang ngan pa nyid/ /chos min
phal cher tshul khrims 'chal/ /'thab pa la yang rtag tu dad/ /bram ze'i tshogs dang rgyal phran dang / /sdom brtson de bzhin rang byung ba/ /kun la yang ni gnod byed cing / /
rtag tu tshar gcod dag la'ang dga'/ /drag pos 'dul bar byed pa dang / /de bzhin rkun ma rnams kyang gsod/ /ma rungs thams cad gnod byed cing / /ya mtshan can gyi
brtul zhugs ston/ /rnam par grol ba'ang spyin mi byed/ /de che rgyal srid byed par 'gyur/ /lo ni bcu dang bdun gyi bar/ /der ni sa bdag 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /mdze yi nad
kyis sdug bsngal nas/ /de nas dus byas dud 'gror 'gro /dud 'gro dag las klu rgyal du/ /gdengs ka che ldan mgyogs par 'gro/ /mchog tu 'jigs rung lus ldan
zhing / /de tshe sgra ni drag par sgrogs/ /de la lor ni mi 'dod pa/ /yun ring sdug bsngal rjes su myong / /sa srung 'jig rten 'phel byed pa/ /'jig rten kun gyis shes pa
ste| |lus can shar phyogs gnas pa yin/ /rgyal po yi ge pa zhes pa'i/ /rgyud rnams kun tu skyes pa gzhan/ /rgyal rigs dpa' bo rnam par gnon/ /de bzhin rgya
mtsho gsum gyi bdag /sde che stobs ni che ba dag /shar gyi phyogs su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ston pa'i mchod rten bzang po dang / /gtsug lag
khang dang 'dug gnas khyim/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skyed mos tshal/ /rdzing dang khron pa bkang sas bskor/ /de bzhin rtag tu bsod nams khang / /sa ni mdzes par byed par
'gyur/ /de ni thub mchog dam pa dag /theg pa bla na med la brten/ /shAkya'i rab byung de nyid ni/ /rtag tu de ni rab gnas byed/ /mi khom rnams ni spong byed cing / /dal
ba nyid kyang legs par thob/ /yi ge ka zhes rnam par bsgrags/ /'jig med dran dang ldan pa nyid/ /lo ni nyi shu gcig par du/ /sa skyong rgyal srid byas par gyur/ /de nas
gsud nad kyis btab ste/ /dus byas nas ni lha gnas 'gro/ /blo ldan de ni mthar gyis su/ /myur du byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de yi lhag ma'i rgyud las kyang / /
gzhan la rab gnas 'tsho byed pa/ /de yi 'og tu sa skyong ba/ /sa srung 'tsho ba gnas pa yin/ /bram ze bkren pa'i skye bo ni/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi
dus su chos min ldan/ /ston pa'i bstan pa nges par nyams/ /sngags kyi bstan pas sems can rnams/ /dge ba'i don du nges par sbyor/ /gang zhig gzhon nus
bstan pa yi/ /sngags ni longs spyod 'phel byed pa/ /rgyal po'i dbang phyug don du ni/ /de tshe de yi yul phyogs su'ang / /grub pa mchog ni bsgrub bya min/ /chos kyi
'khor lo nyams dga' dang / /de bzhin 'od ma'i tshal chen dang / /gang du bcom ldan de zhi par/ /phung po med par rab zhugs pa/ /sngags gnyis 'di dag bsgrub bya ba//
lha mo sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rtag tu rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang ni/ /snying po med pa'i 'bab chu mchog /gang+gA'i 'gram ni thams cad du/ /pad+ma 'byung ba bsgrub par bya/ /sa
bcu thob pa'i bdag po ni/ /gang yang byang chub sems de yang / /sems can rnams ni 'dul byed pa/ /zla ba zhes ni rnam par bsgrags/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo rdzu 'phrul che/ /de
ni sgrol ma zhes kyang bstan/ /bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo ni/ /'gro ba kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sems can rnams la phan don du//
mi mjed 'jig rten khams gnas ma/ /bud med ming gis 'jug par byed/ /sa bcu la ni rab gnas thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /sems can
rnams ni 'dul byed pa/ /lha mo sgrol ma zhes su bstan/ /'di ni 'bad med grub pa ste/ /srung dang skyob dang sbed par byed/ /longs spyod dbang phyug 'phel byed pas/ /
'di ni lha mo bsgrub par bya/ /byang chub tshogs kyi ched du ni/ /bskyed pa nyid ni brtsam par bya/ /snying rjes brlan pas lus can la/ /de tshe lha mo rjes 'brang
ba| |sngags kyi gzugs kyis sems can la/ /byang chub tshogs ni bya phyir ro/ /re ba thams cad dga' rgyas phyir/ /shar gyi phyogs su gnas pa yin/ /bdag nyid
rnam pa stong dang ni/ /rnam pa mang po byas nas kyang / /rgya mtsho bzhi yi mthar thug par/ /sa rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /de nas shar gyi phyogs su'am/ /yang na bA
rA Na sIr 'grub/ /lha mo da yi zhing du ni/ /shar gyi phyogs su rab tu bstan/ /'od chen po ni dzam+b+ha la/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po yang dag 'grub/ /de tshe longs spyod ma lus
'dod/ /de che dus kyi tha ma la/ /lha mo sgrol ma gnod sbyin rgyal/ /de nor rgyas pa 'dod pas sgrub/ /de tshe khro bo'i sngags dag ni/ /lho phyogs dag tu bsgrub par bya/ /kla klo
rkun ma'i gling dang ni/ /de bzhin rgya mtsho'i nang du ni/ /stobs chen sgrol ma gnod sbyin rgyal/ /de bzhin du yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /ha ri ke la kad ri tsa/ /kA ma ru
pa gA dA ha'i/ /pho nya mo tshogs rnam mang dang / /gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen mo 'grub/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis gang gsung sngags/ /longs spyod kyi ni rgyur 'gyur
ba| |de bzhin yul der grub pa ste/ /gzhan yul de bzhin ma yin no/ /shar phyogs dang ni phyogs mtshams su/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sngags kyi rgyur/ /de yi dus su bstan
pa ni| |lus can rnams kyis bsgrub par bya/ /dbus kyi yul du de bzhin sngags/ /de bzhin sa srung mang po ni/ /rgya che thams cad nyams chung ba'i/ /blo chung rnams kyis
rtogs par byed/ /rgyal po'i gtso bo mdor bsdus nas/ /ming ni 'di dag nges par brjod/ /dang po'i yi ge sha dang na/ /dang po'i yi ge par yang bstan/ /dang por yi
ge ba dang e/ /dang po'i yi ge ar yang bstan/ /dang po'i yi ge har bstan te/ /dang po'i yi ge bar yang bsgrags/ /dang po'i yi ge dza dang wa/ /dang yig d+ha ni zla ba'i
rigs/ /yi ge ha nyid rnam bsgrags dang / /de bzhin yang ni dang po'i a/ /dang po'i yi ge sa la yang / /bud med rigs min 'jig rten sdang / /dang po'i yi ge a dang
ma| |'jig rten rnams la mthu dang ldan/ /rim gyis rim gyis rigs dag ni/ /bram ze rje'u rigs dag tu 'jug /phal cher chos min las byed cing / /rnam sdang bud
med la brkam chags/ /sa srung skyon ni rab mang par/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /yul gyi dbus su mi yi bdag /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /dus kyi tha mar
'di dag tshe/ /lo ni brgya dang nyi shu nyid/ /de yi tshe na mi rnams kyi/ /tshe ni ring bar rab tu bstan/ /de dag bar ma bzang po las/ /khyad par ring dang
thung ba yin/ /rgyal po rnams ni tshe thung bar/ /de tshe dus su bstan pa ni/ /gang+gA'i 'gram gyi dogs dang ni/ /gangs can gyi ni ri zhol dang / /de tshe kA ma ru yul du/ /de
'dra'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dang po bar ma tha ma yi/ /rigs kyi lhag ma brjod bya ste/ /dang po'i gtso bo chen po ni/ /rna can rgyal por rab tu bsgrags/ /tha ma ang
ga'i bdag po dang / /der ni 'byor bzang 'byor pa dang / /legs byin srid pa byin pa ni/ /kA ma ru pa'i yul du byung / /tha mar legs 'byor gzhon nu dang / /yi ge ba
dang tha gnyis ni/ /yangs pa can du yang dag byung / /gang du thub pa de skyes pa/ /ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog tu/ /tha mar zas gtsang shAka rigs kyi/ /nyi ma bu ram
rigs skyes pa/ /tha mar zas gtsang rnam bsgrags pa/ /shAkya shAkya'i rnams 'phel byed/ /sems can brtson 'grus chung bar ni/ /'jig rten skyes mchog bstan
pa yin/ /gang zhig rgyal bas gsung sngags dang / /de bzhin bran po'i tshogs kun dang / /pho nya'i tshogs kun du ma dang / /rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang / /rgyud rnams
kun gyi don rig pas/ /bsgrubs na grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /'jig rten kun gyi sngags dag ni/ /yul gyi dbus der grub par 'gyur/ /dbus yul gnas par
khyad par du/ /rgyal bas gsungs par bsgrub par bya/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rtags dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyud dag dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor bar
ldan/ /lus can rnam pa sna tshogs 'grub/ /dbus kyi yul du de bzhin sngags/ /longs spyod 'phel ba bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin lus can bsrung don dang / /
skyob dang dbang dang dgug pa 'grub/ /dbus kyi yul du mi yi bdag /'das dang ma 'ongs rab tu gsungs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rtags dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs
tshe dang rigs/ /rgyal po thams cad gsungs pa ni/ /mchog dang tha ma bar ma yin/ /de bzhin rnam gsum grub pa ste/ /dus kyang gsum du sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin
sngags kyang rnam gsum du/ /de bzhin thub pa mchog gis gsungs/ /rgyal po mtha' yas gsungs pa ni/ /dbus kyi yul dang nub phyogs dang / /byang phyogs
dang ni shar phyogs dang / /de bzhin phyogs mtshams thams cad dang / /rnam pa bzhi ru mtshon pa yi/ /gling dag de bzhin kun tu yang / /sa bdag mtha' yas rab gsungs
pa| |mtha' yas sngags ni sgrub pa dang / /mtha' yas yul la gnas pa dag /mtha' yas sngags ni yongs su grub/ /thub pa'i
bstan pa nub pa na/ /tshar gcad rjes su gzung bar byed/ /dus su rgyal po dag la sngags/ /'jam dpal gyis ni gsungs pa yin/ /rdzu 'phrul rtse dang rnam
'phrul dang / /'dir ni dus kyi spyod pa'ang bstan/ /sngags kyi bdag nyid sems can gyi/ /'gro ba skye gnas rgyal po'i ming / /sngags ni sgrub par 'dod
rnams la/ /yul dang dus ni yang dag bstan/ /bstan pa nub pa'i 'og tu ni/ /zhar la rgyal po rnams kyis bstan/ /yon tan bdag nyid che sngags rnams/ /
tha mar 'bras bu rtogs par byas/ /rgyal po gzhan ni theg pa dang / /sngon ni 'gal ba med par bstan/ /dus kyi tha ma de dus su/ /rab tu gnas par the tshom
med/ /de dag phyogs la gnas par ni/ /rgyal po thams cad gsungs pa yin/ /de bzhin shAkya'i gsung rab la/ /nges par rab byung gnas nas ni/ /'jig rten
mig gcig gyur pa yi/ /thub pa mchog ni med pa na/ /rtag tu sngags smra la dad pas/ /bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur/ /de dag gzhon nu bshad par bya/ /rtse
gcig yid kyis mnyan par gyis/ /ston pa'i gsung rabs steng du/ /dus mthar 'jig rten nyams pa na/ /sdom brtson rgyal po'i tshul gyis ni/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar theng
tshom med/ /dper na ma khol zhes bya dang / /me tog ces byar rnam par grags/ /yi ge ma zhes gzhon nu zhes/ /dang po tha mar chos la dga'/ /klus bos zhes kyang
rnam par grags/ /rin chen 'byung zhes bya ming dang / /yi ge ga zhes gzhon nu zhes/ /yi ge ba zhes chos sems byed/ /yi ge a ming bdag nyid che/ /ston pa'i bstan
pa gces 'dzin byed/ /blo ldan yon tan kun gyis bkur/ /dang po'i yi ge la zhes bstan/ /rgyal po sangs rgyas pa yi phyogs/ /ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed/ /
sdom brtson yi ge a zhes bsgrags/ /bram ze las ni rab tu byung / /grong khyer gnas bcas gnas pa ste/ /de bzhin tshe ni brgyad cur 'tsho/ /dang yig yi ge a dge
slong / /lho yi phyogs su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /blo ldan tshe ni drug cur 'tsho/ /ka shi zhes bya'i grong du gnas/ /yi ge d+ha zhes sdom brtson nyid/ /lho yi phyogs su rnam par
bsgrags/ /pha rol rgol ba bzlog nas kyang / /de bzhin sdom brtson sngags kyang grub/ /gzhan yang rang byung dam pa ni/ /sing+ga la yi grong na gnas/ /'phags pa min
la 'phags pa'i ming / /sing+ga la yi gling na gnas/ /pha rol rgol ba bzlog nas ni/ /mu stegs rnams kyi sngags sun phyung / /de dus 'jigs
su rung ba yi/ /dus kyi mtha' la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yi ge nga dang la dang por/ /sdom brtson gang zhig rab gsungs dang / /yi ge ra dang ba dang por/ /dge slong gang
zhig rab byung gsungs/ /ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /rgyal po nag po zhes bya bar/ /yi ge ma zhes sdom brtson
'byung / /mchod rten kun dga' rab gnas/ /rdzing dang khron pa'ang thams cad du/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan de bzhin rtags/ /gzings dang zam pa nyid rnams ni//
byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /mtshon gyis lus zhig mtho ris 'gro/ /de nas yi ge sa dang ka /dang po dag tu brjod pa dang / /de bzhin yi ge ra dang g+ha/ /dang po
dag tu rab brjod dang / /dang por yi ge ba dang ni/ /legs bzhin legs te sde zhes bstan/ /sbyin byed sbyin par byed pa nyid/ /gzhan gyi grub mtha' sun byed
pa| |tshong pa sngon dang sman pa sngon/ /gnyi ga sbyin byed sna tshogs byed/ /yi ge ba zhes sdom brtson bsgrags/ /de las gzhan pa dang yi ger/ /dang po yi ge ba
grags dang / /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan don yang byed/ /blo ldan dang por yi ge ma/ /de bzhin sdom brtson dad pa 'byung / /rnam pa du ma sdom brtson gsungs/ /de tshe mtha'
yas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sdom brtson thams cad bsgrags pa yang / /ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa'o/ /bstan pa de tshe sa steng du/ /rnam par nyams shing snang med
la| |ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid du 'ong / /phyed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /thams cad byang chub lung bstan te/ /de yis byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/ /de bzhin
'jig rten sbyin gnas 'gyur/ /srid pa gsum gyi mthar yang byed/ /sngags dang rgyud la mngon brtson pas/ /grags pa 'dzin par shes par bya/ /bram ze chos kyi ngang
tshul can/ /de ni rab tu brjod par bya/ /sngags dang rgyud la mngon brtson pas/ /rgyal po'i lugs la nye bar gnas/ /de tshe mi bzad dus dag tu/ /'jig rten kun
la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yi ge ba zhes bram ze mchog /phyug cing rig byed pha rol phyin/ /de 'dir sa rnams ma lus par/ /rtsod pa'i phyir ni rab tu rgyu/ /mtsho gsum sa
yi mthar thug par/ /pha rol mu stegs rtsod la dga'/ /gang phyir dang po gtso bo'i tshig /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /gzhon nus yongs su gsungs gyur
pa| |yi ge drug pa'i sngags kyang zlos/ /cho ga rab 'byams 'di dag las/ /des ni de phan de la bstan/ /rgyal dang legs par rgyal ba dang
grags ldan dge ba bde las gzhan/ /rigs ldan chos dang ldan pa dang / /brtson ldan legs pa khyab 'jug dang / /sbrang rtsi sbrang rtsi bzang po dang / /de bzhin grub dang
dregs bral dang / /ra g+ha pa dang dmangs rigs dang / /de bzhin ka shir skyes pa gzhan/ /gzhon nu 'di yi bzlas pa la/ /thams cad kun yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de
dag kun kyang bzang po ste/ /blo ldan mang du thos pa yin/ /de kun sngags ni mngon du gyur/ /rgyal po'i 'tsho bas yang dag gnas/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa
ni| |bram ze dang po'i yi ge gi /grong khyer me tog ces bya bar/ /de ni khro bo grub par gyur/ /dbul bas yongs su zil mnan pas/ /rgyal po rnams ni tshar bcad
byas/ /khro rgyal gshin rje gshed de yi/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dir gsungs pa/ /sems can ma rungs rnams dang ni/ /gdul dka' 'dul bar byed pa
dang / /phan pa'i min las bzlog don dang / /phan pa nye bar 'phel phyir dang / /sems can rnams ni rjes gzung dang / /sems can srog 'chad 'gag phyir ro/ /
bram ze'i khye'u rmongs pa de/ /dbul ba khro ba chags pa yis/ /rgyal po'i srog la gnod pa'i phyir/ /khro ba'i sngags ni zlos par byed/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni//
bram ze yi ge dang po a/ /chos don dge ba ldan bdag nyid/ /bden par smra zhing dbang po thul/ /mnga' bdag mang pos bkur ces pa/ /de tshe sngags ni zlos par 'gyur//
sngags ni bsgrub par gyur pa la/ /dbang 'gyur yin gyi gzhan ma yin/ /'byung po dbang du gyur pa na/ /de tshe nor dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni//
bram ze chos don sems byed pa/ /de nas mthar ni dang yig sha /ma la'i yul du de ni 'byung / /sa steng sngags ni zlos par grags/ /bstan pa mchog la'ang rab tu dang / /
rig pa rjes gzung ma rungs dang / /tshangs pa'i srin po srin mo dang / /'byung po shin tu ma rungs bcas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sha za dang / /brtan dang 'gro ba sna tshogs ni/ /de
dag ma lus dbang du 'gyur/ /de bzhin bram ze'i mtshan ldan pa/ /thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /lho yi phyogs su bram ze ni/ /
yi ge dang po ba bstan pa/ /ston pa'i bstan pa de gtsor byed/ /mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid 'ong gis/ /sa ni rgya mtsho gnyis
mthar thug /thams cad kyi ni rgyan du byas/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /bram ze gtso bo nor chen ldan/ /dang po'i yi ge na zhes pa/ /lho yi phyogs
su yang dag bstan/ /bdag nyid chen po sngags zlos ldan/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /dbus kyi yul du bstan pa ni/ /bram ze gang ba bzang zhes
pa| |'dul ba dang ni tshul bzang nyid/ /gang ba bcom brlag dag tu gnas/ /dang yig b+ha ni nor gyi spyan/ /rgyal po rnams kyi sngags mchod byed/ /bram ze 'di dag
bstan pa ni/ /ston pa'i bstan pa mchod byed pa'o/ /thog ma bar mtha' gtso bo ste/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gnas dang rigs/ /sna tshogs phyogs kyi bram ze rnams//
bram ze gzhan gyis mchod par byed/ /mu stegs sna tshogs rigs dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs spyod yul spyod/ /gnas ni kun tu gsung ba ste/ /bram ze'i khye'u
mang thos yin/ /rang byung sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal/ /sems can kun gyi don sgrub pa/ /sems can rnams ni ma lus dang / /lha gnas kyis kyang mchod pa'o/ /
rgyal po chen po bzhi po yang / /'jig rten kun la grags pa ste/ /'phags skyes po dang mig mi bzang / /yul 'khor srung dang gnod sbyin rgyal/ /brgya byin de nas
lha rnams kyang / /nges pa'i tshig ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'thab bral lha yi bu dang ni/ /'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / /rgyal po dga' ldan gsung ba dang / /'dod
pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mchog /gcig gi ming ni brgya byin sogs/ /de bzhin 'dod khams dbang phyug yin/ /de yang rtag tu gcig gnas te/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po
gcig gi gzugs/ /de yang mtha' yas dag tu bstan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs 'chang lha/ /de las gong du thams cad mnyam/ /de yang thams cad rdzu 'phrul che//
lha yi gtso bo ming gcig ste/ /'du shes med pa'i mthar yang bstan/ /de dag gtso bo med pa ste/ /mnyam pa'i tshul du yang dag gnas/ /'og tu mnar med mthar thug
par/ /der ni rgyal po yod ma yin/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na/ de ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus su rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du chud par byas te 'dri bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba'am/ glegs bam du byas te 'chang bar
'gyur/ gus par byas te yid la byed par 'gyur/ gos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dril bu dang / rol mo dang / phreng
ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / dri dang / dri zhim po dag gis mchod par byed par 'gyur/ /ri mor byed par 'gyur/ /yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur
yid rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis chos byed par 'gyur ba de la ni/ phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ der 'di la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ char 'bab pa mi mkhas pa dang / gza' dang / 'ching ba chen po'i 'tshe ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs
pa'am/ der 'di la mi'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la dus ma yin pa'i char gyis 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /char ches pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ der
'di la rlung chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sha za thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi
'gyur/ de bzhin du g.yon can rkun po'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i rgyal pos khyer ba'i 'jigs
pa'am/ der 'di la chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la gzhan gyi sngags
kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyar ba'i dug thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa dang / rims dang / tshad par 'khru ba dang / ma zhu ba dang / yan
lag dang / nyid lag gi nad kyi 'jigs par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu shes par bya'o/ /gang du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi cho ga chen po
rab 'byams chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du byas te bzhag la/ 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / kha ton du byed na de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams kyis shin tu bzung zhing chos kyi mdzod mngon du 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig gi spyod pa la rjes su ma zhugs pa dang / dam tshig mi shes pa gzhan dag la ni rnam pa thams
cad du bstan par mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir 'di ni gsang ba yin pa'i phyir te/ 'dis ni thams cad mtshon pa yin na/ sems can rnams kyi dran pa med par ma byed cig /
'on kyang khyod kyis shes par 'gyur/ /mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur zhing bsod nams chen po yang rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can
skal ba med pa rnams la bstan par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na dbul ba dang / nad dang / mdze dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nad nyid byed par 'gyur
ro| |de bas na gzhan dag la yang bstan par mi bya'o/ /dam tshig dang / gsang ba'i sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la legs par bslab pa rnams dang / legs par rnam par bzhag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / chos kyi don
la mkhas pa dang / bsam gtan la rab tu zhugs pa dang / chos la gnas pa dang / bden par smra ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rab tu gnas shing snying
rje'i spyod pa dang rab tu ldan pa rnams te/ sems can 'di dag la bstan par bya yi/ gzhan dag la ni ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te thal mo sbyar ba byas nas
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhig bya/ 'di bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zungs shig /ngo mtshar rmad
du byung ba'i chos kyi man ngag legs par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rgyud thams cad kyi mdzod ces
bya bar yang zungs shig /theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa nges par bstan pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang
zungs shig /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /chos thams cad kyi don rdzogs pa nges par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig/
'jig rten ma lus thams cad la/ /chos dang chos min rnam spyod cing / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /gang khyod kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /de bzhin chos kyi dam pa
mchog /gsang ba gzhan ni ma mthong ngo / /sngags rgyud don dang mdo rnams dang / /'gro ba yul ni skyon med pa/ /byang chub chos la rab gzhol ba/ /dpa' bo gzhan ni
ma mthong ngo / /gang 'di bla ma gsang ba dang / /drang don mdo yis yongs su brgyan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdo don dang / /sngags dang rgyud kyi rjes 'jug pa/ /cho ga rab 'byams
'di las gzhan/ /ma byung gang yang yod ma yin/ /rgyal srid chen po longs spyod che/ /lha gnas dag tu'ang phun sum tshogs/ /de bzhin lhag
dang mi rnams kyi/ /grags pa rgyas pa'ang thob par 'gyur/ /mi khom brgyad ni spong byed cing / /dal ba dag ni thob par byed/ /theg pa rnam gsum bdag po dang / /de des
sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /mdo 'di 'dzin pa'i bsod nams dang / /de bzhin du ni phan yon ni/ /'di yi lus la mtshon mi 'byung / /dug dang mes kyang ma
yin no/ /ro langs dang ni gdon dang ni/ /de bzhin srul po ma mo dang / /srin mo sha zas 'tshe byed pa'ang / /gang zhig mdo 'di 'don la min/ /'chang ba dang ni klog
pa dang / /yang dang yang du mchod byed dang / /'jigs pa med pas mchod byed dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod byed de/ /phan yon 'di ni rab bstan pa/ /'jig
rten 'dir ni thob 'gyur ba/ /nad pa rnams ni nad las grol/ /sdug bsngal can ni bde bar 'gyur/ /dbul pos nor ni rnyed 'gyur te/ /bcings pa rnams ni
'ching las grol/ /'gro ba lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ltung ba rnams/ /bde ba zhi ba mya ngan 'das/ /mi g.yo go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/ /rang
rgyal sangs rgyas nyid dang ni/ /nyan thos mthar ni phyin par 'gyur/ /mdo sde 'di ni bklag pa yis/ /sangs rgyas sku mdog thob par 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i bye ma mnyam pa
yis/ /rgyal ba mchog ni mtha' yas par/ /mchod pas thob pa'i bsod nams dang / /mdo 'di bton pa'i bsod nams mnyam/ /'jig rten ji snyed gang su dag /
zhing ni bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /de srid phra rab rdul snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams la rtag mchod pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' btung dang / /na ba rnams kyi gsos sman dang //
rnam pa sna tshogs gnas mal rnams/ /rtag tu thams cad rab sbyin dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gos dang ni/ /phye ma dag ni kun gyis kyang / /bsod nams skye bos thob
gang yin/ /'di dag 'chang dang klog pas so/ /gang zhig rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /'jig rten nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /sa
bcu la gnas de las gzhan/ /de rnams tshad ni de mnyam la/ /de dag mchod pa'ang de bzhin te/ /gang gi lag par glegs bam chung / /mi yis de mnyam bsod nams
thob/ /'jig rten ji snyed bstan pa yang / /'jig rten khams na gnas pa yi/ /grangs med sems can ma lus pa/ /thams cad nad ni med byas te/ /skye bo gang zhig yang
dang yang / /bkur stir byas nas de mchod pa/ /chos mchog 'di la mchod na ni/ /blo ldan de yis bsod nams thob/ /bskal pa bye ba
mtha' yas par/ /rgyal ba mchog gis rtag par yang / /'jig rten mgon chos mdzod mchog 'di/ /mchod par yang ni nus so/ /chos mchog 'di ni sa steng
du| |yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra/ /'jam pa'i cho ga 'dir gsungs pa/ /bklags pa dang ni 'chang ba yis/ /des ni 'dod 'jo'i pa 'drar 'gyur/ /longs spyod
tshe nor phun sum tshogs/ /yid ni skyo ba med byas nas/ /sa steng 'di ni rab tu sgrub/ /sngags dang rgyud don drang ba'i don/ /don yod tshig ni rab bshad pa/ /bya ba dus
la brten nas ni/ /sa steng rig pa 'dzin bsgrub na/ /rin chen phun tshogs rab gang ba/ /de yi phyogs kun dag tu gsungs/ /'bras bcas 'gro ba'i bdag nyid
che| |spyod par bzang bar brjod pa yin/ /gang zhig cho ga mchog 'di las/ /rgyal po sngags gcig 'chang byed pa/ /rgyal srid phun tshogs 'dod bcas te//
tshe ring phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /rnam pa sna tshogs longs spyod tshogs/ /rgyal mchog dam pas thob par 'gyur/ /'gro dang gnas pa'i dug dag
dang / /gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig pa dang / /ro langs sngags kyis sgrub pa dang / /mtshon gyis kyang ni gnod mi 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi gnod byed gtsor byed pas/ /sa steng
'jig rten gnod mi byed/ /chom rkun nad ni gzhan dag dang / /me yi 'jigs pa de la med/ /rgyal po skye bo dag kyang rung / /su zhig de la mchod mi byed/ /gang zhig
mdo sde dkon mchog 'di/ /'chang dang klog pa'ang de bzhin no/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas/ /dbang bskur yul du nyer gnas tshe/ /mdo sde mgo la nges bcings
nas/ /yang dang yang du phyag btsal na/ /de la rkun pos mi gnod cing / /mtshon gyis de la phog mi 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs su yang dag byung / /rma bya'i gdan
la legs bkod pa/ /glang po'i mtshog ma'i steng bzhag nas/ /g.yul du yang dag zhugs byas na/ /skye bo rnam sdang de dag kun/ /mthong ba tsam gyis ldog par
byed/ /byis pa'i gzugs can bzang po ni/ /gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan/ /gser dang dngul dang ra gan gyis/ /rgyal mtshan yu ba bsgreng ba la/ /rgyal mtshan
ba dan btags nas ni/ /legs dgod legs par mnyam par gzhag /g.yul du dgras ni legs gang ba/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs byed pa/ /thams cad g.yul
du 'dus pa la/ /de yi tshen 'jug par bya/ /rgyal mtshan sgreng la gnas pa yi/ /gzhon nu las ni sna tshogs pa/ /rnam pa du ma'i gzugs
dang ldan/ /bdag nyid chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /sa bcu'i bdag po'i bdag po ni/ /mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig par byed/ /rgyal rigs rgyal po chen po ni/ /
'jig rten sa srungs gnas pa/ /dang ldan yid gnyis the tshom ni/ /rnam bral chos la mnyes gshin pa/ /bde bar gshegs la dad bskyed nas/ /snying rjes brlan
pa'i yid kyis ni/ /'dir bshad 'di dag bya ba ni/ /grub par 'dod pas rab tu bya/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba'i sngags dang ni/ /rgyud dang ldan pas sa steng du/ /chos dbyings
tshogs pa'i rgyal ba yis/ /gsung rab 'di ga nges par bstan/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam gnas pa'i/ /rgyal mchog snga ma grangs med pas/ /sa yi steng
gi mi rnams la'ang / /chos kyi mdzod ni gsungs pa yin/ /lha dang lha min sngon g.yul 'thab/ /pha rol 'jigs pa byung ba na/ /gang tshe brgya byin sngon gyur pa//
dpung ni pham byas zhes sdang bas/ /de tshe gcig tu song nas ni/ /sa steng rnam par du bar gyur/ /rgyal mchog 'od srung de la ni/ /thub pa mchog la de tshe zhus/ /ji ltar
bya zhes tshig tu ni/ /bde sogs bdag pos rnam par smras/ /mi bzad lha min gyis pham nas/ /bdag kyang 'dir ni yang dag lhags/ /de skad bcom ldan gsol na sa
ni| |lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ /de che thub mchog zhabs gnyis la/ /spyi bo'i gtsug gis rab btud nas/ /mig stong ko'u shi ka ni/ /de yi spyan sngar 'dug par
gyur/ /de skad gsol nas thub mchog ni/ /bram zer gyur pa 'od srung gis/ /de che gsung du bka' stsal pa/ /ka la ping+ka'i sgra skad du/ /rgyal ba mchog gis sngon
gsungs pa/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag 'byung / /bdag nyid chen po 'jam dpal ni/ /rnyed dka' sku ni 'bum gyur pa/ /yang dag mtha' la gnas nas ni/ /zab
mo'i don gyi don ston byed/ /spros med rnam pa med pa dang / /gnas med pa la gzugs byas nas/ /shin tu don ldan chos kyang ston/ /lha yi dbang phyug de ni dran/ /de nas
de ni da dran pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' dran tsam gyis/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs can ni/ /der ni de yi mod la lhags/ /der ni bcom ldan 'das dang ni/ /bcom
ldan lha yi dbang phyug bcas/ /lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' des/ /de tshe rgyal ba mchog la btud/ /rgyal ba mchog kun phyag 'tshal nas/ /'od chen 'od srung
la yang btud/ /de tshe thub pas rjes gnang nas/ /sngags kyi tshig ni 'di smras so/ /namaHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaHa pra ti ha ta shA sa ne b+h+yaH/
oM ha na ha na/ sarba b+ha yod A da ya trA sA ya/ mo Ta ya/ tshin+d+ha/ b+hin+d+ha/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pas sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ri dang rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das thams cad kyi zhing mtha' yas pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs kyi mthar thug pa thams cad dang bcas pa yang rab tu 'gul bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'jigs pa dang bral nas ba spu langs
te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob nas/ mig gnyis phye ste stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas
shing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon du bltas nas sngags kyi tshig de dag gzungs ste yid la byas nas phyir yang shing rta la zhon te lha ma yin gang
yin pa de logs su phyin par gyur to/ /de nas lha ma yin thams cad rgya mtsho chen po'i mtha'i 'gram du gang rang gi grong khyer gang yin pa der mngon du phyogs shing
song bar gyur te/ sems zhum zhing nyams la dpung gi 'jigs pas sems dkrugs shing gdong gi mdog nyams shing nga rgyal dang / dregs pa la sogs pa dang
bral bar gyur la/ mtshon cha dang bral zhing ri 'bigs byed 'bar ba bzhin du lha'i dbang phyug de mthong nas byer bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag /ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha ma yin las bdag cag nges par
rgyal bas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar bya'o/ /rang rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du song nas khyed cag rtse ba dang / dga' ba yongs su spyod par gyis shig /de nas lha
de dag thams cad yid shin tu dga' nas phyir yang rang gi gnas su log par gyur ro/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/
gang bdag gis gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyi gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa de byas la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la'ang btags na/ des na gong gi lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa mi
'byung ngo zhes bstan to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis chen po la 'os pa'i nor bu rin po che nang 'od dang ldan zhing gsal
ba'i phreng ba blangs nas gzhon nu'i cha byad kyi gzugs brnyan byas te/ steng gi khang bzangs su grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa'i dbus na lha rnams kyi mdun sa chos
bzang gi rtse mor rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba legs par bkod pa byas nas bzhag par gyur to/ /de nas lha ma yin de dag rab tshim byed dang / thag bzangs ris la
sogs lha rnams kyi steng du mi 'gro zhing lha de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur la/ rdzu 'phrul las rnam par 'phrul pa'am/ /g.yul mngon du phyogs
par 'gro bar mi nus so/ /de ltar lo bye ba khri phrag du ma mi ma yin pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar yang lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
du phan yon dpag tu med pa bstan pa dang / tshe dang / nad med pa 'phel bar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos kyang sngon du gsungs pa yin no/ /de bzhin du phan yon gyi yon tan mchog 'di dag rgya che ba dang / mtha' yas shing mu med pa sngon gsungs pa yin no/
gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs sam/ /rnam par rtog par byed na bsod nams ma yin pa dpag tu med par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing dmyal bar yang skye bar
'gyur la/ dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi skye ba ngan par yang 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sman dang / sngags rnams med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
med do/ /de rnams bdag nyid chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa yang med do/ /cho ga rgya che ba yang med do/ /'phags pa ma yin pas bshad do zhes
byas nas spong ba'am/ yang na 'gro zhing 'di nyan par mi nus so zhes gnas de las gzhan du 'gro na de dag la bsod nams ma yin pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur
ro| |ci ste blo chung ba gang gis chos 'di ni thub pa mchog dang / thub pa'i sras blo dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /zhes rab tu spong bar byed do/ /mi de dmyal
bar 'gro 'gyur zhing / /de nyams nas ni dud 'gror 'gro/ /thig nag dang ni yang sos dang / /spu gri so dang me ma mur/ /ro myags chu bo rab med skye/ /de nas phyir
yang spu gri sor/ /lo ma ral gri lta bu'i nags/ /yang na kyi hud zer de bzhin/ /'jig rten grags pa so thams thams/ /sdig pa'i las kyi dmyal ba ru/ /gang gis
chos ni sun byed pa/ /des ni skye bo de dag 'gro/ /'jig rten smad par rab bstan pa/ /mi bzad mnar med pa zhes bya/ /ma dad sems kyis
chos spangs pa/ /sdig pa'i las can gnas yin te/ /gang zhig chos ni 'di 'jigs pa/ /de la skye bo de 'tshed 'gyur/ /kun gyi mthar thug mnar med pa/ /de nyams
de bzhin dmyal chen skye/ /dmyal ba'i sa mtha' mtha' yas par/ /rtag tu blo med de ni 'gro/ /mdo sde de ni rgya cher bcas/ /chos kyi nor kun rab spangs nas/ /de
nas 'jig rten ngan par 'gro/ /dbang med rtag par dbang du 'gro/ /gang zhig mdo sde'i cho ga 'di/ /sngags dang rgyud kyis legs par brgyan/ /grub pa sna tshogs
brgya rnams 'thob/ /yang dag mtha' ni sgrib pa med/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi sku nyid yin/ /dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /cho ga cho ga rgya chen bcas/ /le'u
rab 'byams 'dis 'dren byed/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni legs dgod pa/ /phun tshogs dpal dang blo gros mchod/ /rtsa ba'i cho ga mi nyung ba/ /rgya che mang por
bstan pa yin/ /rtag dang chad dang thog mtha' ni/ /gnyi ga'i mtha' don rnam par spangs/ /rim bcas rim ni nges par bstan/ /sngags kyi lus ni btus pa
yin/ /me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang / /stong pa'i de nyid legs gsungs pa/ /spangs pa rtag tu 'gro ba ni/ /'og nas 'og tu de che 'gro/ /bskal pa rnams mang gsum gyi
grangs/ /de tshe bsod nams yongs bsags nas/ /de tshe byang chub thob nas ni/ /bdag dang rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi don gsungs pa/ /'gro ba yul
ni sdig med pa'o/ /rtsa ba'i cho ga dag byed dang / /sdig pa med cing bkra shis pa'i/ /le'u rab 'byams rab gsungs pa/ /nges pa'i mdo sde bzang po yin/ /sa bdag
yon tan bdag nyid che/ /yul dang dus kyi sbyor ba dang / /rgyal sras mi ru skyes pa yis/ /sa steng dam pa'i chos bstan ces/ /'jig rten gtso bo thub pa ni/ /rgyal ba bdun
pas bstan pa yin/ /cho ga rgya cher gsungs pa ni/ /blo dang dpal ni mngon par 'phel/ /rtsa ba rab 'byams le'u zhes/ /sngags dang rgyud dang ldan pa de/ /gang zhig mdo
mchog gtso bo 'di/ /rgyal bas mchod pa'i chos kyi mdzod/ /sa steng mis ni spong byed pa/ /de ni mnar med dmyal bar 'gro/ /bskal pa chen por de 'tshed ces/ /
rnam pa du mar dbye bar bstan/ /nam zhig gang du 'byung ba ni/ /mi yi lus su skyes na yang / /dbul zhing nad mang glen pa dang / /kla klo dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /'jig
rten smad par 'gro ba ste/ /de ni mdze can nad par 'gyur/ /lkugs shing 'on pa yan lag nyams/ /blo nyams long ba nyid dang ni/ /rtsub cing rtag tu
'jig pa'i gzugs/ /sa steng yi dwags lta bur snang / /gros ngan sems ni zhan pa dang / /sen mo dang ni lus kyang ngan/ /srin bu rnams kyis zos pa dang / /shu ba
g.yan par yang dag ldan/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab spangs na/ /gang dang gang gi 'gro bar 'gro/ /de dang der ni skye ba na/ /blo ngan rmongs par skye bar 'gyur/ /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
ngas la btsugs te mig phye zhing mi 'dzum pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs
du ma chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus pa shes nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs
'di ni ngo mtshar te mchog tu legs par gsungs pa lags na/ de la/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mi rigs pa'i chags pas zil
gyis non pa/ slu bar byed pa/ nga rgyal can/ ma dad pa/ gya gyu can/ dum rgod/ tshul khrims 'chal ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag sngags rnams kyi rtog pa'i bdag
nyid chen po rgyas pa grub pa dang / dus dang / yul dang / nges par sdom pa dang / sngags dang / spyod pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa nges par sdom pa dang / chog rab
'byams dag la ma dad par 'gyur/ yid mi byed par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no zhes byas nas spang bar 'gyur te/ de dag nyon mongs pa'i sems
su gyur nas dus byed par 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal drag cing tsha ba'i tshor pa myong zhing de dag dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sdug bsngal ba'i
sems can de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa la spyi bor byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir rab tu zhugs pa khyod kyang legs so/ /legs
so| |'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa/ khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa de khyed yang legs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ de'i
phyir legs par shin tu rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir
zhugs pa dang / lha dang / mi rnams dang / 'jig rten la rab tu brtse ba'i phyir ngas khyod la bshad do/ /spyod pa thams cad la zhugs pa dang / byang chub kyi lam
dang / thams cad shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi skul gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po
mchog tu gsang ba/ gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang 'di dran par bya'o/ /de gang zhe na/ na mo stai ya d+h+ya ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/

ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ oM ku mA ra rlu pi Ne/ bi shwa saM b+ha ba/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ la hu la hu/ b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ dzi na dzi ka/ many+dzu shri ye/ su shrI ye/ tA ra ya mAM/
sarba duHkhe b+h+yaHphaT phaT/ sha ma ya/ sha ma ya/ a mr-i tong b+ha ba/ pA paM me nA sha ya swAhA/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ni khyod kyi snying po dam pa yin te/ zhi ba thams
cad byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu grol bar byed pa/ tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / skal pa
bzang po mchog dang / ngag gi dbang phyug skyed par byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad gzengs bstod par byed pa/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'di
gsungs ma thag tu sa chen po ri dang / rgya mtsho dang bcas pa/ sems can dang snod nye ba'i mthar thug pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad
de yi dwags kyi 'gro ba dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / dmyal ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu sbyangs shing bde ba rnams kyang
rab tu thob par 'gyur la/ 'jam dpal/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yang yid la byed cing de'i tshe dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems kyang med par 'gyur na bdud sdig to can
gyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar yang sems bskyed par bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas dang / chos ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bsam pa'am/ gzhal ba'am/ spong ba ni bdag cag gis ci zhig nus te/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i
mdo las/ phan yon dang / nyes dmigs kyi nus par ba 'byams bstan pa'i le'u sum cu drug pa rdzogs so// //bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / gnas
gtsang ma'i steng na gnas pa'i lha'i bu'i tshogs rnams dang / sems can bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grub pa dang / rig 'dzin dang / drang srong mchog dam pa du ma dang / 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byams pa dang / mthu chen thob dang / mthu chen gnas dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra bar bzhugs pa'i sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams thugs rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //dpal lha btsan po lha btsun pa byang chub 'od kyi bkas/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge bsnyen chen po
ku mA ra ka la sha dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sid+d+ha e ka bI ra mahA
tan+t+ra ra dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpa' bo gcig pu grub pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal
bo gcig grub dpa' bo'i gtso/ /rab mchog smra ba rnams kyi mchog /'gro ba'i bla ma 'jam rdo rjes/ /'jig rten don du rgyud rab gsungs/ /lha nyid gsang sngags tshul
gyis ni/ /dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad pa/ /sngags pas de nyid bsgoms nas ni/ /de grub na ni de 'grub 'gyur/ /sngags pa lus ni rnam dag dang / /gang tshe dngos
grub phra mo 'grub/ /snod du gyur pa'i lus la ni/ /dngos grub chen po rab tu skye/ /rim pa 'di yis 'di la ni/ /sa la sogs pa 'thob pa skye/ /sngags pas yid bzhin
nor bu ltar/ /rtag tu sems can don byed do/ /de ltar mkhyen nas thugs brtses non/ /rdo rjes 'chang sogs kyis zhus tshe/ /grub pa'i gsang
sngags bsdus pa ni/ /'gro ba'i don du gsungs pa yin/ /oM kA lu me lu kA lu me stam+b+ha ya shi lA baR+ShaM tu ShA rany+tsa luts+tsha i luts+tsha i swAhA/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po
'di legs par bzlas na ser ba gcod par byed do/ /dran pa nyid dang / thal ba la mngon par bzlas na ser ba 'bab pa'am/ kha ba 'bab pa gcod par 'gyur zhing
gang du 'dod pa der 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du glog dang / rlung dang / rdo rje dang / thog 'bab pa la sogs pa med par byed do/ /oM ga ru Da haM sa he/ tsa la tsa la swAhA/ sngags
kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa nyid na ser ba 'bab pa zlog par byed do/ /rdo rgyus kyis rnga pa Ta ha la bris shing rnga lcags la mngon par bzlas pa'i rnga pa Ta ha'i sgras ser ba zlog

par byed do/ /de bzhin du dung la sogs pa'i sgras kyang bya'o/ /oM he he/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/ ni run+d+ha ni run+d+ha/ de ba da ta ur+N+Na ma Ni swAhA/ gsang sngags
kyi rgyal po 'di sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshogs 'bum phrag gcig yongs su bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /glog dang / rlung dang / rdo rje dang / thog 'bang
pa'am| kha ba la sogs pa dran pa tsam nyid kyis zlog par byed do/ /char ches pa la thal pa dang / yungs kar la mngon par bzlas na char ches pa gcod pa
dang / byi ba dang / sbrang ma la sogs pa'i mchu 'ching bar byed do/ /skyed mos tshal lam/ zhing la bya dang / 'bu srin dang / byi ba rnams kyis nye bar 'tshe ba zlog par
byed do/ /dur khrod kyi ras la ming dang bcas pa'i sngags bris la spra tshil gyis gtums te dur khrod kyi bum par bcug nas kha bcad de de nyid du sbas pas mngal
rengs par byed do/ /phyung nas 'o ma dang / chus bkrus te chur bor bas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yung ba'am/ ba blas gro ga'am/ gos sam/ lo ma la mngon par bris te
spra tshil gyi nang du gtums pa'i sngags 'di grog mkhar gyis las 'jigs byed kyi gzugs su byas pa de'i snying gar bcug ste thal bas bkang nas sbas na rgol
pa dang / phyir rgol pa'i kha rengs par byed do/ /rtsod sbyong byed pa na gzugs de nyid kyi lce la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i tsher ma bdun gyis btsugs na kha
'ching ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rgyus kyis khams phor la bris te thal bas bkang la kha sbyar du byas te sbas na ni mi snyan par smra ba'i kha rengs par byed do/ /rdza mkhan gyi lag
pa phyis nas 'jim pa las lug gi gzugs byas pa'i snying gar spra tshil gyis gtums pa'i sngags bcug na khros pa'i kha rengs par byed do/ /ske'am
dpung pa la btags na g.yul ngogs kyi mtshon cha'i dpal zhi bar byed do/ /grog mkhar gyi 'jim pa las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po'i rkang pa'i mthil du sngags
kyi rgyal po bcug ste bzhi mdor sbas na 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba thams cad rengs par byed cing brtags pa byed pa thams cad rengs par byed do/ /gro ga'am/ gos la
sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bris la spra tshil gyis gtums te de nyid kyi khong par bcug la bum pa sar pa chus bkang ba'i nang du bcug na yongs su brtag pa rengs par
byed do/ /bla gos kyi mtha' ma la sngags rjes su dran zhing mdud pa bcings pas lam du rkun po la sogs pa rengs par byed cing nags kyi ba men la sogs pa rwa
can rnams dang / mche ba can rnams rengs par byed do/ /gyo mol lan bdun bzlas te chur bcug na chu gnas pa rnams kha bcings par byed do/ /dur khrod kyi ras
la pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs kyi gtso bo'i ming smos pa'i sngags sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su bris pa sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyi rol du yi ge laM brgyad bris shing phyi rol
dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa bris te/ phyogs rdo rjes brgyan pa'i spra tshil las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po'i khong par bcug pa'i sngags pha rol gyi dpung
gi tshogs kyi sa mtshams su bcug na dpung gi tshogs rengs par byed do/ /sngags oM gnyis kyi kha sbyor du bcug la yi ge tha zung gis yongs su bskor ba'i phyi rol
du yi ge laM brgyad kyis bskor ba dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyis non pa/ sna tshogs rdo rjes nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ grog mkhar gyi 'jim pa las byas pa'i
tshogs kyi bdag po'i khong par bcug nas dur khrod kyi bum pa'i nang du bcug ste dur khrod du sbas pa'am/ phub ma'i sbyin sreg gis pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs rengs
par byed do/ /grong khyer tshig pa'i me la mngon du phyogs shing sngags 'dis mngon par sngags ba'i chu snyim pa bdun rab tu gtor na khyim gang bsrung bar 'dod pa'i
khyim de srung bar byed do/ /thal bas mgul ba bcings pas skyugs pa zlog par byed do/ /mthe'u chung gi rtse dam du btsir la sngags brjod pas skyigs bu med par
byed do/ /thal ba mngon par sngags pas mig rengs pa sos par byed do/ /'brum bu la sogs pa rnam par 'tshe ba la byang bu la bris te khyim gang gi sgor btags
pa'i khyim der 'brum bu la sogs pa'i rnam par 'tshe ba zlog par byed do/ /nya dang / sha dang / chang dang / 'bras chan la sogs pa sbyin
par 'gyur ba las grong gi phyi rol gyi char gtor ma chen po gtang bar bya ba'am/ yam shing lnga dang / 'bru lnga'i bye brag mar la btags pas grong gi dbus su
zhi ba'i thab khung du byas la sbyin sreg byas na bdud dang / rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad rengs par byed do/ /gang 'ga' zhig la grong la sogs pa 'byin par
'gyur ba la bzlas pa tsam gyis zlog par byed do/ /rtag tu bzlas na lha dang / lha ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal rje btsun
